33a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchog tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems dma' ba lags/ ji ltar na/ le lo can lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu brtson pa lags/ bka'
33b1(mdo sde): stsal pa| mchog tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab dang ye shes kyis so/ /sems dma' ba ni/ nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ro/ /le lo can ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par bya ba la'o/ /
33b2(mdo sde): rtag tu brtson pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ mi srun par yang gyis shig /dul ba'i sa la gnas par yang gyis shig /'jigs
33b3(mdo sde): par yang gyis shig / seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi srun pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dul
33b4(mdo sde): ba'i sa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ 'jigs pa lags/ ji ltar na/ seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ mi srun par bya ba ni/ bdud thams cad gdul
33b5(mdo sde): ba'i phyir ro/ /dul ba'i sa la gnas pa ni/ sems can cang shes gdul ba'i phyir ro/ /'jigs par bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad las so/ /seng+ge'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon par bya ba ni/
33b6(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dma' dbab pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ yid du 'ong bar yang gyis shig /yid du mi 'ong bar yang gyis shig /smad du med par
33b7(mdo sde): yang gyis shig / smad du yod par yang gyis shig /gsol phu/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid du 'ong ba lags/ ji ltar na/ yid du mi 'ong ba lags/
34a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ smad du ma chis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ smad du chis pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba ni/ yon tan gyis phyug pa'i phyir
34a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs su byin pa'o/ /yid du mi 'ong ba na/ mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir bdud thams cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'o/ /smad du med pa
34a3(mdo sde): ni| lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro/ /smad du yod pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la smod pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rma
34a4(mdo sde): byung ba rnams la rma ma 'byin cig / rma ma byung ba rnams la rma byung zhig /ye shes tshol cig/ ye shes kyi bya ba rnams la dga' bar ma byed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
34a5(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma byung ba rnams la rma mi 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rma ma byung ba rnams la rma 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ye shes tshol ba lags/ ji ltar
34a6(mdo sde): na| ye shes kyi bgyi ba rnams la mi dga' ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ de la rma dbyung bar mi bya'o/ /rma
34a7(mdo sde): ma byung ba rnams zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i skye bo thams cad de/ de dag ni/ rma dbyung bar bya'o/ /ye shes btsal bar bya ba ni/ zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /ye shes kyi bya ba la
34b1(mdo sde): dga' bar mi bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas su ltung bar mi bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta bas na/ mnyam par gzhag par yang gyis shig /sems rnam par g.yeng
34b2(mdo sde): bar yang gyis shig / sems mi gnas par yang gyis shig /rtag tu snyoms par zhugs par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
34b3(mdo sde): mnyam par bzhag pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems rnam par g.yeng bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ sems mi gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa lags/
34b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ mnyam par gzhag pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyis so/ /sems rnam par g.yeng bar bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi sems las so/ /mi gnas pa ni/ de la ma chags pa'i phyir
34b5(mdo sde): ro| |rtag tu snyoms par zhugs pa ni/ sems can thams cad sems mnyam pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bsreg par bya ba ni/ sregs shing / tshig
34b6(mdo sde): pa ni| skyed cig / skyed pa ni/ thod zhig /rnam par phye ba ni/ sos shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsreg par bgyi ba sreg pa lags/
34b7(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ tshig pa rnams skyed pa lags/ ji ltar na/ skye pa rnams gtong pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnam par phye na rnams sdud pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bsreg par bya ba sreg pa ni/ nyon
35a1(mdo sde): mongs pa thams cad shes rab kyi mes sreg pa'o/ /tshig bskyed pa na/ srabs kyis phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzung ba'o/ /skyes nas
35a2(mdo sde): gtong ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa la snying las su bya ba'o/ /rnam par phye bas bsdu ba zhes bya ba de ni/ yongs su bsngo ba'i tshig bla dwags te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /
35a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ dus ma yin pa ni/ dus su shes par gyis shig /dus ni/ dus ma yin par shes par gyis shig /dus dang dus ma yin pa la mkhas par yang gyis
35a4(mdo sde): shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus ma lags pa la dus 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ dus la dus ma lags par 'tshal ba
35a5(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ dus dang dus ma lags pa la mkhas pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang nyan thos kyis thob par bya ba'i dus de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i dus ma yin no/ /pha rol
35a6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dus so/ /dus dang dus
35a7(mdo sde): ma yin pa la mkhas par bya ba ni/ dus bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'byor ba ni/ phye shig /ma 'byor pa ni/
35b1(mdo sde): sbyor cig /'byor pa dang / ma 'byor pa la chags par yang ma byed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byor pa 'byed pa lags/ ji
35b2(mdo sde): ltar na| ma 'byor pa ni/ sbyor ba lags/ ji ltar na/ sbyor ba dang / mi sbyor ba la ma chags pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'byor pa ni/ phyin ci log bzhi 'khor ba'i 'dam dang
35b3(mdo sde): 'byor pa ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dbye bar bya'o/ /ma 'byor pa ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshul bzhin yid la bya ba ste/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpas sbyar ba'o/ /'byor
35b4(mdo sde): pa dang ma 'byor pa la chags par mi bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa la ma chags par bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta
35b5(mdo sde): bas na| dbugs phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs ma phyung zhig /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni/ dbugs phyung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
35b6(mdo sde): dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyin pa rnams dbugs mi dbyung ba ni/
35b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi pa'o/ /dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba ni/ yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ste/ de ni/
36a1(mdo sde): tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ rma byung bar yang gyis shig /ma rmas par yang gyis shig /rma byung ba rnams ni/ sos par yang gyis shig /
36a2(mdo sde): rma ma byung ba rnams ni/ ma dbyung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rma 'byin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ma rmas pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rma
36a3(mdo sde): byung ba rnams gso ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rma ma byung ba rma mi 'byin pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rma byung ba ni/ yan lag dang nying lag yongs su btang ba'i phyir ro/ /ma rmas par bya
36a4(mdo sde): ba ni| sems kyis so/ /rma byung ba rnams gso ba ni/ ltung ba byung ba rnams chos bzhin du bcos pa'o/ rma ma byung ba rma mi dbyung ba ni/ srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las 'gal bar mi bya
36a5(mdo sde): ba ste| de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ nye bar 'tshor med par yang gyis shig /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar yang gyis shig /ma bsags pa rnams kyang
36a6(mdo sde): sogs shig / bsags pa rnams kyang chud ma gzan cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nye bar 'tsho ba ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na/
36a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba lags/ ji ltar na/ ma bsags pa gsog pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bsags pa chud mi gzon pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'tsho ba med
36b1(mdo sde): pa ni| bdud dang mu stegs can thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed pa'o/ /sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ni/ dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu'o/ /ma bsags pa gsog pa ni/ dge ba'i
36b2(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro/ /bsags pa chud mi gzon pa ni/ dge ba'i sems skyes so cog byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na| stobs chung
36b3(mdo sde): bar yang gyis shig / stobs dang ldan par yang gyis shig /rten med par yang gyis shig /dpung gnyen med par yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
36b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams stobs chung ba lags/ ji ltar na/ stobs dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rten ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa lags/ bka'
36b5(mdo sde): stsal pa| stobs chung du bya ba ni/ gnod par byed pa rnams la lan mi bya'o/ /stobs dang ldan par bya ba ni/ phan pa mi byed pa rnams la bzod pas phan gdags pa'o/ /rten med par bya
36b6(mdo sde): ba ni| so so rang gis shes pas so/ /dpung gnyen med par bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ dang ba dag ni/ rnyog pa can du
36b7(mdo sde): gyis shig / rnyog pa can dag ni/ dang bar gyis shig /rnyog pa med par yang gyis shig /rtag tu dang bar yang gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
37a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang ba dag ni/ rnyog pa can du bgyi ba lags/ ji ltar na/ rnyog pa can dag ni/ dang bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rnyog pa ma
37a2(mdo sde): mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na/ rtag tu dang ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dang ba dag rnyog pa can du bya ba ni/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bsgo
37a3(mdo sde): ba'o| |rnyog pa can dag dang bar bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa la rnyog pa'i sems byang chub kyi sems su dang bar bya ba'o/ /rnyog pa med par bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'o/ /
37a4(mdo sde): rtag tu dang bar bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad la sems dang ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag| de lta bas na/ lugs las ldog par 'jug par yang gyis shig /lugs
37a5(mdo sde): bzhin du'ang slobs shig / spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud kyang shes par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lugs las ldog par 'jug
37a6(mdo sde): pa lags/ ji ltar na/ lugs bzhin du slob pa lags/ ji ltar na/ spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud 'tshal ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ lugs las ldog par 'jug par bya ba ni/ byis
37a7(mdo sde): pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa las phyir log pa'o/ /lugs bzhin du bslab pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la'o/ /spyi'u tshugs kyi rgyud shes par bya ba ni/
37b1(mdo sde): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las log ste 'dod pa'i khams su snang bar bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bdud rtsi dang
37b2(mdo sde): dug tu ma 'dres par gyis shig / dug med pa rnams dang ma sten cig /dug dang ldan pa rnams la bdud rtsi'i sbyin pa gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
37b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams bdud rtsi dang dug tu ma 'dres pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dug ma mchis pa rnams dang mi sten pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dug dang ldan pa rnams la bdud rtsi'i sbyin pa
37b4(mdo sde): bgyid pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi zhes bya ba ni/ bag yod pa'o/ /dug ces bya ba ni/ bag med pa ste/ de la byang chub sems dpas bag yod par bya zhing bag med pa'i
37b5(mdo sde): sems dang ma 'dres par bya'o/ /dug med pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos rnams te/ de dag dang bsten par mi bya'o/ /dug dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams te/ de dag
37b6(mdo sde): la bdud rtsi bstan par bya ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ mngon par dga' bar bya ba la ni/ mngon par dga' bar ma byed cig /mngon par dga' bar mi bya ba la
37b7(mdo sde): ni| mngon par dga' bar gyis shig / dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan par yang gyis shig /dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su bcad par yang gyis shig/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
38a1(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyi ba la mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid pa lags| ji ltar na/ mngon par dga' bar
38a2(mdo sde): mi bgyi ba la mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dga' ba dang 'dod chags dang ldan pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dga' ba dang 'dod chags yongs su gcod pa lags/
38a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ de dag la mngon par dga' bar mi bya'o/ /mngon par mi dga' ba ni/ bdud rnams
38a4(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ste/ de la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/ /dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang ldan par bya ba ni/ 'khor ba na sred pa ni/ zla yin no/ /dga' ba dang / 'dod
38a5(mdo sde): chags yongs su bcad pa ni/ 'gog pa yongs su shes par bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ bcing bas bcings par yang gyis shig /bcing bas bcings
38a6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang khrol cig / grol ba rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur gyis shig /ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub
38a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams bcing bas bcings pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bcings pa rnams dgrol ba lags/ ji ltar na/ grol ba rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ ma
38b1(mdo sde): grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ bcing bas bcings bar bya ba ni/ bslab pa'i bcings pas so/ /bcings pa 'grol ba ni/ sred pa'i bcings pa las so/ /
38b2(mdo sde): grol ba rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la'o/ /ma grol ba rnams kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba ste/
38b3(mdo sde): de ni| tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ 'dod par bya ba rnams la ni/ 'dod par gyis shig /'dod par mi bya ba rnams la ni/ 'dod par ma byed cig /'dod pa dang bral bar
38b4(mdo sde): yang gyis shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'tshal bar bgyi ba rnams 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na| 'tshal bar mi bgyi ba rnams
38b5(mdo sde): mi 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ 'tshal pa dang bral ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod par mi bya ba ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad de/ de
38b6(mdo sde): dag la 'dod par mi bya'o/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'dod par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams te/ de dag la 'dod par bya'o/ /'dod pa dang bral bar bya ba ni/ brgya
38b7(mdo sde): byin dang tshangs par skye ba la blta ste/ /de ni/ tshul lo/ rigs kyi bu dag /dre lha bas na/ ji tsam du tshang ba'i sa bon la'ang ma brnyas shig /zhing tshad med pa la'ang mos par gyis shig /thob
39a1(mdo sde): pa chen po ni/ ma sgrubs shig/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji tsam du chung ba'i sa bon la'ang
39a2(mdo sde): brnyas par mi bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ zhing tshad ma mchis pa la mos pa lags/ ji ltar na/ thob pa chen po mi sgrub pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ji tsam du chung ba'i sa
39a3(mdo sde): bon zhes bya ba ni/ ji tsam du chung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ste/ de la brnyas par mi bya'o/ /zhing tshad med pa la'ang mos par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas la phul ba'i sbyin pa tshad med pa la
39a4(mdo sde): mos par bya'o/ /thob pa chen po mi sgrub pa ni/ sems can thams cad la sbyin pa'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ chags pa rnams ni/ khong
39a5(mdo sde): du chud par gyis shig / chags pa rnams la ni/ spyod cig /chags pa la zhen pa rnams la ni/ ltos shig /chags pa med par ni/ ma ltung zhig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
39a6(mdo sde): 'das| ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags pa rnams 'tshal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ chags pa rnams la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar na/ chags pa la zhen pa
39a7(mdo sde): rnams la lta ba lags/ ji ltar na/ chags pa ma mchis pa nyid du mi ltung ba lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa dang / khong khro
39b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems te/ de gnyis ni/ byang chub sems dpas bsrung bar bya'o/ /chags pa rnams la spyad pa ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa rnams su'o/ /chags pa med pa
39b2(mdo sde): nyid du mi ltung ba ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med par te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ yang bar yang gyis shig /khur chen po'ang khyer cig /ma blangs pa ni/ ma len
39b3(mdo sde): cig / blangs pa ni/ nyams 'og tu chud par gyis shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang ba lags/ ji ltar na/ khur chen po khyer ba
39b4(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ ma blangs pa mi len pa lags/ ji ltar na/ blangs pa nyams 'og tu chud par bgyid pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ yang bar bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams
39b5(mdo sde): cad bcad do/ /khur chen po skur ba ni/ sems can thams cad do/ /ma blangs pa mi blang pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /blangs pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba ni/ theg
39b6(mdo sde): pa chen po ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ smad par yang gyis shig /bstod par yang gyis shig /nye bar bsnyen par yang gyis shig /spang par yang gyis shig /gsol
39b7(mdo sde): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smod pa lags/ ji ltar na/ bstod pa lags/ ji ltar na/ nye bar bsnyen pa lags/ ji ltar na/ spang ba lags /
40a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ smad pa ni/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad smad pa'o/ /bstod pa ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad bstod pa'o/ /bsnyen pa ni/ 'phags
40a2(mdo sde): pa'i lam mo/ /spang pa ni/ mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi lam thams cad de/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang
40a3(mdo sde): 'khor dag tu ni/ bsam gtan gyi stobs ston cig /dgon pa dang / bas mtha' rnams su ni/ nyon mongs pa chung bar ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na /
40a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor rnams su bsam gtan gyi stobs ston pa lags/ ji ltar na/ dgon pa dang / bas
40a5(mdo sde): mtha' rnams su nyon mongs pa chung bar ston pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor dag tu phyin pa na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri
40a6(mdo sde): dang / ro dang / reg bya rags pa dag snang bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ bsam gtan gyi stobs kyis mnan par bya'o/ /dgon pa dang / bas mtha' rnams na 'dug pa'i tshe nyon mongs pa
40a7(mdo sde): gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/ dben pa'i yon tan gyis mnan par bya ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ chu'i nang na'ang 'dug par gyis shig /rtag par
40b1(mdo sde): skom par yang gyis shig / skom pa'ang sol cig /skom pa med par ma byed cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chab kyi nang nam mchis pa
40b2(mdo sde): lags| ji ltar na/ rtag tu skom pa lags/ ji ltar na/ skom pa bsal ba lags/ ji ltar na/ skom pa ma mchis par mi bgyid pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chu'i nang na 'dug par bya
40b3(mdo sde): ba ni| chos kyi tshul gnas par bya ba'o/ /rtag par skom par bya ba ni/ chos kyis skom par byas pa'o/ /skom pa bsal ba ni/ chos kyis chos kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'o/ /skom pa med par mi bya
40b4(mdo sde): ba ni| 'dus ma byas su ltung bar mi bya ba ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ gcig pu grogs med par yang gyis shig /g.yog mang po dang / 'khor mang po dang ldan par
40b5(mdo sde): yang gyis shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams gcig pu grogs ma mchis par yang bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na/ g.yog mang po dang /
40b6(mdo sde): 'khor mang po dang ldan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gcig pu grogs med par bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa la'o/ /g.yog mang po dang ldan par bya ba ni/
40b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'o/ /'khor mang po dang ldan par pa ba la/ 'khor mang po zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs
41a1(mdo sde): kyi bu dag / de lta bas na/ grol bar yang gyis shig /btson rar chud par yang gyis shig pha rol tu phyin par yang gyis shig /chu bo chen po'i nang du
41a2(mdo sde): 'dug par yang gyis shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams grol ba lags/ ji ltar na/ btson rar chud pa lags/ ji ltar na /
41a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar na/ chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ grol bar bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa dang / bdud kyi bcing ba thams cad las so/ /
41a4(mdo sde): btson rar chud par yang bya ba ni/ bsam bzhin du skye ba rnams su'o/ /pha rol tu phyin par yang bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa la'o/ /chu bo chen po'i nang na gnas
41a5(mdo sde): par yang bya ba ni/ chu bo bzhis khyer ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i phyir te/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /rigs kyi bu dag /de lta bas na/ tshad yod pa la'ang so sor rtog par gyis shig /tshad
41a6(mdo sde): med par yang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par gyis shig / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshad mchis pa la'ang so sor rtog pa lags /
41a7(mdo sde): ji ltar na/ tshad ma mchis pa la'ang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /tshad yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus
41b1(mdo sde): byas so| |tshad med pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpas 'dus byas kyang spang bar mi bya ste/ 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang yang
41b2(mdo sde): 'grogs par mi bya'o/ /'dus ma byas la'ang brtag par bya ste/ skyon med par yang 'jug par mi bya'o/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis
41b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying por mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ de ni/ tshul lo/ /tshul gyi tshig 'di dag bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgyad stong ni/ byang chub tu sems
41b4(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'
41b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod
41b6(mdo sde): do| |'phags pa chos kyi tshul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bra dz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas
41b7(mdo sde): sgyur cing / zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+harma skan+d+ho nA ma ma hA yA na sU hra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas
42a1(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na
42a2(mdo sde): shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal
42a3(mdo sde): gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgrag can zin bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
42a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
42a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi phung po chos kyi phung po zhes bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po'i tshad ji tsam gyis chos kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal/ chos kyi phung po ni /
42a6(mdo sde): ji tsam zhig /chos kyi phung po ni/ gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ de
42a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi phung po ni/ brgyad khri bzhi stong du gsungs te/ shA ri'i bu/ de la chos thams cad skye ba med pa 'di ni/ chos kyi phung po'i rjes su 'jug pa dang po yin no//
42b1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ chos 'ga' zhig la chos she'am/ chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa zhes nga mi smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ chos thams cad ni/ skye ba med pa'i chos can dang /
42b2(mdo sde): 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ma ning ni/ skyes pa'am bud med ces bya ba'i ming mi 'thob cing / skyes pa'am bud med ces brjod
42b3(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ de ni/ skyes pa'am bud med du gdags su med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas
42b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de'i phyir chos kyis chos rab tu shes so/ /zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
42b5(mdo sde): na| za ma'am/ ma ning ni/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sbangs pa'ang ma yin la 'dod pa la sten pa'ang ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de dag gis bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod chags
42b6(mdo sde): kyi sems skyes pas za ma'am ma ning rnams las phal cher byin pa nad kyis btab par 'gyur/ byin pa 'dzag par 'gyur/ byin pa khar ba lta bur 'gyur/ bzhin dmar por 'gyur ro//
42b7(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ /'di ji snyam du sems/ za ma'am/ ma ning gang yin pa de la ma 'gyel/ de'i las la mtshon gyis ma btab par ci'i phyir de dag byin pa na bar 'gyur snyam/ de skad
43a1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ za ma'am/ ma ning ni /
43a2(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor srung ba lags te/ de dag bud med sdug gu mthong nas 'dod chags kyi sems skye lags so/ /de dag 'dod chags kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pa khol bar
43a3(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ nyon mongs pa khol ba de dag gi lus khu chus rgyas par gyur pas de dag 'dod chags kyi gdung bas gdungs pa na byin pa shin tu gas par 'gyur lags te/ de ltar
43a4(mdo sde): de dag gi lus ma rungs par 'gyur lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/
43a5(mdo sde): za ma'am ma ning las gang dag bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye ba ni/ nyung ste/ phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu
43a6(mdo sde): rnams las gang dag 'dod chags kyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur ba'i khyad par la ltos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa rnams ni/ dngos po med par shes/ 'dod pa rnams ni /
43a7(mdo sde): mi gtsang bar shes nas de dag 'dod pa rnams kyis skyo zhing yid byung la mngon par mi dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no/ /shA
43b1(mdo sde): ri'i bu| skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyis ni/ skyo ba'am yid 'byung bar mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar skyes bu ngan pa de dag ni/ 'dod pa la kun tu rtog pa rnams
43b2(mdo sde): kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyis kun tu rtog pa rnams gang zhe na/ gang dag med pa la rtog par byed pa ste/ mi gtsang ba la gtsang
43b3(mdo sde): bar rtog par byed/ 'du shes med pa la 'du shes su rtog par byed/ bud med la bud med du rtog par byed/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa la 'dod chags dang bcas par rtog par
43b4(mdo sde): byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu de dag ni/ skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa rnams yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni/ za ma dang ma ning 'dod pas zin pa rnams kyi las rnams
43b5(mdo sde): yin te| de dag skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams ni/ ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ ma ning gang la la zhig skyes bu ngan pa rnams kyi kun tu rtog pa de lta bu dag la kun tu rtog par byed pa ni/
43b6(mdo sde): bdag gis reg go /zhes nyams su myong bar byed de/ bu ga dgu'i sgo dang ldan pa 'di mi gtsang ba 'dzag pa 'di la gtsang bar 'du shes skyed par byed do/ /'di dag thams cad ni/ bya ba
43b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa ste/ de dag ni/ skyes bu dam pa'i las rnams ma yin no/ shA ri'i bu/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze gang la la dag 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi
44a1(mdo sde): shes pa de dag ni/ bud med la kun tu rtog cing mig la mtshan mar 'dzin par byed de/ baiDUR+ya lta bu'i 'du shes su byed la chu'i dbu ba bzhin du 'du shes
44a2(mdo sde): su ni mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bong mo 'brangs pa dang / phag mo 'brangs pa ni/ 'brangs pas lus stong par 'gyur zhing lus las sha ma mi gtsang ba/ btsog
44a3(mdo sde): pa/ blta bar bya ba ma yin pa 'byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ mig kyang de dang 'dra bar brjod de/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bong mo'i sha ma'am/ phag mo'am/ khyi mo'i sha ma dang 'dra
44a4(mdo sde): bar mig kyang de bzhin 'dug ste/ mig gi 'bras bu'i nang de ni/ chu'i chu bur lta bur 'dug go /de ltar mi gtsang ba 'byung zhing de ltar mi mthun pa ste/ rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag
44a5(mdo sde): cing mi gtsang ba rab tu 'dzag go / shA ri'i bu/ mi gtsang ba rnag dang khrag rab tu 'dzag cing chu'i snying po 'dzag pa'i lus la chags pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni/ mig ces brjod
44a6(mdo sde): do| |shA ri'i bu/ 'di la rgyu gang gis mig ces bya ba de'i rgyu ni/ gang / rkyen ni/ gang zhe na/ de ni/ lus kyi gtso bo yin te/ gzugs la blta bas thog ma dang / dbus dang /
44a7(mdo sde): mthar ngoms pa med la lus kyis mi dge ba rgya mtsho snyed byed de/ rgyu des na mig ces bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la gang gis na de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni/ gang / rkyen ni/ gang zhe
44b1(mdo sde): na| mi mthun pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ mig gi mi mthun pa de gang zhe na/ gang gzugs med pa la gzugs su 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba med pa la tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / 'du
44b2(mdo sde): shes med pa dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la rnam par shes par 'du shes pa'o/ /yang 'di la rgyu gang gis de mig ces bya ba'i rgyu ni/ gang / rkyen
44b3(mdo sde): ni| gang zhe na/ 'dis dge ba spyod pa nyams par byed de/ rgyu des na mig ces bya'o/ /'dis dge slong gi dngos po las nyams par byed pas na mig ces bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/
44b4(mdo sde): mig ni| mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa ste/ rgyu des na mig ces bya bar shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong mkhas pa/ mang du thos pa/ zhum pa med pa
44b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni/ mig bud med ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin/ skyes pa can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin pa dang / shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du sbyar te rna ba
44b6(mdo sde): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni/ bud med ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin te/ de dag ni/ phung po
44b7(mdo sde): lnga la phyin ci log pa las byung ba'o/ shA ri'i bu/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze gang dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni /
45a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs par 'gyur la/ kha dog ngan cing skya skya bor 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing
45a2(mdo sde): ljon pa chen po'i lo ma'am/ ljon pa'i 'bras bu smin pa 'brul ba'i tshe skya bor 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
45a3(mdo sde): bsnyen ma gang dag kha cig 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mi shes pa de dag ni/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas gdungs bar
45a4(mdo sde): 'gyur| kha dog ngan par 'gyur/ bsam pa mi gsal bar 'gyur/ kha dog ngan cing blta na mi sdug par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ dge slong gang dag gsar bu dar la
45a5(mdo sde): bab pa| gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa de dag ni/ 'dod pa rnams dngos po med do/ /zhes 'dod pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /
45a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i rtog pa skyes na'ang myur ba nyid du rab tu zhi bar byed de/ /de dag mi dge ba yin par shes par yang byed/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ dge slong dag gis 'dod pa
45a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong nas 'dod pa de dag las yid 'byung bar byed/ 'dod chags dang bral bar byed de/ mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod/ bzhin dang
45b1(mdo sde): 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi zhig gi lus la nad kyis thebs la rnag smin nas de'i yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad la rma'i
45b2(mdo sde): kha brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ rma'i kha re re la'ang srin bu'i tshogs brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod la/ kha zas yongs su zos pa rnams kyis tshim
45b3(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur zhing / de ma dag ma spungs pa'i drung du 'dug na/ ji tsam na srog chags de dag mes gdungs par gyur ba dang / de la phyir zhing za bar byed/ yongs su za bar byed na/ shA ri'i
45b4(mdo sde): bu| 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de srog chags de dag gis zos pa yin nam/ 'on te ma zos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
45b5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ 'di thos pa nyid kyis lus kyi spu zing zhes bgyid par gyur na/ mi de'i mi mthun pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
45b6(mdo sde): mi de ni| srog chags kyi rigs de dag gis 'tshal ba lags kyi/ ma 'tshal ba ni/ ma lags so/ /de srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lus g.ya' bar bgyid cing
45b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar bzhi bar ma bgyid la/ bde ba thob par yang mi bgyid pa lags so/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de'i lus la rnag dang khrag 'dzag cing de lta bur gyur pa de smad par
46a1(mdo sde): bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ smad par bgyi ba lags/ mi mthun pa lags/ blta bar mi 'os pa lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/
46a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du dge slong mkhas pa dag ni/ 'di la so so yang dag par slob ste/ bud med ni/ 'di ltar btsog pa/ 'di ltar dri nga ba/ 'di ltar mi mthun pa/ 'di ltar blta bar mi
46a3(mdo sde): 'os pa'o| / nyon mongs pa khol ba'i bud med de dag bstan par bya ba ma yin te/ 'dod pa rnams ni/ dri nga ba'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ mi mthun pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ mi
46a4(mdo sde): gtsang ba'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ blta bar mi 'os pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to snyam mo/ /shA ri'i bu/ skyes pa'i lus la yod pa lta bu ma yin pa/ bud
46a5(mdo sde): med la ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs lnga yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ srin bu'i tshogs lnga po de dag ni/ bud med kyi gci ba'i lam na gnas te/ srin bu'i tshogs re re la srin bu brgyad cu
46a6(mdo sde): brgyad cu yod la/ mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis na yod de/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi lus la za'o/ /des na nyon mongs pa dag gis bud med log par g.yem spyod ste/ 'dod
46a7(mdo sde): pa yongs su spyod pa dag gis ngoms mi myong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na/ 'dod pa rnams ni/ nyes dmigs yin par mthong na/ de dag 'dod pa rnams las yid 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'dod
46b1(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ mngon par dga' nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing bzhin dang 'phral ba'i mdangs gsal ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni/ 'dod pa'i phung po las
46b2(mdo sde): brtsams nas chos bstan pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'dod pa yongs su spyod pa dag las yid 'byung bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ kun nas nyon mongs pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ kun nas nyon
46b3(mdo sde): mongs pa ni/ rang gis byas ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par zhi ba gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ rnam par byang ba dang / rnam par zhi ba ni/ rang gis byas pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/
46b4(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs pa ni/ gang / rang gis byas pa ni/ gang zhe na/ chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o/ /chos su 'du shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta
46b5(mdo sde): ste| skye bar 'du shes pa dang / 'gag par 'du shes pa dang / bdag yod pa dang / bdag med par bdag tu bdu shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yod de/ de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos
46b6(mdo sde): kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ long ba yin te/ gzugs kyi phung po'o/ /zhes rlom sems su byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
46b7(mdo sde): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o/ /zhes rlom sems su byed de/ rlom sems su byed na 'ching ngo / /rlom sems su mi byed na grol lo/ /shA ri'i bu/ rlom sems su byed
47a1(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi phung por 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ bcu po 'di dag ni/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa
47a2(mdo sde): yin te| bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ni/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe gdung bar 'gyur ba dang / dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa 'gyod par 'gyur ba dang / mnar med par
47a3(mdo sde): 'gro'o| |zhes 'khor gyi nang na 'dug na skrag pa dang / bdag nyid tshul khrims la skur ba 'debs pa dang / bdag ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / bdag ni/
47a4(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa dang / bdag ni/ lha rnams kyis yongs su spangs pa'i snyam pa dang / 'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /
47a5(mdo sde): mi'i lus thob par dka' ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni/ dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ste/ tshul khrims 'chal pa ni/ 'chi ba'i
47a6(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe gdung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la dge slong dgon pa na
47a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'am/ shing drung na gnas pa'am/ khang stong na gnas pa'am/ bla gab med pa na gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa rnams ni/ dri nga ba'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ mi mthun pa'o/ /
47b1(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams ni/ rma'i kha lta bu'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ blta bar mi 'os pa'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ smad par bya ba'o/ /'dod pa rnams ni/ bshang bas yongs su gang ba'i ro lta
47b2(mdo sde): bu'o| |zhes de ltar so sor yang dag par slob bo/ /de dag ni/ byis pa 'phyar ba'i spyod yul yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ bud med la bsten pa dang bsnyen pas chog go /shA ri'i bu/ bud
47b3(mdo sde): med kyi lus phyis dang mchil mas yongs su gang ba de la su zhig dga' ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni/ 'jig rten gyi khyi ro rul pa dang 'dra bar smad par bya ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu /
47b4(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi ro mi gtsang ba/ rul pa/ dri nga ba/ mdog mi sdug cing sngo la pags pa mugs pa/ srog chags kyis yongs su gang ba zhig lam ga na snang la/ de'i steng na
47b5(mdo sde): char pa'ang bab cing de rlung gis kyang kun nas btab/ der mi rnams kyang kun nas 'khor bar gyur te/ de dag gis dri de tshor na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi de dag dri mi zhim
47b6(mdo sde): pa de snom par byed dam/ 'on te mi snom/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la
47b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyi ro de la rig par byed dam/ skyod par byed dam/ mngon par dga' bar byed na/ de skye bo mang pos bsngags par bya
48a1(mdo sde): ba yin nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mi
48a2(mdo sde): de ni| blta bar dka' ste/ de la bsngags par ga la bgyid/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
48a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am/ skyod par byed pa'am/ mngon par dga' ba'i mi de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa mdzad kyi/ gang zhig bud med
48a4(mdo sde): yul gyi bzang mo na tshod lo bcu drug lon pa'am/ lhag pa lta bu/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nu ma rgyas pas mdzes pa/ rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ shin
48a5(mdo sde): tu gzhon pa/ reg na bde ba/ nad dang bral ba de la tha na rkang pa'i mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags par mi mdzad de/ shA ri'i bu/ yul
48a6(mdo sde): gyi bzang mo de la tha na rkang ba'i mthe bos reg par byed pa'i mi gang zag de lta bu de ni/ shin tu smad par bya ba yin te/ khyi ro de la 'khyud par byed pa'am/ skyod par byed pa'am/
48a7(mdo sde): mngon par dga' bar byed pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyi rol 'khyud pa'am/ reg pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/
48b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar dge slong gis 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ dge
48b2(mdo sde): slong gis lus la nyes dmigs kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ lus 'di ni/ gnod pa mang pa'o/ /'khrug pa mang pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi lus la ni/ skyes pa'i lus
48b3(mdo sde): la yod pa lta bu ma yin pa ches lhag pa srin bu'i tshogs nyi shu rtsa lnga yod de/ shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi mgo klad pa'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs 'phrog byed ces bya ba dag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi klad
48b4(mdo sde): pa la za bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi sna'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi kha spu la za ste/ des na bud med la kha spu mi skye'o/ /shA
48b5(mdo sde): ri'i bu| bud med kyi rna khung na srin bu'i tshogs za bar byed pa zhes bya ba ngag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi rna ba la za zhing bud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi
48b6(mdo sde): mgrin pa'i mtshams dang / mgo bo'i mtshams la srin bu'i tshogs zhen byed ces bya ba dag yod de/ de dag bud med kyi rna ba za zhing bud med kyi rna ba 'bigs par byed la mig kyang rno bar byed do/ /shA
48b7(mdo sde): ri'i bu| skyes pa'i rna ba la mi 'bigs kyi bud med kyi rna ba la 'bigs so/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med la srin bu'i tshogs a ba re ba na zhes bya ba dag yod de/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud
49a1(mdo sde): med kyi kha la za ste/ des na bud med kyi mgul dma' ba yin te/ skyes pa la ni/ de lta bu med do/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba khar bcug ma thag tu thog mar
49a2(mdo sde): de dag za bar byed do/ /de dag nyal nyil bud med kyi nu ma'i nang du 'jog ste/ des na bud med nu ma 'phyang ba yin no/ /gang gi tshe bud med sbrum par gyur pa de'i tshe srin bu de dag kyang
49a3(mdo sde): sbrum par gyur te/ des na bud med kyi nu zho mang ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi lus kyi nang mngal gyi gnas gang na mngal yod pa'i phyogs de na srin bu zad par byed pa dpa'
49a4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba dag yod de/ de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed ces bya ba dag bsad nas za'o/ /de dag srin bu rab tu ldag byed de dag ma rnyed na de dag kyang 'chi'o/ /srin bu'i tshogs de
49a5(mdo sde): gnyis ka shi ste med pa dang / pha ma 'dus pa las mngal chags par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ bud med kyi lus la lus kyi nang skye gnas kyi sgo na srin bu'i tshogs bzhi yod de /
49a6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mchu mchog ces bya ba dang / gong bu sbed ces bya ba dang / rlung 'byin ces bya ba dang / 'dod len ces bya ba ste/ de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bud med kyi
49a7(mdo sde): lus la za ste/ des na bud med nyon mongs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'bar bar byas te 'dod pa yongs su spyad pas mi ngoms pa yin no/ /de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bud med kyi
49b1(mdo sde): skyon ches lhag pa de dag mkhyen nas bslab pa'i gzhi lhag pa dang bca' bar mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos kyi phung po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dang yang du 'khor bzhi po dag la ston cig /
49b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa rnams ni/ smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur/ lus ni/ smad par bya ba yin par shes par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de ltar lus 'di bcos ma
49b3(mdo sde): yin par shes nas byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par su zhig 'dod pa rnams la sten par byed de/ de ni/ gnas med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de lta bas na/ lus 'di
49b4(mdo sde): la mngon par dga' bar mi bya/ lhag par chags par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas de bzhin du ston
49b5(mdo sde): pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lus ni mi gtsang las byung ste/ /rtag tu srog chags rnams kyang gnas/ /gcin dang rtug pas rab gang na/ /de la byis pa rab tu chags /
49b6(mdo sde): dge slong ba dang dge slong ma/ /dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma/ /'di thos nas ni 'dod chags 'bral/ /'dod chags bral nas rnam par grol/ /chos dang ldan pa rnams la ni/ /nyes
49b7(mdo sde): pa 'di dag ngas ma bstan/ /gang dag 'dod la longs spyod pa/ /de dag la ni skyon rnams bshad/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni bstan pa bzhin/ /bud med mthong na su rtog ste/ /yang dag bskul ba
50a1(mdo sde): shes nas su/ /mkhas pa de dag rtog mi byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha
50a2(mdo sde): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi phung po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
50a3(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pra dz+nyA warma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ba ra mAr+tha d+harma bi dza ya nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod
50a4(mdo sde): skad du|'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad
50a5(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par ga ya'i ri la dge slong mngon par zhugs pa mngon par zhugs pa
50a6(mdo sde): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
50a7(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen ma brgyad khri drug stong dang / gyad drug khri dang / gcer bu pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang / drang srong chen po mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ gdung ba lngas yan
50b1(mdo sde): lag chog pa lnga brgya yan lag dkar ba/ sha med cing rus mgo lpags kyis yog pa/ lto zhar zhing skra'i khur khyer ba/ lus rgu ba/ g.yang gzhi dang shing shun gyon pa/ lag na ril pa thogs
50b2(mdo sde): pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig go / rgal bar 'dun pa rnams dang yang thabs cig go /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri nag po rnams kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar drang srong rnams
50b3(mdo sde): kyi nang na lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge ste/ lug rnams kyi nang na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa 'dra la/ srin bu me khyer gyi drung na nyi zla dang mtshungs shing / rtswa ka shi'i me tog gi
50b4(mdo sde): nang na man+dA ra ba'i yal ga dang 'dra la/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po bya rog gis bskor ba dang 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das drang srong rnams kyi nang na nyis 'gyur du mdzes so/ /de nas bcom ldan
50b5(mdo sde): 'das rin po che'i gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dpag tu med par mdzad cing glo g.yas g.yon gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ de bzhin
50b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa bye ba dpag tu med pa phyung / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba dpag tu med pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa phyung / dgra bcom pa brgya
50b7(mdo sde): stong dpag tu med pa phyung / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma brgya stong dpag tu med pa phyung / 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba
51a1(mdo sde): dang / khams kyi rgyal po dang / rig sngags 'chang dpag tu med pa phyung / rgya dang / ri brags pa dang / 'gro lding ba dang / lho phyogs pa dang / nags
51a2(mdo sde): khrod pa dpag tu med pa phyung / rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu dang / mi gzugs dang / cha byad dang / mdog dang / smra ba'i skad
51a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs pa ji snyed pa dang / lha'i ris ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las phyung ngo / /de nas 'khor chen po de the tshom du gyur nas phan tshun gdong du lta'o/ /
51a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste/ rin po che'i char 'bebs pa nas rgyan thams cad kyi bar gyi char 'bebs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rin po che gtong ba'i ting nge
51a5(mdo sde): 'dzin las bzhengs te/ seng+ge bsgyings pas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur gzigs ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
51a6(mdo sde): dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang ba de dag thams cad lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin du mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su kun tu snang ngo / /de
51a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas ji ltar phyung ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sprul pa phyung ba ji
51b1(mdo sde): snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'dus par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dag
51b2(mdo sde): kyang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po dpe med pa thogs te 'dir lhags so/ /de bzhin
51b3(mdo sde): du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa du ma de dag kyang bcom
51b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo / /de nas gang dag phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis mchod
51b5(mdo sde): pa bla na med pas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas te pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis yongs su bsgrubs pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/ /mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar du'ang ci rigs
51b6(mdo sde): pa'i stan dag la 'khod do/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul ba phyung ba de dag kyang mnar med pa yan chad 'og min gyi gnas man chad du mngon par byung ste slar yang log go /phyogs
51b7(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sprul ba phyung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spu'i khung bu thams cad du nub bo/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul ba phyung
52a1(mdo sde): ba de dag na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku rnams su nub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal pa'i phung po zhes bya ba stan las
52a2(mdo sde): l angs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das
52a3(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /kye ma mi rnams kyi ni 'dren pa yis/ /sngon chad ma byung mdzad pa sna tshogs 'di/ /skye rgu kun la myur du kun bstan pa/ /de yis
52a4(mdo sde): bdud sde thams cad mog mog bgyis/ /phan tshun dag tu tshig tu smra bgyid pa/ /kye ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che zhes mchi/ /bdag cag ci zhig phyir ni 'dir lhags kye/ /bdag cag
52a5(mdo sde): bcom mo bdag cag bcom zhes mchi/ /dka' thub can bdag dka' thub can mi 'gyur/ /nyam chung lus la pags pa tsam zhig las/ /bdag 'khogs bdag bskams bde
52a6(mdo sde): ba rnams las nyams/ /bdag cag rdzu 'phrul thob par gyur ma yin/ /yi ge ma mchis rdzu 'phrul gsum rnams kyis/ /bstan pa'i dgra rnams mog mog gyur par mdzad/ /bstan
52a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'dren pa khyod kyis de ring ni/ /sangs rgyas sras la dus ston chen po mdzad/ /'khor 'di thams cad the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur/ /dga' ba skyes shing sems kyang rab dga' ste/ /
52b1(mdo sde): gang zhig gnas nas lha tshogs bdag cag kyang / /'jig rten mgon pa sangs rgyas gyur cig mchi/ /'jam dbyangs sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur bgyis/ /sangs rgyas sras po mtha'
52b2(mdo sde): yas rnams kyis bskor/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs ni 'khor gyi nang na mchis/ /cho 'phrul rnam par phye ste bstan du gsol/ /'di dag chos ni gang gi ltas shig las/ /thub pa chos ni gang zhig
52b3(mdo sde): gsung bar bzhed/ /'khor 'di thams cad 'bod cing mchis lags na/ /sems can thugs brtse'i slad du bdag la gsungs/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor de'i nang
52b4(mdo sde): nas drang srong chen po me sgron zhes bya ba zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i phung po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye gzhon nu re zhig kha rog cig /kho bos dri ba dri bar bya'o/ /gal te kho
52b5(mdo sde): bo'i dri ba khong du chud par byed na ni/ de thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i ming dang yang mthun no/ /'on te sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen pos phyung ba'i 'gro lding ba rnams kyis sprul
52b6(mdo sde): ba byed du bcug na 'dir ngo mtshar yang mi che ste/ skyes bu ngan pa dang / sgyu ma mkhan rnams kyis 'di 'grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis drang srong gi tshogs la
52b7(mdo sde): kun tu gzigs nas drang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshe dang ldan pa drang srong chen po/ ci nus kyis dri ba dris shig dang rnam par sbyang bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
53a1(mdo sde): 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad gsol to/ /kye gau ta ma/ sems can gyi skye ba gang nas byung / ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur/
53a2(mdo sde): sems can rnams gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur/ nang na sems can phra ba khru gang tsam mam/ mtho gang tsam mam/ mdzub mo tsam mam/ mthe bo tsam mam/ nas dang / gro dang / mon
53a3(mdo sde): sran sde'u dang / mon sran gre'u dang / til dang / yungs 'bru tsam mam/ sems can ji tsam zhig nang na mchis bka' stsol cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen
53a4(mdo sde): po me sgron la drang srong chen po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin no/ /drang srong chen po/ tshe bskal pa drug cu pa'i dri ba 'dri ba 'di ni/ mthun pa'o/ /de nas drang srong chen po rnams
53a5(mdo sde): ngo mtshar du gyur te/ drang srong chen po me sgron gyi tshe'i tshad ni/ ma brjod par bdag cag lhan cig gnas pa rnams kyis kyang ma shes na/ 'dis ji ltar shes snyam mo/ /bcom ldan
53a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang bshad do/ /drang srong chen po gang nga la sems can gyi skye ba gang nas
53a7(mdo sde): byung zhes smras pa de ni/ yi ges brjod pa ma yin pa'o/ /sems can zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i rkyen nas skye ba dang / rga shi'i bar du byung ba'o/ /drang srong chen po/ yang rgyu rkyen las
53b1(mdo sde): sems can skyes te/ rgyu rkyen ni/ pha ma'o/ /drang srong chen po/ yang pha ma 'grogs pa ni/ de'i rgyu'o/ /gang gi tshe yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi rlung rnams kyis bud
53b2(mdo sde): med kyi grong du 'jug pa de ni/ rkyen no/ /drang srong chen po/ yang sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang / sdug bsngal
53b3(mdo sde): 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ni/ sems can no/ /nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang / khams bco brgyad ni/ sems can no/ /drang srong chen po/ sems can
53b4(mdo sde): yang gzhan la/ las kyang gzhan ma yin/ las kyang gzhan la/ sems can yang gzhan ma yin no/ /drang srong chen po/ sems can ni/ 'grib pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no//
53b5(mdo sde): drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma/ gal te sems can 'grib pa ma mchis 'phel ba ma mchis na/ ci'i slad du sems can khyi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te dbang sgyur du 'gyur/
53b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ de ni/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du ma yin no/ gal te dbang sgyur dbang sgyur yin du zin na ni/ dbang med par 'chi bar mi
53b7(mdo sde): rigs so/ /drang srong chen po/ gang rang gi lus kyi gtso bo ma yin pa de ji ltar dbang sgyur du 'gyur/ drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ srin bu me khyer 'di snyam du bdag gis dzam+bu'i
54a1(mdo sde): gling snang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i rkyen gyis srin bu me khyer gyis dzam+bu'i gling snang bar byed dam/ sems ma dul ba'i dbang sgyur yang dag pa ma
54a2(mdo sde): yin no| |drang srong chen po/ yang gal te dbang sgyur nyon mongs pa 'bra bar gyur na ni/ khyi la nyon mongs pa shas che bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dbang sgyur dang nyon mongs pa dag
54a3(mdo sde): khyi la yod cing dbang sgyur la'ang yod pa de'i tshe sems can 'grib pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'phel ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ gau ta mas nyon mongs pa 'grib
54a4(mdo sde): par mdzad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ ngas phyin ci log dag bzlog pa'ang med/ 'grib par byas pa'ang med do/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/
54a5(mdo sde): gal te de ltar na/ khyod kyang dbang sgyur ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ de de bzhin te/ ma byung ba'i phyir nga yang dbang sgyur ma yin
54a6(mdo sde): no| |drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ gau ta ma/ bka' mchid re zhig zhog /gau ta ma'i sras kyis pha ma 'grogs pa las sems can skye'o/ /zhes gsungs na/ sems can mang
54a7(mdo sde): du 'grogs pa la sems can skye ba nyung bar gyur pa 'di ci lta bu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
54b1(mdo sde): sa bon gcig las shing skye bar 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gcig las kyang 'bras bu mtha' yas par 'gyur ro/ /de la res 'ga' ni/ gcig sa bon gyi 'os su 'gyur gyi/ lhag ma sa bon
54b2(mdo sde): gyi 'os su mi 'gyur ba de ci lta bu/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma/ rlung dang nyi mas shing tog rnams ma rung bar bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong
54b3(mdo sde): chen po| de de bzhin te/ las kyi rlung gis kyang sems can gyi 'bras bu rnams ma rung bar byas so/ /drang srong chen po/ kha cig ni/ mngal na gnas pa nyid kyi tshe srin bu rnams kyis
54b4(mdo sde): zos so| |kha cig ni/ las kyi rlung rnams kyis phye mar byas so/ /drang srong chen po/ shing gi nyes pa ni/ nyung ngo / /sems can gyi nyes pa ni/ mang ngo / /drang srong chen po/ yang
54b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams ni/ yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba ste/ drang srong chen po/ sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba 'jug pa ji snyed pa de snyed du srid pa
54b6(mdo sde): la dmigs te/ drang srong chen po/ de'i phyir sems can gyi khams ni/ yongs su rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'o/ /zhes smra'o/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ kye gau ta ma/ de de
54b7(mdo sde): bzhin te/ zhu ba brjod pa 'di ni/ rnam par dag go /ci'i slad du bskal pas sreg par 'gyur pa bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ chos
55a1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ gal te bskal pas sreg par mi 'gyur na/ chos kyi dbyings
55a2(mdo sde): gnyis su 'gyur te/ la la mi rtag la/ la la rtag par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bden pa smra bar mi 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ gang gi phyir 'di thams cad rtag
55a3(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ brtan pa ma yin/ dbugs phyin pa ma yin pa de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de'i ming thob bo/ /drang srong chen pos bram ze'i khye'u la smras
55a4(mdo sde): pa| 'di thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol pa ni/ mthun no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ /gal te bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na/ 'di
55a5(mdo sde): ni| dus bzang po'o/ /'di ni/ ngan pa'o/ /zhes bya bar dus tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ gal te yang bskal pas bsregs par ma gyur na legs par byas pa
55a6(mdo sde): dang / nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ yang 'di lta ste/ bskal pas sreg pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
55a7(mdo sde): kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/ drang srong chen po/ sems can ji snyed bskal pas sreg par 'gyur ba thos nas dang bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de snyed de bzhin gshegs pas bsdu ba'i dngos
55b1(mdo sde): bos sdud par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kha chu ldag pa'i sprul ni/ mig gis kyang rdub/ rna ba dang / sna dang / kha'i sgo nas kyang rdub bo/ /drang srong chen po/ de
55b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de ltar blta ste/ sbyin pas kyang sdud/ snyan par smra bas kyang sdud/ don spyod pas kyang sdud/ don mthun pas kyang sdud do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/
55b3(mdo sde): dper na/ gser la gnod par bya ba'i phyir mer 'jug pa ma yin gyi/ gser dul ma ma yin pa 'di ji ltar na dul mar 'gyur snyam nas de'i phyir mer 'jug ste/ shin tu bsregs
55b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir rin po che'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /rin po ches spras pa de'i rin thang med par 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po/ de'i phyir gser brdung ba dang bsreg pas rnam par sbyong ngo / /drang srong
55b5(mdo sde): chen po| de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rgyu med par sreg pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/ 'dir sems can gang la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
55b6(mdo sde): 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bskal pas sreg pa'i me phyung yang sems can gang la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni/ ngo mtshar to//
55b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ sems can gang la'ang gnod par mi mdzad do/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
56a1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu rnams su char phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa de bas ni/ drang srong chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
56a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams nye bar gnas te rang gi lag gis sems can thar par byed pa ni/ ches mang ngo / /drang srong chen po/ de'i che sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
56a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gi gzugs kyang mthong / kha dog mdzes pa'ang mthong / bskal pas sreg pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid sgrol ba'ang mthong nas dga' ba dang mchog tu
56a4(mdo sde): dga' ba skyes te 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang 'di ltar sgrol ba por gyur cig / bdag cag kyang 'di ltar gzugs mdzes par gyur cig /bdag cag kyang 'di ltar kha dog mdzes par
56a5(mdo sde): gyur cig / ces 'dzer te/ kha cig ni/ yid byung nas sems rnam par grol te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
56a6(mdo sde): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed/ kha cig ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid/ kha cig ni/ rang byang chub/ kha cig ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob/ kha cig ni/ phyir
56a7(mdo sde): mi ldog pa'i sa gnon/ kha cig ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye/ kha cig ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum du/ kha cig ni/ mtshe mar/ kha cig ni/ dga' ldan du/ kha cig
56b1(mdo sde): ni| 'phrul dgar/ kha cig ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang phyed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /drang srong chen po/ rnam grangs 'di lta bur 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /de
56b2(mdo sde): bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams dang / stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams dang / khams kyi rgyal po rnams su 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang /
56b3(mdo sde): khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ rnam grangs 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong zhing bdag nyid kyang 'jigs pa chen po las grol
56b4(mdo sde): bar mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la chos nyid thos nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams la bag byed par 'gyur ro/ /
56b5(mdo sde): thabs 'dis na ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ yang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sa'i khams ji snyed snang bar 'gyur ba de bas ni/
56b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams gang 'khor bar chags pa'i skyon chags par shes nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa ches mang ste/
56b7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po/ de'i phyir bskal bas sreg par 'gyur ro/ /de nas drang srong chen po me sgron gyis rang gi yid kyis rnam par dpyad nas tshig tu smras pa/ kye ma'o gang bdag drang srong chen po zhes
57a1(mdo sde): 'bod pa shAkya'i sras 'di'i tshe ba nyid ni/ rgya che ba'o/ /bdag gis 'di la bag ma bas kyang chog ste/ 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen par mngon gyi /
57a2(mdo sde): bdag gis kyang 'di la yang dag pa'i ming gis 'bod par bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yon tan gyi 'byung
57a3(mdo sde): gnas su gyur cing mkhyen pa dpag tu ma mchis pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mtshan gsol pa/ sems can gnas gang du 'du bar 'gyur ba bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan
57a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ gnas med pa la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /mnyam pa nyid la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ theg pa gcig
57a5(mdo sde): gis 'byung ba la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
57a6(mdo sde): sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu klung tha dad pa dang / klung phran dang / klung chen po dag rgya mtsho chen por babs nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /drang
57a7(mdo sde): srong chen po/ /de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed zag pa zad par byed pa de dag thams cad rnam par grol ba'i ngang du gyur pas 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ 'khor
57b1(mdo sde): bar 'du bas sems can 'du bar 'gyur ba ni/ 'du ba ma yin pa'o/ /zhes nga smra'o/ /drang srong chen po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rlung gis bdes nas phye ma leb phyi phyi zhwa la 'du bar 'gyur te/
57b2(mdo sde): rlung med na so sor 'gyes so/ /drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur bas phan tshun las kyis 'brel ba'i sems can gyi khams de dag kyang der 'du bar 'gyur ro//
57b3(mdo sde): drang srong chen po/ rnam grangs 'di lta bur phan tshun las kyis 'brel ba dag yi dwags su skye bar 'gyur/ dud 'gror skye bar 'gyur te/ der de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen po/ lha
57b4(mdo sde): dang mi rnams su de dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ thams cad zil gyis gnon pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ mir skyes pa 'di sems can che ge mo zhes bgyi ba zhig
57b5(mdo sde): dang 'dus par gyur to/ /dud 'gror skyes pa 'di zhes bgyi ba nas yi dwags su skyes pa 'di 'dus par gyur to/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig /
57b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ sems can gang zhig sems can gang dang lhan cig tu sems can dmyal bar skyes nas 'dus par gyur pa des de mthong
57b7(mdo sde): na yid mi bde bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang bar 'gyur/ des de mthong nas gal te na de klad pa na bar yang 'gyur/ bshang ba dang / gci ba 'byung bar yang 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po/ 'di ni/
58a1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /gang la la de ltar gyur ba des kyang bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu sems can dmyal
58a2(mdo sde): ba rnams na gnas gnas par mngon no/ /zhes de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ rigs gsal bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa/ dud 'gro dang lhan
58a3(mdo sde): cig gnas gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan mar 'gyur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams gang gi tshe phan tshun mthong ba na
58a4(mdo sde): 'khon du mdud par 'dzin cing 'di las bdag gis skyon ji ltar rnyed snyam du skyon tshol ba 'di ni/ drang srong chen po/ dud 'gror skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan
58a5(mdo sde): nyid de| bdag dang 'di lhan cig tu dud 'gro'i nang na gnas gnas par mngon no/ /zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ yi dwags su skyes pa rnams ni/ dri nga ba
58a6(mdo sde): 'dod cing kha zas la shin tu sred par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol la sbyin par bsam yang chags pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dang de yi dwags su skyes nas lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa de'i
58a7(mdo sde): dbang phyug mthong nas phrag dog skye bar 'gyur/ gzhan gyi nor la 'dod par 'gyur te/ 'di ni/ yi dwags su skyes pa rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /de la bdag dang 'di
58b1(mdo sde): lhan cig tu yi dwags kyi nang na gnas gnas par mngon no/ /zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ mir skyes pa gang la la zhig tshe rabs gzhan dag nas 'dus par gyur pa ni/
58b2(mdo sde): des de mthong na 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te/ drang srong chen po/ 'di ni/ mir skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'du ba'i mtshan nyid do/ /de la bdag dang 'di mi rnams kyi nang na
58b3(mdo sde): gnas gnas par mngon no/ /zhes de ltar shes par bya'o/ /drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa las mir skyes pa de dag gi ji lta
58b4(mdo sde): bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po/ gang dag lhar skyes te 'dus par gyur pa de dag ni/ phan tshun mthong na blta ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/ des
58b5(mdo sde): na bdag dang 'di lhar skyes te lhan cig 'dus par gyur to/ /zhes shes par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po/ rnam pa de lta bu dag tu sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /da nas drang srong chen po me sgron
58b6(mdo sde): dga' mgu ste yid rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon pa mi bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni /
58b7(mdo sde): bslus pa'o/ /zhes bdag 'chad do/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po me sgron la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po/ gang na sems can zhes bya ba phra ba
59a1(mdo sde): ji tsam zhig yod ces nga la de skad zer ba ni/ drang srong chen po/ gang sems can du dmigs pa de sems can phra mor rnam par 'byed do/ /drang srong
59a2(mdo sde): chen po| 'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig gis dmus long zhig la 'di skad du/ kye skyes bu/ kha dog dkar po zhes bya ba ci 'dra zhes smras na/ drang srong chen po/ /'di ji snyam du
59a3(mdo sde): sems| ma mthong ba'i phyir kha dog dkar po 'di 'dra'o/ /zhes de smra bar nus sam/ drang srong chen pos gsol pa/ 'brel ba ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
59a4(mdo sde): stsal pa| drang srong chen po/ de bzhin du ngas kyang dmus long ltar ma mthong ba'i phyir sems can zhes bya ba ni/ phra mo 'di lta bu zhig go /zhes sems can brjod par mi nus
59a5(mdo sde): so| |drang srong chen po/ yang mig la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyad do/ /drang srong chen po/
59a6(mdo sde): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/ /drang srong chen po/ khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa dang / nang
59a7(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la sems can zhes bya ba mi rnyed do/ /drang srong chen po/ mig ni/ ngan pa'o/ /'jig pa'o/ /
59b1(mdo sde): skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang ngan pa'o/ /'jig pa'o/ /skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/ /drang srong chen po/ nye bar len
59b2(mdo sde): pa'i phung po lnga'ang ngan pa'o/ /'jig pa'o/ /skad cig kyang mi gnas pa'o/ /drang srong chen po/ mi gtsang ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug kyang ngan pa'o/ /'jig pa'o/ /skad cig kyang mi
59b3(mdo sde): gnas pa'o/ /sems can zhes bya ba'ang med/ gzugs kyang med de/ drang srong chen po/ rdzas 'dus pa ni/ sems can zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /yongs su rtog pa pa gang
59b4(mdo sde): dag rdzas rnams rnam par 'byed pa de dag ni/ srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu mi dmigs so/ /drang srong chen po/ gal
59b5(mdo sde): te sems can yod du zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag gis shin tu chos ston par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ drang srong chen po/ gang gi phyir sems
59b6(mdo sde): can med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob ste/ de'i phyir ji lta ji ltar yang dag pa sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar yang dag par 'grub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la drang srong
59b7(mdo sde): chen po me sgron gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ deng slan chad drang srong chen po me sgron bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal
60a1(mdo sde): te bdag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par sems can dmyal ba'i zhugs kyi 'obs su gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ ri rab 'og min gyi gnas tsam
60a2(mdo sde): du gyur pa mthon po'i kha de nas bdag gis bdag 'dor bar 'gyur ba'am/ gdung ba lnga bskal pas sreg pa lta bur 'gyur ba'am/ nyi ma bskal par gnas par 'gyur ba'am /
60a3(mdo sde): bskal pa sum cu'i zla ba gcig tu smyung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad par ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spro ste 'dun gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slad du ni/ brtson
60a4(mdo sde): 'grus nyams par mi bgyi'o/ /drang srong chen po/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa ji snyed bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du lhags pa de dag kyang stan las langs te bcom ldan
60a5(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang deng slan chad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon par bgyi'o/ /brtsam par bgyi'o/ /
60a6(mdo sde): drang srong rnams rngo ci thogs kyis brtson 'grus kyis tshig de dag smras ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung / phyogs bcu'i
60a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang smin mtshams nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer de dag gi mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos
60b1(mdo sde): 'gul| rab tu 'gul/ ldeg /rab tu ldeg ste/ shar phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ shar phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ nub
60b2(mdo sde): phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du me tog gi char phab/ rnga bo che rnams brdungs so/ /dri za'i bdag po
60b3(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba rnams kyis kyang yan lag lnga pa'i sil snyan gyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /lha'i bdug pa dri rab tu zhim po dag kyang rlung gis ngad bslang ste de bzhin
60b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gan du ngad ldang bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu dga' ste mchog tu bde ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng du do shal dang / se mo do rnams
60b5(mdo sde): 'thor zhing rin po che'i char yang 'bebs/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba
60b6(mdo sde): dan dag gis kyang mchod par byed do/ /lha'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu dga' nas me tog man+dA ra ba dang / man+dA ra ba chen po'i char 'bebs so/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang dga' mgu yi
60b7(mdo sde): rang ste ji ltar gyon gyon pa'i gos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gsol to/ /de nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba 'od zer des 'og min gyi gnas man chad/ sems can dmyal ba
61a1(mdo sde): chen po mnar med pa yan chad snang bar byas te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la bskor ba byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
61a2(mdo sde): gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rgyu ma mchis par shAka thub de ring 'dir/ /phyogs bcu dag tu 'od zer mi gtong
61a3(mdo sde): ste| |'khor 'di thams cad the tshom gyur lags na/ /thub pas rgyu dang byed de bdag lung ston/ /mi yi 'dren pa'i rnam par 'phrul mthong nas/ /dga' bar gyur cing spro ba cher gyur te/ /
61a4(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas legs par bstod bgyis nas/ /kha cig 'di na bcom ldan legs zhes mchi/ /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /nam mkha'i gnas nas 'byung po'i tshogs
61a5(mdo sde): kyang bstod/ /mkha' las lha yi me tog char du 'bebs/ /ma brdungs rnga chen dag ni sgra yang 'byin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
61a6(mdo sde): stsal to| |rab 'byor/ khyod kyis drang srong chen po me sgron mthong ngam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
61a7(mdo sde): pa| rab 'byor/ drang srong chen po me sgron 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas stong 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la zla ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs
61b1(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi ming yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu
61b2(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ drang srong chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos ma thag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rjes su thob ste/ rab 'byor/
61b3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab las sa bcu la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa sum brgya'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
61b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdag bka' blo bde ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs
61b5(mdo sde): 'di thos ma thag tu dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ skad dang skad ma yin par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge
61b6(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / khams rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo gros rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyen pa'i sa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam pa'i
61b7(mdo sde): snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /rab 'byor/ lha bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /dge slong dang / dge
62a1(mdo sde): slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag tshad med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/ /rab 'byor/ lha dang / klu
62a2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang+gA'i bye ma snyed dag gis bla na
62a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de mthong nas 'dul ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnams
62a4(mdo sde): phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi ljags kyi dbang pos zhal khebs par mdzad de/ ljags kyi dbang po de las kha dog du ma/ kha dog tha dad pa'i 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon
62a5(mdo sde): po dang / ser bo dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu
62a6(mdo sde): mngon par byung nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su nub bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
62a7(mdo sde): c hen po blo gros mi zad bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba
62b1(mdo sde): btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa ma mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu
62b2(mdo sde): gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu ma dad
62b3(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi don du ljags 'di lta bu ni/ rdzun mi gsung ngo snyam du bya ba'i phyir ljags kyi dbang pos 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi
62b4(mdo sde): zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lung 'bogs na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
62b5(mdo sde): mo de dag bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan la
62b6(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag la yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du gang zhig gis bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas
62b7(mdo sde): kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten byed pa de bas gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang lung 'bogs na/ 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed
63a1(mdo sde): do| |rigs kyi bu/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa na gang zhig dang ba'i sems kyis legs so/ /zhes bya ba sbyin pa de la sangs rgyas thams cad
63a2(mdo sde): kyis bstod par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis 'di la rim gro byas pa des nga la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la rnam par
63a3(mdo sde): gzigs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /nga ni/ bden pa smra ba ste/ sa phyogs gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags pa'i sa phyogs de la sangs rgyas
63a4(mdo sde): thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ dzam+bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi sman du gyur par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs
63a5(mdo sde): 'di lan gsum brjod dam brjod du bcug na/ des ston pa la chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi
63a6(mdo sde): ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa de bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba dang bcas bzhin du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /des sangs rgyas
63a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mdzod kyang bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur ro//
