63b1(mdo sde): gang dag mi'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos te yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye ba de dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang gis
63b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de'i rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
63b3(mdo sde): nas dad dam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba de'i lag tu byang chub song ngo / /zhes bshad
63b4(mdo sde): do| |des mig lnga thob par 'gyur/ dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa brjed pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob
63b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur/ rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtsug gi nor bu'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba'i
63b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur/ yi ge med pa'i za ma tog gi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ chos thams cad la rnam par rgyal pa
63b7(mdo sde): thob pa'i gzungs dang / the tshom rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs dang / don dam pa'i rnam par nges pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la sogs pa gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong
64a1(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bsam bzhin du 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su 'dzin par
64a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa khyod la chos kyi
64a3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad kyi/ yang dang yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu shod cig /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsti stang
64a4(mdo sde): byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de ji snyam du sems/ 'jam dpal/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mtha'am mu yod dam/ dge ba'i rta
64a5(mdo sde): ba dpag par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
64a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal/ gang gis snyigs ma lnga'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rgya par byed par 'gyur ba de dag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba chen por
64a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te khyod de bzhin gshegs pa mang po de snyed cig la na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gsos kyi sman dang / yo byad rnams
64b1(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur byed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston par mi byed na/ khyod da dung du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal/ gal te
64b2(mdo sde): khyod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la'ang phyag mi byed kyi/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyod kyis mchod pa'i bar du byas par 'gyur
64b3(mdo sde): ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / drang srong chen po me sgron dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
64b4(mdo sde): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
64b5(mdo sde): mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas
64b6(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ aR+ya d+harma ar+tha bi b+ha ga nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs
64b7(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
65a1(mdo sde): zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs
65a2(mdo sde): cig go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas dga' la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa
65a3(mdo sde): grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med cing tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba 'byor ba rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs
65a4(mdo sde): pa| nyams dga' ba/ skye bo mang po dang mi rnams kyis gang ba/ lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur ba zhig byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas de
65a5(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog las byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi dang / lha dang /
65a6(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /rigs
65a7(mdo sde): k yi bu| 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi 'byung gnas de na mi'i dbang po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong gsum yi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang byed pa rgyal ba
65b1(mdo sde): thob pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo / /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i tshe tshig rab la sems can de dag bde zhing yid bde ba skyes la/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing
65b2(mdo sde): bdag gi chung mas mngon par dga'o/ /sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gcig la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
65b3(mdo sde): pa| theg pa mchog la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa gtso bo la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa dam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang / rab
65b4(mdo sde): dang / phul dang / bla ma dang / bla ma'i yang bla ma dang / bla na med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa mnyam pa med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa mi mnyam pa dang
65b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa gzhal du med pa la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag go /rigs kyi bu /
65b6(mdo sde): rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i tshe tshig rab la theg pa chen po ma gtogs par theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang mi grags so/ /rigs kyi bu/ rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor ni /
65b7(mdo sde): dgu khri dgu stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gzhan ma yin pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po'i khong su 'dus pa/ nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos la
66a1(mdo sde): dga' ba sha stag go / rigs kyi bu/ de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa rin po che dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sdud pa/ sangs rgyas dang chos
66a2(mdo sde): dang dge 'dun la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po'i khongs su 'dus pa/ nyin mtshan du chos 'dod pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba zhig yod de/ rigs kyi bu/ rin
66a3(mdo sde): chen dpal de chen po la 'os pa'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / de'i pang nas bu rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba lha'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lha'i gos bgos pa/ lus
66a4(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas te byung nas gzhon nu de byung ma thag tu gzhon du des ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yum/ de bzhin
66a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa me tog las byung ba de 'tsho'am/ de nas rgyal mo rin chen dpal des gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu gcig kun mkhyen 'jig rten mgon/ /bla na med pa
66a6(mdo sde): dga' mdzad pa/ /lha dang mi dang bcas pa yi/ /'jig rten na ni de 'tsho 'o/ /de nas rgyal bu rin chen 'byung gnas kyis pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum tshur gshegs/
66a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog las byung ba de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
66b1(mdo sde): chos mnyam pa'i slad du gshegs so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yab yum/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten na dka' ba mdzad pa ste/ ma grol ba rnams
66b2(mdo sde): grol mdzad mgon/ /ljongs pa rnams la mig sbyin mdzad/ /chos la dpa' zhing cher dpa' ba/ /lhun po lta bur mi g.yos so/ /de nas rgyal po rgyal ba thob dang / rgyal mo rin chen
66b3(mdo sde): d pal gyis bu de blangs te btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas par bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te brgya stong ri ba'i mu
66b4(mdo sde): tig gi se mo do phul lo/ /phul nas kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas rgyal bu des rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa byas nas shing ta la bdun srid tsam gyi
66b5(mdo sde): bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das me tog las byung ba de la rin po che'i char dang / me tog gi char dang / spos kyi char rnams kyis gtor/ mngon par
66b6(mdo sde): gtor te/ /gtor nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ston pa rgal nas sems can rnams/ /sdug bsngal chu bo che las sgrol/ /bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa
66b7(mdo sde): khyod| |blta ba'i slad du 'dir mchis so/ /'jig rten mgon po bla na med/ /lha dang mi yi 'jig rten na/ /khyod kyis yon tan gang bstan dang / /khyod 'dra ba ni yong ma mchis/ /sems
67a1(mdo sde): can shul ngan lhung gyur cing / /'dod chags zhe sdang dbang mchis rnams/ /theg pa dman la bzhag mdzad nas/ /theg pa chen po rjod par mdzad/
67a2(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas shing dpa' ba ste/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang du gyur/ /chos ni don te chos kyi ngoms/ /chos rtsom yon tan 'byung gnas so/ /gang dag skye ba ma mchis pa//
67a3(mdo sde): chos de snying po med mkhyen nas/ /chos nyid kyang ni khyod kyis mkhyen/ /des na khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad/ /de nas gzhon nu des tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bla bstod
67a4(mdo sde): nas yang bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar yangs pa'i spyan gyis phyogs thams cad du
67a5(mdo sde): gzigs te 'khor bzhi po de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba mkhyen nas rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po/ phung po lnga po
67a6(mdo sde): de dag ni/ snying po med pa yin no/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ snying por 'du shes so/ /rgyal po chen po/ phung po rnams ni/ kha dog ngan pa/ dring ba/ khrag dang rang
67a7(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ shing dang / bong ba dang / lam dang mtshungs pa/ snying po med pa/ g.yo ba med pa dang / dga' ba dang mi dga' bar 'brel ba/ srid pa'i lu gu rgyud kyis phan tshun
67b1(mdo sde): sbrel ba| nyon mongs pa mang ba/ smad pa yin na/ snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes/ mi gcang ba la
67b2(mdo sde): gtsang bar 'du shes/ bden pa ma yin pa la bden par 'du shes so/ /rgyal po chen po/ phung po nga ni/ rang gi las kyis rnam par bris pa ste/ rgyal po chen po/ dper na/ rma
67b3(mdo sde): bya'i 'jug tshogs tshon sna lnga pa de la ri mo mkhan gyis bris pa'ang med/ tshon kyang ci'ang med de/ /de ni/ rang gi las kyis rnam par bris pa nyid do/ /rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin
67b4(mdo sde): du byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang rang gi las kyis rnam par bris pa phan tshun gyi rkyen las byung ba dag go / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
67b5(mdo sde): m i pham dbang phyug ces bya ba de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas lus
67b6(mdo sde): btud lus smad de sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phung po 'di dag ni/ kha dog ngan pa/ dring ba/ khrag dang rang
67b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba/ shing dang / bong ba dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang 'dra ba/ snying po ma mchis pa/ g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni/ snying por 'du shes te/
68a1(mdo sde): yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ldongs pa/ rmongs pa dang 'dra ba/ gti mug la gzhol ba/ mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog gis kun nas
68a2(mdo sde): khebs pa/ lta ba thams cad kyi tshang tshing thibs pos gtibs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni/ zab ste/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing
68a3(mdo sde): 'dra ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde'i tshig bshad pa 'di dag la yang dag pa'i 'du shes skyed pa'i sems can de dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags
68a4(mdo sde): sam| de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das me tog las byung ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/
68a5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung ba de'i tshe sems can rnams sbyang ba'i phyir 'byung ste/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang
68a6(mdo sde): ston to| |sred pas nyam thag pa rnams kyi sred pa gcod do/ /sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams kyi mya ngan sel to/ /chos thams cad snying po med par shes te nam mkha'
68a7(mdo sde): dang mtshungs shing 'dra bar shes nas sems can rnams chos nyid la rab tu 'god de/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can sbyong bar byed pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan
68b1(mdo sde): ' das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog las byung ba des sems can bstan pa 'di bshad pa na rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa bu dang bcas pa
68b2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mo rin chen dpal de dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog 'khor du bcas pa thams cad skra dang kha spu bregs te bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu byung ngo / /de nas
68b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag/ rgyal bu gzhon nu 'di la ltos/ rigs kyi bu dag /skyes bu dam pa 'dis sangs rgyas bye
68b4(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ thams cad du'ang chos smra bar gyur to/ /'di ni/ rtag tu skyes bu dam pa 'di'i phar gyur te/ rtag tu skyes
68b5(mdo sde): bu dam pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yongs su smin par byas so/ /rigs kyi bu dag /rgyal bu gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas 'di ni/ nga yongs su
68b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ rin po che du ma bkod pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug nas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
68b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston
69a1(mdo sde): pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer kun nas mngon 'phags dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni/ kun
69a2(mdo sde): nas rin po ches yang dag par bris pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni/ tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa
69a3(mdo sde): drug thub par 'gyur ro/ /de'i dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan ni/ lo 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa lngar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
69a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i lung bstan pa brjod pa bshad pa na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs
69a5(mdo sde): pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
69a6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med ces bya ba 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog las byung zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der
69a7(mdo sde): chos bstan par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom za'am yid gnyis
69b1(mdo sde): su gyur na/ de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po rgyal ba thob pa zhes bya ba de'i bur
69b2(mdo sde): gyur te| de bzhin gshegs pa des nga las 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas dga' zhes bya bas
69b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
69b4(mdo sde): bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gang dag yi ger 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'brir stsol ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / bdug
69b5(mdo sde): pa dang / spos rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas dga' la 'di skad ces
69b6(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas pa de dag gis mdo sde 'di rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi
69b7(mdo sde): bu| chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur la the tshom mi za ba'i sems can de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs
70a1(mdo sde): kyi bu| gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu dag 'dzin pa'i sa phyogs de dag phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na bud med
70a2(mdo sde): gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ klog na/ de bud med kyi lus brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha
70a3(mdo sde): ma yin no/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa'
70a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /
70a5(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do/ /'phags pa chos dang don rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo
70a6(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar
70a7(mdo sde): skad du| bo d+hi satwa pra ti mok+Sha tsa tuSh+ka ni ra hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa chos bzhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bcom
70b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa
70b2(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dang / maud+gal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang
70b3(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su song ste
70b4(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di
70b5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bden pa'i rnam pa'i bya ba ni/ gang / bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bden
70b6(mdo sde): par smra zhing yang dag par smra bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
70b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra zhing yang dag par smra ba yin te/
71a1(mdo sde): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la rigs
71a2(mdo sde): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas gnas
71a3(mdo sde): pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ dper na/ skyes bu grong khyer gyi tshad 'jal bar 'dod pa de grong khyer gyi bya ba la brtson pa skyed par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ skyes bu de'i grong khyer de yang dag
71a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / mi rnams grong khyer du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes re bar bya ba yin la/ grong khyer du so sor 'jog par 'dod pas kyang yang dag pa'i shes rab la brten nas
71a5(mdo sde): gnas thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du dus gang gi tshe dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' brtson
71a6(mdo sde): 'grus brtsom pa la gnas te chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang gis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
71a7(mdo sde): rgya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i rnam pa dang po'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thos pa nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge
71b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams myur du smin par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu nad kyis thebs par gyur ba de la sman pas sman nye bar bstan la/ des ji skad bstan pa bzhin du
71b2(mdo sde): so sor bsten pas nad de las myur du thar par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des sman tshul bzhin du so sor bsten pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos
71b3(mdo sde): thos pa nan tan gyis sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dge ba'i chos rnams myur du yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang gis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
71b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i rnam pa gnyis pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad
71b5(mdo sde): la gzhan gyi 'du shes skyed par byed de/ chos cung zad kyang mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye bar len pa las ni/ 'jigs pa 'byung bas chos thams cad la 'jigs pa'i 'du shes
71b6(mdo sde): skyed par byed de/ 'jigs pa'i 'du shes skyed pa las ni/ yid rton par mi byed do/ /yid mi rton pa yod na/ ji ltar thar par bya/ ji ltar na/ bde legs su gnas par 'gyur zhes lam
71b7(mdo sde): tshol bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
72a1(mdo sde): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba yod na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ji ltar thar par bya/ ji
72a2(mdo sde): ltar na| bde legs su gnas par 'gyur zhes lam yongs su tshol zhing phyogs bzhir legs par gsungs pa yongs su tshol lo/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang gis myur du bla na med pa yang
72a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i rnam pa gsum pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
72a4(mdo sde): dpa' sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi chos rnams kyis yongs su mi skrag cing ma gos pas rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sems can gang su dag sdug bsngal
72a5(mdo sde): dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams byung ba nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis de dag bsal bar bya'o/ /zhes sems skyed par byed cing / ji ltar bdag la zag
72a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i bde ba myong ba skyes pa de bzhin du bdag gis sems can thams cad la bsgrub par bya'o/ /zhes brtson 'grus rtsom par byed do/ /de de ltar brtson 'grus rtsom pa na rnyed
72a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes skyed par mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu dbyar zla 'bring po'i zla ba la 'brog dgon par song ba na 'brog dgon pa de na'ang mi rgyu ba med
72b1(mdo sde): la| shing med cing chu med pa dang / de'i steng nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang shar bar gyur/ der sa gzhi'ang rab tu 'bar zhing tsha bar gyur te/ de'i mdun du chu bo'i rgyun chen po 'bab
72b2(mdo sde): par gyur pa na/ de de la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyed par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi phyir sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam
72b3(mdo sde): ji lta bu bzung la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' lam de yongs su bzung yang bskal pa bye ba 'das nas tha na 'dug pa tsam gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i sems gcig skyed na'ang de la byang
72b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpas 'di ltar sems gzengs bstod par bya ste/ bdag gis gang gzung nas 'dug pa de'ang mang du yin te/ sems can thams cad la gnong bskur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
72b5(mdo sde): gang gis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i rnam pa bzhi pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ci'i
72b6(mdo sde): phyir mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya zhe na/ ma mkhyen pa'i mkhyen pa mkhyen pas mngon par mkhyen pa dang / mkhyen pa'i chos de la rab tu gnas pas spyod pa des na/
72b7(mdo sde): mngon par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya'o/ /bla na med pa zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang rdul tsam yang lus shing ma rgal ba med pa des na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ pha
73a1(mdo sde): rol tu byon pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ci'i phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na/ thugs mnyam pa dang / thugs rnyog pa med pa dang / thugs mi 'khrugs
73a2(mdo sde): pas chos rnams mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med par mngon par mkhyen pa des na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
73a3(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ brtson 'grus mi 'phrog par gyur te nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos par bla na med pa
73a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi sgrub pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa dang /
73a5(mdo sde): gzigs pa dang / thugs su chud pa dang / brnyes pa dang / mngon sum du mdzad pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas de dag las ma
73a6(mdo sde): nyams shing sgrub pa'i rnam pa kun rdzogs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub
73a7(mdo sde): sems dpas bsngags pa'i bya ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du mi 'gyur ba yin/ nga rgyal
73b1(mdo sde): tshar gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ chags pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ chags pa spong ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ zhe sdang med par 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa sgom pa la mngon par dga'
73b2(mdo sde): ba yin| rmongs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa yin/ shes rab nye bar ston pa yin/ shes rab kyis spyod pa yin/ shes rab kyi bdag por gyur pa yin/ shes
73b3(mdo sde): rab kyis nges par 'byung ba yin/ rmongs pa'i dra ba spong ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ mun pa mun nag 'joms pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ shes rab kyi rgyu lhur len cing mthu dang ldan pa
73b4(mdo sde): yin| shes rab nges par rnyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ chos dang po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa'i bya ba rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang
73b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i bya ba don du gnyer ba yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig bu gcig pa sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/
73b6(mdo sde): mi mthun pa med pa de rgyal pos gsad sar por ba mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i pha dang ma kye ma'o bu cig pa/ kyi hud bu gcig bdag cag 'bor ram zhes kun tu smra zhing smre sngags 'don
73b7(mdo sde): pas rnam par smra bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du dus gang gi tshe lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can gang yang rung ba zhig sdig pa byed
74a1(mdo sde): pa mthong ba na/ kye ma'o gang du sems can shes rab 'chal ba rnams ni/ bdag gi yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba las rnam par nyams par byed do/ /zhes de
74a2(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' snying rje skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan bsrung ngo snyam na bdag bsrung bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' phan pa 'dod pa 'di
74a3(mdo sde): lta bu dang ldan pas srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa'i bya ba rjes su thob par
74a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gis chos tshol bar byed cing bsti stang gis chos yongs su 'dzin par byed la/ bsti stang gis chos kyi
74a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas bsti stang gis chos btsal bar bya zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod pa
74a6(mdo sde): mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus pas gang yongs su mi gtong ba'i rin po che de 'jig rten na med do/ /gang lus kyis rim gro mi byed pa de med do/ /gang rkang pas btang ba la mi spro ba
74a7(mdo sde): med do| |gang ngag gi las la mi spro ba de med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin du sbyar te chos rin po che ni/ rin po che thams cad las khyad par can du gyur pa yin pas bdag gis
74b1(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad btang nas chos rin po che btsal zhing gzung bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di ni/ 'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ba'o/ /chos 'di ni/ skye pa dang / rga
74b2(mdo sde): ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba gcod par 'gyur ba'o/ /snyam nas rin po che'i sems bskyed/ rnyed dka'
74b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed/ sman gyi sems bskyed de/ chos 'di ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'gyur bas/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi nad nye bar zhi bar
74b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir chos 'di lta bu btsal bar bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i bsam pas shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' chos tshol bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas
74b5(mdo sde): rin thang med pa'i sems bskyed cing bsti stang gis chos 'dzin par byed ce na/ de tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa'i ched du ri rab tsam gyi rin po che'i phung po yongs su btang yang de la
74b6(mdo sde): dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed kyi/ ci ste gang tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dzin pa de nyid la ni/ dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed do/ /chos kyi tshig gcig gi ched du stong gsum gyi
74b7(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ba srid pa'i rtse mo dang mnyam pa 'di yongs su gtong yang de la ni/ dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed kyi/ ci ste gang chos kyi tshig
75a1(mdo sde): gcig po 'di nyid la ni/ dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i gus pa dang / de lta bu'i ri mor byed pas chos
75a2(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu srog don du gnyer bas srog gi phyir
75a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i phung po 'di tsam yongs su gtong ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang
75a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pas chos kyi tshig gcig gi don gyi phyir yang bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'dor ba'am/ yang na stong gsum gyi stong
75a5(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba 'di la 'jug tu zin kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi byed kyi/ ci ste gang chos kyi tshig 'di 'dzin pa de nyid la dka' ba'i
75a6(mdo sde): 'du shes skyed par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang gis chos yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bsti stang du
75a7(mdo sde): byed pas chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed ce na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa na zang zing gi sems skyed par mi byed de/ bdag gi sbyin
75b1(mdo sde): pa 'di las chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams rnyed par 'gyur ba'am/ tha na bdag gi sbyin pa 'di las legs so/ /
75b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes skyes bu dam pa de de lta bu'i bsam pas chos kyis byin pa sbyin par mi byed do/ /'on kyang ji ltar sems can 'di dag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba
75b3(mdo sde): dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las thar par bya zhes de ltar sbyin par byed de/ shA ri'i
75b4(mdo sde): bu| skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ de lta bu'i gsam pa dang / de lta bu'i tshul gyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig 'di
75b5(mdo sde): skad du gal te bdag la khyed kyis lus byin pa lta na/ bdag khyed las chos kyi sbyin pa 'di lan par 'dod do/ /zhes zer na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig de lta
75b6(mdo sde): bu'i phan par 'dod pa yod na 'di skad du khyod la bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag las mchog dang / mchog tu gyur pa'i sha dag kyang zo zhig /'dod chags zad par byed pa'i
75b7(mdo sde): chos 'di'ang zungs shig ces smra bar byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu byed pa na yang dka' ba'i 'du shes mi skyed kyi/ ci lte gang 'di chos kyi sbyin pa de sten pa de
76a1(mdo sde): nyid la ni/ dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i bsti stang gis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ de
76a2(mdo sde): lta bu'i bsti stang gis chos 'dzin par byed/ de lta bu'i bsti stang gis chos tshol bar byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i bsti stang gis chos nges par yongs su tshol ba po'i sems
76a3(mdo sde): can yang rnyed dka' ba yin/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i bsti stang gis chos yongs su 'dzin pa po'i sems can yang rnyed dka' ba yin/ shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i bsti stang gis
76a4(mdo sde): chos sbyin pa po'i sems can yang rnyed dka' ba yin te/ gang rnyed dka' ba de ni/ ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin la/ de dag ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang bsngags
76a5(mdo sde): par bya ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa'i bya ba rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
76a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di la 'dod chags skye bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba na 'dod chags 'di gzhi gang las byung bar tshol bar byed de/ yongs su btsal ba na de'i gzhi
76a7(mdo sde): mi dmigs so/ /gang las 'dod chags de skye ba dang / gang gi 'dod chags de skye ba dang / ji ltar 'dod chags de skye ba de ltar gang gi skye ba de mi dmigs/ gang la skye ba de mi
76b1(mdo sde): dmigs/ ji ltar skye ba de mi dmigs te/ 'dod chags de mi dmigs pa ni/ 'dod chags kyi rgyus sdig pa'i las mi byed la/ de'i dka' po'i chos rnams 'phel bar 'gyur
76b2(mdo sde): zhing de ma smad cing bsngags par 'gyur te/ des na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos rnams kyis bsngags
76b3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /de chos thams cad khas mi len cing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par stong par mthong zhing de sangs rgyas bcom
76b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub la lhag par mos par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten rnams phyin ci log la yang dag par zhen pa mthong ba na de zhe sdang med pa dang / gnod sems med pa
76b5(mdo sde): bzod pa mchog la rab tu gnas nas sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom zhing
76b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te gnod sems dang ldan na ni/ khong khro ba mang bar 'gyur ro/ /khong khro ba mang ba las ni/ gzhan
76b7(mdo sde): dag la khro ba'i tshig rjod par byed de/ de mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed do/ /de mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pas mi dge ba'i srid pa mngon par skyed par 'gyur ro/ /
77a1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ yang bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bzod par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang bzod pa'am/ mi bzod pa'i chos
77a2(mdo sde): rdul tsam yang mi dmigs pa des na gzhan mi shes pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag la snying rje skyed par byed de/ sems can kun nas gshe bar byed pa dang / kun nas khro bar byed
77a3(mdo sde): pa dang / yongs su spyo bar byed pa de dag nyid la snying rje skyed par byed do/ /des na byams pa chen po bsgoms pa yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyang bsgoms pa yin te/ bzod pa de
77a4(mdo sde): dang ldan na bzod pa mchog thob pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yin te/ de snying rje chen po dang ldan pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
77a5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par byed/ de dka' ba spyod par byed cing bzod pa dka' ba byed de/ des na bzod pa mchog thob par
77a6(mdo sde): byed| des na thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba thob par byed/ des na sna tshogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba thob par byed/ des na chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong
77a7(mdo sde): ba thob par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa'i bya ba rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos
77b1(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa yin/ ji ltar byed pa de
77b2(mdo sde): bzhin du smra ba yi/ khro ba skyes pa'ang spong bar byed de/ rab tu spong bar byed/ rnam par sel bar byed cing ye shes la rab tu rton par 'gyur ba yin te/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper
77b3(mdo sde): na| me mdag chen pos gang ba'i dong ni/ chu'i phung po chen pos nye bar zhi bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba skyes pa spong bar byed pa dang / sel
77b4(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / ye shes la rton par byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos dang po 'di dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan
77b5(mdo sde): yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thos pa tshol ba la gnas shing dge ba'i chos thams cad tshol ba na gces pa mi 'dor ba yin/ nyams 'og tu chud pa'i thos pa mang po dang
77b6(mdo sde): ldan pa yin/ de gang dang gang du 'gro ba thams cad du 'dod pa'i bya ba rjes su thob par 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang thos pa mang po la 'god par byed cing chos de dag la'ang tshul
77b7(mdo sde): bzhin du so sor rtog par byed do/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe'ang chos dang ldan pa'i dran pas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig rtse ba dang dga' bas
78a1(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pas lam du zhugs pa na de dus de'i tshe bkres par gyur la/ de dus phyis shig na sngon gyi rtse ba dang dga' ba de rjes su dran par gyur
78a2(mdo sde): pa na 'di ltar de sngon gyi yid la byed pa des bkres pa yod pa sel bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du dus gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshor bas nyen pa de'i
78a3(mdo sde): tshe chos dang ldan pa'i yid kyis dang du len par byed de/ de shes bzhin dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /des shes bzhin dang ldan pas ma'i mngal du 'jug cing der gnas na'ang dran pa
78a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
78a5(mdo sde): ngag legs par srung ba yin te/ de gzhan la gshe bar mi byed de/ gti mug pa zhe'am/ rmongs pa zhe'am/ khengs pa zhe'am/ long ba zhe'am/ 'theng po zhes gzhan la khro
78a6(mdo sde): ba skyed pas gnas pa ma yin no/ /gzhan du na sems can khros pa gang yin pa de la dbugs 'byin par byed/ bzod pa gsol bar byed/ rjes su mthun par byed/ chos
78a7(mdo sde): kyis dga' bar byed/ dran pa la nye bar gnas par byed/ de la gsong por smra bar byed/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so/ /zhes smra bar byed de/ ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs
78b1(mdo sde): shig / ces sems can de dag la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byed/ dbugs 'byin par byed/ yid ches par byed cing bzod pa gsol bar byed/ rjes su mthun par byed do/ /sems
78b2(mdo sde): can 'khrul ba'i spyod pa dag las kyang kun nas slong bar byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ chos gsum po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/
78b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di la dge ba'i chos rnams las shin tu 'das shing dge ba'i chos rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / de de la gnas nas gzhan dag kyang de
78b4(mdo sde): la rab tu 'god par byed/ bsti stang gis chos yongs su tshol bar byed pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher ston par byed de/ shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang
78b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de skye ba dran pas gnas lnga rab tu thob pa yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ sngon thos pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag la de bzhin du mngon par
78b6(mdo sde): 'jug pa nyid dang / dran pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / shes rab rno ba dang / dran pa mchog dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / de srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ste /
78b7(mdo sde): skyes ma thag tu chos lnga po 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos 'di bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la med de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
79a1(mdo sde): la g.yo med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ser sna med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phrag dog dang phra ma med do/ /byang chub
79a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so snyam du zhum pa'i sems med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang
79a3(mdo sde): la chos bzhi po 'di dag yod pa de ni/ mkhas pa rnams kyis kye ma'o 'di ni/ tshul 'chos pa'o/ /kye ma'o 'di ni/ kha gsag can no/ /kye ma'o 'di ni/ chos stor ba'o/ /kye
79a4(mdo sde): ma'o 'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos can no/ /kye ma'o 'di ni/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing lhur len pa'o/ /kye ma'o 'di ni/ gos dang zas ched cher byed pa ste/ 'jig rten
79a5(mdo sde): na rkun por rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ gang zag de lta bu la ni/ dngos po bzhi med de/ de'i rtags bzhi gang zhe na/ zas la ched cher byed pa la gnas
79a6(mdo sde): pa dang / bdag la mchog tu 'du shes pa dang / sgrog pas nye bar ston pa dang / de la byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa gang yin pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi
79a7(mdo sde): gnas gcig la'ang mngon par sbyor ba med pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas brtsam par bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
79b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyid dang / tshul khrims ma ral pa nyid dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa nyid dang / lhug par gtong ba nyid dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang / khro ba
79b2(mdo sde): med pa nyid dang / 'tshe ba med pa nyid dang / thos pa mang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba med pa nyid dang / gnod
79b3(mdo sde): sems thams cad la don du gnyer ba med pa nyid dang / myur du mngon par 'byung ba nyid dang / phra ma med pa nyid dang / khro ba med pa nyid dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par len
79b4(mdo sde): pa dang / ye shes kyi spyod pa dang / sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nyid dang / mi mthun pa rnams sdum par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi zam pa nyid dang / chos
79b5(mdo sde): kyi gtam byed pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i stobs so sor rig par byed pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa ni/ shA ri'i bu/ nges par byang chub sems dpar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i
79b6(mdo sde): bu| 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpas brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ gang la byang chub sems dpas brtsams pa'i byang chub sems
79b7(mdo sde): dpa'i yon tan gyi chos 'di dag med pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa ngan 'gro'i gnas dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po 'di ni/ byang chub
80a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos dang chos shes pa dang / sbyin pa
80a2(mdo sde): dang sbyin pa shes pa dang / zhal ta byed pa'i bya ba shes pa dang / thos pa mang po btsal ba shes pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta
80a3(mdo sde): ste| dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
80a4(mdo sde): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / chags pa med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di rnams ni/ byang
80a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ gang de rnams tshul bzhin sgrub par byed kyi log par mi sgrub pa ste/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par
80a6(mdo sde): sdom pa 'di ni/ chos shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la sbyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' la gang yod pa de yongs su gtong bar byed de/ de lag pa yongs
80a7(mdo sde): su gtong ba yin/ rkang pa yongs su gtong ba yin/ lag pa dang rkang pa yongs su gtong ba yin/ sna yongs su gtong ba yin/ mgo yongs su gtong ba yin/ yan lag
80b1(mdo sde): dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba yin/ bu yongs su gtong ba yin/ bu mo yongs su gtong ba yin/ chung ma yongs su gtong ba yin/ srog yongs su gtong ba yin/ nor yongs su

80b6(mdo sde): pas smad pa'i sbyin pa 'di rnams las rab tu ldog pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ dus su ma byin pa'i sbyin pa dang / rung ba ma yin pa'i sbyin pa dang / chang gi sbyin pa dang / dug gi sbyin
80b7(mdo sde): pa dang / gnod pa'i sbyin pa dang / 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa dang / mtshon cha'i sbyin pa dang / 'phrog pa'i sbyin pa dang / brnyas pa'i sbyin pa dang / rang gi lag gis ma yin pa'i sbyin pa

81a2(mdo sde): pa'i sbyin pa dang / dug dang sbyar ba'i sbyin pa dang / so sor gnod pa'i sbyin pa dang / rnyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang / rtag tu 'jigs pa bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa dang / byang chub

81a4(mdo sde): ldog par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ 'di la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa gang yin pa de dag la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi spyod cing lhag par mi spyod de/ byang chub sems
81a5(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad kyi thams cad du spyod cing lhag par spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod par mi bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang la byang chub

81b1(mdo sde): r i'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba gang byang chub kyi yan lag la mngon par brtson pa gang yin pa des so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsngams te gnas

82a1(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ nga rab tu byung bar gyur nas bskal pa grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab par khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba'i chos gos dang /

85a3(mdo sde): b dag kyang dus nam zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba de la nyin mtshan brgyad du

85a6(mdo sde): bdag cag gis ni/ mi shes mod kyi/ 'on kyang lus 'di la 'bras can dang / zan drong gyis gsos te bza' ba btsal bar brtson par gyis la khyod myur du 'chi ba'i dus
85a7(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ba ma byed cig ces smras so/ /des lus nyam chung bar ni/ mngon par shes pa med kyi/ 'on kyang gang du 'gro bar bya ste/ 'di nyid du bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed par
85b1(mdo sde): bya'o| |zhes nyin mtshan bdun du du zhing 'chi ba'i dus bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /shA ri'i bu/ brtson 'grus des bskal pa byed ba phrag drug cu phyir bsnyil bar gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ byang chub
85b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' des de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba nyi shu rtsa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /des bla na med pa yang dag par
85b3(mdo sde): r dzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su smin
85b4(mdo sde): par byas so/ /de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ dpag tu med cing 'di'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun yang tshad med cing dpag tu med par gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu/ ci'i phyir mkhas pa'i brtson 'grus zhes
85b5(mdo sde): bya zhe na| de dus thams cad du nges par 'byung ba la brtson pa dang / dus thams cad du brtson 'grus rtsom pa la brtson pa dang / dus thams cad du thos pa mang po la brtson pa ste/
85b6(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ de lta bu'i brtson 'grus 'dis byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa'i brtson 'grus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
85b7(mdo sde): so/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
86a1(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' thos pa mang ba yin/ thos pa 'dzin pa yin/ thos pa bsags pa
86a2(mdo sde): yin| tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rgan rabs dang / bar ma dang / gsar bu la gus pa dang bcas pa yin/ dris na lag pa g.yas pas la ma ni/ 'di'o/ /lam ni /
86a3(mdo sde): 'di'o| |zhes nye bar ston pa yin zhing chos ston pa la brtson pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur
86a4(mdo sde): zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ji ltar thos pa btsal bar bya zhe na/ rang gi 'dod pa
86a5(mdo sde): btang ste mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi gzhung la rab tu gnas pa dang / gus pa dang bcas par bya'o/ /chos bzhi rnam par spang bar bya ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gnyid
86a6(mdo sde): dang rmugs pa dang / bre mo gtam dang / khro ba dang / khengs pa nyid de/ chos bzhi po 'di dag rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /chos bzhi dag la goms par bya ba yin te/ bzhi
86a7(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ mi nyal ba la goms pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams shing 'chag pa'i rang bzhin can du bya ba dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi bsnyen bkur la gus pa dang
86b1(mdo sde): bcas shing khengs pa med pa dang / gzhan dag la gus pa bskyed pas thos pa 'dzin pa dang / de sems la bzhag nas tshig yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang
86b2(mdo sde): ldan na| thos pa tshol ba yin no/ /chos bzhi po 'di dag gis kyang slob dpon mnyes par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ des pa dang bshes pa dang / bshes pa brtan pa dang / chos la gnas
86b3(mdo sde): pa dang / nges pa'i tshig bzang po dang ldan pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ slob dpon ma nyes par byed do/ /bdag chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dga' ba thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi
86b4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ bdag gi btsal ba don yod par bdag nyid kyis dga' ba thob pa dang / bdag thos pa'i gter dang ldan pa dang / bdag 'di la brten nas shes rab kyi phung po dang
86b5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / gzhan dag la chos kyi sbyin pa spyin pa na dga' ba dang rangs pa skye bar 'gyur te/ chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid dga' ba
86b6(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro/ /de de lta bur thos pa tshol ba la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / ri mo dang ldan pa dang / sri zhu dang ldan pa dang / bdag nyid mi 'phyar ba dang / bdag nyid dul ba'i
86b7(mdo sde): don dang / bdag nyid zhi ba'i don dang / bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i don dang / gzhan dul ba'i don dang / gzhan zhi ba'i don dang / gzhan mya ngan las 'da'
87a1(mdo sde): ba'i don byed pa yin te/ bdag gcig bu'i don byed pa ni/ ma yin no/ /de ltar thos pa tshol zhing de ltar thos pa yongs su tshol ba na mthong ba'i
87a2(mdo sde): chos kyi shes rab kyang 'phel bar byed na/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ shes rab de'ang thos pa nan tan du byed pas sgrub pa yin no/ /byang chub sems
87a3(mdo sde): dpa' thos pa la nan tan du sgrub par mi byed pa des ni/ ser skya rjes su dran par bya'o/ /de bas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag la'ang gus pa dang bcas par bya/ mdun
87a4(mdo sde): du gnas te 'phya bar mi bya/ smra bar mi bya/ rkang pa bkru bar mi bya/ mdun du so shing bza' bar mi bya/ mdun du mchil ma dor bar mi bya/ sgra drag pos smra bar mi bya/ ma
87a5(mdo sde): dris par smra bar mi bya/ gtam gyi bar chad mi bya/ ma smras par 'gro bar mi bya/ snga phyi'i 'du shes mi bya/ gang cung zad tsam rab tu smra bar mi bya/ gzhan dang gzhan pa'i
87a6(mdo sde): gtam mi bya/ dman pa dang ldan pa'i gtam mi bya/ gzhan dris pa na gzhan gyis brda sprad par mi bya/ gang dris pa de nyid brda sprad par bya/ rkun po'i gtam mi bya/ mdo
87a7(mdo sde): sde la rton par bya ba dag dang / gzhan gyi sems bsrung bar bya zhing / de dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsten par bya/ gang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag pa
87b1(mdo sde): nyid la zhugs pa de rnams la phan gdags par bya/ gang ma zhugs pa rnams la'ang gnod par mi bya/ de la rnam pa de dag gnyis ka la'ang gnod par mi bya'o/ /gang dag la bdag la khros par gyur
87b2(mdo sde): nas yang dag pa ma yin pas rjod par byed cing srog gi bar chad byed par gnas pa/ tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad byed pa la 'jig pa'am/ gus par bya ba dang / tha na dga' ba'i tshig
87b3(mdo sde): gis kyang de dang sems yongs su 'dris par bya/ gang las lung nod pa dang / kha ton 'don pa dang 'brel ba de la ni/ ston pa'i 'dus shes bskyed cing gus par bya'o/ /de ltar tshangs pa
87b4(mdo sde): mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la gus par yang bya'o/ /ji ltar lam bstan par bya zhe na/ sems mnyam pa nyid dang / sems rab tu dang ba nyid dang / yang dag par 'du shes pa
87b5(mdo sde): dang / som nyi med pas lam la la ma nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /gal te the tshom med par ma gyur na des lam shes pa'i skyes bu dag las mnyan nas lam nye bar bstan par bya'o/ /chos
87b6(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshul
87b7(mdo sde): bzhin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /tshul bzhin chos ni nyan byed cing / /tshul bzhin shin tu don sems la/ /chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /lus can rnams la phan don du/ /
88a1(mdo sde): chos de yongs su tshol ba na/ /mkhan po dag dang nye gnas ni/ /gus pa kun gyis bya ba yin/ /rtag tu byams pa la gnas nas/ /byas pa gzo dang
88a2(mdo sde): byas pa tshor/ /ngo tsha khrel yod phun sum tshogs/ /phrag dog tshul 'chos rnam par spang / /nad pa rnams ni gso byed pa/ /rnyed dka' rin chen 'du shes kyis/ /de dag 'du shes
88a3(mdo sde): nyer bzhag nas/ /legs par bshad pa yongs su btsal/ /de dag thos pas bder 'gyur dang / /shes rab rnon po'ang skye 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/
88a4(mdo sde): thams cad byams pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /dper na skyes bu khrus byas la/ /'ga' yis phreng ba byin pa na/ /lag pa gnyis kyis yon blangs nas/ /spyi bo la ni 'jog pa
88a5(mdo sde): ltar| |de bzhin legs bshad thos nas kyang / /dga' ba'i sems ni skye 'gyur ba/ /rgyal srid thob pa'ang de lta bu'i/ /dga' ba rnyed pa ma yin no/ /rtag tu de dag chos smra
88a6(mdo sde): la| |mchog tu bla mar bya ba yin/ /chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas mtshan te/ /chos ni dgra bcom rgyal mtshan yin/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thos nas kyang / /sgrub pa dag la
88a7(mdo sde): rab gnas shing / /tshul khrims thos pas nges 'byung ste/ /dper na yar ngo'i zla ba bzhin/ /mi rmongs zhe sdang med pa yis/ /lam mchog dag ni bsten pa dang / /byis pa gang
88b1(mdo sde): la gus bcas pa'i/ /lta ba'i gnas kyang rnam par spang / /seng+ges spangs pa'i wa bzhin du/ /zil gyis mnan pas chos rnams 'chang / /rlung gis sprin gyi tshogs bzhin du/ /mu stegs
88b2(mdo sde): can de zil gyis mnan/ /sa la sprin gyi tshogs bzhin du/ /chos kyis yongs su tshim par byed/ /sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni/ /sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du sel/ /sems
88b3(mdo sde): ni rtse gcig mnyam bzhag pas/ /de dag rnam rtog spyod yul min/ /de dag khro ba lhur mi len/ /'phyar ba la yang mi gnas so/ /dus dang dus min rnam shes shing / /don shes
88b4(mdo sde): pa yis rnam par 'dren/ /rtag tu bzod stobs la dga' rnams/ /shes pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /mkhas dang mthu la brtan pa dang / /chos shes pa la mkhas pa dang //
88b5(mdo sde): dpa' zhing sems stobs che ba ste/ /rlung gis char ba'i rdul bzhin du/ /sdig can rnams ni zil gyis gnon/ /phyogs rnams dag tu gsal gnas pa/ /nyi ma 'char ba ji bzhin
88b6(mdo sde): no| |mkhas pa de dag rang don la/ /ched du smra ba rjod mi byed/ /'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /bsam gtan mngon shes dag la mkhas/ /de dag rnam pa 'di 'dra bas/ /bdud
88b7(mdo sde): kyi steng na gnas pa yin/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir/ /'jig rten mar me byed cing rgyu/ /shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa
89a1(mdo sde): sgrub pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gus pas tshul khrims srung zhing so sor thar pa la khyad du mi gsod pa dang / gus pas byams pa sgom par byed
89a2(mdo sde): cing gnod sems la sbyor ba yang spong bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa la 'dun pa drag po skyed par yang byed pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad la gces pa mi 'dor ba ste/
89a3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa sgrub pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad
89a4(mdo sde): gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /de dag sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i/ /tshul khrims ma nyams ma ral srung / /tshul khrims phung po dag pa la/ /
89a5(mdo sde): dga' ba nye bar skye bar 'gyur/ /chos rnams mang po tshol byed cing / /thos pa mang la legs gnas na/ /gang gis the tshom gcod byed pa'i/ /des de'i shes rab 'phel bar
89a6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |skye dang 'chi ba'i rgyun dag las/ /'di dag ji ltar grol bya zhes/ /ltos med phan pa'i sems dag gis/ /dam pa'i chos kyang ston par byed/ /gnod sems don
89a7(mdo sde): du mi gnyer bas/ /byams pa'i sems kyang sgom par byed/ /mi 'jigs pa dang phan pa'i sems/ /bdag dang sems can mnyam pa nyid/ /byang chub la brtan zil gnon
89b1(mdo sde): pa'i| |brtson pa dag kyang legs par rtsom/ /gang dag byang chub la brten pa'i/ /dge ba'i chos rnams tshol ba dang / /bsgom par bya ba sgom pa dang / /spang bar bya ba'ang rnam
89b2(mdo sde): par spong / /ji ltar spang bya spangs pa yis/ /myur du mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /dgon pa'i gnas la mngon phyogs shing / /gnod pa dag la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /thos pa tshol
89b3(mdo sde): la brtson pa dag / go 'phang mchog ni rtogs par 'gyur/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams dang / /dge bsnyen de bzhin dge bsnyen ma/ /thams cad dang ni de dag gis/ /'dris pa
89b4(mdo sde): rnam par spang bar bya/ /byis pa'i lam la brten pa yi/ /rmongs pa kun kyang skyabs med de/ /gang zhig chos la brten pa dang / /de dag sangs rgyas mchog tu gzhol/ /mi gang
89b5(mdo sde): sems can don dga' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas pha dang ma yin no/ /g.yo med chos la 'dod pa dag /byang chub la ni rab tu dad/ /sangs rgyas dag tu mi lta ba'i/ /mi rnams mtshan
89b6(mdo sde): nyid gsum gsungs te/ /g.yo dang chos min 'dod pa dang / /snyom las dag las rtag dga' ba'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang / /de bzhin sdig pa rab spangs
89b7(mdo sde): nas| |blo ldan brtson 'grus ldan gyur pa/ /byang chub la ni rab gus 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi
90a1(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /byang
90a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa chos bzhi sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka pa shrI dz+nya na dang / zhu
90a3(mdo sde): chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros dang / dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsa tur+d+harma ni rde sha nA ma mahA
90a4(mdo sde): yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
90a5(mdo sde): lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang na dge slong lnga brgya tha ma pa'i dge
90a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
90a7(mdo sde): te| de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90b1(mdo sde): po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang / gnyen
90b2(mdo sde): po kun tu spyod pa dang / sor chud par byed pa'i stobs dang / rten gyi stobs so/ /de la rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni/ mi dge ba'i las spyad na de la 'gyod pa
90b3(mdo sde): mang ba yin no/ /de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni/ mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la shin tu brtson pa'o/ /de la sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni/ sdom
90b4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par blangs pas mi phyed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'am/ /de la rten gyi stobs ni/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / byang chub kyi
90b5(mdo sde): sems mi gtong ba ste/ de stobs dang ldan pa la brten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/ /byams pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi
90b6(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan na/ sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mdo 'di rtag tu bklag par bya'o/ /kha
90b7(mdo sde): ton du bya'o/ /bsam par bya'o/ /bsgom par bya'o/ /mang du bya'o/ /des na nyes par spyad pa 'bras bu 'byin mi nus par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
91a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / brgya
91a2(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos
91a3(mdo sde): bzhi bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
91a4(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu r+d+harma ka sU tra/ bod skad du/ chos bzhi pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
91a5(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban dge
91a6(mdo sde): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brtan zhing zab la snyan cing rgya che ba'i sgra
91a7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas bzhi la yid brtan par mi bya'o/ /bzhi
91b1(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ dge slong dag/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni/ bud med dag la dga' ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba dang / dge slong dag/ rigs
91b2(mdo sde): kyi bu mkhas pas bdag ni/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor la dga' ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba dang / dge slong dag/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pas
91b3(mdo sde): bdag ni/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ nang nyung ba'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba dang / dge slong dag/ rigs kyi bu mkhas
91b4(mdo sde): pas bdag ni/ phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa'o snyam du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
91b5(mdo sde): stsal te| bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /bud med brten du ga la rung / /rgyal po'i pho brang gal dga'/ /
91b6(mdo sde): dbu ba'i snying po ga la yod/ /longs spyod rtag pa ga la yin/ /longs spyod dag ni 'bab chu bzhin/ /gru ci 'dra bar khyim de 'dra/ /me tog ci 'dra gzugs de bzhin/ /
91b7(mdo sde): spog ni chu bur 'dra ba yin/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
92a1(mdo sde): rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon bar bstod do/ /chos bzhi pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
92a2(mdo sde): AR+ya tsa tur+d+harma ka nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
92a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
92a4(mdo sde): na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig go /de
92a5(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos bzhi po 'di dag ji srid 'tsho'i
92a6(mdo sde): bar du srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byang chub kyi
92a7(mdo sde): sems srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge ba'i bshes gnyen
92b1(mdo sde): srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzod pa dang des ba srog gi phyir yang yongs
92b2(mdo sde): su mi gtang ba dang / dge slong dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dgon pa la gnas pa srog gi phyir yang yongs su mi gtang bar mi bya ste/
92b3(mdo sde): dge slong dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos bzhi po 'di dag srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
92b4(mdo sde): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid sems ni mi gtong
92b5(mdo sde): zhing / /mkhas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems skyed cig /bzod pa des pa'i stobs la rab gnas te/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su gtang mi bya/ /ri dwags rgyal
92b6(mdo sde): po bzhin du 'jigs spangs te/ /mkhas lag dgon gnas rtag tu bsten par bya/ /chos 'di dag la rtag tu rab gnas nas/ /bdud rnams bcom nas byang chub de 'tshang
92b7(mdo sde): rgya| |bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rang ste
93a1(mdo sde): te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos bzhi pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsa tush+ka ni ra hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
93a2(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi
93a3(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang go cha chen po bgos pa sha stag dang /
93a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun
93a5(mdo sde): gyis bltas nas chos ston to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu'i tshad
93a6(mdo sde): tsam thogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu 'dzin to/ /de nas 'khor de nyid du dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag
93b1(mdo sde): p ar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa g.yog dang bcas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
93b2(mdo sde): p us mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
93b3(mdo sde): smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod da dung de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las mdzad pas ma chim mam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/
93b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po chu thams cad len pas gzhar yang chog shes sam/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ de ni/ ma lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de
93b5(mdo sde): bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po mtsho gting dpag dka' ba de lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med dpag tu med pa btsal bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
93b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyis gzhar yang tshim par mi bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpas ci la dmigs te de bzhin gshegs
93b7(mdo sde): pa mchod par bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpas dmigs pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
94a1(mdo sde): ste| thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu dgrol ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog
94a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su gzung ba la dmigs pa ste/ lha'i bu/ byang chub
94a3(mdo sde): sems dpas dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha'i
94a4(mdo sde): bu'i nang du tshangs pa gtsug phud can la byang chub sems dpa'i lam bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa de/ 'jam dpal/ legs par
94a5(mdo sde): bshad du gsol/ de la ni/ bdag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di'ang nyan par 'tshal lo/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos
94a6(mdo sde): kyi ser sna ma mchis/ slob dpon gyi chos kyi dpe mkhyud kyang ma mchis/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs
94a7(mdo sde): shig dang / bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bas khyod la bshad do/ /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam
94b1(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed par rig par bya'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dpag tu med pa bsdu ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / sems
94b2(mdo sde): can dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsag pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag
94b3(mdo sde): tu med pa mngon par rdzogs par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa ste/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems bskyed
94b4(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o/ /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ slong ba rnams la khong
94b5(mdo sde): khro ba med pa'i sems dang / log par zhugs pa rnams la snying rje ba'i sems dang / shes rab las mnyams pa'i sems dang / rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i
94b6(mdo sde): sems te/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brag lta bu yin no/ /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
94b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa mngon par 'phags pa yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims mngon par 'phags pa dang / thos pa mngon par 'phags pa dang / byams pa chen
95a1(mdo sde): po mngon par 'phags pa dang / snying rje chen po mngon par 'phags pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
95a2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa brtan pa/ snying po can/ mi phyed pa/ rdo rje lta bu'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa las mi phyed pa dang / mdza' ba las mi phyed pa dang / nan
95a3(mdo sde): tan las mi phyed pa dang / theg pa chen po las mi phyed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bsnyen
95a4(mdo sde): dka' ba yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa dang / theg pa dman
95a5(mdo sde): pa dang ma 'dres pa dang / skye bo mi bgrungs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
95a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa bla na med pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems dang / byin nas 'gyod pa med pa'i sems dang / rnam par smin pa
95a7(mdo sde): la re ba med pa'i sems dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems te/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi bor phyin
95b1(mdo sde): ba'i chos so/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed
95b2(mdo sde): ba ste| bzhi po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi lam ston par byed pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson
95b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas sgrub pa dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po
95b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi gya nom pa dam pa mchog yin no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang / gang dag de dang
95b5(mdo sde): 'gal bar byed pa de dag nyid la rab tu thar par bya bar sems bskyed pa dang / ci tsam gyi yul rgya chen po zhig 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang / ci tsam du dbul bas
95b6(mdo sde): phongs par gyur kyang chos spyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khyim par gyur na
95b7(mdo sde): bdag gi longs spyod kyis cho ga shes pa dang / gzhan gyi nor la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang / rab tu byung nas 'phags pa'i rigs kyis cho ga shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon
96a1(mdo sde): tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/
96a2(mdo sde): chos sbyin pa dang / zang zing sbyin pa dang / shog shog dang / snag tsha dang / smyu gu dang / glegs bam sbyin pa dang / chos smra ba la bsam pa thag pa nas legs so/ /zhes bya ba
96a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po nyid do/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa las nan tan snying po nyid dang /
96a4(mdo sde): longs spyod rnams las gtong ba snying po nyid dang / lus las bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba snying po nyid dang / srog las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa snying po nyid de/ bzhi
96a5(mdo sde): po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su gtang bar
96a6(mdo sde): mi bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / sems can yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba
96a7(mdo sde): yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyed mos tshal lo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dgon pa la
96b1(mdo sde): gnas pa dang / dben pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang / thabs mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag
96b2(mdo sde): go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhal med khang ngo / /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas dang / 'bel ba'i gtam gyi chos mnyan pa
96b3(mdo sde): la dga' ba myong bar byed pa dang / stong pa nyid la nges par sems pa dang / skye bo ris mthun pa dang 'du ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang
96b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor mi zad pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa'i nor dang / chos ston pa'i nor dang / sems can dbul po sdud pa'i nor dang / byang chub tu yongs
96b5(mdo sde): su bsngo ba'i nor te/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gter ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs kyi gter dang / spobs pa'i
96b6(mdo sde): gter dang / chos kyi gter dang / longs spyod zad mi shes par yongs su bsngo ba'i gter te/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
96b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'dzi las 'byung ba dang / yul thams cad las 'byung ba dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i bsam pa las 'byung ba
97a1(mdo sde): dang / khams gsum thams cad las 'byung ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
97a2(mdo sde): bde ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i bde ba dang / yul spangs pas dben pa'i
97a3(mdo sde): bde ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir zhi ba'i bde ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba ste/ bzhi po de
97a4(mdo sde): dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas mchog tu dga'
97a5(mdo sde): ba dang / chos thos pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sbyin pa la 'gyod pa med pas mchog tu dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba bskyed pas mchog tu dga' ba
97a6(mdo sde): ste| bzhi po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / yi
97a7(mdo sde): dam las mi nyams pa dang / skyabs su song bdag yongs su mi gtong ba dang / ngag bsdams pas tshig thams cad bden pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di
97b1(mdo sde): dag ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i chos so/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i chos thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba dang / ma bslab pa thams cad la mi
97b2(mdo sde): brnyas pa dang / gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad la bshes gnyen du gyur pa dang / yon tan thams cad sgrub pa la phyir bya ba'i re ba med pas lan la mi re
97b3(mdo sde): ba ste| bzhi po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag med pa'i phyir tshul khrims
97b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa dang / sems can med pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa dang / srog med pa'i phyir shes rab rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag med pa'i phyir rnam par
97b5(mdo sde): grol ba rnam par dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ chos kyi rkang pa dang / don gyi
97b6(mdo sde): rkang pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas 'jug pa'i rkang pa dang / byang chub kyi lam gyi tshogs gsog pa'i rkang pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/
97b7(mdo sde): bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa'i lag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi lag pa dang / thos pa'i lag pa dang / shes rab kyi lag
98a1(mdo sde): pa ste| bzhi po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig go/ bzhi gang zhe na/ las legs
98a2(mdo sde): pa byas pa'i phyir sha'i mig dang / mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa'i phyir lha'i mig dang / shin tu thos pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir shes rab kyi mig dang / chos
98a3(mdo sde): thams cad la nges par sems pa'i phyir chos kyi mig ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi ngoms pa'o/ /bzhi
98a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ sbyin pas mi ngoms pa dang / dgon pa la gnas pas mi ngoms pa dang / chos nyan pas mi ngoms pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis
98a5(mdo sde): mi ngoms pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba byed pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can mthu chung ba
98a6(mdo sde): rnams la bzod cing dang du blang ba dka' ba byed pa dang / dbul po la bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bsam ba dka' ba byed pa dang / yan lag gi
98a7(mdo sde): mchog mgo slong ba la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dka' ba byed kyi steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen du sems bskyed pa dang / skye ba la mi rtog pas bsam bzhin du skye
98b1(mdo sde): bar byed pa'i dka' ba byed pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nad med pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khams ma nyams
98b2(mdo sde): pas nad med pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med pas nad med pa dang / sems can thams cad bde bar mnyam par bzhag pas nad med pa dang / chos thams cad
