98b3(mdo sde): la the tshom med pas nad med pa ste/ bzhin po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdag gi phyogs so/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol
98b4(mdo sde): tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi phyogs dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa'i phyogs dang / sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i phyogs te/
98b5(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi bskyod pa'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi bskyod pas dang / yi dam mi
98b6(mdo sde): bskyod pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa las mi bskyod pa dang / yang dag pa'i nan tan las mi bskyod pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag
98b7(mdo sde): ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs so/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs dang / lhag mthong gi tshogs dang / thos pa'i tshogs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba
99a1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi tshogs te/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi ro 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos zung du 'brel bar
99a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel ba dang / gton ba dang bsngo ba zung du 'brel ba dang / byams pa dang snying rje zung du 'brel ba dang / thabs
99a3(mdo sde): dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang
99a4(mdo sde): zhe na| khron pa rdul can mthong zhing de'i gting na'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / mtshe'u 'am/ rdzing bu'am/ khron pa rnyog ba can mthong zhing de'i gting
99a5(mdo sde): na'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la sprin chen pos yog cing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang / bar snang la rlung dang / rdul dang /
99a6(mdo sde): du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la'ang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
99a7(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ g.yang chen po nas bdag g.yang du lhung bar mthong ba dang / lam mtho dma' can du mthong ba dang /
99b1(mdo sde): bdag lam srang dog par zhugs par mthong ba dang / rmi lam na phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang
99b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dug drag pos 'khrugs par mthong ba dang / gcan gzan gtum po
99b3(mdo sde): phal po che'i sgra thos pa dang / bdag g.yon can gyi nang na gnas par mthong ba dang / bdag gi lus dri ma can dang gos dri ma can du mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/
99b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu| bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gter chen po rin po che sna tshogs kyis
99b5(mdo sde): gang ba mthong ba dang / rdzing bu me tog pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su gang ba mthong ba dang / bdag gos dkar po'i phrug rnyed par mthong ba dang / lha zhig spyi bo'i gtsug
99b6(mdo sde): na gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam
99b7(mdo sde): mo| |bzhi gang zhe na/ bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang / nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po thal dkar gyi khyu skad 'byin
100a1(mdo sde): cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog pa mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
100a2(mdo sde): me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
100a3(mdo sde): pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang / me tog
100a4(mdo sde): pad+ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin
100a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam
100a6(mdo sde): mo| |bzhi gang zhe na/ shing sA la chen po 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang / khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong
100a7(mdo sde): ba dang / nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba ste/ bzhi
100b1(mdo sde): po de dag go / lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ gyad chen pos gyad thams cad
100b2(mdo sde): mnan nas ba dan thogs te 'gro bar mthong ba dang / dpa' bo chen pos g.yul las 'das te 'gro bar mthong ba dang / rgyal po dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang / bdag nyid
100b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags
100b4(mdo sde): kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ mgo la thod dkar pos bcings par mthong ba dang / bdag gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed par mthong ba dang / bdag chos
100b5(mdo sde): kyi stan chen po la 'dug par mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba ste/ bzhi po de dag go /lha'i bu/ bzhi
100b6(mdo sde): po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bum pa mthong ba dang / bya tsa shes bskor bar
100b7(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du shing thams cad dang ldan zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen po
101a1(mdo sde): mthong ba ste/ lha'i bu/ bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi snying po thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam mo/ /'jam
101a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bzhi po sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa dang / lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan dga' mgu yid rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga'
101a3(mdo sde): ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'khor dang bcas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang / ut+pal dang
101a4(mdo sde): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gtor to/ /me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus
101a5(mdo sde): steng gi bar snang la me tog pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam gyi tshad blta na sdug pa/ bsung dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag byung bar gyur to/ /me tog de dag gi dbus
101a6(mdo sde): kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa dag byung bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
101a7(mdo sde): la lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang nas lhags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/
101b1(mdo sde): me tog 'di dag ga las 'ongs pa nyid nas so/ /lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal/ me tog 'di dag ni/ sprul pa ste/ bdag gis khyod la mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i
101b2(mdo sde): slad du gtor to/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu/ ji ltar me tog 'di dag sprul pa yin pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la'ang de bzhin du blta'o/ /
101b3(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzam pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan
101b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhal gyis sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha
101b5(mdo sde): dog lta bu dag byung ngo / /de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa snang bas khyab par byas nas steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par
101b6(mdo sde): byung ste/ gzi brjed kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas lha'i bu dpal bzang
101b7(mdo sde): l dan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pos mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la bdag de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
102a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ gser bzang dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid ldan/ /skyes chen mtshan
102a2(mdo sde): mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis sna tshogs mnga'/ /yon tan khrag khrig yod tan gzhal yas gzi brjid can/ /mgon po ci yi slad du 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad/ /sgra snyan
102a3(mdo sde): 'byin par mdzad cing rab tu gsung 'brel ba/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gsung zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gsung ba/ /nor bdun 'od zer rgya chen bde gshegs blo gros
102a4(mdo sde): ldan| |ka la ping ka'i gsung can ci slad 'dzum pa gsungs/ /mi mchog skyes bu dam pa ngan pa'i tshogs can 'dul/ /bdud kyi stobs ni rtag par mtha' mar 'byin
102a5(mdo sde): par mdzad/ /lha dang lha min nam mkha' lding gis rtag mchod pa/ /stobs bcu ldan pas ci slad 'dzum pa bstan/ /dri med dri bral dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /zla ba nya
102a6(mdo sde): ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur zhal rgyas pa/ /mun pa rab rib sgrib pa'i rdul gyi nyes gcod pa/ /bde dang bde ldan sbyin par mdzad pa 'dzum don gsungs/ /bde bar
102a7(mdo sde): gshegs pas dang lha yul phan pa mchog / bde dang bde ldan sbyin mdzad yon tan mtha' yas pa/ /mtshungs shing 'brel la legs gsungs gsal ba'i gsung
102b1(mdo sde): ldan pa| |'dzum bstan 'di yi don ni ji ltar rtogs par bgyi/ /ling tog stug po mun pa rab rib rnam bsal ba/ /shes rab sgron ma 'od kyi gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /glang chen
102b2(mdo sde): khyu mchog stobs dang / seng+ge'i stan ltar brjid/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan du gsol/ /mi yi dam pa mi ngan tshogs can 'dul mdzad pa/ /zab cing
102b3(mdo sde): mthong bar dka' la gting tshod dpag dka' ba/ /srid pa'i chu ni skem mdzad mnyam pa med pa can/ /sgyu med stobs bcu ldan gyis 'dzum pa ci slad bstan/ /rga shi zhi
102b4(mdo sde): bar bgyi ba'i bdud rtsi'i don stsol ba/ /zhabs ni 'jam zhing dra ba dag dang 'khor lor ldan/ /blun pa sbyong mdzad srid pa gsum na mnyam med pa/ /ye shes chen po
102b5(mdo sde): mnga' bas 'dzum don bstan du gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha'i
102b6(mdo sde): bu| khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' steng gi bar snang la seng+ge'i khri la pad+ma'i snying po la 'khod pa 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong lags
102b7(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa 'di dag thams cad ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i
103a1(mdo sde): drung du chos mnyan pa dang / bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa'i phyir lhags so/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams
103a2(mdo sde): cad ni| 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yongs su smin par byas pa yin no/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag thams cad ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
103a3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ming sna tshogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag
103a4(mdo sde): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang
103a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par rdo mi thogs na/ ji snyed cig mchis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka'
103a6(mdo sde): stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi grangs rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis stong
103a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang skar ma'i gzugs de dag thams cad ni/ skad cig /thang gcig /yud tsam gcig gis bgrang bar spro'i/
103b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni/ lo brgyar yang bgrang bar spro ba ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i
103b2(mdo sde): bu| gal te dzam+bu'i gling 'di rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis gang bar gyur kyang rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag
103b3(mdo sde): ni| bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa 'di dag ni/ de tsam du tshad med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang
103b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di dag gang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed mchis par ga la 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
103b5(mdo sde): stsal pa| shA ri'i bu/ kha rog 'dug /de skad ma smra zhig/ shA ri'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag de bzhin gshegs pas stong ngo / /shA ri'i bu/ yongs
103b6(mdo sde): su brtags pa bzung na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gyur la/ nyi ma re re thams cad la'ang chos bshad pa gang+gA'i
103b7(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed 'jug par gyur cing chos bshad pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed lung bstan par gyur la/ gang gis shar phyogs
104a1(mdo sde): s u sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig mtshan mar bzhag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
104a2(mdo sde): rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis de tsam du stong na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sha'i spyan tha mal bas gzigs par 'gyur
104a3(mdo sde): b a'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag gi sems de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis stong pa la lta ci
104a4(mdo sde): smos| de nas nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas tshig 'di skad du bdag cag gi ston pa de dag de ltar rdzu
104a5(mdo sde): 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar ye shes gzigs pa chen po dang ldan te/ bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs bar rnyed do/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas byang chub
104a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa steng gi bar snang la 'khod pa de dag bar snang de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam
104a7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor nas phyogs bcur dong ngo / /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzang
104b1(mdo sde): ldan gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzad cing sems can tshad med pa byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad pa legs so legs so/ /
104b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal/ khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par bgyid pa'i chos las brtsams te spobs par mdzod cig /'jam dpal gyis
104b3(mdo sde): smras pa| lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su smin par byed pa'i chos ni/ sum cu rtsa lnga'o/ /sum cu rtsa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus su
104b4(mdo sde): skul ba dang / tshod la skul ba dang / ran par skul ba dang / dbang po la skul ba dang / brtan par skul ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la skul ba dang / thabs la skul
104b5(mdo sde): ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa la skul ba dang / byams pa chen po la skul ba dang / snying rje chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa chen po la skul ba dang / theg pa dman
104b6(mdo sde): pa la skul ba dang / bden pa la skul ba dang / de bya ba la skul ba dang / chos srung bar skul ba dang / thos pa bstan par skul ba dang / sems can sna tshogs su mi
104b7(mdo sde): dbye bar skul ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin pa'i gnas su mtshungs par skul ba dang / bdud kyi las bstan par skul ba dang / dam
105a1(mdo sde): bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par skul ba dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo bar skul pa dang / bdud gdul bar skul ba dang / byas
105a2(mdo sde): pa shes pa dang / byas pa gzo bar skul ba dang / rgyu zad pa la 'jug par skul ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo la mi 'jigs par skul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
105a3(mdo sde): pa la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar skul ba dang / sems can thams cad la ci bya snyam pa la spro bar skul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang ma 'dres par skul
105a4(mdo sde): ba dang / dgon pa la dga' bar skul ba dang / 'dod pa chung zhing cho ga shes par skul ba dang / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma
105a5(mdo sde): phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar skul ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad
105a6(mdo sde): par skul ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag par blang bar skul ba ste/ lha'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub yongs su
105a7(mdo sde): smin par byed pa'i chos ni/ sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag go /lha'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byas pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
105b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las bskyod du med pa yin te/ de ni/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis thul bar mi nus so/ /de ni/ phyin chad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcus
105b2(mdo sde): dregs par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ tshul khrims kyis dregs pa dang / thos pas dregs pa dang / spobs pas dregs pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs
105b3(mdo sde): su bcad pas dregs pa dang / dgon par gnas pas dregs pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pas dregs pa dang / gzugs dang / longs
105b4(mdo sde): spyod dang / dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'khor gyis dregs pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba bsnyen bkur byed pas dregs pa dang / bsam
105b5(mdo sde): gtan dang / mngon par shes pas dregs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la dang ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
105b6(mdo sde): dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag 'dod pa dang / bstod pa dang / bsngags par byed pa des kyang snyems pa med pa yin te/ lha'i
105b7(mdo sde): bu| byang chub sems dpa'i dregs pa bcu po de dag gis mi snyems/ rab tu mi snyems so/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha'i bu dpal bzang ldan
106a1(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal/ khyod phyogs gang na gnas pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa der ni/ sangs
106a2(mdo sde): rgyas 'byung bar blta'o/ /der ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /lha'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ ji
106a3(mdo sde): skad smras pa bzhin no/ /phyogs gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa de ni/ stong pa ma yin par mngon no/ /gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par
106a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po nyid brtson par mdzad do/ /gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nyan par byed/ mos par byed pa'i sems can
106a5(mdo sde): de dag ni/ nga'i yin par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / mos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar blta'o/ /
106a6(mdo sde): gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa
106a7(mdo sde): yin no| |de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / gnas brtan 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
106b1(mdo sde): pa| skyes bu dam pa dag / ji tsam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang ba dang / gzung ba dang / bshad pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i phyir khyed la gtad do/ /nga ni/ ring por
106b2(mdo sde): mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyi/ de'i phyir khyed kyis sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis gnas par gyis
106b3(mdo sde): shig / byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci
106b4(mdo sde): lags| 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa/ de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzhi pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub
106b5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub
106b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
106b7(mdo sde): rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //
107a1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ tri d+harma ka nA ma sU tra/ bod skad du/ chos gsum pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
107a2(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
107a3(mdo sde): sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge
107a4(mdo sde): slong dag / 'di na mi blun po la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum dang ldan na/ sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag
107a5(mdo sde): par blangs nas gnas par mi byed do/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / ser sna dang / bag med pa ste/ dge slong dag /'di na mi blun de
107a6(mdo sde): la la dam pa'i chos ma yin pa gsum po de dag dang ldan pas sbyin pa dag ma byin zhing bsod nams dag ma byas la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te
107a7(mdo sde): gnas par ma byas pas/ lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag
107b1(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos gsum dang ldan pa ni/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byed do/ /gsum po
107b2(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma chags pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / bag yod pa'o/ /dge slong dag /dam pa'i chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ skyes bu dam pa sbyin pa dag
107b3(mdo sde): sbyin zhing / bsod nams dag byed la/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te gnas par byas pas lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha
107b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad
107b5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to/ /gang phyir ser sna bag med pas/ /sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed de/ /de phyir bsod nams 'dod pa yi/ /mkhas pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya/ /ser sna
107b6(mdo sde): can gyis 'jigs pa ni/ /bkres dang skom pa 'di yin na/ /gang gis 'jigs pas 'dir ma byin/ /de nyid mi yi 'jigs pa yin/ /gang gis ser sna'i dbang
107b7(mdo sde): gis na| |yod ma byin pa 'jigs pa ste/ /'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu/ /de yis byis pa bgos par 'gyur/ /gang dag ser sna spangs nas kyang / /dus su sbyin pa
108a1(mdo sde): sbyin byed na/ /shi yang de ni shi ma yin/ /rgyags bzang po yi mgron po bzhin/ /gang dag shin tu gtang dka' ba/ /nyung du'am mang po
108a2(mdo sde): gtong byed na/ /gtang dka' gtong ba de dag ni/ /dka' ba'i las dag byed pa yin/ /dam pa min pas mi rtogs te/ /dam pa chos las 'da' mi byed/ /de phyir
108a3(mdo sde): dam pa dam pa min/ /'di nas shi bar 'gyur ba na/ /dam pa min pa dmyal bar 'gro/ /dam pa dag ni mtho ris 'gro/ /rga bas gtses pa la ni skyabs med de/ /tshe
108a4(mdo sde): thung bas ni srog khyer dus kyang nye/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'di mthong rnams kyis ni/ /bsod nams bde sbyor dag ni bya ba'i rigs/ /bud med spangs 'dir sbyor
108a5(mdo sde): bas 'tsho ba gang / /dka' bas byin pa nyung du byin na yang / /stong gi mchod sbyin brgya stong byed pa ni/ /de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod de/ /ci phyir mchod sbyin yangs
108a6(mdo sde): shing rgya che ba/ /mchod sbyin mthun pa de yi lam mi 'gro/ /ji ltar stong gi mchod sbyin che rnams kyang / /de yi bcu drug char mi 'gyur zhe na/ /byis pa la la gsod cing
108a7(mdo sde): 'chi byed 'dir/ /gzhan nor ma byin len byed brlag par 'gyur/ /mchi ma'i gdong bcas chad par bcas pa yi/ /yon de'i mchod sbyin mthun pa'i lam mi 'gro/ /
108b1(mdo sde): de ltar mchod sbyin yangs shing rgya che ba/ /mchod sbyin mthun pa'i lam du mi 'gro la/ /de ltar stong gi mchod sbyin stong rnams kyang / /de yi bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /la
108b2(mdo sde): la gang dag gzu lums ma yin pa/ /chos bzhin nor rnams thob pa gtong byed pa/ /de dag gtang dka' de rnams btang bas na/ /rang gi bsod nams kyis ni lha gnas
108b3(mdo sde): 'gro / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /chos gsum pa zhes
108b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he de ba tsan+d+ras bsgyur/ lo tsa ba dpal brtsegs kyis zhus te
108b5(mdo sde): gtan la phab pa/ rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya d+harma ke tu d+h+wa dza pa ri pr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg
108b6(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
108b7(mdo sde): mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
109a1(mdo sde): 'dug pa stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' chos du
109a2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub
109a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'dir byang chub sems dpa' dad pa
109a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtang ba dang / dgon par brten cing 'du 'dzi spang ba
109a5(mdo sde): dang / bla ma dang mkhan po'i gdams ngag yongs su stsal ba dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang / mang du thos pa dang ldan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims
109a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pas don ma lus par sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
109a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan
109b1(mdo sde): gyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ d+harma sa mu dra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/theg pa chen po'i
109b2(mdo sde): mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i gling phran po Ta la ka'i ri la rgyal ba'i sras phyir mi ldog pa
109b3(mdo sde): phal po ches bskor cing mdun du byas te bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bka'
109b4(mdo sde): stsal pa| skyes bu dam pa/ chos kyi gtam ci 'dod pa dri bar gyis shig /ces pa dang / brtse ba la bsgribs pa med pas rnam par grol ba thob pa/ 'jig rten
109b5(mdo sde): gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa/ ji ltar na/ gzhon nur gyur pas bdud las rgyal ba lags/ gang gis byang
109b6(mdo sde): chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag gis 'dod pa la rtog cing mi sten pa dang / mi 'chang ba dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / stong
109b7(mdo sde): pa nyid la shin tu mos pa dang ldan te/ yod pa dang med pa spangs pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa la brlags pas grangs med par 'khor bar gyur/ ji ltar na
110a1(mdo sde): dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul bar rab tu byung zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i
110a2(mdo sde): ches rnams las 'das pa dang / gnas ngan len la brten cing 'jug pa'i sems dang / yid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa las 'das te mi gnyis pa'i chos thos pa ni/ shin tu
110a3(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba'o/ /sems can gang tha dad pa 'di lta bus rab tu byung ba de ni/ yang dag par rab tu byung ba'o/ /gang rab tu byung yang tshul khrims dang / spyod yul
110a4(mdo sde): dang / 'tsho ba dang / lta ba dang / bsam pa nyams pa ste/ de ni/ mgo dang kha spu bregs kyang don med pa ste/ rnyog pa 'chang bas rang rnyog pa des ngan song du
110a5(mdo sde): gzhol ba yin no| / ngas dad bas byin pa spyod du gnang ba ni/ rigs pas grol ba ste/ dge slong gang brtson pa mi 'dor ba des gzugs mi 'dor/ tshor ba
110a6(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi 'dor/ phung po lnga tha dad pa dang / ril gyis brtags pa'i rang bzhin bas na/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug
110a7(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par lta ba de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams dang / skye mched rnams ma yin par spro ba dam par byed pas
110b1(mdo sde): rtag tu sgom mo/ /snying po med pa dang / 'brum pa can/ zug rdu can dang ldan pas skyon can/ pha rol po slu ba'i chos nyid ces sun 'byin pa de dag kyang mi dmigs
110b2(mdo sde): pa'i tshul du sbyor bas/ gang lus kyis lus la sred pa dang / lus la byams pa dang / lus la bdag yid ches pa dang / lus la zhen pa de dag rab tu spong
110b3(mdo sde): ngo / /gang 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni/ dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'du las la rab tu byung bar gyur/ dad pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa
110b4(mdo sde): yin te| 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang
110b5(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs te 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos rnams las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
110b6(mdo sde): chos rnams thob pa de ni/ dge bar gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa zhes gsungs/ gzhan
110b7(mdo sde): gang zhig rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs kyang bdag bslus pa ste/ pha bang ltar byi ba'ang ma yin/ bya'ang ma yin pa bzhin du de ni/ khyim pa'ang ma yin/ rab tu
111a1(mdo sde): byung ba'ang ma yin pas na glen pa'i skyes bu de de lta bu'i tshul du zungs shig / skyes bu dam pa 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos de dag ni/ sgyu ma
111a2(mdo sde): lta bu ste| de las 'da' bar yang mi nus/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos ni/ yongs su ma rdzogs pas na de las 'da' bar yang dka'/ sems can gyi khams ni/ phyi
111a3(mdo sde): na'ang med/ nang na'ang med de/ gnyis kar yang dmigs su med pas na/ gang sems can gyi khams kyi dngos po de ni/ 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ste/ de
111a4(mdo sde): las 'da' bar yang dka' ba de la kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos
111a5(mdo sde): thob pa'i dge slong de ni/ rab tu byung bar gyur/ bsnyen par rdzogs par yang dag par rdzogs pa ste/ de ni/ dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur
111a6(mdo sde): pa'o| |zhes gsungs pa'ang kye rgyal ba'i sras/ rten pa'i gnas med na de la thob pa gang ci ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur na/ de
111a7(mdo sde): ni| dmigs par gyur pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ni/ mi dmigs pa ste/ bcom ldan
111b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas 'gro ba tha dad pa'i chos las 'das shing 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thob pa de ni/ dge slong yang dag par gyur pa steg
111b2(mdo sde): dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas so/ /de nas byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bcom ldan
111b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis ci las dgongs te brtson pa mi 'dor ba'i dge slong gang gis gzugs mi 'dor/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
111b4(mdo sde): pa mi 'dor ba de ni/ rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ste/ de ni/ dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la shin tu rab tu byung bar gyur pas na/ 'di lta bu'i dge
111b5(mdo sde): slong ni| dad pas byin pa spyod pa'i mchod gnas su gyur pa'o/ /zhes gsungs/ 'jig rten gyi dbang pos smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ bcom ldan 'das
111b6(mdo sde): kyis chos nyid la dgongs te chos kyi dbyings nang na'ang med/ phyi na'ang med de/ gnyi gar yang dmigs su med pas na/ nad med par btags pa dang / mi skye
111b7(mdo sde): bar btags pa dang / mi 'gag par btags pa rnams gdags su med pa ste/ sems can gyi khams mnyam pa bzhin du chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid/
112a1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa bzhin du sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid de/ sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi
112a2(mdo sde): dbyings mnyam pa nyid du mi gnyis ste/ gnyis su med do/ /de mi gnyis te gnyis su med pas na/ de la dor ba'ang med/ mi dor ba'ang med/ gang dor ba'ang
112a3(mdo sde): med| mi dor ba'ang med pas na/ de la 'da' ba dang / thob par mi nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di ltar dgongs nas gdags su med pa'i dge slong
112a4(mdo sde): btags pa la mi 'jug go / gang yi ge med pa'i dge slong yi ge las 'das pa ste/ de la grangs kyis bstan par yang mi rung ste/ de ni/ mi 'ong / mi 'gro/ /mi
112a5(mdo sde): gnas| mi 'dug / nyal bar yang mi rtog go/ zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba rnams mi dmigs pa'i dge slong la brtags pa ste/ spyod pa rnams kyang brtags pa'o/ /
112a6(mdo sde): log pa la rnam pa mang du rtog pa'i dge slong spyod pa ni/ ma brtags pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar dgongs nas 'di lta bu'i dge slong ni/ dad pas
112a7(mdo sde): spyin pa spyod pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la dge ba byin te/ ngas dgongs
112b1(mdo sde): te bshad pa bzhin du skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bstan pa ni/ dge'o dge'o/ /dge bar gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba 'di bla na med pa dam pa'i
112b2(mdo sde): chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di tshul khrims nyams pa dang / ma dul ba dang / nga rgyal mngon par byed pa rnams kyi mdun du mi bshad par gyis shig /de lta bu de dag/
112b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi snyems pa spang pa'i phyir phyag rgya 'di la gang gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab kyis bltas shing mi dmigs pa'i lus mngon du byas na/ des
112b4(mdo sde): yid kyi lus myur du 'thob bo/ /gang gi yid kyi lus des grangs med pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu smin par byed do/ /de nas chos kyi gzhung 'di bshad pa'i
112b5(mdo sde): tshe dge slong bdun stong zag pa med par mi skye ba'i sems rnam par grol bar gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur/
112b6(mdo sde): dmigs pa can gyi dge slong lnga brgya chos kyi gzhung 'di mi sgrub cing mi 'jug pa dang / ma dad pas na stan las langs te dong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das ngas dgongs te
112b7(mdo sde): gsungs pa 'di dag 'jig rten thams cad yid mi ches pa'i gnyen po yin pas na/ chos kyi gzhung 'di dmigs pa dang bcas pa rnams mi mthun pa'o/ /yod pa ma
113a1(mdo sde): yin pa la brten pa rnams dang mi 'gal te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bzung ba rnams dang / zab mo'i chos la mos pa rnams dang /
113a2(mdo sde): skyo zhing chog shes pas bsnyungs te dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa rnams kyis nga'i chos kyi gzhung
113a3(mdo sde): 'di la ston par shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu gang zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na 'gro ba mang po'i mdun na smra zhing chos 'chad
113a4(mdo sde): kyang chos de 'jig rten thams cad las ma grags na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ ci 'gro ba mang po de rnams yod de/ gang des sangs rgyas kyi chos bshad pa dang mi 'gal ba
113a5(mdo sde): snyam du sems sam/ byams pas smras pa/ rmi lam ni/ yang dag par ma mchis pa ste/ 'khrul ba tsam zhing mchis par bas na/ de ngan 'gro phal po che
113a6(mdo sde): la chos 'chad par gyur pa lta ga la zhig mchis/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ de ltar de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ rmi lam dang mtshungs te/ yang dag pa ma yin
113a7(mdo sde): par 'byung bar byung nas kyang med par gyur pa ste/ kun rdzob kyang 'khrul pa tsam zhig yod kyi don dam par ni/ ma yin no/ /'phags pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba
113b1(mdo sde): mngon du byas na bsam gtan sems pa'i bsam gtan pa'ang mi dmigs pa ste/ de la chos kyi tshul tsam zhig yod kyi kun tu btags pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang las
113b2(mdo sde): kyi rnams ni/ yod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di ni/ 'jig rten pa thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/ /chos 'di dag la dmigs pa rnams kyis ni/ don
113b3(mdo sde): dam par 'dzin gyi 'phags pa'i rnams ni/ mi dmigs so/ /byis pa rnams mi shes pas de la mngon par zhen pas na/ dmyal ba dang / yi dwags rnams kyis sdug
113b4(mdo sde): bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi gzhung 'di ji lta ba de ni/ dmigs pa'o/ /ji ltar dmigs pa de ni/ chos thams cad do/ /de ltar dus gsum gyi
113b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ mi dmigs pas na gang dmigs pa de ni/ rtags pa'o/ /gang rtogs pa de ni/ thob pa/ gang thob pa de ni/ byang chub/ gang byang
113b6(mdo sde): chub pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid/ gang de bzhin nyid pa de ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha'/ gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni/ stong pa nyid/ gang stong pa nyid de ni/ mtshan ma
113b7(mdo sde): med pa| gang mtshan ma med pa de ni/ smon pa med pa/ gang smon pa med pa de ni/ don dam pa/ gang don dam pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings/ gang chos kyi dbyings de ni/
114a1(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa'i mtha'/ gang gnyis su med pa'i mtha' de ni/ dbu mar sgrub pa/ gang dbu mar sgrub pa de ni/ yang dag par
114a2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku rtag pa/ brtan pa/ mi 'gyur ba ste/ rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin te/ de ni/ gdags pa'ang ma yin/
114a3(mdo sde): mi gdags pa'ang ma yin/ gang gdags pa'ang ma yin/ mi gdags pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang
114a4(mdo sde): ma yin| gang 'jig rten pa'ang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang ma yin pa de ni/ brjod du med pa/ gang brjod du med pa de ni/ cung zad kyang med pa /
114a5(mdo sde): gang cung zad kyang med pa de ni/ sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing / gang sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi zhing de ni/ ston pa/ gang ston pa de ni/
114a6(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog pa/ gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni/ dmigs pa med pa/ gang dmigs pa med pa de ni/ mi 'gyur ba grub pa/ gang mi 'gyur ba grub pa de ni/ yid
114a7(mdo sde): bzhin nor bu rin po che ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ji ltar mos pa thams cad byed do/ /de nas byang
114b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mang po de dag gi tshig mthun par smras pa/ chos kyi gzhung 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de rdo rje lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
114b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams bzhugs pas na/ sems can de myur du mngon par shes pa dang / dbang po rnon por 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig chos kyi gzhung 'di la brjod
114b3(mdo sde): dam| 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ chub par byed dam/ kha ton du byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
114b4(mdo sde): dgongs pa 'di bshad nas 'jig rten gyi dbang po dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lha dang mir bcas
114b5(mdo sde): pa dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za'i 'jig rten rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par dga'o/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo chos rgya mtsho zhes bya ba rdzogs
114b6(mdo sde): so|| ||rgya las 'gyur ba skad gsar bcad kyis gtan la phab pa'o/ /chos kyi rgya mo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
114b7(mdo sde): sems kyi gnas bshad pa le'u bcu ste/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas kyi bu thams cad thal mo sbyor ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims chen po bshad pa sems
115a1(mdo sde): thag pa nas nyon cig/ mang po tshogs pa yid bsdus te nyon cig/ bdag la kun tu ltung ba yod par shes ma mthol tshangs byos shig /mthol tshangs byas na bde bar 'gyur ro//
115a2(mdo sde): mthol tshangs ma byas na sdig phyir zhing thab tu skye'o/ /kun tu ltung ba med na ma sma bar 'khod cig dang / kun kyang gtsang mar mngon no/ /legs pa chen po yod pa'i
115a3(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa brtag par nyon cig /sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir na mchod rten las chos byed pa'i tshe so
115a4(mdo sde): sor thar pa la btsud cing lci ba dang / gus shing rin cher byos shig /so sor thar pa zhes bya ba'i tshul khrims ni/ 'di yin no/ /tshul khrims 'di bzung na mun
115a5(mdo sde): pa las snang bar phrad pa dang mtshungs so/ /mi dbul po las nor chen po thob pa dang mtshungs so/ /nad pa sman rnyed pa dang mtshungs so/ /btson khri mun nas
115a6(mdo sde): phyung ba dang mtshungs so/ /lam ring por song ba las slar 'khor ba dang mtshungs te/ 'di ni/ kun gyi mkhan po chen po yin par mngon pas sangs rgyas 'jig
115a7(mdo sde): rten na bzhugs pa dang mi mtshungs pa med do/ /'jigs pa'i sems ni /skye dka'/ dge ba'i sems ni/ g.yo dka' bas na kha na ma tho ba las brnyas te med
115b1(mdo sde): snyam du byas na chu'i thigs pa chung mod kyi/ rgyun gyis na snod chen po 'gang ngo / /yud tsam gyi bar du sdig byas pas na bstir med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo / /re
115b2(mdo sde): zhig mi lus tshor na bskal pa khri'i bar du'ang slar mi lus mi thob bo/ /dar ba'i tshe mi sdod do/ /dper na ni/ rta rgyugs pa dang 'dra/ mi'i tshe'ang rtag pa med de/ dpa'
115b3(mdo sde): rgal gyi chu 'bab pa bas kyang myur te/ de ring gson mod kyi/ sang gi gnya' yang dka'o/ /da dus kho na la bab kyi/ mang po'i rnams so so nas sems gcig tu 'grus
115b4(mdo sde): shing 'bogs pa btsal ba'i rigs so/ /pag byas la le lo bla khyad dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid kyis log cing rang nyams kyi yid mi bya'o/ /mtshan zhing ni/ sems
115b5(mdo sde): b sdus la rtag par dkon mchog gsum gzungs su bzung la phyal ba don med pa la nyon mongs ngal chad cing tshe phyi ma la'ang rab tu 'gyod pa mthar ci'ang thob pa
115b6(mdo sde): med par mi bya'o/ /mang po'i rnams gcig nas gcig tu tshul khrims 'di bzhin legs par byos shig /de'i tshe na sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis mang po'i
115b7(mdo sde): phyir chu bo gang+gA'i brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyis brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo'i mdo phye ste/ de'i nang nas sems kyi gnas spu nyag ma'i mgo rnyed do/ /snga ma 'das pa'i
116a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang bshad do/ /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas la'ang de bzhin 'chad do/ /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
116a2(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' slobs pa dang / slob pa dang / slob par 'gyur ro/ /ngas bskal pa brgya'i bar du
116a3(mdo sde): sems kyi gnas 'di byas pas na/ nga'i mkhan po rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku zhes bya'o/ /khyed sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ngas bshad do cog gcig nas gcig
116a4(mdo sde): tu sems can thams cad la sems kyi gnas lam phye zhig / de nas pad+mo'i snying po'i snod kyi khams na gnam gyi 'od lham me lhang de ba'i seng+ge'i gdan gyi steng
116a5(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'od btang ste/ 'og gi me tog stong gi thog gi sangs rgyas la sbran te nga'i sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u
116a6(mdo sde): gzungs su zungs la dengs shig / yang gcig nas gcig tu 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad la mthar gyis nga'i yan
116a7(mdo sde): chad kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi sgo mo'i le'u shod de khyod la sogs pa sems gcig tu gzungs su zungs la byos shig / de nas me tog stong gi thog gi sangs
116b1(mdo sde): rgyas 'bum phrag brgya'i yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa pad+mo'i snod kyi khams na lham me lhang nge ba'i seng+ge'i khri las 'das te/ so so nas mchi phyag 'tshal te phyir nur nas
116b2(mdo sde): lus kun gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od btang ste/ kun 'od kyi nang nas grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas byung ste gcig car grangs med pa'i me tog sngon po/ ser po/
116b3(mdo sde): dmar po/ dkar pos rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas la yon du gsol nas yan chad sems kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa'ang khong du chud nas so sor pad+mo'i
116b4(mdo sde): snod kyi khams kyi nang du nub ste/ rang bzhin gyi bskal pa stong pa nyid kyi nang du nub nas me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin thog mar byung ba'i gnas su slar song ste dzam+bu'i
116b5(mdo sde): gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas rang bzhin gyi bskal pa me tog 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ste/ gdod rdo rje'i rgyal po'i gdan dang / 'od shin tu bzang po'i khang
116b6(mdo sde): par 'dug nas phyogs bcu'i chos rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa bshad do/ /de nas yang seng+ge'i khri las langs te sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi pho brang du phyin nas gral bcu'i
116b7(mdo sde): chos bshad do/ /de nas zung ma'i gnam du phyin te las su bya ba bcu bshad do/ /de nas yang khri las langs te rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gnam du phyin nas phyogs shing lta
117a1(mdo sde): ba bcu bshad do/ /de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te 'phrul dga'i gnam du phyin nas bsam gtan mi 'gyur ba bcu bshad/
117a2(mdo sde): de nas yang 'dug pa'i sa nas langs te gnam bden gnam du phyin nas sa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gcig gi nang du phyin nas rdo rje
117a3(mdo sde): bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gnyis kyi nang du phyin nas bzod pa bcu'i chos bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan gsum gyi nang du phyin nas smon
117a4(mdo sde): lam bcu bshad/ de nas yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i nang chen po che ba dbang mchog 'du mched gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te nga'i thog ma'i phyi mo'i pad+mo me
117a5(mdo sde): tog sna tshogs kyi khams rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi chos kyi phyi mo'i le'u bshad pa bshad do/ /gzhan 'bum phrag brgya'i
117a6(mdo sde): yang phrag stong gi shAkya thub pa'ang de bzhin te/ gnyis su med do/ /tha dad pa'ang med do/ /bsam gtan bskal pa'i le'u'i nang nas kyang zhib tu bshad do/ /de'i tshe
117a7(mdo sde): s hAkya thub pa pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams kyi shar phyogs nas byung nas lding pa'i khang bu'i nang du zhugs nas bdud kyis chos mnos pa bzhin du bshad zin nas yas
117b1(mdo sde): babs te dzam+bu'i gling gi ka pi lar skyes nas yum gyi mtshan ni/ lha mdzes chen mo/ yab kyi mtshan ni/ zas gtsang ma/ nga bdag gi ming ni/ sid+d+hA tha zhes bya ste/
117b2(mdo sde): lo bdun na rab tu byung / lo sum cu nas sangs rgyas su phyin nas nga'i mtshan ni/ shAkya thub pa zhes bya ste/ mi 'gyur ba'i gtsang ma'i sar rdo rje'i me tog gi khri
117b3(mdo sde): la 'dug nas dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ de'i nang gi 'dug pa bcu'i gnas mthar gyis bshad/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis rus
117b4(mdo sde): g tsang ma chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po dra ba'i rgyal mtshan mthong ba'i phyir gangs med pa'i khams dper na dra ba'i bu gu dang mtshungs par bshad na khams gcig
117b5(mdo sde): nas gcig so so mi mthun te/ tha dad pa'i grangs med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo mo bshad pa'ang de dang 'dra'o/ /nga khams 'dir lan brgyad stong phyin
117b6(mdo sde): t e| khams dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i phyir rdo rje'i khri steng du 'dug ste dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas de'i nang gi mang po thams cad sems
117b7(mdo sde): kyi gnas kyi mdo che'o/ /de nas gnam gyi pho brang nas mar babs te dzam+bu'i gling byang chub kyi shing drung du phyin nas de'i sa'i steng gi sems can blun po ma rabs
118a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi phyir thog ma phyi mi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyis sems kyi gnas kyi nang bshad do/ /sems thog pa g.yos pa
118a2(mdo sde): ni| rtag par 'od snang ba'i tshul khrims gcig kha ton du klog go / rdo rje rin po che'i tshul khrims ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thog ma'i phyi mo yin no/ /byang chub
118a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ thog ma'i phyi mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sa bon no/ /sems can thams cad la'ang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi
118a4(mdo sde): skal ba yod do/ /thams cad kyi shes pa dang / kha dog dang / sems dang / yid dang / sems so cog thams cad kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi nang du
118a5(mdo sde): 'dus so/ /tshul khrims kyi nang na rtag pa yun du rtag par bsod nams yod do/ /rtag pa yun du rtag par chos kyi lus yod do/ /so sor thar pa 'di rnams
118a6(mdo sde): bcu ni| sangs rgyas kyi dbyings nas byung nas chos kyi tshul khrims byas te dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su 'dzin to/ /ngas de mang po 'di'i
118a7(mdo sde): phyir zad pa'i mtha' med pa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u bcu bslabs te bshad do/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa nga bdag ste/ /pad+mo'i dbus su gdod bzhugs nas/ /mtha'
118b1(mdo sde): bzhi'i me tog stong gi steng / /shAkya thub pa stong du bzhugs/ /me tog gcig khams 'bum phrag brgya/ /khams de gcig kyang sprul pa gcig /kun kyang byang chub
118b2(mdo sde): shing drung bzhugs/ /mnyam par sangs rgyas gnas su son/ /de yang 'bum phrag brgya pa stong / /rdzogs longs spyod pa rang bzhin lus/ /sprul pa 'bum phrag brgya
118b3(mdo sde): stong po| |kun kyang rdzu phran mang por 'dren/ /gcig car nga yi gnas su 'ongs/ /sangs rgyas nga yi tshul khrims nyon/ /zil dngar sgo mo de nas bye/ /'ung nas 'bum
118b4(mdo sde): phrag brgya stong po/ /slad du gtsang ma'i gnas su phyin/ /kun kyang byang chub shing drung bzhugs/ /nga yi mkhan po tshul khrims kha ton lhogs/ /tshul khrims chen po rtogs
118b5(mdo sde): par lnga bcu brgyad/ /tshul khrims snang khyad nyi zla bzhin/ /gcig tu nor bu yang nyo 'dra/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdul phran bzhin/ /'di yi yon gyis yang dag
118b6(mdo sde): 'grub| |gdod ma rdzogs longs spyod pa nyid kyis blags/ /ngas kyang de bzhin kha ton blags/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsar slob pa/ /klad la khyer zhing khrims
118b7(mdo sde): bzung bzhin/ /thub bzhin gcig tu sems can ston/ /nga yi bde blag rtag par nyon/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams tshul khrims snod/ /so sor thar pa shes rab bzhin/ /
119a1(mdo sde): mang po yid kun brtags par ches/ /khyed rnams sangs rgyas phyin par 'ong / /nga yi sangs rgyas phyin zin kyang / /rtag par 'di bzhin yid ches
119a2(mdo sde): byed| |tshul khrims le'u kun chog gtsang zin/ /yid sems yod pa thams cad ni/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas khrims kyis bsdu/ /sems can sangs rgyas khrims
119a3(mdo sde): mnod pa/ /de nas sangs rgyas sa ru phyin/ /tshor chen sa dang mtshungs zin te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bu yang dag /mang po kun gyis gus par byas/ /sems gcig
119a4(mdo sde): brtul te nga klog nyon/ /de'i tshe na shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas thog ma byang chub shing drung bzhugs bla na med pa'i g.yung drung rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /byang chub sems
119a5(mdo sde): dpa'i thog ma so sor thar pa'i 'dud pa ni/ pha ma dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu dang / yid dang mi 'gal bar bya'o/ /sri zhu byas te bla ma'i
119a6(mdo sde): yid dang ma 'gal ba ni/ chos zab mor thob pa'i gzhung ste/ sri zhu'i ming ni/ tshul khrims so/ /ming gcig tu ni/ sdom pa dang / gtong ba'o/ /de nas 'od
119a7(mdo sde): snang ba grangs med pa 'byung ngo / /de'i tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong mang po tshogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams kyi gnam bco brgyad
119b1(mdo sde): dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam rim pa drug gi lha dang / rgyal po chen po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ sems gcig tu mnyan nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims chen po
119b2(mdo sde): blags te byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ nga da ltar zla ba phyed phyed cing bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du klog go /khyed
119b3(mdo sde): la sogs pa thog ma sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig / sems g.yos te phyogs bcu dang / g.yo zhing bskyed
119b4(mdo sde): pa bcu dang / rdo rje bcu dang / sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang kha ton du lhogs shig /'ung na tshul khrims kyi 'od kha nas byung ste rgyu yod/ rkyen
119b5(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od ma yin te/ 'od sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser po/ dkar po/ nag po'ang ma yin/ kha dog kyang ma yin/ sems kyang ma yin/ yod pa'ang
119b6(mdo sde): ma yin| med pa'ang ma yin/ rgyu rkyen gyi chos kyang ma yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni/ gdod ma phyi mo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ni/ lam gyi rtsa
119b7(mdo sde): ba bas na/ mang po thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyi rtsa ba'i phyi mo zhes bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis kyang gzungs su bzung ba'i rigs
120a1(mdo sde): so| |legs par bslab pa'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams brtag par nyon cig /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims nod na ni rgyal po
120a2(mdo sde): dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po che phra dang / dge slong pho mo dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams gnam drug dang / gdol pa
120a3(mdo sde): dang / nying grum dang / pho g.yem dang / mo g.yem dang / bran pho mo dang / lha ma srin sde brgyad dang / phyag brnyan dang / byol song dang / 'phrul zhing 'gyur
120a4(mdo sde): ba'i mi la sogs te chos kyi mkhan po'i tshig brda phrad pa'i rnams thams cad tshul khrims mnod du rung ste/ kun kyang ming rab tu gtsang ma zhes bya'o/ /sangs
120a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ so sor thar pa la phas pham pa bcu yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos pa ni/ tshul khrims
120a6(mdo sde): 'di kha ton du ma blags na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa bon yang ma yin/ nga'ang 'di bzhin du kha ton du klog go /lobs zin
120a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyis slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ngas
120b1(mdo sde): so sor thar pa'i gzungs kyi mdo tsam zhig bshad kyi/ bslab cing gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bdag
120b2(mdo sde): gis bsad pa dang / mi gzhan gsod du bcug pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod pa gsod pa la sdod pa gsod pa mthong na dga' bar sems pa/ sngags dang / rngad
120b3(mdo sde): mo byas te bsad pa/ gsad pa'i rgyu/ gsad pa'i rkyen/ gsad pa'i chos byed pa/ gsod pa'i las byed pa la sogs te sems yod do cog la ched kar gsad du
120b4(mdo sde): mi rung / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ rtag par snying rje ba dang / sri zhu che zhing mi 'gal ba'i sems rtag par g.yos te bags kyis sems can thams
120b5(mdo sde): cad kyir mda' dang / 'or ba bya ba'i rigs so/ /bdag gis rang nyams sam te snying tshim par sems can bsad na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas
120b6(mdo sde): pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis ma byin par blangs sam/ pha log po ma byin par len du bcug gam/ thabs kyis ma byin par blangs sam/ ma byin
120b7(mdo sde): par len pa'i rgyu/ ma byin par len pa'i rkyen/ ma byin par len pa'i las byed pa/ sngags sgyu ma byas te nor khyer ba la sogs te lha ma srin dang / bdag po
121a1(mdo sde): yod pa dang / yang blo'i nor rdzas dang / nor rdzas so cog la khab dang / rtswa nyag ma gcig langs ched kar ma byin par blang du mi
121a2(mdo sde): rung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin skyed la/ sri zhu'i yid dang mi 'ga' zhing / byams shing snying rje bar byas te rtag par sems
121a3(mdo sde): can no cog gi yon tan dang bsod nams bskyed pa'i rigs so/ /de la slar log par mi'i nor rdzas ma byin par blangs na byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham
121a4(mdo sde): pa'o| |sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag mi tshangs par spyod dam/ gzhan mi tshangs par spyod par bstan nam/ bud med do cog la mi tshangs par spyod par byed pa
121a5(mdo sde): dang / gzhan la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rgyu dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i rkyen dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa'i chos byed pa dang /
121a6(mdo sde): mi tshangs par spyod pa'i las byed pa dang / byol song dang / lha dang / lha ma srin gyi bu mo la mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / chos dang 'gal ba'i mi tshangs par spyod
121a7(mdo sde): na| byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems kyis sems can thams cad thar pa'i ra mda' bya zhing chos gtsang ma gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs
121b1(mdo sde): so| |de la slar mi'o cog la mi tshangs par spyod pa bskyed de byol song dang / ma dang / bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs te gnyen pa drug la mi tshangs par spyod pa byas
121b2(mdo sde): te byams shing snying rje ba med na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag gis rdzun byas sam/ pha rol po rdzun zer bar bstan
121b3(mdo sde): tam| thabs kyis rdzun byas pa dang / rdzun gyi rgyu byas pa dang / rdzun gyi rkyen byas pa dang / rdzun gyi chos byed pa dang / rdzun gyi las byed pa dang / mthong ba la ma
121b4(mdo sde): mthong zhes zer ba dang / ma mthong ba la mthong zhes zer ba dang / lus dang sems kyis rdzun byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni/ rtag par tshig drang po skye zhing
121b5(mdo sde): gcig tu na sems can gyi tshig drang po bskyed pa yin na/ de la slar log par sems can thams cad kyi tshig mi drang ba dang / yon po la lta ba dang / yon po'i
121b6(mdo sde): las byed par bskyod na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu smyo ba'i khu ba bdag tshong ngam/ pha log po smyo ba'i khu ba tshong bar bstan
121b7(mdo sde): tam| thabs kyis smyo ba'i khu ba tshong ngam/ smyo ba'i khu ba tshong ba'i rgyu byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba tshong ba'i rkyen byed dam/ smyo ba'i khu ba tshong ba'i chos byed dam/ smyo ba'i
122a1(mdo sde): khu ba tshod ba'i las byed pa la sogs te smyo ba'i khu ba 'o cog tshong du mi rung / smyo ba'i khu ba'i rkyen gyis kha na ma tho ba skye'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/
122a2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snang zhing thar pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'i rigs so/ /slar log par sems can thams cad kyi phyin ci log gi sems bskyed na byang chub
122a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rab tu byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i nyes pa bdag
122a4(mdo sde): gis 'phyas su byas sam/ gzhan 'phyas byed par bstan tam/ 'phya ba'i rgyu byas sam/ 'phya ba'i rkyen byas sam/ 'phya ba'i chos dang / 'phya ba'i las byed na/
122a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mur 'dug dang / theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis byed pa'i mi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na chos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma yin zhes zer na/
122a6(mdo sde): rtag par snying rje bskyed de ngan pa'i rnams theg pa chen po la yid dga'/ yid ches par bstan cing bslab pa'i rigs na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' slar
122a7(mdo sde): log par sangs rgyas kyi chos la nges shes bshad na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la la zhig bdag gis bdag bstod
122b1(mdo sde): cing phar smod pa dang / gzhan la bdag bstod/ phar smod par ston pa/ smod pa'i rgyu/ smod pa'i rkyen byed pa/ smod pa'i chos dang / smod pa'i las byed na/ byang chub
122b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi skyin par rmad bab cing ngan sems pa ni/ bdag gis blangs te dge zhing legs pa ni/ gzhan la sbyin pa'i rigs na/ la
122b3(mdo sde): la zhig gis bdag gi legs pa ni/ bsnyad/ gzhan gyi legs pa ni/ bcabs te gzhan la rmad bab par byas na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /
122b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag ser sna che'am/ gzhan ser sna che bar ston tam/ ser sna che ba'i rgyu byed dam/ ser sna'i chos byed dam/ ser sna'i las byed na/ byang chub sems
122b5(mdo sde): dpa' ni/ dbul po 'ongs so cog dang / gzhan ji 'dod pa bzhin dgos so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems la ngan du sems shing sems la gshe ba dang / dong
122b6(mdo sde): tshe gcig gam/ khab gcig gam/ rtswa nyag ma gcig mi ster ram/ chos 'dod pa zhig 'ongs na tshig gcig /le'u gcig /rdul tsam gyi chos kyang ma bshad la/
122b7(mdo sde): slar ngag ngan pas spyos te rma phab na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag khro'am/ mi pha log po khro bar ston tam/ khro ba'i rgyu
123a1(mdo sde): byed dam/ khro ba'i rkyen byed dam/ khro ba'i chos byed dam/ khro ba'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ thams cad kyi nang na
123a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa bskyed cing 'thab cing rtsod pa med par byas la rtag par snying rje bskyed cing bya ba'i rigs kyi/ phyir log par sems can thams cad kyi nang na
123a3(mdo sde): sems can ma yin pa la kha ngan pas gshe zhing lag pas 'tshog pa dang / ral gri dang / dbyug pas gdab cing brdegs kyang snying brtse ma bri ste pha log
123a4(mdo sde): po 'gyod cing tshig 'jam pos 'chags shing gnong ba bskur kyang khro ba'i mdud pa ma bkrol na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /sangs
123a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu la la zhig gis dkon mchog gsum lam yin zhes zer ram/ gzhan dkon mchog gsum lam yin zhes zer bar bstan nam/ ma yin
123a6(mdo sde): zhes zer ba'i rgyu dang / rkyen byed dam/ ma yin pa'i chos byed dam/ ma yin pa'i las byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni/ mur 'dug dang / ma rabs
123a7(mdo sde): kyi ngan tshig gcig sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad ma yin zhes zer ba zhig mthong ngam thos na mdung rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas snying la zug pa dang mtshungs na/ bdag gi kha nas ma yin zhes zer ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
123b1(mdo sde): yid ches pa'i sems sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs na/ slar log par ma rabs
123b2(mdo sde): log pa la lta zhing ma yin zhes zer ba'i grogs byed na/ de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i phas pham pa'o/ /dge zhugs spyod pa'i rnams ni/ byang chub sems
123b3(mdo sde): dpa'i so sor thar pa 'di bslab pa'i rigs so/ /'di'i nang nas rdul phra mo tsam yang gzhig tu mi rung na tshul khrims bcu tshang bar bshig pa la lta smos kyang ci
123b4(mdo sde): dgos| la la zhig gis tshul khrims bshig pa zhig na/ da ltar gyi lus la byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i las ma nus te/ rgyal po'i gral
123b5(mdo sde): yang stor/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral yang stor/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma'i gral yang stor/ g.yos shing phyogs pa bcu dang / bskyed cing gsod
123b6(mdo sde): ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rtag pa'o/ /yon tan zab mo la sogs pa zad par stor nas ngan song gsum du
123b7(mdo sde): lhung ste bskal pa gnyis gsum gyi bar du pha ma dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ming mkhan kyang mi thos te/ de bas na gcig kyang gzhig tu mi rung ngo / /khyed la sogs
124a1(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' lobs pa dang / slobs pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba'i rnams tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la gus
124a2(mdo sde): par byos te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /gsal bar ni/ le'u brgyad khri ba'i nang nas rgya cher bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems
124a3(mdo sde): dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ phas pham pa bcu ni/ bshad zin to/ /ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang /
124a4(mdo sde): 'khor los bskor ba'i rgyal po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / blon po'i gral thob pa'i tshe dang / sngar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i rigs so//
124a5(mdo sde): 'ung tang lha ma srin thams cad kyang rgyal po'i lus dang / blon po'i lus kyi rim gro dang / skyabs byed do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyang dgyes so/ /tshul khrims
124a6(mdo sde): thob zin na sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems dang / sems la gus par byas pa'i sems bskyed de gral mthon po na 'dug pa'i mkhan po dang / slob dpon
124a7(mdo sde): dang / theg pa chen po la tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa dang / mtshungs par mthong ba dang / las mthun par byed pa mthong na langs te bsu la phyag 'tshal te nad dri
124b1(mdo sde): ba'i rigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' slar dregs pa'i sems dang / le lo'i sems dang / glen pa'i sems bskyed de ma langs/ ma bsu/ phyag ma byas te/ ci la'ang
124b2(mdo sde): chos bzhin du zhe sa dang / ri mo dang / bdag gi lus dang / yul mkhar dang / po mo dang / nor rin po che bdun la sogs te nor ro cog btsongs la dgos so cog ma
124b3(mdo sde): sbyar te| de ltar ma nus na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu la la ched kar chang 'thung na chad gi nyes pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa stor to/ /la la zhig
124b4(mdo sde): gis bdag gi lus dang lag gis chang snod blangs te mi pha rol po la byin te blud na tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du lag pa med par 'ong na/ bdag 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci
124b5(mdo sde): dgos| 'di lta ste/ mi 'o cog thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la chang 'thung bar bstan du mi rung ngo / /bdag rang 'thung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bdag
124b6(mdo sde): ched kar 'thung ba dang / pha rol po la bdar ba ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sha ched kar zos pa dang / sha 'o cog bzar mi rung ste/ zos na snying rje zhing byams
124b7(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon chad pas sems can thams cad kyis mthong nas 'jigs nas spong ngo / /de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi sha bzar
125a1(mdo sde): mi rung ngo / /sha zos pa ni/ sdig grangs med de/ sha zos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu dku ba rnam lnga bzar mi rung ngo / /sgog pa
125a2(mdo sde): dang / tsong dang / rgya sgog dang / ri sgog rnams dang / shing kun dang 'di rnams lnga kha zas so cog gi nang du bzar mi rung ngo / /la la zhig ched kar zos na ltung
125a3(mdo sde): ba'o| |sangs rgyas kyi bu sems can thams cad kyis tshul khrims brgyad dang / tshul khrims lnga dang / tshul khrims bcu dang / rtsa ba rnam pa bzhi bshig pa
125a4(mdo sde): dang / log pa bdun dang / gnod pa brgyad kyi tshul khrims bshig pa'i sdig byed pa mthong na mthol tshangs byed du gzhug pa'i rigs so/ /de las
125a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma bstan te mthol tshangs byed du ma bcug na/ lhan cig 'dug 'dug cing tshangs par spyod du mtshungs pa'i dge 'dun rnams gcig
125a6(mdo sde): tu tshogs te tshul khrims bshad pa'i tshe sdig dngos su byung gi nyes pa mthol tshangs byed du chug cig / ma bcug na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu mkhan po
125a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la lhan cig tu lta ba/ lhan cig tu las byed pa/ dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar du 'ongs pa mthong na rgyang grags stong gi lam na
125b1(mdo sde): tshur 'ongs na ni/ bsu/ 'gro ba ni/ bskyal cing phyag 'tshal te bkur sti dang / ri mo dang / nyin gcig cing dus gsum du ri mo dang nyi ma gcig gi zan du gser srang
125b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi kha zas dang / khri stan dang / chos kyi mkhan po ci 'dod do cog dgos kyang kun sbyor te byin la rtag par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te dus gsum du chos bshad
125b3(mdo sde): de nyin gcig cing dus gsum du phyag gsum par 'tshal la khro ba'i sems dang / mya ngan gyi sems mi skye bar bgyis so/ /chos kyi phyir lus dang bsdos te chos
125b4(mdo sde): gsol lo/ /de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gang la'ang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang / mdo sde 'chang ba'i khang khyim chen po'i nang na chos 'chad pa
125b5(mdo sde): y od na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa tshul khrims gyi glegs bam khyer te chos kyi mkhan po'i gnas su song la gsol te dri zhing mnod pa'i rigs
125b6(mdo sde): so| |la la zhig ri dang / tshal dang / shing gi drung dang / dge 'dun gyis dang / khyim gyi nang dang / chos 'chad do cog gi sar phyin par byas te mnyan cing 'dod
125b7(mdo sde): pa'i shan gnas su song ste ma mnyan/ ma mnos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sems ni/ theg pa chen po dang 'gal zhing rtag par sangs rgyas kyi yi ge dang / tshul
126a1(mdo sde): khrims la 'dug kyang khar smra na sangs rgyas kyi bshad pa ma yin zhes zer na/ rtag par theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur
126a2(mdo sde): 'dug gi chos la lta zhing log par lta'o cog gi tshul khrims dang / chos kyi yi ge gzungs su bzung na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu mi nad kyis btab bo cog
126a3(mdo sde): r tag par rim gro byas te gsos la sangs rgyas dang mtshungs par byas na dge ba'i bsod nams rnam pa brgyad kyi nang na nad pa la lta zhing gsos pa'i dge ba'i
126a4(mdo sde): bsod nams ni/ bsod nams kyi dam pa'o/ /pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / slob ma'am/ dbang po ma tshang ba nad do cog gis btab cing nyon
126a5(mdo sde): mongs na kun kyang gsos te sos par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta gshe zhing ngan sems kyis dge 'dun gyi khyim dang / yul mkhar
126a6(mdo sde): du ma phyin pa/ dbye dang / ri lung dang / mkhar dang / tshal na nad pa 'dug pa mthong ste ra mda' dang / rim gro ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu
126a7(mdo sde): ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung dang / sta re la sogs te 'thab mo'i spyad mtshon cha dang / sems can gsod pa'i spyad dang 'dra ba rgya rgya mo la sogs pa 'chad
126b1(mdo sde): du mi rung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ pha ma gzhan gyis bsad kyang sha mi glan na/ sems can thams cad bsad pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ mtshon cha ched kar
126b2(mdo sde): 'chang ba na/ ltung ba'o/ /'di lta bu'i tshul khrims rnam bcu ni/ bslabs te rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /'og ma le'u drug gi nang na rgya cher bshad
126b3(mdo sde): do| |sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu khe 'dod pa'i phyir sems ngan pa bsam ste nyi 'og gi yul du pho nyar 'drul
126b4(mdo sde): ba dmag gi g.yul bshams te/ dmag bskyod nas 'thabs te sems can mang po bsad na/ byang chub sems dpa' dmag gi nang du song zhing phan tshun du 'dul
126b5(mdo sde): yang mi rung na ched kar yul gyi dgra byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de la ched kar byed pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bla 'bangs dang / bran pho mo dang / phyugs
126b6(mdo sde): bdag sna drug dang / gshin sgrom ro gzhug pa'i snod la sogs pa khe dang tshong spogs bdag gis kyang bgyi ba'i mi rigs na/ gzhan la byed par bstan pa lta smos
126b7(mdo sde): kyang ci dgos te/ de la ched kar byed pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bus ngan sems bskyed de pha log pa dge ba/ des pa/ chos kyi mkhan po/ dge 'dun rgyal
127a1(mdo sde): po| ya rabs btsun pa la ma nyes par log pa bdun dang / pham pa bcu dang / pha ma dang / phu bo nu bo dang / gnyen pa rnam drug gi
127a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims bshig go / zhes skur na/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal zhing byams shing snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi/ de la slar log pa'i gnod pa bskyed
127a3(mdo sde): na mi bde ba'i gnas su lhung na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de ched kar me chen po btang la ri dang / tshal dbye dang / ri lung dbyar zla ra
127a4(mdo sde): ba man chad/ ston zla tha chung yan chad/ bsregs sam/ la la zhig gis me btang ste gzhan gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / dge 'dun
127a5(mdo sde): gyi khyim dang / zhing dang / skyed shing dang / lha ma srin dang / bla'i dkor la sogs te bdag po yod do cog gi rdzas sreg tu mi rung ngo / /la la zhig gis
127a6(mdo sde): ched kar bsregs na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi slob ma bdag dang / mur 'dug dang / gnyen rnam drug la sogs te/ dge ba'i bshes
127a7(mdo sde): gnyen no cog kun kyang ci'ang theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims nod cing gzungs su 'dzin bar bstan pa'i rigs so/ /gzhung dang lugs shes shing
127b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / bskyed cing gsol ba'i sems bcu dang / rdo rje'i chos kyi sems g.yo bar bstan te/ gcig nas gcig tu go
127b2(mdo sde): rim dang / chos kyis cho ga shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpas ngan sems dang / zhe sdang bskyed do/ /gzhan nyan thos kyi theg
127b3(mdo sde): pa chung du rnam gnyis kyi tshul khrims dang / yi ge dang / mur 'dug dang / log par lta ba'i bshad pa bstan pa na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu legs pa'i
127b4(mdo sde): sems kyis sngar theg pa chen po'i go cha dang / tshul khrims dang / yi ge bslabs nas rgya cher phye nas gzhung gi ro ci bro ba shes nas byang chub sems dpa'
127b5(mdo sde): gsar du slob pa rgyad grags brgya stong gi lam nas theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims 'dod cing 'ong ba mthong na chos kyi phyir dka' thub spyod pa chos bzhin
127b6(mdo sde): bshad pa'i rigs so/ /dka' thub ces bya ba ni/ lus bsregs pa/ lag ngar bsregs pa/ sor mo bsregs pa'o/ /de la lus dang / lag ngar dang / sor
127b7(mdo sde): mo bsregs te sangs rgyas thams cad la yon du ma gsol na/ de'i rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no/ /stag dang / spyang ki dang / seng+ge ltogs pa
128a1(mdo sde): la sogs pa dang / 'dre ltogs pa la sogs pa thams cad la lus kyi sha dang / rkang lag gtong phod par byas te byin la/ de nas
128a2(mdo sde): gcig nas gcig tu mthar gyis yang dag pa'i chos bshad de/ sems ni/ phye/ yid ni/ gol bar bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' bdag gso ba'i
128a3(mdo sde): khe 'dod pa'i phyir lan glan pa'i rigs pa ni/ ma glan gyi/ yi ge dang / tshul khrims ri mo dang / 'bru phyin ci log tu bshad nas snga phyi med par dkon
128a4(mdo sde): mchog gsum la 'phya zhing 'chad pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu bdag kha zas dang / nor rdzas dang / gso ba'i khe dang / ming snyan pa'i phyir rgyal po
128a5(mdo sde): dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po la sogs pa gnyen zhes zer te/ snyems shing nan gyis nor slong la/ btsan ngag gis bsdigs te nan gyis nor dang /
128a6(mdo sde): khe tshol lo cog gi ming ni/ ngan pa mang po tshol zhes bya'o/ /gzhan la'ang snying rje med cing sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems yong med par bstan pa ni/ ltung
128a7(mdo sde): ba'o| |sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims kha ton du klog pa slob pa na nyin gcig cing dus drug tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bzung la de'i gzhung dang / don
128b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shes par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi yon tan tshig gcig le'u gcig kyang mi shes par sgyu ma'i tshig tu nus zhes zer ba
128b2(mdo sde): ni| bdag la brnyas shing bslus/ gzhan la'ang brnyas te chos so cog rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes par gzhan la mkhan po byed cing tshul khrims ston pa ni/ ltung
128b3(mdo sde): ba'o| |sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de/ tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i lag na pog snod khyer te byang chub sems dpa'i las byed pa la mthong nas
128b4(mdo sde): phan tshun gnyis kyis bar du bar bcug ste/ 'phags pa'i mi la brnyas ma shin byed cing ngan mi byed pa med do/ /zhes skur te/ de lta bu ched kar byas na ltung
128b5(mdo sde): ba'o| |sangs rgyas kyi bu snying rje spyad de ci'ang mi gsad par btang ba'i las byed cing pho'o cog ni/ bdag gi pha yin/ mo'o cog ni/ bdag gi ma yin/ bdag
128b6(mdo sde): sngon chad kyi tshe rabs la gar skyes so cog na'ang de dag las ma skyes pa med pas na/ 'gro ba drug gi sems can bdag gi pha ma yin te/ de bsad cing zos na
128b7(mdo sde): bdag gi pha ma bsad do/ /gcig tu na bdag gi lus rnying pa bsad do/ /sa dang chu thams cad ni/ bdag gi lus snga ma yin no/ /me dang rlung ngo cog ni/ bdag gi
129a1(mdo sde): gzugs kyi phyi mo yin pas rtag par gson por btang ba'i las byed/ gar skyes gar skyes kyang sems can gsod pa mthong na/
129a2(mdo sde): thabs spyad de bdag gis 'or ba dang ra mda' byas te nyon mongs shing phongs pa thar par bya'o/ /rtag par byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bshad de bstan
129a3(mdo sde): bslabs nas sems can thar pa'i ra mda' bya'o/ /pha ma dang / bu pho dang nu bo zhig shi na de nyin par chos kyi mkhan po gnyer te byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
129a4(mdo sde): bshad na de'i bsod nams kyis shi ba de sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad de mtho ris su skye'o/ /de ltar ma byas na ltung ba'o// //chos kyi rgya mo/ bam po
129a5(mdo sde): gnyis pa ste/ tha ma/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs na sems gus par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /sdig bkru ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang
129a6(mdo sde): tshul khrims gcig pu gcig nas rgya che zhing gsal bar bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ khros pa'i lan khros pas mi glan/ brdeg
129a7(mdo sde): pa'i lan brdeg pas mi glan/ pha ma dang / phu nu bo dang gnyen rnam drug bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo / /gzhan zhig gis bdag gi rgyal po bsad kyang sha glan du mi rung ngo / /srog gcod kyang sha
129b1(mdo sde): glan na sri zhu'i chos dang 'gal lo/ /bran pho mo la ngag ngan pas spyos shing brdegs la nyin gcig cing las ngan pa rnam gsum bskyod pa la'ang sdig grangs med na/
129b2(mdo sde): ched kar log pa sna bdun gyi sdig byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la snying rje med/ gnyen rnam drug la sogs pa'i sha
129b3(mdo sde): glan pa ched kar byed na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gdod ma dang po rab tu byung te ci'ang mi shes par bdag dbang po rno la mdzangs par rlom zhing la la ni/ lo
129b4(mdo sde): grangs rgan zhing phyug btsan snyems te/ la la rus che zhing thabs mtho ba dang / mang du shes pa dang / dbang che ba dang / nor rin po che sna bdun mang du 'dog
129b5(mdo sde): pas rgyags dregs sngon chad chos shes pa'i mkhan po la yi ge dang / tshul khrims mi gsol/ mi nod/ chos kyi mkhan po la la ni/ rung chad/ la la ni/
129b6(mdo sde): nas gzhon/ la la ni/ thabs chung / la la ni/ dbul/ la la ni/ dbang po ma tshang yang legs pa'i chos dben pa yod de/ chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul
129b7(mdo sde): khrims so cog zad par shes na byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob bo/ /chos kyi slob dpon ma rig pa dang / thabs la 'phral gang du bltas shing chos kyi
130a1(mdo sde): mkhan po la yang dag pa'i bden pa gzhung ngo cog gsol zhing nod du ma 'ongs na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das
130a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyin sems dge bas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 'dod cing nod na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar bdag gi sems
130a3(mdo sde): la yi dam bcas te zhag bdun gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar mthol tshangs byas la ltas bzang po mthong ba ni/ tshul khrims thob bo/ /ltas
130a4(mdo sde): bzang po ma mthong ba ni/ zhag bdun gnyis/ bdun gsum/ lo gcig gi bar du ltas bzang po mthong ba'i drod kyis gzung ngo / /ltas bzang po mthong
130a5(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims mnod do/ /ltas bzang po ma mthong na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
130a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims ma nos kyang ming tshul khrims thob pa zhes mi bya'o/ /la la zhig gis sngon chad byang chub sems
130a7(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims mnod pa'i mdun du nod na ltas bzang po mi dgos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi mkhan po gcig nas gcig tu bstan pas na/
130b1(mdo sde): ltas bzang po mi dgos te/ chos kyi mkhan po de'i mdun du tshul khrims mnos na tshul khrims kyang thob ste gus pa'i sems skye'o/ /rgyang grags stong la tshun
130b2(mdo sde): tshun chad tshul khrims sbyin nus pa'i mkhan po med la sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi spyan sngar tshul khrims nod na/ ltas bzang po mthong
130b3(mdo sde): ba dgos so/ /chos kyi mkhan po la la zhig bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims shes pa dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po rnams byams
130b4(mdo sde): shing mdza' ba snyems te byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa chos kyi yi ge'i lugs dang / tshul khrims kyi gzhung 'dir 'ongs pa la brnyas pa'i sems
130b5(mdo sde): dang / ngan sems dang / le lo'i sems kyis gcig pu gcig pu nas 'dri ba'i lan ma glan na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / tshul
130b6(mdo sde): khrims kyi yi ge dang / theg pa chen po'i drang po'i chos/ drang por mthong ba/ drang po'i ngo bo nyid/ drang po'i chos kyi lus kyis 'grus par slob cing spyod sgom
130b7(mdo sde): mi nus pa rnams ni/ dkon mchog bdun bdun btang ste/ slar log par bltas ste theg pa chung ngu rnam gnyis dang / mur 'dug gi chos dang / ma rabs kyi
131a1(mdo sde): gzhung la brten pa dang / a b+hi d+harma bshad pa slob pa dang / theg pa chung ngu'i yi ge dang / 'dug par slob na/ de ni/ sangs
131a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid sa bon chad pas lam 'gog pas bsgribs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin no/ /de lta na ched kar byas pa ni/
131a3(mdo sde): ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das pa'i phyin chos 'chang ba bdag po byed pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khyim bdag po dang / ston cing 'phrul pa'i
131a4(mdo sde): bdag po dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i bdag po dang / 'gro zhing 'ongs pa'i bdag po dang / de lta bu byed na byams pa'i sems bskyed la mi
131a5(mdo sde): mdza' ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa'ang dge bar bsdum pa'i rigs so/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi nor yang dge ba'i bsrungs te ma 'os par mi spyad/ bdag
131a6(mdo sde): gis bdag gi sgor bab pa dang mtshungs par bya'o/ /de la las log par mang po 'grub cing 'bad pa dang / rang nyams kyi sems kyis dkon mchog
131a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi nor spyad na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sngon chad dge 'dun gyi khyim gyi nang du 'dug la byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong mgron pa zhig
131b1(mdo sde): phyis dge 'dun gyi khang khyim dang / mkhar dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i khyim dang / dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i tshe dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs pa mthong na snga na
131b2(mdo sde): 'dug pa'i dge 'dun gyis 'ong na ni/ bsu/ 'gro na ni/ bskyal te zas bsti stang dang / khang khyim nyal ba'i mal cha dang / khri dang / sna sna nas sbyar te sbyin
