131b3(mdo sde): no| |la la zhig bdag la nor med na/ bdag gi lus dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dag btsongs te ci 'dod pa kun sbyar te sbyin dgos so/ /sbyin pa bdag la la
131b4(mdo sde): zhig 'ongs te dge 'dun phal dang / dge 'dun gyi mgron pa zhig gnyer te yon gyi nor skal pa yod pa'i sar dge 'dun khyim bdag pos dge 'dun mgron
131b5(mdo sde): pa'i rnams rim gyis gnyer ba btang ste/ de las dge 'dun snga nas 'dug pas bdag 'ba' zhig gnyer bar song ste/ dge 'dun mgron pa ma btang na dge
131b6(mdo sde): 'dun gyi khyim gyi bdag po sdig grangs med par thob ste byol song dang mtshungs so/ /dge sbyong ma yin/ shAkya'i rigs kyi sa bon yang ma yin te/ de ltar
131b7(mdo sde): byas pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ci'ang go rims su ma bab par logs shig tu yon blangs shing bdag gir bkur du mi rung ngo / /de lta bu'i yon gyi nor
132a1(mdo sde): rdzas ni| phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun dbang ste/ de la logs shig tu mnos shing khyer na/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor bdag gi
132a2(mdo sde): sgor khyer na bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa rnams dang / mkhan po dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / nad pa'i rdzas
132a3(mdo sde): bdag gis spyad kyis ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu ma byung ba'i sbyin bdag gis dge 'dun gnyer te
132a4(mdo sde): bsod nams bskyed cing smon lam gsol na/ dge 'dun gyi nang du song na dge bskos la dris te/ de ring go rim gang la bab pa gnyer na phyogs bcu'i
132a5(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi dge 'dun thob bo/ /gud nas dgra bcom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge 'dun lnga bcu gnyer ba bas go rims su bab pa'i
132a6(mdo sde): dge 'dun tha mal pa gcig gnyer ba bsod nams che'o/ /de las dge 'dun gzhan gnyer ba ni/ mur 'dug ngan pa'i chos so/ /sangs rgyas bdun
132a7(mdo sde): la ni| gud nas gnyer ba'i chos med do/ /sri zhu'i lam dang 'gal bas gud nas dge 'dun gnyer ba ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems
132b1(mdo sde): spyad de gso ba'i khe'i phyir pho mo'i g.yem pa tshong ba'i bdag dar cing zan byed pa dang / bdag rdung pa/ bdag 'du ba pho mo'i mtshan lta rmi lam bzang ngan
132b2(mdo sde): 'gro la po zhes zer/ mo zhes zer/ log pa'i chos kyi sngags sgyu ma rang bzor zer/ dgra bslab pa'i chos byed/ dug go cog sbyor zhing byed la dug rtsi rnam
132b3(mdo sde): pa brgya stong byed de/ sbrul dug/ gser dngul ma btul ba'i dug dang / byad ste ma la sogs pa snying rje yong med pa lta bu ched kar byas na ltung ba'o/ /
132b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de bdag gi lus kyis dkon mchog gsum la skur pa byas te gzhan la gnyan sgyu ma smos te/ kha ni/ stong pa 'chad /
132b5(mdo sde): las ni| yod pa'i las byed la/ tha mal pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa'i smyan byed cing mi tshangs par spyod par sbyor te/ ci la'ang mi 'jigs shing chags pa
132b6(mdo sde): med| dus drug tu mchod ston byed pa'i nyi ma dang / lo gcig la zla ba gsum gsum mchod ston rtag tu byed pa'i tshe sems can gsod/ rkun po dang / chom
132b7(mdo sde): po byed cing mchod ston gyi tshul khrims bshig pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /tshul khrims 'di bcu bslabs la rtag par gzungs su gzung ba'i rigs so/ /khrims gzung
133a1(mdo sde): ba'i le'u'i nang nas kyang rgya cher mngon par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu sangs rgyas 'das
133a2(mdo sde): pa'i phyi na ngan pa'i dus la mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa'o cog dang / rkun po chen pos sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha ma dang mtshungs pa'i
133a3(mdo sde): gzugs tshong ba mthong ngam/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi yi ge tshong ba mthong ngam/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshong ngam/ gcig tu sems bskyed pa'i
133a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' tshong ba dang / la la zhig snying rje'i las la mngags pa'i 'brang nas bran pho bran mor byas pa zhig byang chub sems dpas de lta bu
133a5(mdo sde): mthong na byams pa'i sems bskyed de thabs kyis ra mda' dang / skyabs byas te gnas gnas na 'khod do cog kyang slar slob cing ston cig/ sangs rgyas
133a6(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge thams cad nor yod na nor gyis blus
133a7(mdo sde): shig / de ltar ma blus na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu 'chang du mi gnang ba la mtshon cha dang / mda' gzhu 'chang ba dang / tshong spobs byed pa dang / srang
133b1(mdo sde): dang bre che chung 'chang ba dang / rtsa lag snyems shing mi gzhan la nor len pa dang / sems can la phrag dog byed de/ pha log po bcings drags byas pa dang /
133b2(mdo sde): ngo so don du yod pa zhig btang byi la dang / sel phyi dang / khyi dang / phag dang / phya 'chang zhing gsor mi rung ngo / /de lta bu ched dkar gsos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs
133b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu ngan sems bskyed de pho mo la sogs pa 'thab bo cog la lta ba dmag gi g.yul dang / dgra chom po byed pa la sogs pa la bltar mi rung ngo / /yang
133b4(mdo sde): gcig tu dung 'bud pa dang / rnga gling dang / gyim shing dang / dzeng dang / gling bu dang / kor hi'u dang / glu len pa dang / rol mo'i sgra la mnyan du mi rung ngo / /
133b5(mdo sde): cho lo dang / mig mang dang / par sig gi rtsed mo dang / ra 'bri lug gi dmag gi rtsed mo dang / pho long rdo ba dang / rdo 'phen gyis rtse ba dang / bum bu la rde'u
133b6(mdo sde): 'phen pa dang / khras byed pa dang / me long brud pa byar mi rung ngo / /rtsa tshi tsho'u dang / rgya lcang dang / pher kha ru ba dang / mi'i thod pa dang / de rnams la mo gdab tu
133b7(mdo sde): mi rung ngo / /rkun po'i than gyi pho nya la sogs pa gcig kyang byar mi rung ngo / /de ltar ched kar byas na ltung ba'i/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu tshul khrims thub par bzung
134a1(mdo sde): ba'i rim gro byas na 'gro nyal 'dug langs/ nyin mtshan dus drug tu tshul khrims kha ton bklags na rdo rje dang mtshungs
134a2(mdo sde): so| |rkyal pa thogs pa mtsho chen po rgal ba dang mtshungs so/ /gcig tu na dge slong rtswas bcings ba dang mtshungs te/ theg pa chen po la dge zhing yid
134a3(mdo sde): ches pa'i sems rtag par bskyed la bdag gis shes par bsam pa nga ni/ da dung sangs rgyas su ma phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams
134a4(mdo sde): n i| sangs rgyas su phyin pa'i sangs rgyas so snyam du byang chub tu sems bskyed de bar mi chad par sems la bsam la de skad cig gcig theg pa chung
134a5(mdo sde): du gnyis dang / mur 'dug la sems kyis bsam na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par smon lam thams cad gsol la/ pha ma dang / mkhan
134a6(mdo sde): po dang / dge 'dun dang / dkon mchog gsum la sri zhu che zhing yid dang mi 'gal bar smon/ rtag par mkhan po mkhas pa dang / tshangs par spyod du
134a7(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad de rtag par bdag theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / khrims dang / g.yo zhing phyogs pa bcu dang / bskyed cing
134b1(mdo sde): gso gso ba bcu dang / chos rdo rje dang mtshungs pa bcu dang / sa bcu la sogs pa bdag byed cing shes la chos bzhin du las byed par smon to/ /sangs rgyas
134b2(mdo sde): kyi bu tshul khrims bzung la sran thub par bya ba ni/ lus dang srog kyang bor te sems la sems pa'i bar mi gtsang par sems bsam mo/ /de la byang chub
134b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu smon lam chen po bcu smon pa'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims
134b4(mdo sde): gzungs su bzung ste smon lam 'di bzhin du gdab bo/ /bdag gi lus 'di me chen po'i nang du tshig kyang rung / khung zab mo dang / ral gri'i ri la song yang
134b5(mdo sde): rung ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims mthar mi zhig pa dang / nam du'ang mi zhig pa bud med thams cad gsog pa
134b6(mdo sde): mi byed par smon to/ /gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lcags bsregs pa'i dra ba dang / de lta bu rgya mo rim pa stong gis bskor te lus dkris kyang mthar
134b7(mdo sde): yun du tshul khrims bral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i spyin bdag gi gos thams cad mi bgo bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /kha 'di'i
135a1(mdo sde): nang du lcags kyi thu lum bsregs pa dang / me chu bzhin du bab ste 'ongs pa la bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du lon kyang tshul khrims
135a2(mdo sde): bshig pa'i khas dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi zas thams cad mi za bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'di me chen pos bsregs
135a3(mdo sde): pa'i lcags kyi dra ba dang / lcags bsregs pa'i tsha ba'i steng du bsnyal kyang tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khri bo cog gi steng
135a4(mdo sde): du mi 'dug par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'di bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du mdud rtse kha gsum pa sum brgyas
135a5(mdo sde): gtsags kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims bshig pa'i lus kyis dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi rtsi sman thams cad mi za bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam
135a6(mdo sde): 'di ltar smon to/ /lus 'dis bskal pa stong gi bar du lcags kyi zangs po che tsha ba'i nang du bcug kyang rung ste/ mthar tshul khrims dral ba'i lus kyis
135a7(mdo sde): dad pa'i sbyin bdag gi khang khyim mo cog dang / ldum ra dang / skyed shing dang / zhing gi steng du mi 'dug par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon
135b1(mdo sde): t o| |lus 'di mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du lcags kyi gtun bus brdungs te rdul phra mo bzhin du song yang khrims dral ba'i lus sems yid ches pa'i sbyin bdag
135b2(mdo sde): gis 'grus shing gus par phyag mi 'tshal bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /stong phrag brgya'i lcags bsregs pa'i ral gri dang / mdung
135b3(mdo sde): rtses mig gnyis brus shing gtsags kyang tshul khrims bshig pa'i sems kyis pha logs kha dog bzang po la mi lta bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam
135b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar smon to/ /lcags kyi smyung bu stong phrag brgyas bskal pa gcig gnyis kyi bar du lus kyi chu ba dang / rna ba'i rtsa bar btsugs kyang tha mar khrims dral
135b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis rol mo snyan pa la mi mnyan par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di lta bur smon to/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du ral gris sna bcad
135b6(mdo sde): cing gzhogs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis spos so cog la mi snom par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /bskal pa brgya stong gi bar
135b7(mdo sde): du lce ral gris bcad gtubs kyang khrims dral ba'i sems kyis mi'i cog gi kha zas gtsang ma'o cog la mi bza' bar smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di
136a1(mdo sde): ltar smon to/ /sta re rnon pos lus bcad gtubs kyang mthar khrims dral ba'i sems kyis reg pa'i bzang po la mi brkam
136a2(mdo sde): mi chags par smon to/ /yang gcig tu smon lam 'di ltar smon to/ /sems can no cog sangs rgyas su yod par smon to/ /byang chub sems dpa'
136a3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i smon lam ma bskyed na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par dus gnyis su sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa dgun dang / dbyar bsam gtan du
136a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims su 'jug pa so shing dang / sran phye dang / chos gos gsum dang / ril ba dang | lhung bzed dang / gding ba dang / gsil
136a5(mdo sde): byed dang / pog phor dang / chu tshags dang / lag phyis dang / gri dang / gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / smed tsher dang / tha gu'i khri dang / dar ma
136a6(mdo sde): dang / khrims dang / sangs rgyas kyi bu sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa'i cha grong rgyu ba'i tshe 'gro zhing 'ongs na rgyang grags brgya stong du 'gron yo byad bco brgyad
136a7(mdo sde): rtag par lus dang mi 'bral te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan pa ni/ dpyid zla ra ba tshes bco lnga nas dpyid zla tha chung tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o/ /ston zla 'bring po tshes
136b1(mdo sde): bco lnga nas dgun zla ra ba nya'i bar du dus gnyis su yo byad bco brgyad lus dang mi 'bral/ dper na/ bya'i 'dab ma dang 'dra'o/ /de ste gso sbyin gyi nyi ma
136b2(mdo sde): la gsar du slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams zla ba phyed cing kha ton du phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi khrims kha ton du lhogs
136b3(mdo sde): shig / de ste khrims klog pa'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzugs dang / gzugs brnyan
136b4(mdo sde): gyi spyan sngar mi gcig gis kha ton bklags la gcig gis mthol tshangs bya ste/ gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gang yang rung ste/ stong brgya de'ang mi gcig
136b5(mdo sde): gis kha ton klog go / kha ston klog pa ni/ sa mthon po la 'dug la/ nyan pa ni/ dma' ba la 'dug go /so so nas chos gos tshal bu dgu pa dang / lnga pa dang /
136b6(mdo sde): bdun pa bgos te tshul du 'jug pa ni/ gcig nas gcig tu chos bzhin du'o/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa'i tshe bgegs yod cing mi bde ba'i nang du ma 'gro
136b7(mdo sde): zhig / yul gyi bgegs dang / rgyal po mi srun pa dang / sa mtho dma' dang / rtsi shing zab mo dang / dbyar seng+ge dang / stag dang / spyang ki dang / chu ste rlung gi
137a1(mdo sde): bgegs dang / rkun po chom po dang / sbrul gdug pa'i lam la sogs te/ bgegs yod do cog thams cad du sbyangs pa'i
137a2(mdo sde): yon tan pa 'gror mi rung ngo / /de la ched kar song na ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu chos 'di bzhin du rim pas 'khod cig /tshul khrims sngar nos pa
137a3(mdo sde): ni| sngar 'dug cig / tshul khrims phyis nos pa ni/ phyi nas 'dug cig /rgan gzhon mi lta/ dge slong pho dang / dge slong mo dang / ya rabs dang /
137a4(mdo sde): btsun pa dang / rgyal po rgyal bu dang / nyung rum dang / bran pho mo la sogs pa tshul khrims sngar nos pa ni/ sngar 'dug cig /phyis nos pa ni/ phyis
137a5(mdo sde): go rim bzhin du 'dug cig / mur 'dug ngan pa dang / mi glen po bzhin du rgan yang rung / gzhon yang rung / snga med phyi med pa'i go rim med pa ni /g.yung
137a6(mdo sde): po bran gyi chos so/ /nga sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang na ni snga ma ni/ steng du 'dug /phyi ma ni/ 'og tu 'dug go /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos bzhin du go rims
137a7(mdo sde): su ma 'khod na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems can no cog bstan cing bcos te dge 'dun gyi khang khyim byed cing ri dang / tshal dang / ra ba dang /
137b1(mdo sde): zhing la sangs rgyas kyi rten gyi khang pa byas la dbyar dgun du tshul dang / bsam gtan du 'jug pa'i gnas dang / gtsang ma'i 'chag sa 'dzugs su gzhug ba'i
137b2(mdo sde): rigs so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems can no cog gi phyir theg pa chen po'i chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge bkrol bshad na nam na tsha byung ba dang /
137b3(mdo sde): yul gyi bgegs dang / dgra'i bgegs dang / pha ma dang / phu nu bo dang / mkhan po la sogs pa thog ma shi ba'i dus dang / bdun gsum gyi nyi ma dang /
137b4(mdo sde): bdun bzhi'i nyi ma dang / bdun lnga'i nyi ma dang / bdun bdun gyi nyi ma la de'i phyir theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims bkrol bshad de/ mchod
137b5(mdo sde): ston byas te dge pa'i bsod nams thob par gsol cig / 'gro 'ongs kyang gson po'i mtsho bsod nams byed pa la me chan pos bsregs/ chu chen pos khyer
137b6(mdo sde): rlung nag po chen pos gru bus pa dang / rtsad po dang mtsho chen po'i dgra'i bgegs la sogs te sdig go cog bgegs dang lan gyis stan mtshungs med pa bdun
137b7(mdo sde): bgegs brgyad/ lag sgril/ rkang sgril ltung dang / lcags dang lus bcings drags te g.yem zhing khro ba mang po dang / blun zhing glen pa mang po dang / na tsha'i
138a1(mdo sde): mang po'i dgra zus na kun gyis kyang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi yi ge dang / tshul khrims kha ton bklags te dgrol ba bshad do/ /
138a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gsar du slob pa 'di bzhin ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la gus par rtag par gzungs su zungs shig /
138a3(mdo sde): snyoms pa'i chos kyi le'u las kyang rgya che zhing mngon par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bu mi la tshul
138a4(mdo sde): khrims shig sbyin na bye brag dbye zhing gdam du mi rung / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po chen po dang / blon po phal dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma
138a5(mdo sde): dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / pho g.yem mo g.yem dang / gzugs kyi gnam bco brgyad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi gnam drug dang / dbang
138a6(mdo sde): po med pa dang / dbang po rnam gnyis yod pa dang / nyung rum dang / bran pho mo dang / lha ma srin la sogs te thams cad kun khrims mnod du rung ngo / /lus
138a7(mdo sde): la chos kyi gos bgo ba rnams ni/ kha dog bsgyur bar ston la chos dang mthun par gyis shig /kha dog ser po/ sngon po/ nag po/ dmar po/ mal gos yan
138b1(mdo sde): chad kha dge bsgyur ro/ /lus la gos pa go'o cog tshos te kha dog sgyur cig /yul lo cog gi nang na mi'i gos su bgo ba la dge slong ngo cog gi gos ni/ tha mal
138b2(mdo sde): pa'i gos dang mi mthun no/ /thog ma tshul khrims sbyin pa'i tshe mkhan pos dri ba khyed tshe 'di la log pa bdun gyi sdig byas sam zhes dris shig /chos kyi mkhan
138b3(mdo sde): po byang chub sems dpa' ni/ log pa bdun byas pa la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo / /log pa bdun zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi lus la khrag phyung ba
138b4(mdo sde): dang / pha ma dang mkhan po dang slob dpon bsad pa dang / lus kyi tshul khrims gtsang ma bshig pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba pa'i 'phags pa bsod
138b5(mdo sde): pa yin te/ 'di rnam bdun tshang bar byas te bsgribs pa'i tshul la tshul khrims sbyin du mi rung ngo / /gzhan ni/ thams cad kyang tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo / /
138b6(mdo sde): rab tu byung ba'i chos ni/ rgyal po la'ang phyag mi 'tshal/ pha ma la'ang phyag mi 'tshal/ gnyen pa rnam pa drug la'ang zhe sa mi bya/ lha ma srin la'ang phyag
138b7(mdo sde): mi 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi mkhan po skad shes pa zhig rgyang grags stong gi lam nas 'ongs te khrims gsol ba zhig yod na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
139a1(mdo sde): mkhan pos ngan sems dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de sems can no cog la tshul khrims ma byin na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi
139a2(mdo sde): b u la bstan bcos te yid ches pa'i sems g.yo bar bya na byang chub sems dpas gzhan tshul khrims bstan pa'i chos kyi mkhan po byas te tshul khrims
139a3(mdo sde): mnod du 'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong na sngar mkhan po slob dpon gnyer du thong zhig / mkhan po gnyis kyis kyang khyed la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod dam
139a4(mdo sde): dris shig / de la'ang tshe 'di la bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig yod na/ mkhan pos tshul khrims sbyin pa mi rigs so/ /bdun gyis bsgribs pa'i sdig
139a5(mdo sde): med na| tshul khrims sbyin du rung ngo / /la la zhig gis tshul khrims bcu bshig pa zhig yod na/ mthol tshangs byed du chu gcig /sangs rgyas dang byang
139a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i zhal sngar nyin mtshan drug tu pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi tshul khrims kha ton du bklags la dus gsum gyi sangs
139a7(mdo sde): rgyas la sems thag pa nas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe ltas bzang por bya dgos so/ /de la nyi ma bdun dang / bdun gnyis dang / bdun gsum dang / lo gcig
139b1(mdo sde): tshun chad ltas bzang po mthong dgos so/ /ltas bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas gshegs te sbyi bo la byugs te 'od mthong ba dang / me tog mthong ba dang /
139b2(mdo sde): ltas ci'ang rung ba bzang po mthong na mod la sdig 'byin to/ /de la ltas bzang po med na/ mthol tshangs su zin kyang mi phan te/ de'i tshe lus kyis ni/ tshul
139b3(mdo sde): khrims mi thob bo/ /lo ngang nyi mas bstan te spogs te byas la ltas 'od byung ba dag mthong na tshul khrims mnod du rung ngo / /la la zhig gis ltung ba bzhi bcu
139b4(mdo sde): rtsa brgyad bshig pa ni/ mthol tshangs byas pa'i mod la 'byung ste/ bdun gyis bsgribs pa dang mi mtshungs so/ /de bas na/ tshul khrims ston pa'i mkhan
139b5(mdo sde): pos chos 'di'i nang nas kyang gcig nas gcig nas khrel na mkhan po bya'o/ /theg pa chen po'i yi ge dang / tshul khrims yang pa dang / lci ba dang / yin
139b6(mdo sde): pa dang / ma yin pa'i gzugs dam pa mi shes na/ gzhung gi mchog bden pa dang / snga ma'i rang bzhin gyi sa bon dang / da ltar bskyed cing gso ba'i rang
139b7(mdo sde): bzhin dang / gtan mi rlag pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos kyi sa bon gyi rang bzhin dang / drang po'i rang bzhin dang / de'i nang nas rtog pa dang / dpyod pa'i rang
140a1(mdo sde): bzhin dang / phyi nang gi bsam gtan bcu'i yal ga la sogs te chos kyis las bya'o/ /cho ga dang / tshul khrims dang /
140a2(mdo sde): chos kyi yi ge 'di gcig nas gcig khong du ma chud do/ /byang chub sems dpa' gso ba'i khe dang / ming snyan pa 'dod pa'i phyir slob ma la khe brkam
140a3(mdo sde): pas ngan pa btsal te mi shes pa la sgyu mar chos dang / tshul khrims kyi yi ge kun shes so/ /zhes zer zhing yon len pa'i bdag la'ang bslus shing
140a4(mdo sde): brnyas| gcig tu na gzhan la'ang bslus shing brnyas te/ de lta bus mi la tshul khrims byin na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu gso ba'i khe 'dod pa'i
140a5(mdo sde): phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ma mnos pa'i mdun du mur 'dug dang / ma rabs kyi mdun du sangs rgyas stong gi tshul khrims chen po 'di bshad
140a6(mdo sde): du mi rung ngo / /log par lta ba'i mdun du mi rung ngo / /rgyal po ma gtogs pa gzhan su'i mdun du'ang bshad du mi rung ngo / /mi ngan pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas
140a7(mdo sde): kyi tshul khrims ma mnos pa ni/ mid byol song zhes bya'o/ /gar skyes gar skyes kyang dkon mchog gsum mi mthong zhing rdo shing dang mtshungs sems med de/
140b1(mdo sde): ming chos log pa zhes bya'o/ /log pa la lta ba'i rnams ni/ shing dum pa dang mtshungs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ngan pa'i mdun du sangs rgyas rabs
140b2(mdo sde): bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de bstan na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu sems yid ches te rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dam pa mnos la ched
140b3(mdo sde): kar sems bskyed de 'phags pa'i tshul khrims bshig na/ sbyin bdag go cog yon blang du mi rung ngo / /gcig tu ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyis ris la'ang 'gror
140b4(mdo sde): mi rung / rgyal po'i chu la'ang 'thung du mi rung ste/ 'dre chen po lnga stong gis rtag par de'i mdun bcad nas 'dre na re/ dgra chen po khyim dang / mkhar dang /
140b5(mdo sde): yul gyi nang du 'ongs so/ /zhes zer te/ de rnams kyis khor mor mi de'i rjes phyags so/ /'jig rten na re'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi nang du 'gro'o/ /zhes zer te mig gi
140b6(mdo sde): mthong du 'ong mi dga'o/ /tshul khrims bshig pa ni/ byol song dang mtshungs/ shing dum pa dang mtshungs te/ drang po'i tshul khrims bshig na ltung ba'o/ /
140b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bu sems gcig tu brtul te rtag par gzungs su bzung ste kha ton du'ang klog go /pags pa bshus te ni/ shog shog byas/ khrag phyung bas
141a1(mdo sde): ni| snag tshar byas/ rus pa bcag ste smyug gur byas la sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi yi ge bri'o/ /shing gi shun pa dang / thong
141a2(mdo sde): kar la bris te rtag par rin po che sna bdun dang / rin med pa'i spos dang / me tog la sogs pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi gze ba dang snod byas te/ nang du
141a3(mdo sde): chos kyi yi ge tshul khrims kyi glegs bam gzhug go / de la chos kyi bzhin du ri mo ma byas na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu rtag par sems rgya cher bskyed
141a4(mdo sde): de yul mkhar dang / khang khyim mo cog tu phyin te sems can no cog ni/ mthong na/ khyod la sogs pa sems can no cog thams cad dkon mchog
141a5(mdo sde): gsum la phyogs shing tshul khrims bcu nos shig ces bsgo ba'i rigs so/ /byol song gi khams shig na'ang sems la bsam khar smras te/ khyod
141a6(mdo sde): ni| byol song na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems skyed cig ces bsam zhing bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ ri lung dbye thang ga la gnas kyang
141a7(mdo sde): rung ste| sems can no cog kun byang chub sems dpa'i sems skye bar byos shig / byang chub sems dpa' sems can ma bstan ma bcos na ltung ba'o/ /sangs
141b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bu rtag par bstan cing bcos pa'i snying rje chen po bskyed nas chos byed pa dang / ya rabs la sogs pa sbyin bdag dang / 'du ba mang bo'i nang du 'greng
141b2(mdo sde): la gos skya bo gyon te chos bshad du mi rung ngo / /gos skya bo gyon pa 'du ba mang po'i nang du chos bshad na/ chos kyi mkhan po ni/ sa mthon por 'dug la
141b3(mdo sde): spos dang me tog gis yon gsol te mtha' bzhir nyan pa'i rnams dma' ba na 'khod la gus par mnyan to/ /pha ma la sri zhu mi 'gal bar bya ba dang /
141b4(mdo sde): slob mas mkhan po la bya ba bzhin chos la'ang de bzhin gus par bya'o/ /bram ze me lha can chos byed pa bzhin gus par bya'o/ /de bzhin ma byas te chos
141b5(mdo sde): 'chad pa bo chos bzhin du ma bshad na ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu kun kyang the tshom med pa'i yid kyis khrims nos shig /rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / slob
141b6(mdo sde): ma sde bzhi dang / bdag mtho zhing btsan snyems te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang tshul khrims bshig pa nan tur gyis chos byas te nga'i slob ma rnam bzhi rab
141b7(mdo sde): tu byung zhing chos byed par mi ster te/ bgegs gcig tu na sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / mchod rten 'dzugs shing chos dang tshul khrims yi ger 'brir mi
142a1(mdo sde): ster te| dkon mchog 'jig cing de lta bur ched kar chos 'jig pa ni/ ltung ba'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu dge ba'i sems spyod pa la
142a2(mdo sde): rab tu phyung zhig/ legs pa'i ming snyan pa 'dod pa dang / gso ba'i khe'i phyir rgyal po dang / blon po'i mdun du sangs rgyas bdun gyi tshul khrims bshad de/
142a3(mdo sde): dge slong dang dge slong ma la byang chub sems dpa'i khrims mi rigs par byin te slob ma rnams bcings btags na/ seng+ge'i lus la srin bu 'dug pas
142a4(mdo sde): seng+ge bdag gis sha zos pa dang mtshungs te/ phyi'i srin bus sha zos pa ma yin no/ /de lta bas na/ sangs rgyas kyi bu mur 'dug dang / bdud kyis chos bshig
142a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /bdag gis chos bshig pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims mnos na sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi rim gro bya ba ni/ pha mas pha ma bu
142a6(mdo sde): gcig pu la bsam pa dang mtshungs so/ /pha ma la sri zhu bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /mur 'dug dang / mi ngan pa la ngag ngan pa tshig ngan pas sangs rgyas kyi tshul
142a7(mdo sde): khrims la skur pa zer na/ mdud rtse kha gsum pa'i mdung rtse sum brgyas snying la btsugs pa dang / ral gri stong dbyug pa stong khris lus brdegs pa dang
142b1(mdo sde): mtshangs par bya ste/ bdag gi lus bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems can dmyal bar song yang sla'i/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshig gcig ngan du zer
142b2(mdo sde): ba'i skad ni mi thos par smon to/ /bdag nyid kyis tshul khrims bshig pa gzhan la lan lon pa dang / zhar gyis zhar gyis tshul khrims bshig par bstan
142b3(mdo sde): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ sri zhu dang mi 'gal ba'i sems med do/ /de lta bu byas na ltung ba'o/ /tshul khrims 'di dgu bslabs la sems gus par gzungs
142b4(mdo sde): su zungs shig / sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams tshul khrims yang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad khyed la sogs pas rtag par gzungs su zungs shig /sngar 'das pa'i sangs
142b5(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ kha ton zin to/ /da ltar gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ da ltar kha ton byas so/ /sangs
142b6(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' phyis 'ongs pa'i rnams so/ /da de'i khar kha ton byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi bu nyon cig /phas pham pa bcu dang / ltung ba bzhi bcu rtsa
142b7(mdo sde): brgyad cig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kha ton zin/ da ltar gyi kha ton byas/ phyis kyang kha ton byed de/ nga'ang de bzhin da ltar kha ton byed do/ /de lta bas na/ khyed
143a1(mdo sde): la sogs pas sems can phal mang po rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
143a2(mdo sde): dge bsnyen mas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims nos na 'grus par kha ton klogs la bkrol bshad de/ yi ger bris la sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin
143a3(mdo sde): g yis skal pa rtag par 'dug ste khrims kyi glegs bam dus gsum gyi bar du tshul bzhin 'bab cing thogs pa med par byas te sems can thams
143a4(mdo sde): cad bstan cing bslab pa'i rgyun mi gcod cing sangs rgyas mthong la sangs rgyas gcig gis gcig la gtad de/ tshe tshe rabs su yang ngan song dang
143a5(mdo sde): bgegs brgyad kyi nang du'ang mi ltung zhing rtag par mi'i lam dang gnam gyi steng du skye'o/ /ngas da ltar shing 'di'i drung du 'dug ste sangs rgyas rabs
143a6(mdo sde): b dun gyi chos kyi khrims mdo tsam zhig phya ba khyed la sogs pa snying gcig tu brtul te so sor thar pa la bslabs la dga' zhing gus par gyis
143a7(mdo sde): shig / gzugs med pa'i gnam gyi rgyal po'i le'u slob pa'i blon 'debs pa'i nang nas gcig pu gcig bu nas rgya che zhing mngon bar bshad do/ /de'i slob
143b1(mdo sde): m a mkhas pa sum stong 'dug cing nyan pas sangs rgyas kyis kha ton bklags pa thos nas sems thag pa nas spyi bo la khyer te dga' gzha' nas rtag par
143b2(mdo sde): gzungs su bzung ngo / /de ltar shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis yan chad pad+mo'i me tog gi snod kyi khams kyi rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku'i sems kyi gnas chos
143b3(mdo sde): kyi sgo mo le'u'i nang na zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims bcu bshad zin to/ /stong phrag brgya 'bum gyi thub pa'ang de bzhin no/ /dbang po chen po'i gnam gyi rgyal
143b4(mdo sde): po'i pho brang nas 'di'i gtsang ma'i shing drung na 'dug pa bcu'i gnas na chos dang tshul khrims kyi le'u yang bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
143b5(mdo sde): bsgo ba bshad kyis mi lang ngo / /mang po phal tag par gzungs su gzungs la kha ton du lhogs shig /de'i gzhung bkrol bshad pa de yin no/ /stong phrag brgya'ang
143b6(mdo sde): 'bum gyi khams pad+mo'i me tog snod kyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi khams kyi thams cad kyi sems kyi snod/ tshul khrims kyi snod/ grangs med pa'i smon lam
143b7(mdo sde): gyi snod| yon tan dang / sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin 'dug pa'i snod de/ sangs rgyas thams cad grangs med/ chos kyi sgo mo'ang bshad zin to/ /stong phrag
144a1(mdo sde): brgya'i khams kyi nang na sems can thams cad kyis gzungs su bzung ste dga' zhing gus par byed do/ /sems kyi gnas rgya cher
144a2(mdo sde): phye ba'i gzungs ni/ sangs rgyas kyi me tog 'od kyi rgyal ba'i le'u'i nang nas bshad do/ /sangs rgyas bdun gyis tshig gi le'u bshad pa gcig ste/ sangs rgyas
144a3(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs kyis bstan pa'i tshul khrims bshad pa/ bzod pa'i dam pas dka' thub zhugs/ /bzod pa'i dam pas mya ngan 'da'/ /gzhan la gnod
144a4(mdo sde): pa de ni byang chub ma yin no/ /gnyis te spyi tor sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ mig can mi bde yod las byol te 'gro/ /mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten
144a5(mdo sde): na| |sdig pa kun kyang rnam par spongs/ /gsum ste thams cad skyob sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ gnod la mi smra mi sems te/ /so sor thar pa bzhin du
144a6(mdo sde): sdom| |zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya/ /gnas kyang dben par 'jug par bya/ /rab tu sems dang ldan pa ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /bzhi ste log
144a7(mdo sde): par dad sel sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ ji ltar bung ba me tog gi /kha dog bsung la mi gnod par/ /khu ba blangs te 'phur ba bzhin/ /de bzhin byang chub
144b1(mdo sde): grong du spyod/ /gzhan gyi rnams la mi blta bar/ /gzhan gyis legs pa byas la'o/ /bdag rang nyid la ltos/ legs nyes ci byas pa/ lnga ste gser thub
144b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ bsam gtan la ni ma byol bar/ /thub pa rnams kyis tshul thub slobs/ /mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur mgon/ /mngon par zhi bas
144b3(mdo sde): rtag tu dran pa'i yid/ /drug ste bsod skyabs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ thams cad sdig pa mi bya'o/ /dge 'o cog ni rdzogs par bya/ /bdag gi sems kyang
144b4(mdo sde): shin tu gdul/ /de ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o/ /bdun te shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa/ lus kyis su ni sdom pa dge /ngag gi sdom pa yang ni dge /
144b5(mdo sde): yid kyi sdom pa yang ni dge /dge 'o thams cad sdom pa ni/ /byang chub kun la mgon skyabs byed/ /nyon mongs thams cad kun las skyob/ /byang chub dag srung
144b6(mdo sde): yid kyang sdom/ /lus kyis mi dge mi bya zhing / /'di gsum las las rnam par skyongs/ /'thob bo drang srong gsungs pa'i lam/ /mi yis brdegs spyos sha
144b7(mdo sde): mi glan/ /sdig gi mi la sems mi 'khon/ /gshe ba'i mi la'ang rtag tu gcang / /mi yis ngan byas bdag mi byed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rabs btsun byas/ /'jig
145a1(mdo sde): rten ra mda' pha skyabs nus/ /sangs rgyas 'dis tshul khrims bshad pa/ /ngas rgya cher bshad du kun rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas
145a2(mdo sde): kun dang slob ma rnams/ /chos kyi tshul khrims gus par 'dzin/ /gcig la gcig kyang gus par byos/ /chos la drin gzo cho ga tshang na/ /bya ba med pa'i
145a3(mdo sde): chos thob nus/ /tshul khrims yi ge bshad zin nas/ /sems gcig brtul te byang chub thob/ /chos kyi rgya mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
145a4(mdo sde): AR+ya sUR+ya gar+b+ha nA ma ma hA bai bu l+yaM sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po dang po/ sangs
145a5(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i
145a6(mdo sde): tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan grangs med dpag tu med pa dag nas der lhags pa'i byang chub
145a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas so/ /de bzhin du phyogs
145b1(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas der 'dus te lhags pa'i nyan thos chen po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med bdag gis kyang yongs
145b2(mdo sde): su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas so/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dir lhags pa brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i
145b3(mdo sde): dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / dri za'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'
145b4(mdo sde): lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po grangs med/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi sangs
145b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i lam gang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang
145b6(mdo sde): gzhan dag dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gzhan dang gzhan
145b7(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang lhags nas bcom ldan 'das la gyen du lta zhing / bcom ldan 'das ring po mi thogs par mthar phyin pa/ nam mkha'
146a1(mdo sde): ltar snang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu 'byed pa/ dbugs rdub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa/ 'chi ba med pa'i sgo/ tshangs
146a2(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa lung bstan pa ston pa na cang mi smra bar 'khod de/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i
146a3(mdo sde): lam gang bar gyur cing / da dung bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi char gyi ston pas tshim par ma gyur nas thal mo dag rab tu sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kho na
146a4(mdo sde): la blta zhing 'khod pa ni/ dper na/ nad pa dag sman pa la lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / mun pas khebs pa dag snang ba lta bar byed pa bzhin dang /
146a5(mdo sde): chu bos khyer ba dag chu 'gram du lta bar byed pa bzhin dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / skyabs la lta bar byed pa bzhin te/ da ltar mi mjed kyi sangs
146a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sa dang nam mkha'i lam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / nyan thos dag dang / dbang po brgya byin dag
146a7(mdo sde): nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag gi bar dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzhan dang gzhan dag nas mi dang ma yin pa rnams
146b1(mdo sde): gzhan dang gzhan dag gi bar bcom ldan 'das chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po la lta zhing thal mo rab tu sbyar te cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
146b2(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal zhes bya ba sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
146b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas par gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal
146b4(mdo sde): s tan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
146b5(mdo sde): ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'dis chos bshad par gsol ba btab bo/ /ring du gshegs shing myur ba'i rgyun dang ldan/ /zad
146b6(mdo sde): pa lhur mdzad mi g.yo 'od gsal ba/ /rtogs pa thams cad skyed par mdzad pa po/ /khyod gsung rab zhi rgyu skar tshul mkhyen mkhas/ /dbugs rdub pa dang
146b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba dran pa mkhyen/ /tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag dang ldan/ /srid pa gsum po ji ltar dag 'gyur bar/ /sems can 'gro ba spong bar mdzad pa po/ /tshul
147a1(mdo sde): gcig ldan pa nyid kyi mkhyen mnga' ba/ /lha mi rnam pa mang po khri dag kyang / /so ma nyi rgal mdzad dge brnyes chu bo rgal/ /bde
147a2(mdo sde): 'gro'i mkhyen pa myur dang ldan pa po/ /byang chub spyod dang sangs rgyas chos mngon sum/ /sems g.yo sems can kha cig 'dod klung lhung / /mun pas khebs
147a3(mdo sde): shing mig dang mi ldan pa'i/ /sdug bsngal thams cad bcom par gyur lags pa/ /mthos dge bral slob dpon mkhas ldan pa'i/ /skye bo bral la mi
147a4(mdo sde): dbang thugs rje skyed/ /mnyam pa'i chos nyan skye ba'i pha rol mchi/ /srid pa gcod pa bshad par mdzad du gsol/ /skye rlung pha rol gshegs thub thugs
147a5(mdo sde): rjes gsungs/ /blo 'chal skye mang sred pa'i dra ba'i lam/ /de dag thams cad nyon mongs rtsa ba can/ /der ni sems can 'khyams 'gyur gcad du gsol//
147a6(mdo sde): gang du sdug bsngal rab zhi dbang drug dang / /yid kyang zhi 'gyur sred skyon rgyal ba gsungs/ /sred pa bral ba sred rgyu mi mnga' ba/ /sems can gdung ba dpal
147a7(mdo sde): kun bral gyur pa/ /de slad thub pa thugs brtse ba yi rgyus/ /sred pa yi ni chu klung skem mdzad pa/ /myur du bde zhing 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i/ /chos kyang sred pa
147b1(mdo sde): gcod pa bshad par gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa pad+ma 'bar ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang dag sngon chad pha rol
147b2(mdo sde): phyin| |spyod pa spyad cing spyod 'gyur ba/ /de dag nyan thos chos rnams la/ /nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas chos las nyams 'gyur ba'i/ /ltung ba
147b3(mdo sde): gnyis pa gzhan med de/ /de ni yang dang yang du yang / /gnyi gar sems ni 'jug pa yin/ /khro dang nyan thos chos rnams dang / /rkyen gyi byang chub 'jug pa yin/
147b4(mdo sde): chos gsum rnam par spangs pas na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /skye gnas bzhi ldan sems can 'di/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir lhags pa
147b5(mdo sde): dang / /thams cad 'dod pa rten mi byed/ /thams cad mi sdug thob pa yin/ /'di na sems can mkhas pa gang / /byang chub mchog gi phyir zhugs shing / /gang blo gzungs dang bzod pa la/ /
147b6(mdo sde): brtson zhing legs par goms byas la/ /dbang po drug gi sgo bsdams shing / /skyil mo krung gis dran bzhag nas/ /rang gi spyod yul sa non pa/ /phyi ma'i dus
147b7(mdo sde): kyi de bzhin gshegs/ /nor bdun rab tu rdzogs pa'ang yin/ /'dir ni mi sdug tshul bshad na/ /kun gzhi gang yin sems can gyi/ /'ching ba brtan pa 'dir
148a1(mdo sde): bshad 'gyur/ /ngas ni chos kyi ser sna spangs/ /sems can srung phyir ma bshad de/ /'di la byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang
148a2(mdo sde): chub phyir sems 'dir ma btang / /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ /chos 'di yun ring gnas bya zhes/ /sa 'di yongs su spyad mdzad cing / /sa
148a3(mdo sde): 'di byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /de bzhin du ni khyod kyis kyang / /zhing 'di la ni rtse bar byos/ /de bzhin bzod pa dag gis rtses/ /bsdams nas yun
148a4(mdo sde): ring gnas par byos/ /nyan thos theg pa ngas bshad de/ /sems can chags las thar bya zhing / /phung po dag dang khams rnams dang / /skye mched
148a5(mdo sde): stong pa ngas bshad de/ /zhi gnas rnam pa bcu gsum dang / /lhag mthong nga yis bshad bya ste/ /'dod pa'i 'ching bas dam bcings pa'i/ /sems
148a6(mdo sde): can de yis rnam dag 'gyur/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse bas/ /nyan thos rnams kyi bden pa bzhi/ /chos rnams rtag tu yun gnas dang / /zag
148a7(mdo sde): pa med phyir ngas bshad do/ /nyan thos bden pas 'dul ba ni/ /srid pa'i mtsho las ngas bsgral lo/ /byang chub spyod pa thams cad kyang / /phyi nas khyed
148b1(mdo sde): la bstan par bya'o/ /de nas de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da
148b2(mdo sde): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ nyan thos kyi gtam yang dag par rab tu ston par mdzad kyi/ theg pa chen po'i gtam ni/ mi mdzad do snyam mo/ /de nas
148b3(mdo sde): de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa yongs su
148b4(mdo sde): spyad pa'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dkon mchog gsum gyi
148b5(mdo sde): gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / sprin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
148b6(mdo sde): dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ma dad pa rnams mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir dang / dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar
148b7(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can chos la mngon par brtson pa dag dang / chos la gnas pa dag dang / yon tan gyis phyug pa dag dang / tshul khrims kyi dri dang yang
149a1(mdo sde): dag par ldan pa rnams bde ba la reg pa dang / rnam par mtho 'tsham pa med par bya ba'i phyir dang / byad grol gyi bde ba

149a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan thams cad kyang bsgo ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur par bya ba'i phyir
149a4(mdo sde): bdag cag nang du yang dag par 'jog par bzhed pas ma la bdag cag gis nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste / bdag cag thams cad kyis sa'i steng du skyil mo krung gis 'khod par bya zhing /
149a5(mdo sde): rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i bzod pa
149a6(mdo sde): dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnal 'byor dag gis gnas pa dag tu bya gor ma chag go snyam mo/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba dag dang / gang dag sa bcu dag dang / gang dag mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la gnas pa'i bar dag
149b1(mdo sde): dang / gang dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa dag gi bar
149b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad sa steng 'dir skyil mo krung gis 'khod par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rang rang gi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyi bzod pa dang / gzungs
149b3(mdo sde): dang / ting nge 'dzin dag la mnyam par bzhag pa dag tu gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe bsod nams kyi stobs ji lta ba bzhin du rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu'i stobs kyis byang
149b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mnyam par gzhog pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan byed pa de dag las
149b5(mdo sde): kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ mar me'i 'od lta bu'o/ /kha cig gi ni/ skar mda' dang mnyam pa dag go /kha cig gi ni/ brgya
149b6(mdo sde): byin dang mnyam pa dag go / kha cig gi ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang mnyam pa nas kha cig gi ni/ zla ba dang mnyam pa'i bar dag go /kha cig gi

150a3(mdo sde): snang ba chen po rgya che ba de lta bus 'jig rten khyab par gyur to/ /de dag gi lus las mchog tu sems can gzhan dag gi lus dang sems kyi bde
150a4(mdo sde): ba la reg pa dang / dga' ba dang / rab tu tshim par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed
150a5(mdo sde): pa| lus kyi gnas ngan len thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bkres pa dang skom pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu zhi
150a6(mdo sde): bar byed pa/ /khro ba thams cad dang / 'jig pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'ching ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'od byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi
150a7(mdo sde): zhing 'di srid pa gsum gyi btson ra'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa thams cad kyi bar rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sems can thams cad
150b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la 'bab pa dag dang / chos la 'bab pa dag dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan la dga' pa la mkhas pa dag 'khod par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
150b2(mdo sde): zhing 'di phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dang / stong pa ma yin pa dag dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa ma yin
150b3(mdo sde): pa dag na kun nas lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger yang dag bar snang ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan mo mun pa byung ba na zla ba dang / nyi ma brgya stong shar nas lham
150b4(mdo sde): me| lhan ne/ lhang nge ba bzhin te/ de ltar de'i tshe mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang phyogs bcu'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa

152a3(mdo sde): 'jug par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bzhugs khang dag gam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dag gam/ chos kyi bzhugs khang dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /

152b6(mdo sde): lta ste| chos go sa dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis byed par 'gyur ba'am/ byed du 'jug
152b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / 'chags dang / dgon pa'i gnas de dag tu'ang bkur stir byas te chos nyan pa dang / rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i
153a1(mdo sde): gtam byed pa dag tu 'gyur ba'am/ glegs bam dag klog par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / 'chag sa la sogs pa
153a2(mdo sde): de dag tu'ang yongs su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ zhing gi gzhi'am/ khyim gyi gzhi'am/ kun dga'i
153a3(mdo sde): ra ba'i gzhi'am/ bran dang / bran mo dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / phyugs gzhan dag dang /
153a4(mdo sde): snod spyad kyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag der yongs su gtong bar 'gyur zhing / nga'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi gnas pa rnams longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir
153a5(mdo sde): mal cha dang stan gyi yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sems kyi rgyan gyi don dang / sems kyi yo byad kyi don dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi don dang / byang
153a6(mdo sde): grol gyi bde ba don gyi mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir bsngo ba dag tu byed do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir yongs
153a7(mdo sde): su gtong ba rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su gtong bar byed do/ /de bzhin du sems can de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag
153b1(mdo sde): thams cad la ci nas kyang sems can de dag 'bras bu chen por 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad do/ /bzhes par mdzad do/ /sems
153b2(mdo sde): c an log par ltung ba'i chos can ma yin pa ngan 'gor gsum rnam par spangs pa de dag thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum gyis phyir mi
153b3(mdo sde): ldog pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /sems can bdag yun ji srid du 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de srid du'ang longs spyod gnyis po chos kyi longs spyod dang zang
153b4(mdo sde): zing gi longs spyod dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /ri dang / nags khrod dang / shing ljon pa chen po dang / dgon pa dang / nags 'dabs gang du'ang rung
153b5(mdo sde): ste| da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na thar pa don du gnyer ba chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma sgra
153b6(mdo sde): bskyungs pa dag dang / bcom bskyungs pa dag dang / nang du yang dag 'jog gi tshul dang bcas pa dag dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang 'tsham pa
153b7(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag kyang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag gdul ba'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyi mthu la
154a1(mdo sde): ltos shig / bdud thams cad kyi yul dang / klu thams cad kyi yul zil gyis mnan nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs
154a2(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyis chos kyi tshul ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir sngon yang mi
154a3(mdo sde): mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su spyod pa mdzad de/ da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa dpag tu med pa gang dag
154a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir zhu ba dang / zhal blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang /
154a5(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / nam mkha'i mig dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa/ chos kyis gnas pa rnams
154a6(mdo sde): k yi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang nga la snying nye ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul
154a7(mdo sde): ring du gnas par bya ba'i don dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i don du bsam gtan gyi yul gyis sa steng du 'khod nas bdud thams
154b1(mdo sde): cad kyi yul tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang / 'khor bas skrag pa sbyin pa la mngon par brtson pa'i sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
154b2(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa dag tu byed do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa 'di dang / dam pa'i chos sam/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yun ji srid
154b3(mdo sde): gnas par chos kyis gnas pa'i dge slong rnams la khyim dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo'i bar gang su dag gis de ltar bsngos
154b4(mdo sde): pa de la sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong tshul khrims 'chal ba gang dag tha na 'dab ma gcig dang / 'bras bu gcig dang / me tog gcig cig yongs su
154b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dag tu byed na/ de ni/ mi blun po de la don ma yin pa dang / phan pa ma yin par 'gyur te/ de la gnod pa bzhi'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang
154b6(mdo sde): zhe na| phyogs thams cad du mi snyan pa chen po 'gro ba yin/ mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang /
154b7(mdo sde): rim gro ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dag dang myur du 'bral bar 'gyur ba yin/ nad tshabs chen po yun ring ba dag gis thebs par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i chos gos
155a1(mdo sde): dang lhung bzed gang yod pa'ang 'jigs pa chen po lngas 'phrog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /lnga gang dag gis she na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po dang / chom
155a2(mdo sde): rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba dang lnga po de dag gis so/ /de'i 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'dod pa ma yin pa'i 'bras bu bzhi myur du 'grub
155a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba yin te/ bzhi gang dag yin zhe na/ lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba chen po mi bzad par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de gal te brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring
155a4(mdo sde): zhig 'das nas sems can dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa ro skam gyi nang du dud 'gor dang / yi dwags kyi ris su long ba dang rkang lag med pa dag tu skye
155a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur zhing / de lo brgya stong mang po dag tu bkres pa dang / skom pas yongs su gdung ba chen po'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin/ gal te
155a6(mdo sde): brgya la res 'ga' zhig dus ring zhig 'das nas de dag shi 'phos nas lo brgya stong mang po dag tu sprul gdug pa long ba rdul za ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ de brgya la res 'ga' zhig de nas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams kyi nang du skyes na/
155a7(mdo sde): 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tu mi nyid thob
155b1(mdo sde): pa rnyed par 'gyur zhing / mongs rtul ba dang / tshul du mi shes par 'gyur ba dang / mig ma tshang ba dang / lag pa ma tshangs ba dang / rkang pa ma tshang ba dang / khyi'i longs
155b2(mdo sde): spyod kyi kha zas la gdu zhing skyag khungs sa'i kha zas za ba dang / 'dam rdzab dang / phyag dar khrod na nyal ba dang / 'brog dang / dgon pa dang / lam po che rnams
155b3(mdo sde): na 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang yang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu 'dod pa ma yin pa
155b4(mdo sde): de ltar lci ba 'byung zhe na/ 'di ltar sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de ni/ 'di ltar chos kyis gnas pa rnams la khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / bran
155b5(mdo sde): dang | bran mo dang / phyugs dag gi bar bsngos pa dag 'phrog nas gang zag rang gi yongs su longs spyod pas longs spyod par byed pa'i phyir te/ sdig pa spyod
155b6(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong de lta bu de ni/ de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul med par bya ba dang / rnam
155b7(mdo sde): par gzhig pa dang / rgyun gcad pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung med par bya ba nas nub par bya ba'i
156a1(mdo sde): bar du brtson pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i phyogs ni/ tshogs dang ldan pa yin la/ chos kyi tshul dang
156a2(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang dge ba'i phyogs kyis rab tu phye ba yin te/ de'i phyir de nyid kyi mi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa lci ba mngon
156a3(mdo sde): par 'grub pa yin no/ /de nas gnas brtan ga ya 'od srung gis mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi nyid
156a4(mdo sde): rnyed pa ni/ ma thob kyang mi bsngo'i/ /rab tu byung nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i slad du log par sgrub pa ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
156a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ ga ya 'od srung chen po/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gang du de'i sngon gyi las rnams zad pa dag tu 'gyur ba'i sems
156a6(mdo sde): can dmyal bar gnas pa ni/ bla'i/ 'di na gang gzhan du spyod pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /'on kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig mi nyid thob pa rnyed par dka' ba
156a7(mdo sde): rnyed de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang la sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa dang / zag pa thams cad mthar thug par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar rmad du
156b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i rab tu byung ba rnyed par dka' ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob nas 'od kyang skyes bu blun po de dag gang gis mchod par mi 'gyur
156b2(mdo sde): ba dang | bza' btung dang bral bar 'gyur ba mi dge ba'i phyogs rnal 'byor yid la byed pa yongs su bsam nas rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs
156b3(mdo sde): dang | dmangs rigs dad pa can dag gis khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo nas rkang bzhi pa dag gi

160b6(mdo sde): byed pa yin no/ /de de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'brog dgon pa chen por brdzus te skye ba sha nar nar po chen po ri dang mnyam pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhi kun
160b7(mdo sde): tu'ang rlung kun tu tsha ba dag gis kun tu sreg par byed do/ /der yang phyogs bzhi nas ri dwags dang bya dag lhags te yongs su za ba dag tu byed do/ /de brgya la res
161a1(mdo sde): 'ga' dus ring zhig 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas yang sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang shi

161a3(mdo sde): mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skyes na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu mig ma tshang ba dang / tshul du mi shes par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /
161a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po/ gang chos kyis gnas pa dag la bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de'i log par sgrub
161a5(mdo sde): pa de ni| de lta bu yin no/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ skyes bu gang zag de lta bu
161a6(mdo sde): ni| sems can dmyal ba na gnas par mi bsngo lags kyi/ gang gis mi nyid rnyed pa thob nas bsod nams ma lags pa chen po de lta bu kun tu spyod par
161a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rgyal rigs
161b1(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa khyed cag gi lag tu gang zag yongs su gtad kyi/ srungs shig /yongs su srungs shig /rab tu byung ba'am/ khyim na gnas pa gang dge slong
161b2(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa de la khyed kyis ci nas kyang chos dang mthun
161b3(mdo sde): pas chad pas gcad par bya'o/ /rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te gang dag dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs
161b4(mdo sde): spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad 'phrog par byed pa'i khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba de dag ci nas chos dang mthun pas chad pas gcod par mi bgyid
161b5(mdo sde): cing / de la rgyal po btang snyoms par gnas par bgyid lags na/ rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan
161b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba dag dang bcas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams
161b7(mdo sde): ji snyed yod pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can gcig cig ldan par gyur na/ sems can de nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad las ches khyad
162a1(mdo sde): par du 'phags pa dang / ches bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin nam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
162a2(mdo sde): de de ltar lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sems can de ches khyad par du 'phags pa lags te/ de gang la sems can 'tsho ba kun gyi nang na nyan thos dang / rang
162a3(mdo sde): rgyal ba thams cad las ches bsod nams dang ldan pa ni/ skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'byung bar bas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
162a4(mdo sde): gal te sems can snga ma de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ de la gang
162a5(mdo sde): sems can 'tsho ba thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par byed cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag
162a6(mdo sde): rnam par gcod par byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de bsod nams ma yin pa sdig pa'i las
162a7(mdo sde): ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchi ma dag phyung nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
162b1(mdo sde): po| lan thob cig / lan thob cig /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po shum zhes ngu bzhin du gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang sems can bsod nams
162b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa de lta bu gcig gi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dag rnam par gcod par bgyid
162b3(mdo sde): pa'i skyes bu de'ang bsod nams ma lags pa sdig pa'i las grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis/ dpe ma mchis pa bskyed par 'gyur ba lags na/ gang
162b4(mdo sde): de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dag rnam par gcod par bgyid cing / mig 'byin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lag pa dang /
162b5(mdo sde): rkang pa dag rnam par gcod pa lta ci smos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa 'tsho
162b6(mdo sde): ba'am| yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'ang rung ste/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos zad par 'gyur ba'i bar du khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba gang chos kyis
162b7(mdo sde): gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / nor gyi yo byad dang / zhing gi gzhi dang / khyim gyi gzhi dang /
163a1(mdo sde): kun dga'i ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal
163a2(mdo sde): cha dang / stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag yod pa de las 'phrog gam rku ba de la rgyal rigs btang snyoms par byed cing / rab tu byung ba dang / khyim
163a3(mdo sde): na gnas pa rkun ma de dag chad pa ci yod pa bzhin chad pas gcod du mi 'jug na/ rgyal rigs de bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du skyed do/ /rgyal rigs ji lta ba
163a4(mdo sde): bzhin grong gi blar bskos pa dang / grong khyer gyi bla dang / grong rdal gyi bla dang / ljongs kyi blar bskos pa'ang de bzhin du btang snyoms par byed cing / de ltar rku ba'i sems
163a5(mdo sde): can da dag zlog par mi byed na/ de lta bu'i grong gi bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar de bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches mang du skyed do/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can
163a6(mdo sde): snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po nyid ni/ shin tu lci ba lags so/ /rgyal rigs ni/ bag ma mchis pa mang po dang ldan
163a7(mdo sde): par gnas pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang rgyal po bag ma mchis par gnas shing / gang zag chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu dag srung bar
163b1(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las zlog par bgyid pa dang / grong gi
163b2(mdo sde): bla nas ljongs kyi bla'i bar yang de bzhin du de ltar bsngos pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dag rku ba'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog
163b3(mdo sde): par bgyid na/ de bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gal te ngas sngar
163b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa bzhin bsod nams kyi phung po de lta bu dang sems can thams cad ldan pa dag tu gyur la/ thams cad kyang btson rar bcug cing bkres pa dang skom
163b5(mdo sde): pa dag gis gzir bar gyur la/ de la gang sems can thams cad de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dag btson ra de nas yongs su thar par byed cing / lo brgya
163b6(mdo sde): tshang bar yang sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang /yo byad dag gis
163b7(mdo sde): rim gro byed pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur
164a1(mdo sde): ram| gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mang lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa/ skyes bu de ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po
164a2(mdo sde): grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa bskyed lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bas kyang gang da ltar nas ma 'ongs
164a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar la chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug pa dag la de ltar bsngos pa 'phrog pa'i sems can rnams sdig pa'i las de las slar zlog

164a5(mdo sde): dge slong chos kyis gnas pa gcig cig gi ma bsrungs na/ de bsod nams ma lags pa de snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags na/ gang yang gcig gi srung bar
164a6(mdo sde): bgyid pa de bsod nams de snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ gang zag gcig gi len pa ngas ma
164a7(mdo sde): gnang ngo / /gnyis las ma yin/ gsum gyi ma yin/ bzhi'i ma yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po/ phyogs bzhi'i dag 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang gcig dang / dgon
164b1(mdo sde): pa'i gnas gcig tu ye nyung na'ang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa lnga'i len par gnas gnang ste/ gaN+Di brdungs nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong glo bur du lhags pa dag lhan cig tu
164b2(mdo sde): longs spyod pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / gnas khang dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag longs spyod par ngas gnang

164b4(mdo sde): pa dag dang lhan cig tu sman gyi yo byad kyi bar dag la longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo / /ma chags pa dag dang / ma bcings pa dag dang / ma chums pa dag dang / nam gyi cha stod dang /
164b5(mdo sde): nam gyi cha smad dag la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa dag dang / 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dag dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la nang du phyogs pa dag dang / gzhan
164b6(mdo sde): la mi smod pa dag dang / bdag la mi bstod pa dag dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyod pa dang / rab tu dben pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag dang / mnyam
164b7(mdo sde): par bzhag pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dag gis longs spyod par ngas gnang ngo / /rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag gnas te/ rgyal
165a1(mdo sde): po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na sems can de lta bu dag la sems can rnams kyis longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa yongs su btang bas
165a2(mdo sde): bsod nams tshad med pa skyed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas gang na dge slong lnga'am/ lhag par gnas kyang rung ste/ tshul khrims dang
165a3(mdo sde): ldan pa dag dang / tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / kha na ma tho ba phra mo dag la'ang 'jigs par lta ba dag gnas par byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs
165a4(mdo sde): pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde de dag kyang ston par byed/ kha ton du byed la/ gzhan la mi smod cing bdag la mi bstod pa/ phrag dog dang ser sna rnam par spangs pa /
165a5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba/ thar pa la mngon par brtson pa dag gnas la/ gaN+Di brdungs nas longs spyod par byed na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun de lta bu las
165a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams bsod nams tshad med pa de lta bu 'dzin pa dag tu byed do/ /rgyal po chen po/ ye nyung ste dge slong gi dge 'dun lnga'i tshogs shig yod du zin kyang gal
165a7(mdo sde): te yang tshul khrims yongs su dag cing ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho ba la 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i
165b1(mdo sde): yon tan dang 'phags pa'i rigs la mngon par brtson pa yin na/ rgyal po chen po/ de ni/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rgya mtsho dang 'dra bar gsungs shing / de ni/ mi dpag tu med pa dag la
165b2(mdo sde): phan pa byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu rnam par thar par byed pa yin par gsungs na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun bcu'i tshogs
165b3(mdo sde): dang zhes bya ba nas brgya stong gi tshogs zhes bya ba'i bar dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gang la bram ze dang khyim bdag chen po dad pa can dag
165b4(mdo sde): rim gro bya ba'i phyir gaN+Di rdung ba dag tu byed cing / der yang gal te dge sbyong ltar bcos pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong nyung mang rung / mang yang rung ba dag kyang 'du la/ der gal te dge
165b5(mdo sde): slong chos kyis gnas pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa dge slong lnga'ang 'du na/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gi dge 'dun de ni/
165b6(mdo sde): chos tshad med pa dang ldan pa yin zhing sbyin gnas chen po dang / lha dang mi thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ dge slong chos kyis gnas
165b7(mdo sde): pa dag dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dag khyed kyi lag tu ngas yongs su gtad do/ /khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba la las de dag la rkyen gang yang rung ba dag gis gtses

166a2(mdo sde): gnyis pa/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci dge slong sdig pa spyod pa tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams kyis dge 'dun

166b2(mdo sde): spyod par khas 'che ba'i gang zag de lta bu ni/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gnod pa yin te/ de ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma

167a5(mdo sde): chags pa yin/ lam ngan par zhugs pa yin/ khengs pa yin/ kha drag pa yin/ 'phral g.yar can yin/ 'phyar po yin/ kha shing can yin/ g.yo sgyu can yin/
167a6(mdo sde): sgyu byed pa yin/ dge sbyong yon po yin/ dge sbyong g.yo can yin/ dge slong snye long lta bu yin/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mi mthun par 'dod par smra ba yin /

167b6(mdo sde): btang ba/ snying rje'i bsam pa med pa/ phyis khung chen po dang 'dra ba/ bdud kyi lam du zhugs pa/ lha dang mi rnams la gnod pa byed pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi drang srong thub pa rnams

168a1(mdo sde): par byed pa/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la mtho 'tsham par byed ba/ dge 'dun mthun bar byed pa'i rgyun gcod par byed pa ni/ de lta ma yin no/ /sdig pa can
168a2(mdo sde): gyi dge slong de ni/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i rkyen gyis mtho ris kyi lam las rgyal po ldog par byed pa yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /
168a3(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo ldog par byed pa yin no/ /ngan song gi lam gsum la rab tu gzhog par byed pa yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ sdig pa can gyi dge slong
168a4(mdo sde): de yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lha dang mi ji snyed cig mi skyid par byed par 'gyur pa la ltos/ rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i dge

168a7(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag gis byams pa dang ldan zhing chos dang mthun pas dran par bya ste/ gal te sdig pa can gyi dge slong de gnas de nas 'gro ba lta na/ de ltar ni/ legs/ gal te
168b1(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi byed na/ der dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag dong la grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / grong dang / ljongs dang / ri 'or de dag na rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs
168b2(mdo sde): sam| dmang rigs gang dbang byed du 'jug pa de la sbran par bya'o/ /gal te rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs des sdig pa can gyi dge slong
168b3(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin dang bcas pa gnas de nas zlog par byed na/ der ni/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis gnas par bya'o/ /ci ste rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang /
168b4(mdo sde): rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs de bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i rgyus sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs byed pa lta na/ de'i phyir dge slong
168b5(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa de dag gis khro ba bstan par mi bya'o/ /chags pa ma yin/ nga rgyal ma yin te/ 'on kyang cang mi smra bar gnas de nas 'gro bar bya zhing dgon pa'i gnas sam/
168b6(mdo sde): nags khrod dam/ ri'am/ ri po'i 'or gzhan gang na sgra gcom chung ba dang / nang du yang dag 'jog dang 'tsham pa'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang mthun pa der gnas
168b7(mdo sde): par bya'o/ /yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rnyed pa'i
169a1(mdo sde): slad du sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs bgyid cing / dge slong chos kyis gnas pa/ yon tan gyis phyug po
169a2(mdo sde): rnams kyang gnas nas mchi bar 'gyur pa'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ni/ nyams pa lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar
169a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa/ mchog tu nyams pa lags so/ /de'i mi nyid rnyed pa ni/ rnyed par dka' ba lags te/ 'khor ba na 'khor bar bgyid pa de'i mi nyid rnyed pa'i tha ma ni/
169a4(mdo sde): de lags so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten du 'byung bar
169a5(mdo sde): 'gyur bas kyang gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi tshig gus par mi nyan pa'i sems can de ni/ ngan song rnams las yongs su thar bar bgyi ba 'am /
169a6(mdo sde): mtho ris su gzhag par mi spyod de/ de ni/ sdig pa'i las de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/
169a7(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na la lar gang dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la shin tu dag pa'i rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dag
169b1(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gi don du dgon pa'i gnas dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa'i gnas der yang khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang / bran
169b2(mdo sde): dang / bran mo dang / kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag gi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i phyir yongs su gtong ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang rgyal
169b3(mdo sde): rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
169b4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ba nas ring por mi thogs par sbyin pa po dang / spyin bdag de
169b5(mdo sde): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur te/ de dag ni/ nga'i bstan pa la dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams
169b6(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba yin no/ /rgyal po chen po/ 'di lta ste/ gang khyod kyi bu'am/ spun nam/ bkrabs pa'am/ sna chen po la gtogs pa gang yang
169b7(mdo sde): rung ba zhig nyes pa dang bcas pa yin na/ gang dang gang du rgyal po chen po'i dus ston nam/ dga' ston byung ba der rgyal po chen pos dga' ba dang bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs nyam
170a1(mdo sde): su myong bar byed na/ rgyal po chen po/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de khyod kyi mdun du 'dug cing skyed pa dang rtse ba myong bar byed pa'am/ dga' ba dang bde ba
170a2(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas par byed nus sam/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags te/ skyes bu des bdag gi mdun na mchis par yang rngo mi thogs
170a3(mdo sde): lags na/ skyid pa dang rtse ba myong bar bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin du gang zag gang zhig gang zag gir bran dang bran
170a4(mdo sde): mo srel bar byed cing khyim gyi gzhi nas zhing gi gzhi dang / lug dag gi bar srel bar byed na/ nga'ang de'i ston pa ma yin la/ de'ang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/ /dus gsum du gshegs
170a5(mdo sde): pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la'ang gnod par byed pa dang bcas pa yin no/ /de ni/ chos kyi gnas pa rnams kyi gnas de ltar bsngos pa dag tu chos dang
170a6(mdo sde): mthun pas gnas par 'os pa ma yin no/ /rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang yang sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa de'i
170a7(mdo sde): don byed pa dang / de nas 'gror mi ster ba'i rgyal rigs nas dmangs rigs kyi bar de ni/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la'ang gnod pa
170b1(mdo sde): byed pa dang bcas pa chen po yin no/ /sbyin pa mang po sbyin par byed du zin kyang 'on kyang de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye bar
170b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ bdag la phan par yang dag par rjes su lta bas sdig pa can gyi dge slong yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'i phyogs su gnas par
170b3(mdo sde): mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni/ lha dang mi thams cad la'ang gnod pa dang / phan pa ma yin pa dang / log par ltung bar bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum
170b4(mdo sde): gyi gdung med par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'am/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang zhig dge slong
170b5(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi chos kyi phyogs la yang dag par gnas par byed cing sdig pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyi phyogs la ma yin na/ de sbyin pa mi sbyin du zin kyang
170b6(mdo sde): 'on kyang de ni/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyu'i phyir dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sbyin bdag dam pa yin no/ /de ni/ dam pa'i chos rjes su srung
170b7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dam pa yin par blta bar bya'o/ /'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba nas ring po mi thogs par bla na med
171a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po/ de lta bas na/ rgyal rigs
171a2(mdo sde): 'tsham pa khyod kyi lag tu chos kyis gnas pa dang / bstan pa ngas yongs su gtad kyi/ lnga brgya pa tha ma la gnas pa'i bar du khyed kyis nga'i chos kyis
171a3(mdo sde): gnas pa yang dag par zungs shig dang / de'i rkyen gyis nga'i chos kyi tshul 'di dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yun ring du gnas par 'gyur
171a4(mdo sde): zhing lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
171a5(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ zhal ta ba zhes bgyi lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam gyis na/ zhal ta bar gdags pas gdags
171a6(mdo sde): par mdzad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ dge slong gnyis zhal ta bar ngas gnang ngo / /gnyis gang
171a7(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ gang yang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sgom pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / gang yang dge slong slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa yin te/ rgyal po
171b1(mdo sde): chen po| dge slong 'di gnyis zhal ta ba'i las byed par ngas gnang ngo / /'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ le'u bcu gcig pa ste nyi
171b2(mdo sde): ma'i snying po'i le'u las dam pa'i chos srung ba'i 'dus pa dang po rdzogs so/ / //gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying
171b3(mdo sde): p o dang thabs cig tu dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams kun tu srung pa'i gtam yang yang dag par rtsom pa mdzad pa de'i tshe de'i dus na shar phyogs

171b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam+pa ka'i mdog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs
171b6(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog de'i 'khor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po
171b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos gyen du rnam par bltas pa dang /
172a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa'
172a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas gang du byang
172a3(mdo sde): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'dong ba nub phyogs su bltas nas kyang de nas snang ba chen po mthong nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas tsam+pa ka'i mdog
172a4(mdo sde): ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems
172a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa shar phyogs nas chas shing nub phyogs su mchi ba dag bdag gis mthong lags

172a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
172b1(mdo sde): tshad med pa gang+gA'i klung gi be ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
172b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ chos kyi tshul dang dkon mchog gsum gyi
172b3(mdo sde): gdung yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir 'dus pa chen po la theg pa gsum rnam par gtan
172b4(mdo sde): la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston par mdzad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir
172b5(mdo sde): dang / stobs dang mi ldan par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgred par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par mdzad
172b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'du ba mdzad de/ der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
172b7(mdo sde): longs spyad par mdzad nas slar gshegs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
173a1(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan

173a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos dam pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pa la ngoms pa med do/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba
173a4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa nyid dang / bdud kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi
173a5(mdo sde): le'u dang / sems can gyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed nas de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
173a6(mdo sde): k yi zhing thams cad na pha rol tu phyin pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba nas sangs rgyas
173a7(mdo sde): k yi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i bar 'khod pa de dag thams cad
173b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir zhugs par gyur cing / 'dir 'khod nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs dang bsam gtan dag gis rnam par spyod
173b2(mdo sde): par gyur la/ des na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po shin tu skal ba dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan
