173b5(mdo sde): der 'khod nas rang rang gi ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i phyogs kyis bsam gtan dag byed de sgom pa de dag las kha cig gis lus las ni/ 'od
173b6(mdo sde): 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ 'bru mar gyi mar me bzhin no/ /kha cig gi lus las ni/ 'od 'di lta bu'i bar dag byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma
173b7(mdo sde): bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'od bzhin no/ /der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang du 'dus pa da ltar snang ba chen pos sangs rgyas kyi

175b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / ma rig pa thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba thams cad dang / mthar 'dzin pa'i lta ba thams cad dang /

176a3(mdo sde): yongs su shes par byed pa nas yid kyi dbang po thams cad kyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par byed pa/ phung po dang / khams

176b1(mdo sde): pa yin/ bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad kyi gter brtan pa yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la bdud dang
176b2(mdo sde): phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud thams cad kyi yul rnam par 'jig par byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ gzhan yang
176b3(mdo sde): bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed pa yin/ klu rnams pham par byed pa yin/ lha rnams
176b4(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa yin/ gnod sbyin rnams snying dga' bar byed pa yin/ lha ma yin rnams 'bros par byed pa yin/ nam mkha' lding rnams
176b5(mdo sde): dngang par byed pa yin/ mi'am ci rnams dad par byed pa yin/ lto 'phye chen po rnams skrag par byed pa yin/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul
176b6(mdo sde): bar byed pa yin/ rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dad par byed pa yin/ bram ze rnams 'jug par byed pa yin/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar
176b7(mdo sde): byed pa yin/ dmangs rigs rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin/ bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar byed pa yin/ mang du thos pa rnams skyo
177a1(mdo sde): bar byed pa yin/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa
177a2(mdo sde): yin| 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / dus ma yin
177a3(mdo sde): pa'i char dang / shwa dang / dus ma yin pa'i lhags pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i tsha ba dang / dngos po kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub po dang /
177a4(mdo sde): hrud hrud po dang / reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ sprug par byed pa/ mdangs sum 'gyur du rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/
177a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gsal bar byed pa yin/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par byed pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton
177a6(mdo sde): par byed pa yin/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa yin pa nas zad pa shes pa'i bar skyed par byed pa yin/ mi skye ba shes
177a7(mdo sde): pa rtogs par byed pa yin/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa yin/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin
177b1(mdo sde): no| |s+yAd ya the da na/ ba ye ba ya pa ri bA re/ bA he bA ha pa ri bA re/ pr-i tha be/ pr-i tha bA pa ri bA re/ A be a ba pa ri bA re/ te dze te dza pa ri bA re/
177b2(mdo sde): mA le mA la pa ri bA re/ kha ge kha ga pa ri bA re/ A lo ke A lo ka pa ri bA re/ s+thA me s+thA ma pa ri bA re/ ri dze ri dza pa ri bA re/ si li si la pa ri bA re/ ga
177b3(mdo sde): me ga ma pa ri bA re/ A bo pa a bo pa pa ri bA re/ mA la ma la ma/ la ma la ma/ rA la rA la ma/ bI dz+nyA na b+hu ta gra he/ b+hu ta gra hA pa ri bA re/ tsak+Shu gra
177b4(mdo sde): ha pa ri bA re/ sho tra gra he/ sho tra gra hA pa ri bA re/ g+h+rA Na gra he/ g+h+rA Na gra hA pa ri bA re/ dzi hwA gra he/ dzihwA gra hA pa ri bA re/ kA ya gra he/ kA ya gra hA pa ri bA
177b5(mdo sde): re/ ma na gra he/ ma na gra hA pa ri bA re/ spaR+sha gra he/ spaR+sha gra hA pa ri bA re/ be da nA gra he/ be da nA gra hA pa ri bA re/ tr-iSh+NA gra he/ tr-iSh+NA gra hA pa ri bA re/ u bA dA na
177b6(mdo sde): gra he/ u pa dA na gra hA pa ri bA re/ b+hA ba gra he/ b+hA ba gra hA pa ri bA re/ dzA ti gra he/ dzA ti gra hA ba ri bA re/ dza ra ma ra NA gra he/ dza ra ma ra Na gra hA pa ri bA re/ duH kha
177b7(mdo sde): san+ta pA na gra he/ duH kha san+ta pA na gra hA pa ri pA re/ A ra pA ra dwi dza gra he/ A ra pA ri dwi dza gra hA pa ri bA re/ a brta ba birta s+ya/ a ba ra mu ba ma sa s+ya/ be ga bi ni/
178a1(mdo sde): brti AR+ya ra smi saM be ga shAn+ta swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer
178a2(mdo sde): gyi le'u dang / sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs 'di la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa
178a3(mdo sde): bskur bar mdzad kyi/ longs la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song zhig /nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod
178a4(mdo sde): pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la/ de la 'di skad du/ shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad ma mchis pa
178a5(mdo sde): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gdung ba med pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin
178a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang bdag de nas 'dir bcom
178a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du btang ba lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung ngam/ khyod
178b1(mdo sde): kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa chung ngam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan pa
178b2(mdo sde): lags sam/ chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir
178b3(mdo sde): bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom ldan lags sam/ sangs rgyas gcig gi yul lags sam/ 'dir khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma mchis
178b4(mdo sde): par bskor bar mdzad lags sam/ gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa
178b5(mdo sde): ka'i mdog des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyi gnas pa klu rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u dang / sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur
178b6(mdo sde): ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa gnang ste/ de nas kyang bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
178b7(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags kun tu zad par bgyid pa
179a1(mdo sde): nas ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bar bgyid pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po'i khur 'dor bar

179a3(mdo sde): to| |btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa yon tan dang phan yon dang bcas pa bdag gis bzung lags na/ btsun pa bcom
179a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das las
179a5(mdo sde): bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du bzung lags te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems can rnams 'dod chags kyi shas che ba dmus
179a6(mdo sde): long dang 'dra bdag lags te/ de na bud med gzugs mi sdug pa dang / tshul du mi shes pa dang / mchog tu gzugs kyi rgyags pas dregs pa nas sems can
179a7(mdo sde): rnams bsam gtan la rab tu spyad pa bgyis pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba/ skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa chen po dag kyang lhag par bud med kyi dbang du
179b1(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so/ /bud med kyi nyes pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / ngan song ba dag dang / sems can
179b2(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i bar 'byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog des byang chub
179b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ bdag gi don du smra ba
179b4(mdo sde): ma yin zhing bdag la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don du smra ba yin zhing / khyod ni/ sems
179b5(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor na dge
179b6(mdo sde): bsnyen dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba snang ba gang yin pa de'ang su yin/ de ni/ khyod nyid ma yin nam/ de cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs
179b7(mdo sde): pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog nga'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med pa 'di'i bar du sems can yongs su smin
180a1(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir la lar kha cig tu ni/ tshangs pa'i lus byed du kun tu snang ngo / /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir kha cig tu ni/ dbang
180a2(mdo sde): phyug gi lus byad du kun tu snang ngo / /la lar ni/ dge sbyong gi lus byad dang / la lar ni/ brgya byin gyi lus byad dang / la lar ni/ lha'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ klu'i
180a3(mdo sde): dbang po'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ mi'am ci'i
180a4(mdo sde): dbang po'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ shes las skyes kyi dbang po'i lus byad dang / la lar ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lus byad dang / la lar ni/ nyan thos kyi lus byad

180a7(mdo sde): la lar ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i lus byad du kun tu snang ngo / /de lta mod kyi/ 'khor 'di na gang dag nga dang thabs cig lhan cig tu snyoms par 'jug pa mdzad
180b1(mdo sde): cing bzhengs par yang mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad khri yod do/ /'khor 'di na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig blo g.yo ba dag dang / blo rgyud
180b2(mdo sde): rnam par mi gnas pa dag kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po de la'ang blta
180b3(mdo sde): ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de las kyang 'dus pa chen po mnyan par mchog tu 'dod par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang nga kho na dang thabs
180b4(mdo sde): cig tu de nyid du 'dong bar 'dod de/ der de dag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgyus bslus par gyur na mi rung zhing der nga'i skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i byed pa 'gro bar gyur na mi
180b5(mdo sde): rung bas de dag gi don du ngas bshad do/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog gis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad cas bka' stsal
180b6(mdo sde): to| |rigs kyi bu/ ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig /skyes bu dam pa khyed la 'di lta ste/ gzungs sngags gang gis srid pa gsum gyi btson rar thams cad du mngon par
180b7(mdo sde): mi dga' ba'i 'du shes can dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par thar pa'i sgo la reg nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
181a1(mdo sde): pa dang / mgo mnyam du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba lus kyi tshor ba thams cad
181a2(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa/ lus kyi 'du shes thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ dul ba'i sa sgrub par byed pa/ rnam par grol ba sgrub par byed pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su gcod pa
181a3(mdo sde): sgrub par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi gegs zlog pa sgrub par byed pa/ byams pa chen po sgrub par byed pa/ snying rje chen po sgrub par byed pa/ shes rab rnam par grol
181a4(mdo sde): ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bdud bzhi dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba sgrub par byed pa/ zad pa shes pa dang mi skye ba shes pa sgrub par byed pa/ longs spyod dang /

181a6(mdo sde): sngags 'di sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srab mor byed do/ /'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang lha rnams kyi
181a7(mdo sde): nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing cher bas dran par yang 'gyur la der 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de rnams kyi nang du lha'i drang srong du 'gyur
181b1(mdo sde): zhing lha rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /de de nas shi 'phos nas mi rnams kyi nang du tshe rabs bdun 'khor bar byed cing 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis rjes su gos par yang
181b2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /'dir mi rnams kyi nang du mi'i drang srong du 'gyur zhing lha dang mi thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /gang la la 'dir nyi ma
181b3(mdo sde): snang ba'i gzungs sngags sems rtse gcig pas lan bdun gyi bar du nyan par byed na/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas lha rnams kyi nang du lan bdun gyi bar du drang srong mngon par shes
181b4(mdo sde): pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lha thams cad kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /de 'dir mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga
181b5(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os dang / mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /rigs
181b6(mdo sde): kyi bu/ gang la la lha rnams kyi nang du'ang lha'i 'dus pa rnams la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di lan bdun du rjod par byed la/ de dag kyang sems rtse gcig
181b7(mdo sde): pas nyan par byed na/ lha dang / lha mo de dag thams cad kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bsam gtan la mngon par
182a1(mdo sde): dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te la la 'dir rgyal po rnams sam/ rgyal rigs rnams sam/ bram ze rnams sam/ rje'u rigs rnams sam/
182a2(mdo sde): dmangs rigs rnams kyi rna khung du lan bdun du rjod par byed la/ gal te de dag kyang sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na/ de dag thams cad 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
182a3(mdo sde): po thams cad la mi lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ bud med gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma
182a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'di nyan par byed cing nyin zhag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par rnam par sems par byed dam/ lces kha ton du byed na/ de'i ris mthun pa la 'dod chags la
182a5(mdo sde): sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ de'i bud med thob pa'i tha ma yin no/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
182a6(mdo sde): mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de phyis kyang bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe bud med thob pa
182a7(mdo sde): rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la la gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'dis lan bdun du rtsi grang mo las byabs nas rnga bo che'am dung la byugs
182b1(mdo sde): nas rnga bo che de rdung bar byed dam/ dung 'bud par byed na/ gang dang gang du de dag gi sgra 'gro ba de dang der mi rnams la byad stems thams cad kyi rgyu med par 'gyur ro/ /der sman
182b2(mdo sde): gyi sbyor ba 'gro ba dang / pho nya dang / yig 'bru dang / yid la byed pa dang / lus 'gyur ba dang / tshul 'chos dang / 'ching ba dang / lus dang / snying gi kun tu gdung ba mthong bar
182b3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ /las sgrub pa med par 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/ /
182b4(mdo sde): tad+ya thA/ sid+d+ha mA te/ bi lo ka ma te/ e le ke te re She / rU tse sU rU tsi/ bud+d+he bi bud+d+he/ mahA bud+d+he/ un ma da un mad te/ pra ti She d+ha ne/ ra ga d+hu ra ga d+hu pa pra ti She d+ha ne bin+du /
182b5(mdo sde): bin+du ma te/ tsi Ta tsi Ta pra ti She d+ha ni/ arka tsand a d+he/ ha ta tsid ti ha ta ni rmi/ ha ta kA ma be ge /ha ta pau na b+ha bi ra dze/ ha ta tsak+Shu sa ma te/ ha ta pi ta ma bud+d+he/ ha ta yA gre/ ha ta bi
182b6(mdo sde): sa ma gre/ ha ta sa mu dra tsa be/ ha ta bi ta mA ra dze/ ha ta ti te/ ha ta d+harma tsa tsa te/ ha ta d+harma rA dze/ ha ta ba hu rA dze/ ha ta pa brdza ma ti/ ha ta g+ha ra sh+mi/ ha ta d+harma sid+d+hi/ ha ta sarba
182b7(mdo sde): u ba d+ha na dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ ri bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ sarba mArga dz+nyA dz+nyA/ e Sha an+ta saM sA ra duHkhe swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ 'dod pa'i chu bo thams cad kun tu skem par byed pa nges par 'byung
183a1(mdo sde): ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bzung nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig / khyod kyis 'dod pa'i bdud kyi mchil
183a2(mdo sde): ba thams cad dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / yul la brtson pa'i pha rol gnon pas pha rol gnon pa byed du zin kyang sus kyang khyod kyi lus sam sems la 'dod pa'i kun
183a3(mdo sde): tu sbyor ba dag gis gos par byed mi nus na/ gzungs sngags 'di ltar thos pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du song nas kyang sbyor ba byos shig /der gal te bdud
183a4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / sman gyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / chos kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / lha dang / mi gzhan dag gis 'dod pa'i dri nga
183a5(mdo sde): ba dag gis gos par bya ba lta ci smos/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
183a6(mdo sde): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang / lha dang / mi rnams ngo mtshar rnyed cing rmad du byung ba rnyed par gyur nas 'di skad
183a7(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gzigs pa dang / mnga' brnyes pa ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /mchog tu ngo mtshar lags te/
183b1(mdo sde): 'dod pas kun tu gdung ba rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags 'di ni/ bdag cag gis sngon ma thos lags so/ /de nas 'khor der lha'i bu mo dang / mi'i
183b2(mdo sde): bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bsnyen bkur byas nas gzungs sngags 'di thos par gyur to/ /thos ma thag tu de dag gi mo mtshan nub par gyur cing / pho mtshan byung bar gyur te
183b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog gis me tog tsam+pa ka'i phreng
183b4(mdo sde): ba bzhes te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rigs kyi bu/ me tog tsam+pa ka'i phreng ba 'di dang /
183b5(mdo sde): gzungs sngags nyi ma snang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba 'di dang / bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa de zungs shig /'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu sel bar byed pa 'di gnyis
183b6(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi sgo mo der khyer la nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes
183b7(mdo sde): kyang zhus la/ de la 'di skad du khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog zhu bar mdzad lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam /
184a1(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam/ khyod kyi 'khor gus par nyan lags sam/ chos 'tshal ba lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pa lags sam/ chos la brtson pa lags
184a2(mdo sde): sam| sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa de dag dang / chos kyi sgo la de bzhin gshegs pa des dad pa stsal te/ de nas 'dod pa glog gi 'od lta bu
184a3(mdo sde): sel bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi sgo'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams
184a4(mdo sde): cad zad par bgyid pa nas ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i bar bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa bskur lags so/ /zhes gsol
184a5(mdo sde): cig / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po gsum pa/ des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de
184a6(mdo sde): bzhin 'tshal lags so/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khris tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
184a7(mdo sde): thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po de la'ang blta ba'i slad du bdag cag kyang mchi bar mtshal te/ de bzhin
184b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa de las 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad na nyon mongs pa sel bar bgyid pa'i chos kyi sgo bdag cag gis mnyan par bgyid lags so/ /de nas de

184b5(mdo sde): n as de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nas chas te yud tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi
184b6(mdo sde): zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me

185a1(mdo sde): dong ngo / /dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ de'i bar
185a2(mdo sde): du'ang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun tu spyod par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe lho phyogs na grong khyer chu dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod pa/ bye
185a3(mdo sde): ma dag gis yongs su gang ba de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lngas snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de

190b7(mdo sde): dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bzod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur te/ des kyang de'i yan lag dang nying lag dag phyung
191a1(mdo sde): zhing bcad na'ang sems kyi skad cig gcig kyang khro ba bskyed par mi 'gyur zhing khro ba thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ /lha'i dbang po thams cad nas
191a2(mdo sde): m i'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du
191a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du skyes bu de mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di thos pa tsam gyi mod la gal te bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na/ myur
191a4(mdo sde): du 'phags pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ting nge
191a5(mdo sde): 'dzin gyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / bzod pa'i sgo de lta bu bye ba phrag brgya stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /dus thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par
191a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de lha'i dbang po thams cad nas mi'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar gyis bsam par 'gyur zhing dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa nas myur du bla na med pa
191a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang la la mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di
191b1(mdo sde): lan gcig tsam sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed na/ de la lhag par yang dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / nye bar rtog pa kun tu skyed par byed do/ /de las kyi sgrib pa dang / sems
191b2(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bgegs byed pa/ 'phangs pa/ so sor ma brten pa/ ma zad pa/ ma sbyangs pa gang+gA'i
191b3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyang ma lus par zad par 'gyur te/ de la 'bras bu 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong bar byed pa dang / 'phags
191b4(mdo sde): pa la skur ba 'debs par byed pa'i las rnams ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de gang gi tshe 'phags pa rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la goms par byed na/ de sangs rgyas
191b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal pa dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /dben
191b6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gis de la 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po legs par sbyangs par byas pa dang / shin tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i chos
191b7(mdo sde): de lta bu dag de'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de chos thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur zhing the tshom med pa dang / the tshom las brgal bar
192a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur ro/ /de lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha
192a2(mdo sde): ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang / mi'i dbang po thams cad kyis dad par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / dran par bya ba'i
192a3(mdo sde): 'os su gyur pa dang / mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / rab tu bsrung ba'i
192a4(mdo sde): 'os su gyur pa yin no/ /de phyi ma'i dus na 'chi ba'i tshe phyogs bcu kun tu goms pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom
192a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de dag kyang de la phyag rkyong bar mdzad cing de la 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par tshur shog / der gnas par byos shig /
192a6(mdo sde): der nged kyis rigs pas sa bcu la gzhag par mdzad do/ /zhes kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / 'phags pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa des 'chi ba'i
192a7(mdo sde): dus byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa stong pa ma yin pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de der yang sa bcu thob cing ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag
192b1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ de ltar phan yon che ba yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi
192b2(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad nas smad cing bor ba mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba'i
192b3(mdo sde): sems can gang mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di thos nas byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /
192b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phra ma mi byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / tshig kyal ba mi smra ba'i sems dang ldan pas lo bdun du gnas par byed cing rtag tu sangs
192b5(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par byed la/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyi ga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas
192b6(mdo sde): mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na/ lo bdun 'das nas de'i las drag po thams cad ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing
192b7(mdo sde): sbyangs par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu/ mi zad pa'i spubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/ /'dir dbang phyug la mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang
193a1(mdo sde): z hig mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di thos nas zla ba bdun du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs
193a2(mdo sde): t e thal mo sbyar nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa 'di dran par byed na bud med de ris mthun par dbang phyug chen po thob
193a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /phyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par 'khor bar bud med kyi dngos po thob par mi 'gyur
193a4(mdo sde): ro| |khyo mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba nas rigs mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / nor mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang
193a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar dang / mngal na bu yod pa'i khur gyis skyo ba'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bu mngon par 'dod pa'i bud med gang zhes bya ba'i bar de khrus byas
193a6(mdo sde): nas byi 'chor ba srung bar byed cing nyin lan gsum dben par/ mtshan lan gsum dben par pus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud
193a7(mdo sde): nas mdun du mngon du sangs rgyas yid la byed pas mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di dran par byed na/ bud med de bu ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'byung bar
193b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'ang rang gi smon lam ma gtogs par de'i bud med thob pa'i tha ma yin no/ /mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa
193b2(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don che ba/ de ltar phan yon che ba ste/ khyed kyis sngon ma thos pa yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ sha ra Na bya ya/ shik+Sha bya ya/ smr-i ti bya ya/ brah+ma ni bya ya/ r-id+d+hi bya ya/
193b3(mdo sde): in+d+ri bya ya/ ba la bya ya/ bo d+h+yang+ga bya ya/ sa mA d+hi bya ya/ d+hA ra NI bya ya/ k+Shan+ti bya ya/ d+h+yA na bya ya/ a rU pa bya ya/ a ni na dza bya ya/ mA rga bya ya/ a bi dz+nyA bya ya/ pra ti sa ma
193b4(mdo sde): bid bya ya/ b+hu mi bya ya/ bid+yA bya ya/ mahA mai tri bya ya/ mahA ka ru Nai bya ya/ pr-i th+wi bya ya/ satwa bya ya/ d+harma bya ya/ ta mo bya ya/ A lo ka bya ya/ pra ti b+ha sa bya ya/ pra ti shrud ka bya
193b5(mdo sde): ya/ ga ga na bya ya/ ma ru ta bya ya/ shU n+ya tA bya ya/ pra Ni hi ta bya ya/ a ni ma ti bya ya/ ru ta bya ya/ g+ho Sha bya ya/ kin tsa nA bya ya/ a b+hi sa ma ya a nu na/ a ba ha/ tsa tsa tsa tsa/
193b6(mdo sde): tsA rA tsa/ tsa ra bi mu/ tsa bi tsak+Sha tsa/ ku tsa tsA ra bi mu/ bya ya bi mu/ k+Sha ya bi mu/ a sa mu dra/ tsa ra bi mu/ ts+tshad bi mu/ A kA sha bi mu/ byu pa sha ma bi mu/ a nA b+ha sa bi mu/ a ha
193b7(mdo sde): ta bi mu/ A ra pA ra bi mu/ a ra pa ra bi mu/ u pa sha ma sa la la bi mu swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po de ni 'di yin te/ yon tan che ba/ don
194a1(mdo sde): che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'khur bar
194a2(mdo sde): byed pa/ snang bar byed pa/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin no/ /longs la nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig /de
194a3(mdo sde): nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing shin tu dga' ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes
194a4(mdo sde): gzigs pa dang / lung bstan pa gang gis sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po sra ba dag ma
194a5(mdo sde): lus par bas par 'gyur zhing myur du byang grol gyi bde ba'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i lung bstan pa chen po de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /de'i
194a6(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'jig rten thams cad sgrol bgyid pa/ /mi zad spubs bshad ji lta bar/ /sems can
194a7(mdo sde): dag gi las rnams kun/ /zad bgyid gnyis pa ma mchis so/ /'khor bar rang gis las gang dag /bgyis pa rnams ni ring du spong / /sdug bsngal kun las
194b1(mdo sde): grol 'gyur zhing / /bsod nams gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho skem bgyid cing / /sdig pa thams cad 'joms par bgyid/ /gang na 'dren pa bzhugs
194b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i/ /zhing dag tu ni myur 'gro bgyid/ /sdug bsngal snod kyi 'khor ba na/ /nyes dmigs mang po mthong nas kyang / /nyon mongs thams cad sel bgyid cing / /byang
194b3(mdo sde): chub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /sems can gang tshul 'di nyan na/ /thub par dka' bar 'gyur ba lags/ /de bas bkur sti bgyis nas mnyan/ /dpal kun thob par bgyis
194b4(mdo sde): pa lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mi zad pa'i sbubs lung bstan pa chen po 'di bdag gis bzung lags te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su bdag mchis lags
194b5(mdo sde): s o| |yang de'i tshe 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin dag las 'das nas ring po ma lon pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis tshig mthun
194b6(mdo sde): par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
194b7(mdo sde): bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs sngon chad mthos pa nyan par 'tshal lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ der bdag cag mchi
195a1(mdo sde): bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag thams cad lhan
195a2(mdo sde): cig mthun par brgya byin gyi cha byad dang / spyod lam dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dag dang / dbang phyug la dbang bas dengs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a3(mdo sde): c hen po spos kyi glang po che byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu thams cad 'grogs shing mthun par brgya
195a4(mdo sde): byin gyi cha byad dang / spyod lam dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dag dang / dbang phyug la dbang bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
195a5(mdo sde): ri dbang rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te de nas chas so/ /de dag yud tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir
195a6(mdo sde): phyin te/ de dag phyin pa'i mdo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir spos kyi char chen po mngon par rab tu
195a7(mdo sde): phab ste/ 'di lta ste/ tsan+dan go shi R+Sha dang / tsan+dan sprul gyi snying po dang / ta ma la'i 'dab ma dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma'i
195b1(mdo sde): char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas kyang thams cad brgya byin gyi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
195b2(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ de'i bar du yang rgyal bo gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig
195b3(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam kun tu spyod par mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi
195b4(mdo sde): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying
195b5(mdo sde): p o'i rgyal mtshan de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
195b6(mdo sde): gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /'khor de na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
195b7(mdo sde): snang ba'i snying po dpal zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus te 'dug par gyur to/ /des kyang gyen du rnam par bltas so/ /des steng gi nam mkha' la byang chub sems
196a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa nub phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas shar phyogs su 'gro ba dag mthong ngo / /de gang du byang
196a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dong ba'i shar phyogs la rnam par bltas te/ des der snang ba chen po mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
196a3(mdo sde): dpal brtsegs rgyal po la yongs su zhus so/ /zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
196a4(mdo sde): po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar dang / rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi phyogs cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu
196a5(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
196a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de'i tshe de na 'dus pa chen po yod de/ de na de bzhin
196a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa de chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyis gnas pa nyid rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dang / bdud
196b1(mdo sde): kyi yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir theg pa gsum rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam
196b2(mdo sde): grangs rab tu ston to/ /der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs nas rin po che tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sngags bshad nas kyang de dag gshegs par mdzad do/ /yang
196b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par 'dus par mdzad
196b4(mdo sde): de| der so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i spyan gsum dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag bstan kyang da dung 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang nam
196b5(mdo sde): mkha'i lam thams cad ma 'dres par gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba shAkya thub pa'i chos bstan pas ngoms pa med do/ /zhes bya ba'i
196b6(mdo sde): par ji ltar sngar gsungs pa bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la zhu ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar
196b7(mdo sde): ston/ der nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags
197a1(mdo sde): la ngas dad pa sbyin par mdzad do/ /der smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun ba'i bzod pa mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
197a2(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ nga
197a3(mdo sde): rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas zad pa shes pa skye ba'i bar byed pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rtogs
197a4(mdo sde): par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa 'di bskur bar mdzad do/ /tad+ya thA/ sha na sha ba/
197a5(mdo sde): ma sha na sha ba/ a bak+Sha sha pa/ k+Shu k+Shu ta sha pa/ tsak+Shu sha ba/ shro tra sha ba/ g+h+rA Na sha ba/ dzi hwa sha ba/ kA ya sha ba/ ma na sha ba/ k+Shu b+ha bi d+ha/ tsak+Shu pra ti bi sha ba/ shro tra a
197a6(mdo sde): b+hak+Sha b+ha| g+h+rA Na te dza k+Sha b+ha/ dzi hwa bA yu k+Sha b+ha/ kA ya kra ma k+Sha b+ha/ ma na o dza/ A lo ka dz+nyA yak+Sha b+ha/ bi dza saM kra ma k+Sha b+ha/ ang+ga ra kha g+ha k+Sha b+ha/ sa mA ro ba bya yak+Sha b+ha/ sha ma
197a7(mdo sde): ka na k+Sha b+ha/ k+Sha ya ka ra sa k+Sha b+ha/ shAn+ta pya t+ye s+tha k+Sha b+ha/ na to tai ta to na/ a tsa nai na na to na/ na g+ha ba na yin to na/ e sha e bAn+to du kha s+ya swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ smon pa med pa dang
197b1(mdo sde): rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags de ni/ 'di yin te/ mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
197b2(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa'i bar yin no/ /longs la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song zhig /ba'i
197b3(mdo sde): bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang / bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhus la/ de la 'di skad du nub
197b4(mdo sde): p hyogs kyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par
197b5(mdo sde): gnas pa snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing snying po'i rgyal mtshan de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
197b6(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos kyang ston to/ /
197b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang bdag de nas 'dir bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du btang ba lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags
198a1(mdo sde): sam| gnod pa chung ngam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar
198a2(mdo sde): thos pa bzhin du chos dang ldan pa lags sam/ chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pa dang ldan par gnas lags sam/ khyod kyi
198a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ sangs rgyas gcig gi yul lags sam/ 'dir khyod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa ma
198a4(mdo sde): mchis par bskor bar mdzad lags sam/ gang la la sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir chos ma lags pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba de'i slad du yang de bzhin gshegs
198a5(mdo sde): p a dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par

198a7(mdo sde): pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu stobs che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags
198b1(mdo sde): thams cad kun tu zad par byed pa zhes bya ba nas sdug bsngal gyi khur thams cad 'dor bar byed pa 'di des bskur lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar gsol cig ces bya ba snga ma bzhin
198b2(mdo sde): no| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ smon pa med pa dang rjes su mthun
198b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs sngags kyi phan yon bdag gis bzung lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der mchi ba la 'jigs pa 'ba' zhig mchis lags
198b4(mdo sde): so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du yongs su bzung lags te/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na sems
198b5(mdo sde): can rnams mchog tu lta ba mi zad pas sdug bsngal thob par gyur pa/ mchog tu 'dod chags kyi shas che ba/ dmus long dang 'dra ba dag lags te zhes bya ba nas bud med kyi nyes
198b6(mdo sde): pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / yud tsam kho nas mnar med par mchi bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ /de
198b7(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
199a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ lan thob cig /lan thob cig /'o na khyod kyis zhag dgu la gling bzhi pa bar ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bya'i rgyal po na ma mkha'
199a2(mdo sde): lding gi cha byad kyis rgya mtsho chen por klu bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi 'jigs pa'i rkyen kun tu bstan pa'i rkyen gyis skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la rnam par ma bkod dam/ bla na med
199a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du ma bcug gam/ des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de de lta lags so/ /ji skad gsungs pa de

199b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ rin po che'i gter chen po zhig mchis par gyur la/ de nas skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
199b2(mdo sde): can la la der mchis nas sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid na/ de ji lta ji ltar sen mo dag gis rko bar bgyid pa de lta de ltar rin po che'i phung po chen po ches mang du rnyed par 'gyur

200a1(mdo sde): ba'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/ tad+ya thA/ sa tri ra Na sha ma/ sa mu da thA na sha ma/ a brdza nA sha ma/ swa raM ga sha sa ma/ saM yo ga sha ma/ ban+d+ha na sha ma/ sa ma bi

205a3(mdo sde): chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lags so/ /yang de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems
205a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas kyang tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
205a5(mdo sde): la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po de'ang blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par
205a6(mdo sde): bgyid pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las bas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags thos par 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs
205a7(mdo sde): nas ring po ma lags/ snga ma'ang kun phyin lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag cag kyang mchi bar gnang bar mdzad par
205b1(mdo sde): gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal kun brtsegs rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag /khyed dag thams cad lhan cig mthun par sred med
205b2(mdo sde): kyi bu'i mdog dang / rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / cha byad kyis khyed dengs shig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lags so/ /zhes kyang gsol
205b3(mdo sde): t e| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu sred med kyi bu'i mdog
205b4(mdo sde): dang / rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i
205b5(mdo sde): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas chas te yud tsam gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir phyin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir
205b6(mdo sde): d e dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab
205b7(mdo sde): bo| |de dag gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di ga la ba dang / yul ma ga d+hA'i zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis
206a1(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ da dung yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs cig
206a2(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do/ /yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams
206a3(mdo sde): cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
206a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
206a5(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug go / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po sa steng gi nam mkha' la bltas
206a6(mdo sde): s o| |des kyang der nam mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas lho phyogs su 'dong ba dag mthong
206a7(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /des lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas des de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu
206b1(mdo sde): btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags te/ bdag gis ni/ steng gi nam mkha'
206b2(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas lho phyogs su mchi ba dag mthong lags so/ /btsun pa
206b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la rgyu ni/ gang lags snyam lags so/ /de nas de bzhin
206b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
206b5(mdo sde): 'di nas lho phyogs kyi phyogs cha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod do/ /'di ltar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
206b6(mdo sde): p ar gnas pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'dus pa chen po la chos kyi
206b7(mdo sde): tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par gtan la
207a1(mdo sde): dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang / dri ma med
207a2(mdo sde): par mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar mdzad pa'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi 'dus pa chen po byung bar gyur to/ /
207a3(mdo sde): der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i tog gi gzungs sngags gsungs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs yongs su spyad nas gshegs so/ /de bzhin
207a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad
207a5(mdo sde): d e| so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang yang dag par ldan pa mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang de na da dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang
207a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchog tu snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas tshim par ma gyur to/ /mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub
207a7(mdo sde): pa de'ang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zad par
207b1(mdo sde): byed pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' sems
207b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba nas gang dag srid pa tha ma pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du 'jug par gyur cig /
207b3(mdo sde): 'dir 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis
207b4(mdo sde): gnas par gyur cig / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag par mthu dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig /'di ltar 'dir
207b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig /
207b6(mdo sde): de'i che byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ngag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i nang
207b7(mdo sde): du chud par gyur cig / de nyid du 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs
208a1(mdo sde): so| |bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu/ dper na/ 'bru mar gyi mar me lta bu byung ngo / /zhes bya ba nas kha cig gi lus
208a2(mdo sde): las 'od 'di lta bu/ dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro/ /de na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
208a3(mdo sde): chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/ /da ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhugs
208a4(mdo sde): par gyur la/ sngon chad der phyin pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi
208a5(mdo sde): mjed der chas so/ /der phyin nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'dus pa chen po de'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs sngags chen po de'ang thos par
208a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /skyil mo krung du 'dug nas rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rtse bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyang da ltar ting nge 'dzin las
208a7(mdo sde): langs kyi/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der 'gro bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na'ang sems can dag mchog tu tshe thung ba
208b1(mdo sde): dag yin/ nad mang ba yin/ blo chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba yin/ bsod nams chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bya ba tshol ba chung ba dag yin/
208b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag yin/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ 'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/ mi dge ba spyod pa dag yin/ phrag
208b3(mdo sde): dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dag spangs pa yin te/ de dag phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song
208b4(mdo sde): du 'gro ba dag yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas
208b5(mdo sde): sdig pa byed pa'i lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar de dag kyang der sa'i
208b6(mdo sde): bcud kyi mdangs 'phrog nas yongs su spyod par byed do/ /'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / ro rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog nas kyang yongs
208b7(mdo sde): su spyod par byed do/ /des na stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no/ /der de dag mngal na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do/ /mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyi
209a1(mdo sde): mod dag la myur du mdangs 'phrog par byed do/ /'o ma'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do/ /bza' ba dang btung ba'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par
209a2(mdo sde): byed do/ /der de dag gis mi mngal du zhugs pa'i mdangs 'phrog cing skyes pa tsam gyi mod la mdangs 'phrog pas de dag kyang mdangs la mi reg cing bza' ba dang / btung ba nyams
209a3(mdo sde): pa yongs su spyad zin pa la yongs su spyod par byed de/ rgyu des de na mi rnams mchog tu na bdag dang / tshe thung ba dag dang / dran pa nyams pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
209a4(mdo sde): las yongs su nyams pa dag dang / bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag dang / longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba
209a5(mdo sde): dag dang / 'dod pa la chums pa dag dang / kun tu spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin zhes bya ba nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin
209a6(mdo sde): no| |zhes bya ba'i bar yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di ltar nga bya ba la brtson pa dang / spro ba dang / brtul ba
209a7(mdo sde): brtan par gyur to/ /sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs par ngas bsnyen bskur byas so/ /ngas thabs gang gis bud med sbrum pa srung bar nus pa'ang yongs su
209b1(mdo sde): zhus so/ /nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde legs su 'gyur pa dang / mngal na yod pa bde legs su 'gyur ba yongs su zhus so/ /lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin
209b2(mdo sde): po'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ grul bum mam/ yi dwags sam/ sha za'am/ srul po'am/ lus srul po'am/ mdangs 'phrog
209b3(mdo sde): pa'am/ rjed byed dam/ rims nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ ro langs gang yang dug gam/ sngags kyi sbyor ba'am/
209b4(mdo sde): sman gyi sbyor bas lus dang sems la gnod par bya bar mi nus pa yongs su zhus so/ /gang gis kyang ma'am/ mngal na yod pa dang / skyes ma thag pa dang / 'o ma 'thung ba
209b5(mdo sde): dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba yongs su spyod pa la gnod par bya bar mi nus par yongs su zhus so/ /gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa'am/ lus dkrug pa'am/ khams dkrug
209b6(mdo sde): pa'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus par yongs su zhus so/ /gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas par yongs su zhus so/ /lus dang sems la
209b7(mdo sde): rnam par mtho ma brtsams pas bde bar ma'i mngal nas gnod pa med par 'byung ba yongs su zhus so/ /bde bar 'o ma 'thung ba yongs su zhus so/ /bde bar bza' ba dang btung
210a1(mdo sde): ba yongs su spyad pa yongs su zhus so/ /gnod pa chung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag
210a2(mdo sde): par blangs pa'i bar dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs
210a3(mdo sde): su zhus so/ /ngas gsang sngags gang dag dang / sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongs su smin par mdzad par spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni/ gang yin/
210a4(mdo sde): sman de dag ni/ gang yin zhe na/ gzungs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin
210a5(mdo sde): pa drug la bkod pa/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
210a6(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang nga la bstan par gyur to/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus dang / brtul ba brtan pa ngas rtag par rgyun du tshe rabs de dang de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med
210a7(mdo sde): la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gzungs sngags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rig sngags 'dis bsrung ba byas so/ /bud med de mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te skyabs gsum
210b1(mdo sde): la rnam par bzhag go / phyin chad kyang lha'am zhes bya ba nas bdud dam/ rjed byed dam/ mi dang / mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis ma'i mngal na bu yod pa btsas te/ rnam par
210b2(mdo sde): mtho brtsams pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba'am/ lus dkrug pa'am/ khams dkrug pa'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so/ /lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi
210b3(mdo sde): bar gyis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa'am/ sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba bya bar mi nus so/ /de dag gis mngal na bu yod pa'i ma rnam par mtho ma brtsams pa dang / mngal na bug nas pa'ang
210b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyi dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
210b5(mdo sde): mchog dang ldan pa dag dang / shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su ma'i lto nas byung zhing brjed ngas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag skyes pa tsam
210b6(mdo sde): gyi mod la'ang lta stobs dang ldan pa/ dbang che bar grags pa re re la'ang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag bsrung ba dang / rjes su sba bar byed par kun tu gnas so/ /de dag mi dang
210b7(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gis kyang rnam par mtho brtsam pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba'am/ lus dkrug pa'am/ khams dkrug pa'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so//
211a1(mdo sde): mdangs blang bar yang mi nus so/ /gsang sngags dang / sman gyis kyang rnam par mtho brtsam par mi nus so/ /gang gi phyir sems can de dag
211a2(mdo sde): mchog tu gzugs dang ldan pa dang / tshe rabs dran pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan
211a3(mdo sde): pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / yon tan dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dben pa la
211a4(mdo sde): dga' zhing bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / de thob pa byed pa'i sdig bsngal yang dag par zad par
211a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /sems can nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu da dag la lha dang / klu dang /
211a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gro bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/ mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon du blta ba dang / byang grol gyi bde ba 'dod pa dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de
211a7(mdo sde): dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag ris mthun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par byang chub sems
211b1(mdo sde): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed na/ de dag myur du skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci
211b2(mdo sde): ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed na/ sems can de dag ris mthun pa nyid kyis bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par byed
211b3(mdo sde): do| |sems can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang / mtho ris su 'gro ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des
211b4(mdo sde): sems can dag yongs su smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba
211b5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don che ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ ngas sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po
211b6(mdo sde): 'dis sman sid+ha k+Shir la brabs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gang na sman sid+ha k+Shir med par yang ngas de'i mdun du bza' ba dang / btung ba
211b7(mdo sde): gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pas brabs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te med par gyur na/ ngas sman bkrus te
212a1(mdo sde): por ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gis brabs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs
212a2(mdo sde): k yi bu| ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag
212a3(mdo sde): par bsgrubs so/ /gang na shing ljon pa dag me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rig pa yong ba'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis char pa'i
212a4(mdo sde): tshul brabs nas shing dag la btab na/ shing de dag lo mang por chu med kyang me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du bu ram shing dang / rgun 'bru dag
212a5(mdo sde): dang / 'bru dang / sman dag gi bar la'ang byas so/ /gang na char mi 'bab cing chu med pa der yang ngas rus sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis
212a6(mdo sde): brangs nas shing tsam+pa ka'i 'dam mas dkris te klu mtsho'i 'gram du bzhag na/ char chen po dang / chu chen po'i tshogs byung bar 'gyur ro/ /der chu chen po byung bas sems can
212a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga'i ra ba'i bar chud za bar gyur na der yang ngas sbrul gyi rgyal po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis

219a4(mdo sde): cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad/ /rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas rgu la/ /rgyang ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod pa mdzad/ /'gro ba'i chos kyi dus 'di dka' ba ste/ /de mthong bdag 'dir
219a5(mdo sde): chos ched tshogs su mchis/ /'gro ba mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'/ /shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang / /nyon mongs chen pos zin gyur thub khyod ni/ /rab myur nyon mongs dra ba
219a6(mdo sde): gcod mdzad lags/ /sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs klung lhung ba/ /khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral/ /rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar mngags/ /khyod kyis chos
219a7(mdo sde): kyi gter la yi rang mdzad/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de na
219b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi
219b2(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa
219b3(mdo sde): klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ram/
219b4(mdo sde): stobs dang bde ba la reg pa la gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/
219b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan
219b6(mdo sde): snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang klu'i yul bcom lags
219b7(mdo sde): sam| khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo bskor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo
220a1(mdo sde): b skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul 'jig pa'i 'od
220a2(mdo sde): zer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so/ /de nas bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod
220a3(mdo sde): chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang /
220a4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di'ang bskur lags so/ /zhes bya ba ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ bden pa dang rjes su mthun
220a5(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ bdud rnams tshar gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams tshim par bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnams
220a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'joms par bgyid pa/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/ bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid
220a7(mdo sde): pa| mang du thos pa rnams skyo bar bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu
220b1(mdo sde): ge dang / dus ma yin pa'i nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rlung dang / char ba dang / chu bo dang / grang ba dang / dro ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / ro
220b2(mdo sde): mi bro ba dang / rtsub pa dang / hrud hrud po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad par bgyid pa/
220b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ston par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/ mi skye ba shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa/ ma
220b4(mdo sde): rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/ sred pa'i klung skem par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te/ tad+ya thA/ bA ye
220b5(mdo sde): ba ya pa ri bA re/ ba he ba ha pa ri bA re/ pr-i tha bi pa ri bA re/ a be a ba pa ri bA re/ te dze te dza pa ri bA re/ ma le ma la pa ri bA re/ kha g+he kha g+ha pa ri bA re/ A lo ke A lo ka pa ri bA re/ s+tha me
220b6(mdo sde): s+tha ma pa ri bA re/ rA dze rA dza pa ri bA re/ si li sil pa ri bA re/ ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/ A bo tsa A bo tsa pa ri bA re/ ma la ma la ma la la me la ma/ rA la rA la la ma/ bid+yA dz+nyA na ma b+hu taM
220b7(mdo sde): ga me| b+hu tang+ga ma pa ri bA re/ tsak+Shu gra he/ tsak+Shu gra ha pa ri bA re/ sho tra gra he/ sho tra gra ha pa ri bA re/ g+h+rA Na gra he/ g+h+rA Na gra ha pa ri bA re/ dzi hwa gra he/ dzi hwa gra hA pa ri bA re/ kA ya gra he/ kA
221a1(mdo sde): ya gra ha pa ri bA re/ ma na gra he/ ma na gra ha pa ri bA re/ spa R+sha gra he/ spaR+sha gra ha pa ri bA re/ be da na gra he/ be da na gra ha pA ri bA re/ triSh+NA gra he/ ti Sh+NA gra ha pa ri
221a2(mdo sde): bA re| u bA dA na gra he/ u pA dA na gra ha pa ri bA re/ b+hA ba gra he/ b+hA ba gra hA pa ri bA re/ dzA ti gra he/ dza ti gra ha pa ri bA re/ dza ra ma ra Na gra he/ dza ra ma ra Na gra hA pa ri bA re/ duHkha san+ta pA gra he/
221a3(mdo sde): duHkha san+ta pA gra ha pa ri bA re/ A rA pA rA d+h+wa dze gra he/ A rA pA rA d+h+wa dza gra ha pa ri bA re/ A rA pA rA dwi dza gra he/ A rA pA rA dwi dza gra hA pa ri bA re/ a brta bi brta s+ya a ba ra mu pa mA swa s+ya/
221a4(mdo sde): ba ga pi ni brta/ AR+ya rasmi sa ma be ga shAn+ti swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog des bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa bskur ba ni/
221a5(mdo sde): 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba gnang ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so/ /zhes
221a6(mdo sde): bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dag ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces
221a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang rjes su
221b1(mdo sde): mthun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog gis gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa lus kyi khyad par thams cad
221b2(mdo sde): sgrub pa zhes bya ba nas shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i bar nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i sbu gu'i gzungs sngags de khyod kyis kyang ston cig / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
221b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /s+yAd ya the da na/ sid+d+ha ma te/ bi lo ka ma te/ a le ge ta ri she/ ru tse su ru tse/ bud+d+he/ bi bud+d+he/ mahA bud+d+he/ un ma te/ un mad ta pra
221b4(mdo sde): ti She d+ha ne/ ra ga d+hu pa pra ti She d+ha ne/ bin+du bin+du ma te/ tsi ta tsi ta ba ti She d+ha ne/ arke tsan+d+ra ar+d+he/ ha ta tsi ti/ ha ta nirmi/ ha ta k+Sha ma be ge /ha ta pau na b+ha bi ra dze/ ha ta tsak+Shu sa ma te/ ha ta bi ma ta mu dre/ ha ta
221b5(mdo sde): yA g+he/ ha ta yA g+he/ ha ta sa mu dra dza be/ ha ta bi ma na rA dze/ ha ta hi te/ ha ta tsi ta Te/ ha ta d+harma rA dzo/ ha ta ba hu rA dze/ ha ta brdza ma ti/ ha ta u pa ga ma te/ ha ta ro pa rasmi/ ha ta d+harma sid+d+hi/ ha ta
221b6(mdo sde): sarbo na ma da/ dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ bi dz+nyA dz+nyA dz+nyA/ sarba mArga dz+nyA dz+nyA/ e Sho na da saM sa ra duHkhe swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsam+pa ka'i mdog des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe
221b7(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i slad du nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags stsal pa ni/ 'di lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/ snyan pa/ khyod kyi
222a1(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zungs shig / snyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig
222a2(mdo sde): rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos
222a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang rung / gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam/ rgya mtsho chen po'i yon tan dang / phan yon ni/ brjod par nus so/ /nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon tan dang /
222a4(mdo sde): phan yon ni/ bskal pa'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang rung ste/ brjod par mi nus so/ /nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ni/ de ltar zab pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
222a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zungs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /'khor bzhi po de dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / der sems
222a6(mdo sde): can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba nas zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i
222a7(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to/ /shing gi rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu khyod kyis bcom/ /byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang ni gcig pus
222b1(mdo sde): brnyes pa lags/ /lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig pu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad/ /rgyal ba nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od zer lags/ /'di na mu stegs gzhan ni gcig
222b2(mdo sde): pus 'od dang bral mdzad pa/ /'jig rten kun na srin bu me khyer dag la nyi ltar mdzes/ /thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
222b3(mdo sde): dang chos tshul yun ring gnas par mdzad/ /khyod gcig bu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa/ /dge dang byang chub yongs su btsal phyir chos don gnyer ba lags/ /rgyal
222b4(mdo sde): ba khyod ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i chos ston pa/ /khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod pa rab mchog ston par mdzad/ /gcig pus zhi 'gyur bdud rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa/ /yang
222b5(mdo sde): srid ma mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod/ /zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs spungs gyur pa/ /gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod/ /'di ni
222b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi khyod la zhu ba'i slad du pho nyar mngags/ /rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po/ /
222b7(mdo sde): thub pa zla ba'i chos dang gsan nas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dper bgyi na/ grong khyer rgyar dpag tshad tsam mchis
223a1(mdo sde): p a bye mas gtams pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag 'das nas snyigs ma lda dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i
223a2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ /de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs
223a3(mdo sde): ba des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer
223a4(mdo sde): gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs
223a5(mdo sde): dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhugs par mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci bsnyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags

223a7(mdo sde): thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid pa dag lags sam/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas
223b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor
223b2(mdo sde): lo bskor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi
223b3(mdo sde): m a'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa
223b4(mdo sde): sbyin par mdzad lags so/ /de nas stong ba nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu cha ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid

224a1(mdo sde): br-i t+ti kha g+ha/ saM ru tsa kha g+ha/ a nai ma kha g+ha/ lo tsa na kha g+ha/ shI khi kha g+ha/ bi ti mi da kha g+ha/ u k+Sho ma kha g+ha/ su ro kha g+ha/ a k+Shi kha g+ha/yA dang
224a2(mdo sde): ma no kha g+ha/ rU ba kha g+ha/ yA ba da bi dz+nyA na kha g+ha/ tsak+Shu d+hA tu kha g+ha/ yA bad ma no bi dz+nyA na d+hU tu kha g+ha/ bri tha bI d+hA tu kha g+ha/ yA ba da bidz+nyA d+hU tu kha g+ha/ tsa tu smr-i t+yu pa s+tha na kha g+ha/
224a3(mdo sde): yA ba da yA bo na ka kha g+ha/ duHkha kha g+ha/ yA ba da brga kha g+ha/ bi pa ba na/ bi k+Sha pa/ a na na sa mu dra na na/ sarba kA ra nan/ sarba sad s+tha na na/ bi shU pa na na/ a ka ni tsan na
224a4(mdo sde): na| k+Sha b+ha k+Sha/ i le i i le/ i i le mi le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos khyod la stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gzungs

224a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la

224b5(mdo sde): to| |tad+ya thA/ sha ra Na byA ya/ shik+Sha byA ya/ smr-i ti byA ya/ pra ha Na byA ya/ r-i d+d+hi byA ya/ in+d+ri ya byA ya/ ba la bya ya/ bod+h+yang+ga byA ya/ sa mA d+hi byA ya/ d+ha ra NI byA ya/ k+ShAn+ti byA

225a3(mdo sde): byu ba sha ma bi mu/ a nA b+ha sa bi mu/ a ha ha bi mu/ a bA ra bi mu/ u ba sha ma/ sa li la bi mu swAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang
225a4(mdo sde): rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe bdag bsrung ba'i slad du mi zad pa'i spubs kyi gzungs sngags stsal ba ni/ 'di lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
225a5(mdo sde): pas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ kau Di n+ya/ khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di gzungs shig /kau Di n+ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
225a6(mdo sde): bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung brnyed par dka'o/ /de bas kyang mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs
225a7(mdo sde): pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung bskal pa brgya stong gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so/ /gang dag mi zad pa'i
225b1(mdo sde): sgrubs kyi gzungs sngags 'dir mun pa med par 'jug pas zhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag ni/ gang gis kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/ /kau
225b2(mdo sde): Di n+ya/ de lta bas na/ mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos 'di ji ltar thos pa 'khor bzhi po dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de dag chos
225b3(mdo sde): de thos pas las thams cad zad pa thob par 'gyur pa nas sbobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang / sbobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bar
225b4(mdo sde): dag thob par 'gyur zhing khams gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu'ang 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
225b5(mdo sde): po snang ba'i snying po'i dpal da bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /'gro drug
225b6(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyis khrid cing / /nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu g.yengs/ /khyod ni mkhas pa mgon gyur khyod/ /rgal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod/ /dbang po drug la rmongs
225b7(mdo sde): gyur cing / /bdud kyi zhags pas nyer zin la/ /yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod/ /'jig rten na ni rab rnyed dka'/ /yan lag drug ldan khyim gyi gzhi/ /mkhas pa'i mi
226a1(mdo sde): rnams kyis spangs la/ /khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen/ /chos kyi mu ge 'jig mdzad pa/ /mngon shes drug ldan sgom byed la/ /bden
226a2(mdo sde): pa gsung ba drang srong che/ /sems can 'khor bar zhugs pa rnams/ /'ching ba dam las grol mdzad khyod/ /khyod kyi sngags la dad nas su/ /zhing 'dir yang ni lhags
226a3(mdo sde): pa lags/ /'dir ni 'jig rten mgon po yis/ /bdag cag po nyar mngags kyis gson/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ nub phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
226a4(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ganga'a'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas de na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so/ /sangs rgyas
226a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des
226a6(mdo sde): bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer
226a7(mdo sde): gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba
226b1(mdo sde): la rag par gnas sam zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyung ba mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor
226b2(mdo sde): bro 'tshal ba ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du'ang chos de
226b3(mdo sde): la'ang nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas phas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i
