282a7(mdo sde): mig thob par bgyi ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung ba rgyun mig cad pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas da ltar sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad snang bar
282b1(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i chos kyi char rab tu phab lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag cag gis rngo ci thogs par mchod pa bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
282b2(mdo sde): las bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs par lha thams cad ces bya ba nas lus sprul po'i par gyis kyang lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra dang / pheg rdob pa'i
282b3(mdo sde): sgra 'byung bar byed do/ /lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu pha bo/ /zhes bya ba nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spobs dang / bdug pa dang / ras bcos bu dang /
282b4(mdo sde): chos gos dang / rgyun dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog phreng gi bar gyi char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar nyi ma shar ba la'ang mchod pa'i las bya ba'i
282b5(mdo sde): phyir rin po che'i me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / ras bcos bu dang / phreng ba rnams gtor to/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying
282b6(mdo sde): po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ las 'byang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas de snyed kyi lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / klu'i
282b7(mdo sde): dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
283a1(mdo sde): dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang / yi dwags kyi dbang po dang / sha za'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa
283a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / lus srul po'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad
283a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i
283a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mi sdug pa sngon du gtong ba tshul de lta bus shes bgyi ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis gnas par
283a5(mdo sde): bgyid la/ ji skad sngar bshad pa'i dge ba'i phyogs yid la bgyid pas gnas par bgyid na/ dad pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu mo'i bar 'khor dang bcas pa
283a6(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang rang gi ris kyi ston pa'i 'du shes gzung bar bgyi'o/ /lus dang / sems dang / yid kyis sems can thams cad la rim gro'i spyod pa bgyi'o//
283a7(mdo sde): chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco
283b1(mdo sde): lnga las yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ /bco lnga gang zhe na/ lus kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ /bong ba dang / dbyug gu dang / mtshon
283b2(mdo sde): cha dang / dug dang / rdo dang / sems sdang ba dang / rtsub pa dang / dad pa ma mchis pa rnams las yongs su thar par bgyi'o/ /khams kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa
283b3(mdo sde): las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / sman dang / yo byad kyi gzhi las rim gro ba dang / nye du dang / sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag
283b4(mdo sde): yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can rnams nad dang dgra'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / dgra thams cad kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs
283b5(mdo sde): pa las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dug gi kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa dang / nang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi
283b6(mdo sde): dmag tshogs dang / mu ge'i kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi ste/ kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag go /gang dag
283b7(mdo sde): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa la gnas pa'i bar gyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dad pa
284a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag dang / gang dag mi sdug pa sngon du gtong ba'i tshul de lta bus zhes bgyi ba nas
284a2(mdo sde): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis gnas par bgyid la/ ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin nam gyi cha stod dang / nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar sbyor
284a3(mdo sde): ba la rjes su brtson par gnas par bgyid pa 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad dang / gang du gnas pa'i yul 'khor dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs
284a4(mdo sde): dang | ri 'or dang / grong dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang / dgon pa'i gnas de dag rang gi ris gyi khyim khol gyi khyim gyi bar bzhin du gzung bar
284a5(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /gang du de lta bu'i dge ba la brtson pa tha na gang
284a6(mdo sde): zag gcig cig gnas par bgyid kyang rung / der tha na nyin zhag gcig cig gnas par bgyid kyang rung ste/ yul 'khor de dag rang gi ris mi khyim khol gyi
284a7(mdo sde): khyim gyi bar bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga las yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /sbyin pa po dang /
284b1(mdo sde): sbyin bdag rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de dag kyang rang gi ris lags
284b2(mdo sde): par gzung bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /gang dag de lta bu'i dge
284b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs la brtson pa'i gang zag rnams la gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gnas dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms
284b4(mdo sde): dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bkur sti dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bgyid pa dag kyang kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa de lta
284b5(mdo sde): bu de dag las bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /gang yang bud med sbrum pa gang zag de lta bu dag la bkur sti bgyid pa de la dus rtag tu rnam par
284b6(mdo sde): mi 'tshe ba'i chos can dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /yang gang
284b7(mdo sde): dang gang du de lta bur tshul bzhin yid la bgyid pa la brtson pa'i gang zag la snying brtse bar gsol ba 'debs par bgyid pa dag dang / de'i ming brjod par bgyid pa
285a1(mdo sde): dag dang / skud pa btags pa'am/ kun tu srung bar bgyid pa'am/ mi dge ba las slar bzlog pa'am/ dge ba la sbyor du stsal
285a2(mdo sde): pa'am rung ste/ sems can de dag kyang kun tu 'khrug pa'i 'jigs pa bco lnga po de dag las bdag cag gis rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar
285a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i sems can gang dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mi
285a4(mdo sde): nyan zhing mi bgyi bar sems pa dag dang / gang dag de dag la gshe bar bgyi ba'am/ phan pa ma lags pa dang / don ma lags pa dang / bar du nyams pa dang /
285a5(mdo sde): gnod sems su bgyi ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag gi thad du bdag cag gis mi dang / mi ma yin pa dag gtang bar bgyi'o/ /de la bzod
285a6(mdo sde): par mi bgyi'o/ /gang dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par brtson pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tshig mi mnyan zhing mi bgyi bar sems
285a7(mdo sde): pa dag dang / gang dag de dag la gshe bar bgyid pa'am/ don ma lags pa dang / phan pa ma lags pa dang / gnod sems dang / rab tu nyams par
285b1(mdo sde): bgyi ba'i slad du rtul bar bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni/ gnod pa bco lnga po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bco lnga gang zhe na/ myur du nad kyi sdug bsngal
285b2(mdo sde): dang / longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang / nye bar spyod pa las yongs su nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i sdug bsngal dang / 'khor
285b3(mdo sde): sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang / dbang phyug las rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang / gnas kyi sdug bsngal dang / dgras rdzi ba'i sdug bsngal dang / rtag tu
285b4(mdo sde): sems kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / yul 'khor gyi sdug bsngal dang / rgyal rigs kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / chom rkun gyi kun tu 'khrug
285b5(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal dang / bud med kyi kun tu 'khrug pa'i sdug bsngal dang / myur du tshe zad pa dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal lags so/ /sems can de dag ni/ gnod
285b6(mdo sde): pa de dag dang myur du ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can gang dag de lta bu'i tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa la brtson pa rnams kyi tshig mi nyan zhing mi bgyid par
285b7(mdo sde): sems pa dang / de dag la'ang gshe bar bgyid pa'am/ don ma lags pa dang / phan pa ma lags pa dang / gnod sems dang / rab tu nyams par bgyi pa'i slad
286a1(mdo sde): du rtul bar bgyid pa'i sems can de dag skra gnas bdag cag la skyabs su mchis kyang rung / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i
286a2(mdo sde): yo byad kyis rim gro bgyi bar brtson par bgyis su lags kyang de dag gi don du bdag cag rim gro'i bsnyen bkur blang bar mi bgyi'o/ /de dag gi skyabs mi
286a3(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |de dag gi bgyi ba mi sgrub bo/ /don sgrub par mi bgyid do/ /phung grol gyi lha'am/ klu nas lus srul po'i bar sdang ba/ snying brtse ba ma mchis pa/ bgyis
286a4(mdo sde): pa mi gzo ba/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de lta bu'i dge ba'i phyogs la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid
286a5(mdo sde): par brtson pa dgon pa dang / nags dang / bas mtha' dang / ri khrod dang / dur khrod dang / shing drung dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang /
286a6(mdo sde): gnas khang dang / 'chag sa'i gnas na gnas pa'i gang zag rnams kyi tha dad du sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / rnam par mtho 'tsham pa'i sems dang
286a7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang nye bar mchi bar bgyid cing / de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi lus kun tu 'khrug pa'am sems kun tu 'khrug par bgyid la/ mdangs 'phrog par
286b1(mdo sde): bgyid cing / tha na de lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi rim gro ba dang / sbyin bdag gang dag lags pa de dag la'ang lha'am/ klu nas lus srul po'i bar sdang ba/ bgyis
286b2(mdo sde): pa mi gzo ba/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag gis lus kun tu 'khrug pa dang / sems kun tu 'khrug par bgyid cing mdangs 'phrog par
286b3(mdo sde): bgyid la/ sngon gyi las kyi rkyen ma gtogs lags te/ gal te lha dang / klu nas lus sprul po'i bar de dag bdag cag gis so sor ma zlog gam/ slar ma zlog
286b4(mdo sde): gam| nongs pa ci mchis pa'i chad pa la ma bkod par gyur na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig /
286b5(mdo sde): bdag cag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi spyod yul lam/ rang rgyal ba'i spyod yul lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi'ang rung ste/ snod
286b6(mdo sde): du ma gyur cig / byang grol gyi bde ba thob par ma gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag /'di ltar yang khyed dus gsum du gshegs
286b7(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs
287a1(mdo sde): so| |khyed kyis de ltar byos shig / de ltar byas na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la khyed kyis mchod
287a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rim gro byas par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag /gang la la brtson pa dang brtul pa de lta bus legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba rjes su srung
287a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / de ltar zhugs shing chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag rnams la rjes su srung bar byed pa'i rigs kyi bu de 'khor bar 'khor ba na dpal dam
287a4(mdo sde): pa la nye bar spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de la 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
287a5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na sdug bsngal dang mi mthun pa bde ba 'dod pa khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /'di ltar khyed legs par byas
287a6(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi mtha' la zhugs pa ni/ khyed yang legs so legs so/ /yang de'i tshe mi ma yin pa'i 'byung po mdangs dang khrag za ba gang dag yin pa grangs
287a7(mdo sde): med pa dpag tu med pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni/ mi ma lags pa/ mdangs 'tshal pa/ sha khrag
287b1(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dag lags te/ bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams la rnam par mtho ba tsam par mi bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ da ltar bcom
287b2(mdo sde): l dan 'das kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin nyan thos gang dag de lta bu'i mi sdug pa'i sbyor ba rnal 'byor yid la bgyid pas gnas pa'i gang zag de lta bu dag gal te bdag
287b3(mdo sde): cag gis rnam par mtho btsams par gyur na/ bdag cag dad pa can ma lags par gyur cig /dbang po thams cad kyi spyod yul rnams su mchi bar mi nus par gyur
287b4(mdo sde): cig / gang zag de lta bu dag ni/ bdag cag gis kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de dag gi rim gro ba dang / sbyin bdag gang dag lags pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /
287b5(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa mi sdug pa'i sbyor ba yid la bgyid pas gnas pa dag yang dag par 'dzin par
287b6(mdo sde): bgyid pa gtsug lag khang dang / gnas dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / bro 'tshal ba'i gsos sman gyi yo
287b7(mdo sde): byad rnams kyis yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar
288a1(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin bzang dag /legs so legs so/ /khyed kyis de ltar byos shig /yang de'i tshe
288a2(mdo sde): sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu'i mi sdug pa'i
288a3(mdo sde): s byor bas rnal 'byor la brtson par gnas par bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag gi lus la bdag gis rgya chen po'i sa'i bcud kyi mdangs gtang bar bgyi
288a4(mdo sde): ste| de'i chos kyis gnas pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par brtson pa de dag shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang
288a5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa chen po dang ldan pa
288a6(mdo sde): gang khyod nga'i sras/ thugs kyi sras/ zhal nas skyes pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sprul pa dag de lta bu'i bsod snyoms kyis yang dag par tshim par byed
288a7(mdo sde): ba legs so legs so/ /sbyin pa chen po dang yang dag par ldan pa des khyod theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe dpal
288b1(mdo sde): lha mo chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang de lta bu'i chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyis sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag
288b2(mdo sde): gang dag lags pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag gi dga' ston dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / shing rta dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod rnams ma tshang ba
288b3(mdo sde): ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /mi sdug pa'i sbyor bas zhes bgyi ba nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yid la bgyid pa'i bar gyis nyin mtshan 'da' bar bgyid pa gang dag
288b4(mdo sde): lags pa de dag gtsug lag khang dang / gzhi dang / gnas dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / bro 'tshal ba'i gsos sman gyi yo
288b5(mdo sde): byad rnams kyis 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / yongs su skyong bar bgyid pa de dag gi yo byed thams cad phun sum tshogs
288b6(mdo sde): pa dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod pa dang / lus dang sems kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba mang bar bdag gis yang dag par
288b7(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyi'o/ /snod du gyur pa'i spyin gnas rnams dang ma bral zhing lhan cig 'grogs su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /chos la mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang
289a1(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan
289a2(mdo sde): pa dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang / mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang dag par bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin pa chen
289a3(mdo sde): po la yang dag par brten pa legs so legs so/ /khyod brtson pa'i brtul ba des theg pa chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe gsang
289a4(mdo sde): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u 'di bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan
289a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su skyong ba dang / yo byad dang yang dag par ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag mang po gang dag mchis pa'i rkyen des sangs
289a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir chos kyi tshul yun ring du 'bar zhing mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas
289a7(mdo sde): smras pa| kye gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ci nam mkha' yongs su nyams pa mngon nam/ smras pa/ gnas la sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ ci
289b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'du ba mngon nam/ smras pa/ ci yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir mi mngon no/ /smras pa/ ci yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' mi
289b2(mdo sde): 'dra bar mngon nam/ smras pa/ 'di ni/ tha mi dad pa nyid de/ tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'dra ba'o/ /smras pa/ ci nam mkha' dang / chos rnams mi 'dra'am/ smras pa/ ci
289b3(mdo sde): mi g.yo ba dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pas mi 'dra ba med pa nyid do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ ci 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
289b4(mdo sde): kyi tha dad pa nyid mi mngon nam/ smras pa/ ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid tha mi dad pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi chos rnams nam mkhar
289b5(mdo sde): sgro btags pa nyid kyi phyir tha mi dad pa nyid do/ /smras pa/ ci yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin du 'dus byas kyi chos rnams yin nam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams
289b6(mdo sde): yin| smras pa/ stong pa nyid sgro btags pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid du 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang yang dag par ldan pa ma
289b7(mdo sde): yin no| |yang smras pa/ ci stong pa nyid du yang dag par 'du ba yin nam/ smras pa/ ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 'jig pa
290a1(mdo sde): med pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba stong pa nyid do/ /'di la gang stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i dngos po'ang mi dmigs
290a2(mdo sde): so| |rigs kyi bu/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa dang mtshan gyi gzhi mtshan gyi gzhis stong pa dang / mtshan gyi gzhi med pa mtshan gyi gzhis stong pa
290a3(mdo sde): yin pa de bzhin du tshul des chos thams cad shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar brjod du med pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /'di
290a4(mdo sde): ltar chos thams cad kyi da'i ngo bo nyid nyan thos rnams kyis byas pa ma yin no/ /rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mdzad
290a5(mdo sde): pa ma yin te/ de ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid thams cad nam mkha' dang yang
290a6(mdo sde): dag par ldan pa nyid kyi phyir mi 'dra ba med pa nyid ni/ tha mi dad pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sngon stong pa nyid kyi tshul la yongs
290a7(mdo sde): su sbyang ba byas pa'i sems can dpag tu med pa ni/ sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa zad cing chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
290b1(mdo sde): thob par gyur to/ /sems can khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes shing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos
290b2(mdo sde): rnams la gnas par gyur to/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po theg pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa
290b3(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / //yang de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dam pa skyes te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
290b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed gtams
290b5(mdo sde): zhing sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i snang ba chen pos khyab pa de lta bu ni/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa/ mchog tu ngo mtshar lags te/ sangs
290b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di dang mtshams gzhan gyi khor yug chen po'i rim gtogs par g.yar sngar gzhan ci yang gda' bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan
290b7(mdo sde): 'das| gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad mthong lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
291a1(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs pa'i snang ba ji lta bur 'gyur ba lags/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi
291a2(mdo sde): zhing gzhan gyi yon tan bkod pa mthong lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
291a3(mdo sde): rang gi spyod yul na bzhugs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa/ sngon gyi tshogs bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
291a4(mdo sde): d ang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rang gi gnas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par smin pas mngon
291a5(mdo sde): par grub pa mtha' yas par bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa ma chags pa'i spyod yul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ ye shes gsal
291a6(mdo sde): ba bskyed par 'jug pa'i blo gros dang yang dag par ldan pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu gshegs pa las rab tu skyes pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par yang dag
291a7(mdo sde): par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul tshad med pa la gnas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba brnyes pa'i rgyu
291b1(mdo sde): mthun pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad pa la mkhas pa/ bag chags yang dag
291b2(mdo sde): par bcom pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa yang dag par bstan pa na bzhugs so/ /rgyal po chen po/ des na phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams
291b3(mdo sde): grangs med pa dpag tu med pa khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa bzhugs shing gzhes pa byang chub sems
291b4(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang / srog chags
291b5(mdo sde): bye ba mang po gzhan dag gis kyang tshig mthun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi yul nyid kyi spyod yul bsod nams
291b6(mdo sde): chen po'i rgyan gyi rgyu mthun pa bstan du gsol/ bdag cag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'i bar yang dag par bstan du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das
291b7(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul yang dag par bstan pa gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la
292a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kau Di n+ya/ nyan thos chen po rnams dang / khyim na gnas pa dang / rab tu byung ba gang dag yin pa thams cad rang gi dge
292a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs kyi nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas par byos shig / nga'ang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas par mdzad do/ /yang
292a3(mdo sde): de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin nas mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i bar gang dag yin pa dang / bden pa mthong ba gang dag yin pa dang / rjes su mthun pa'i
292a4(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa gang dag yin pa dang / theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad pa gang dag yin
292a5(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad skyil mo krung du 'khod nas snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi spyod yul la shes rab kyis
292a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' khyab par byed pa/ mkhas pa mang po thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa nyi ma dang zla ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
292a7(mdo sde): de ni| nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
292b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyis shes pa'i spyod yul ma yin te/ de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi yul mkhyen pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de'i
292b2(mdo sde): tshe bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad dang / gling bzhi ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab
292b3(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bye ba phrag brgya snyed dang / srid pa'i rtse mo lha'i gnas bye ba phrag brgya snyed yod pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
292b4(mdo sde): chud par yang dag par snang ngo / /thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gnas par yang dag par snang
292b5(mdo sde): ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'am/
292b6(mdo sde): lha'am/ mi gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi nyon mongs pa'ang thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad do/ /de dag thams
292b7(mdo sde): cad kyis lus dang sems kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur te/ dper na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i zhi gnas thob pa'i dge slong snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin
293a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ langs pa de dag thams cad kyi rang gi lus la snang ba nub bar
293a2(mdo sde): gyur to/ /nyan thos thams cad dang / sems can gang su dag snyoms par zhugs pa de dag thams cad ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ de dag thams cad lus
293a3(mdo sde): dang sems kyi bde ba de lta bu dang yang dag par ldan par gyur to/ /de dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob pa ste/ dbang po tshim nas de dag
293a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i nang du gnas shing 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i khung bu la bltas te/ de dag thams cad kyis 'di ltar bcom
293a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi sku'i ba spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ba de lta bu mthong bar gyur te/ dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / nor bu
293a6(mdo sde): rin po che chan po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba bzhin no/ /bcom ldan
293a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi ba spu'i khung bu re re nas kyang 'od de lta bu byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rab tu byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
293b1(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa ma yin pa gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing gzhes
293b2(mdo sde): p a'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad 'di lta bu'i dbyangs brjod pas kun
293b3(mdo sde): tu gang bar mdzad do/ /shAkya seng+ge mi yi mchog /byams dang thugs rje'i rgyu mthun pa/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ /bsod nams las grub pa la ltos//
293b4(mdo sde): sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul ston par mdzad/ /thugs rjes 'od zer bkye bas ni/ /zhing rnams thams cad gsal bar gyur//
293b5(mdo sde): re res zhing ni rgyas gyur pa/ /gnas kun gsal ba mthong nas su/ /byang chub mchog ni yongs tshol zhing / /sems kyi mchog kyang skyed par byed/ /gang dag lus
293b6(mdo sde): can rdzu 'phrul 'thob/ /de dag thams cad myur du lhags/ /shAkya seng+ge mi mchog la/ /khyed kyis bskor ba byas nas kyang / /gang dag rdzu 'phrul ma thob kun/ /rgyang
293b7(mdo sde): ma nas ni phyag 'tshal la/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed dang / /mi yi skyes mchog rnams su 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rang rang gi sangs
294a1(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing nas dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad nas thugs rje'i dbang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir de
294a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i dgongs pa dang smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i phyir dang / de'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang
294a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
294a4(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag du mas mdun du bdar cing yongs su bskor te/ de dag rang gi
294a5(mdo sde): s angs rgyas kyi zhing rnams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis yang dag par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la lan gsum
294a6(mdo sde): b skor ba mdzad nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khor gyi sems can gang dag yin pa de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
294a7(mdo sde): pa la bskor ba byed cing de lta bu'i mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu'ang dong ngo / /de'i dus na sems can gang dag sangs
294b1(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chung pa de dag thams cad kyis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i de
294b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mthong ngo / /de dag thams cad kyis de nas yang dag par zhugs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / bcom ldan
294b3(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa la bskor ba mdzad cing gshegs pa dang / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug cing rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs te chos ston pa mthong ngo / /
294b4(mdo sde): ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu rang rang gi gdan la bzhugs nas rang rang gi 'khor las brtsams te de bzhin
294b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags pa dang / yon tan dang / grags pa dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams dang / brtson 'grus dang / thugs rje dang / sems
294b6(mdo sde): c an yongs su smin par mdzad pa bstan pa bzhin der sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bla na med pa
294b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /rang rang gi lung bstan pa thob par gyur to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /nyan
295a1(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud pa gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo / /
295a2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'ang thams cad kyis thos so/ /snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag na sems can gang dag yod pa'i bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
295a3(mdo sde): ci 'dra ba myong ba dag kyang 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud cing 'khod pa rnams kyis mthong ngo / /de'i tshe snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dag
295a4(mdo sde): na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'ang mthong ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
295a5(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag dang thabs cig tu 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
295a6(mdo sde): thub pa la bskor ba mdzad pa mthong ngo / /de'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu dga' ba'i dam pa skyes te thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad
295a7(mdo sde): d o| |snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa gang dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
295b1(mdo sde): p hyir zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can dag yod pa der sangs
295b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku byad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad dbyangs dang / ngag dang / sgra brjod pa gcig gis go bar mdzad do/ /dge ba'i don du zhing gcig tu/ /
295b3(mdo sde): nged cag thams cad gshegs pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mi bzhugs na/ /sus kyang dpal chen mi thob bo/ /khyed cag gis ni byang chub tu/ /gcig tu sems
295b4(mdo sde): ni gzhol byas na/ /khyed cag phyin chad 'khor bar ni/ /sdug bsngal skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shAkya khyu mchog mchod pa dang / /de la bskor ba bya ba'i phyir/ /'di ltar khyed
295b5(mdo sde): cag thams cad ni/ /nga dang thabs cig myur du 'deng / /'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po dgu pa/
295b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku byad kyis re re zhing sems can rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed dang
295b7(mdo sde): lhan cig tu de nas chas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la sems can de dag gis rin po che
296a1(mdo sde): sna tshogs nas rol mo'i sgra dang / gar dang / glu sna tshogs ba'i bar gyis mchod ba byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
296a2(mdo sde): chub tu smon lam btab/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg par smon lam btab ste/ thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de'i tshe
296a3(mdo sde): de dag cho ga bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs thob ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrubs nas rang rang gi zhing du dong ste byang chub sems
296a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig ni rang rgyal ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni nyan thos kyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / kha cig ni tshangs pa'i lus
296a5(mdo sde): byad dang / kha cig ni brgya byin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba nas kha cig ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / kha cig ni sred med kyi bu'i lus byad dang /
296a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni dbang phyug chen po'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / kha cig ni klu'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / kha cig ni gnod sbyin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i
296a7(mdo sde): bar dang / kha cig ni lha ma yin gyi lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / kha cig ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na
296b1(mdo sde): s ems can nyan thos kyis 'dul ba'i bar du yod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcu ba rnams sems can yongs
296b2(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir zhugs te/ der nyan thos kyi lus byad kyi bar gyis sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang sems
296b3(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis snang ba de mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'ang mthong nas sems can de dag shin tu dga' ba dang mchog tu dga'
296b4(mdo sde): ba skyes shing dbang po rnams tshim ste thams cad sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyun chad do/ /de dag la bde ba'i tshor ba'ang byung ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
296b5(mdo sde): der gang nyan thos kyi lus byad kyis chos ston pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/ des bsod nams chen po bsags pa'i dge
296b6(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta bu'i dbyangs dang / sgra brjod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad go bar byed pa 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdug pa'i sems ni gzhom
296b7(mdo sde): par byos/ /sdig pa'i lta ba spong bar byos/ /gang du 'jig rten mi 'jug pa'i/ /'khor ba'i pha rol 'dong bar byos/ /khyed cag sdig pa'i sems kyis su/ /nges
297a1(mdo sde): par 'byung bar mi lta bas/ /rga ba dang ni 'chi ba'i lus/ /'khor bar ring por zhugs pa yin/ /ston pa mthong ba
297a2(mdo sde): rnyed par dka'/ /dal ba 'di 'dra rnyed par dka'/ /chos thos pa yang rnyed par dka'/ /dge byed rab tu rnyed par dka'/ /de ltar khyed kyis gus
297a3(mdo sde): byas te/ /byang chub tu ni 'dun pa skyed/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar gyis la/ /'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar byos/ /rtag pa dang ni chad pa'i blos/ /
297a4(mdo sde): chos gnyis myur du spangs nas ni/ /'du byed thams cad bdag med la/ /tshul bzhin du ni brtag par byos/ /kun 'byung sred dang sdug bsngal yang / /
297a5(mdo sde): ye shes chu yis bkru bar byos/ /shAkya seng+ge mchod pa'i phyir/ /thams cad lhan cig myur du 'deng / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyan thos kyi lus byad
297a6(mdo sde): kyi bar gyis byang chub sems dpa' re re zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems can rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tshad med pa dang lhan cig
297a7(mdo sde): tu rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas chas te/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom
297b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la de dag gis rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / chos gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan dang / rgyan gyi lhab lhub sna tshogs
297b2(mdo sde): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / bstod pa sna
297b3(mdo sde): tshogs dang / glu sna tshogs dang / gar sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
297b4(mdo sde): du phyin nas rang rang gi stan dag la 'khod do/ /de bzhin du rang rang gi 'khor rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsngags ba dang grags pa nas sems
297b5(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi bar brjod par gyur te/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na 'khor de'i sems can grangs
297b6(mdo sde): med pa dpag tu med pa yod pa de dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang
297b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg par yang sems bskyed de/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /de'i tshe de dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa sna tshogs
298a1(mdo sde): thob nas dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed do/ /sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir gang bcom ldan 'das kyi
298a2(mdo sde): sku la chud par gyur pa'i bkod pa de lta bu'ang mthong ngo / /de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob
298a3(mdo sde): bo| |de'i tshe gang dag sngon chad sems ma bskyed pa'i sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag
298a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg par yang sems dag bskyed
298a5(mdo sde): de| de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba'i lus byad kyis zhes bya ba'i bar dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i
298a6(mdo sde): sa thob par gyur to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du yin te/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phyir ji ltar bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul chen po sangs
298a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul gyi rgyu mthun par ting nge 'dzin de lta bu la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no/ /'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/
298b1(mdo sde): le'u drug pa'o// //de nas bdud sdig can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa nyid kyi pho brang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings na
298b2(mdo sde): bzhugs pa mthong nas mchog tu yid mi bde ste lus thams cad rdul thon zhing mchi ma dang / byung nas mi dga' bar gyur to/ /de bdud sdig can gyis gnas
298b3(mdo sde): thams cad du rgyu bar byed/ rnam par rgyu bar byed/ 'jug par byed/ 'byung bar byed/ ldang bar byed/ rgyug par byed/ kun tu rgyug par byed/ glal bar byed/
298b4(mdo sde): 'dzum par byed/ shugs ring du 'byin par byed/ kha la lces ldag par byed/ mig 'dzum par byed/ lag pa gnyis brkyang zhing bskum par byed/ mgo la
298b5(mdo sde): lag pa gnyis kyis rdob par byed/ mgrin pa dang / nu ma la mnyed par byed de/ de mthong bas bdud kyis gnas na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad
298b6(mdo sde): gnod pa dang / mngon par mi dga' ba dang / yid mi bde bar gyur to/ /de nas bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing zhes bya ba des bdud sdig can la tshigs su bcad
298b7(mdo sde): pas dris pa/ 'khrug sems yid rab mi bde bas/ /ci slad de ltar khyod rgyug cing / /kun la dga' bar mi dgongs pas/ /gang du yang ni dgyes mi mnga'/ /bdud
299a1(mdo sde): sdig can gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /gau ta ma stobs can mthong nas ni/ /nga yi snying ni rnam gas nas/ /lus
299a2(mdo sde): kun nas ni rdul thon cing / /gdong yang mchi mas gang ba yin/ /sems can thams cad mthun pa ru/ /ji ltar thos pa bzhin du der/ /tshogs chen rol
299a3(mdo sde): gyis dong bas na/ /nga yi yul ni stongs par byas/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i yul/ /phyogs bcu las ni lhags pa yis/ /de la bskor bar byas nas
299a4(mdo sde): su| |bye ba mang pos yongs su bskor/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'khor bcas te/ /de la yang ni skyabs song bas/ /nga yi dpung ni ma mthong ste/ /gang na'ang
299a5(mdo sde): nga yi phyogs med do/ /de nas bdud sdig can la bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag thams cad 'khor bcas te/ /go
299a6(mdo sde): cha sra ba dag bgos nas/ /ral gri 'khor lo mda' po ches/ /de yi lus ni phye mar rlag /sdig can gyis smras pa/ de la yang ni skyabs song zhing / /der
299a7(mdo sde): yang rang nyid song bas ni/ /de la dmag ni yang dag phul/ /nga ni bcing pa dam pos bcings/ /de nas bdud shor ba nam mkha'i shing des smras pa/ thabs
299b1(mdo sde): rnams kun gyis ci bgyid kyang / /dgra ni dbang du mi 'gyur te/ /mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis bslus bgyis na/ /de lta na ni gsad par nus/ sdig can gyis smras pa/
299b2(mdo sde): mdza' bo'i gzugs kyis der 'gro bar/ /'di ltar bdag gis der bsam na/ /rang gi mgul na dri nga ba'o/ /ro myags 'jigs su rung ba mthong / /nam mkha'i
299b3(mdo sde): shing gis slar smras pa/ bdud dang klu dang bsam gtan pa'i/ /lus gsum dag tu bshad pa la/ /bdag cag gi ni yul bcom yang / /klu rnams kyi ni yul
299b4(mdo sde): brtan no/ /klu de dag kyang gzi brjid che/ /dmag rnams mang zhing stobs kyang tshe/ /de dag gi ni yul mchis pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /'dod pa'i khams
299b5(mdo sde): na gang su dag / klu yi bdag po gnas gyur pa/ /de dag rnams la gau ta ma/ /thal bar rlag par myur du bsgo/ /sdig can gyis smras pa/ kye| bsod nams shes rab
299b6(mdo sde): chen po can/ /klu yi gnas su nyid song la/ /gau ta ma dang dmag 'gyed par/ /thams cad la ni khyod kyis bsgo/ /des smras pa/ de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes nas
299b7(mdo sde): dmag brgya stong go bgos pa de dag la lag pa bsgrang ste bsgrags pa ni/ klu yi rten du bdag cag 'deng / gau ta ma dang dmag 'gyed cing / /srog dang bral bar
300a1(mdo sde): byed du gzhug / deng ni bdag cag grogs bya bar/ /thams cad la ni bsgo bar bya/ /de na 'khod pa de dag kyang gang du yongs su'ang
300a2(mdo sde): 'gro bar ma nus pa dang / shor ba nam mkha'i shing de gdong mchi ma dang bcas shing spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas sdig can
300a3(mdo sde): la smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang du yang / /mchi bar bgyi ba'i rngo ma thogs/ /rdzu 'phrul brtan pa gau ta ma/ /drang srong gi ni sgyu lags so/ /bdag cag
300a4(mdo sde): thams cad rkang pa bcings/ /lus rnams kun la rdul yang byung / /gang gis dgra las khyed rgyal bar/ /gzhan zhig kyang ni mdzad par gsol/ /bdud sdig
300a5(mdo sde): can de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas mya ngan du gyur pa de lta bu'i blo skyes te/ gang bdag gis klu'i rten thams cad du gnag kun tu smra bar byed pa dang /
300a6(mdo sde): mngon par mi dga' ba skyed par byed pa dang / klu thams cad kun tu gshe bar byed pa'i bdud kyi stobs de lta bu yang dag par rjes su dran par bya gor ma chag
300a7(mdo sde): snyam mo| |de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyi klu'i rten thams cad du sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sbrang pu gdug pa rnams sprul to/ /thams cad dri 'bas
300b1(mdo sde): bkang ngo / /rdul nga byung ba dang mngon par mi dga' bar byas so/ /de bzhin du klu dang / klu chen po skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad mngon
300b2(mdo sde): par mi dga' nas de dag thams cad kyis rnam par bltas te bdag cag la co 'dri bar byed pa su yin snyam na/ de dag gis ma shes shing ma mthong ngo / /gling bzhi
300b3(mdo sde): pa 'di'i klu dang / klu chen po skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang khro bas zil gyis non nas de dag thams cad
300b4(mdo sde): kyis kyang rang gi gnas bor/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas kyang rang gi gnas bor nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi 'dabs
300b5(mdo sde): na ri kha la ti ya zhes bya ba yod de/ /ri kha la ti ya de'i rtse mo na drang srong thub pa rnams kyi gnas kyi rten na kun rten ces bya ba rgyar dpag tshad bzhi khri pa lha rdzas kyi
300b6(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa bzhi yod pa/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing bzhugs so/ /der de dag zhugs ma thag tu 'di lta bu'i lus
300b7(mdo sde): chung dur gyur te/ dper na/ mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no/ /de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re'ang 'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam du yang dag par shes te/
301a1(mdo sde): de dag gis skad 'byin kyang ma nus so/ /de nas 'gro bar yang ma nus te/ mya ngan chen po dang / khros bas zil gyis non nas der
301a2(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de bzhin du klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / de bzhin du sa srung gi bu zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du shin tu
301a3(mdo sde): brtan zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du 'jog po zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du ma dros pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du btang bzung zhes bya ba'i
301a4(mdo sde): bar dang / de bzhin du rgya mtshos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du chu lhas byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du khyim bdag gis byin zhes bya ba'i
301a5(mdo sde): bar dang / de bzhin du chu bas byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du chu sog ma med kyis byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du ri bos byin zhes bya ba'i bar
301a6(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin du pa lang mgo zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du rgyan skyes zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du e la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin
301a7(mdo sde): du lag pa'i tshigs mi mngon pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du sgra bsags zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du mtsho gyad ces bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du
301b1(mdo sde): stobs kyis rgyu zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du ti se'i gangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du chu'i shugs zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du
301b2(mdo sde): gtsug phud sngon po zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du gser ser skya zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du rtswa sngon po zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du gshe ba'i shing
301b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig gsal zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du glang po zad ces bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du non pos byin zhes bya ba'i bar dang
301b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du gnas na rgyu zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du gshol ngan zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du e la'i gdong zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du mig
301b5(mdo sde): dmar zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du yid 'phrog ces bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du rab mchog ces bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na klu'i
301b6(mdo sde): r gyal po lnga khri drug stong gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad klu'i rgyal por de'ang 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs
301b7(mdo sde): so| |gla'i brgyad khri bzhi stong nas gling re re nas kyang klu chen po brgya stong phrag du mas rang rang gi gnas por nas gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so/ /de bzhin
302a1(mdo sde): du byang gi sgra mi snyan nas klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rgyu ba chen po zhes bya ba de gnyis re re'ang
302a2(mdo sde): klu dang / klu chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu yongs su bskor cing drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du
302a3(mdo sde): brtan to/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling nas klu'i rgyal po zla ba srung zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po dbyig gtong zhes bya ba de gnyis re re'ang klu dang / klu chen po
302a4(mdo sde): dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig yongs su bskor cing mdun du dbar te drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der skyabs kyi don du rten cing zhugs
302a5(mdo sde): so| |ba lang spyod kyi gling nas klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i phreng bcan zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po ba lang gi 'od kyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba de gnyis re re'ang klu dang /
302a6(mdo sde): klu chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas lhan cig tu mdun du bdar zhing drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so/
302a7(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe gling bzhi pa 'di dang / gling gzhan brgya stong phrag brgyad cu na klu dang / klu chen po dang / klu'i skye gnas pa klu sgo nga las skyes pa dang / klu mngal nas
302b1(mdo sde): skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa pho dang / mo dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'ang rung gang su dag yod pa skad cig de la gnag der brten par
302b2(mdo sde): ma gyur pa gcig kyang med de/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas der skyabs kyi don du zhugs so/ /de dag thams cad zhugs ma thag tu re re'ang 'di lta bu'i lus chung
302b3(mdo sde): dur gyur te/ dper na/ mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no/ /de dag kyang rang khros pa'i mthus re re'ang 'di lta bu'i lus ri rab tsam chen por yang dag par rjes
302b4(mdo sde): su mthong ngo / /de nas de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis gnas rten du klu'i skye gnas pa thams cad 'dus pa dang / thams cad lus chung dur mthong ngo / /de mthong
302b5(mdo sde): bas shas cher 'khrugs shing kun tu 'khrugs te skrag nas rang gi skye bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'byung ba chen po klu rnams thams cad g.yos/ /drang srong
302b6(mdo sde): gnas pa der na 'dus nas su/ /thams cad stobs dang gzugs dang dpal las nyams/ /dge sbyong mdangs kyi stobs la blta bar byos/ /de nas bdud shor ba gzhan
302b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims rten zhes bya ba des smras pa/ thugs mi dgyes pa ma mdzad bdag la gson/ /klu rnams bdag nyid rtse ba 'di lags te/ /'di ltar shA kya'i bu ni phyer rlog
303a1(mdo sde): pa'i| |tshogs can 'dus pa la ni mngon brtag mdzod/ /sdig can gyis smras pa/ blo mchog der ni myur du 'gro bar byos/ /klu yi
303a2(mdo sde): tshogs ni thams cad spro bar byos/ /ci ste shAka bu tshogs bcas bsad nus na/ /klu rnams kyi ni yul yang mchog tu 'gyur/ /de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims
303a3(mdo sde): rten de bdud kyi gnas de nas srog chags brgyad khri dang lhan cig chas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa sngon gyi smon lam mthar phyin pas drang srong
303a4(mdo sde): thub pa thams cad dbang du mdzad/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi cho 'phrul byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyu mthun
303a5(mdo sde): pa bshad pa yang dag par bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad skyo bar mdzad/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas mi dang /
303a6(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyor ba mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
303a7(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di mchog tu ches gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / ches skal pa dang ldan pa dang / ches bsod nams kyi sa bon byed
303b1(mdo sde): pa'i mdangs dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mchod par 'os pa mdzad de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad
303b2(mdo sde): pa rgyun bcad do/ /de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la chud par gyur te/ de dag thams
303b3(mdo sde): cad bcom ldan 'das kyi shes pa so sor sbyangs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyi rgyu mthun pa'i cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ting
303b4(mdo sde): nge 'dzin stobs rgyun bcad pa dang / de'i tshe sngon ji ltar bzhugs pa bzhin du yang dag par snang ste/ de de ltar shin tu lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de
303b5(mdo sde): de'i bar du'ang rang gi gzi brjid kyi 'od zer rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
303b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po brgya stong phrag du ma de dag thams cad ngo mtshar thob cing rmad du byung ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / dri dang / phye ma dang / rin po
303b7(mdo sde): che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar
304a1(mdo sde): 'khod do/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma
304a2(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / mi dang /
304a3(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi bar de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / dri dang / phye ma dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras bcos bu dang /
304a4(mdo sde): chos gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba nas mchod pa'i bar du byas te bskor ba byas nas chos nyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
304a5(mdo sde): sngar 'khod do/ /bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten bdud kyi ris brgyad khri dang de nas '+dzam+bu'i gling 'dir babs nas dge sbyong gau ta mas sku yangs pa kun tu
304a6(mdo sde): bstan pa ji ltar rgyun bcad pa mthong ste/ de yul ma ga d+ha na bzhugs par kun tu snang ngo / /de bdag cag gis skrag pas sgyu'i stobs las ma nyams sam
304a7(mdo sde): snyam zhing / da lta na 'khor dang bcas te 'dus pa'i nang du 'dug na/ de bdag cag gi phyir 'dug nas sdig pa mi byed dam snyam ste/ gang bdag cag gis
304b1(mdo sde): der dang por song nas 'di la rgyu gang yin par 'gyur ba mnyan par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /de nas bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten 'khor dang bcas te de nas
304b2(mdo sde): babs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ de'i tshe'ang des tshigs su bcad pa spobs par
304b3(mdo sde): byas pa| khyod kyis nad ni chen po dag / rga shi'i mtsho las ma rgal to/ /'di ltar sems can slu byed na/ /byang grol du ni ji ltar zhugs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
304b4(mdo sde): bdud shor ba tshul khrims rten la tshigs su bcad nas slar bka' stsal pa/ nga ni sems can chu bo rgal/ /nga la yang srid med pa yin/ /sems can rnams la thug
304b5(mdo sde): brtse'i phyir/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /'khor bar yun ring brtsams nas su/ /khyod kyis byang chub phyir spyad de/ /mar me mdzad ni tshun chad du/ /sbyin
304b6(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims kun tu bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong po/ /de dag khyod kyis ri mor byas/ /theg pa mchog gi don du ni/ /nga yis khyod la lung bstan te/ /
304b7(mdo sde): sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun tu spyad/ /mtshan ma med par rnam par bsgoms/ /nga yis mig rnam dag pa byin/ /sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par byos/ /de nas bdud sher
305a1(mdo sde): tshul khrims rten sngon gyi tshe rabs dang / smon lam dang / sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
305a2(mdo sde): k yis bskul bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rtswa bkram pa lta bur 'ongs par gyur te gdong mchi ma dang bcas pas thal mo rab tu sbyar nas 'di skad
305a3(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa ji lta ba dang / myos pa ji lta ba dang / sems 'khrug pa ji lta ba bzhin du nongs pa 'chags lags so/ /
305a4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das| nongs pa 'chags lags so/ /'di ltar bdag gis dran lags te/ grangs ma mchis pa gcig rdzogs par bla na ma mchis
305a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu brtson pa chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa spyad lags so/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su spyad pa mang du bgyis
305a6(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa rnams bzhugs pa brgya stong phrag bye ba la bdag gis bsnyen bkur ba dang / bkur sti rnam pa
305a7(mdo sde): sna tshogs bgyis te chos kyang thos lags so/ /smon lam yang btab lags so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab la dge slong la la nyan thos
305b1(mdo sde): kyi gtam rjes su skul bar bgyid lags te/ de nas bdag gis ma bsam par kye ma dge sbyong gi lus byad kyis gang zag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
305b2(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi mdun du nyan thos kyi gtam 'chad pa 'di ni/ bdud do/ /zhes sdig can gyis tshig brjod lags te/ der gal te bdag gis sdig can gyi tshig
305b3(mdo sde): de ma smras par gyur na ni/ der bdag gis bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur lags na/ sug las kyi
305b4(mdo sde): lhag ma des bdag de nas shi 'phos nas bdud kyi gnas su skyes te/ dgung lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / dgung lo brgya stong dag tu der bla na ma mchis
305b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag gi sems bskyed pa gcig kyang ma byung lags na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags
305b6(mdo sde): zhes de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la lan gnyis kyi bar du bzod pa gsol to/ /ji srid du sngon gyi mtha'i 'khor bar 'khor ba de srid du slad kyis
305b7(mdo sde): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro lags kyi/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems ldog par ni/ mi bgyid
306a1(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /gang la la snying rje'i sems kyis byang chub tu
306a2(mdo sde): sems gzhol bar byed na/ 'di ni/ 'dren pa rnams la mchod pa mchog dang phul yin te/ 'dren pa'i spyan sngar la la mar me ri rab tsam du 'bar bar byed
306a3(mdo sde): kyang bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/ khyod longs shig /nga la sdig pa'i las sra ba 'or cig /phung po dang khams 'di dag la spros pa
306a4(mdo sde): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad dran par byos shig dang / khyod yon tan mchog tu kha lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de nyid kyi tshe byang chub
306a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten gyis rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'
306a6(mdo sde): s ems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rten stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la rin thang med pa'i mu tig gi rgyan phreng gis sku la g.yogs nas gsol
306a7(mdo sde): pa| gang bdag cag gis chos thams cad myur du rtogs nas dbu ba dang 'dra ba'i lta ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms par bgyid pa dang / byang chub
306b1(mdo sde): tu ni| bzod pa mchog thob par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring po mi thogs par sems can thams cad thar par bgyid pa'i chos ni/ gang lags/ gang zhig ni/ byang
306b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpas spang ba'i slad du sgom par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshul khrims rten/ mkhas pas chos bzhi myur du bskyed
306b3(mdo sde): par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi phyir sdug bsngal tshad med pa thams cad la spro bar bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi bslab pa dpag yas pa
306b4(mdo sde): gzung bar bya ba yin/ ma nyams par gzung bar bya ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin no/ /yang de'i
306b5(mdo sde): tshe tshul khrims rten gyi 'khor bdud kyi sde brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis lung bstan pa de thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dang / dang ba mchog skyes
306b6(mdo sde): shing gus pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa gsol bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
306b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab ste/ de dag thams cad kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la de dag gis rang rang
307a1(mdo sde): gi lha rdzas kyi chos gos dag sku la gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /bdud sdig can gyis mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang yang shes
307a2(mdo sde): cher 'khrugs shing skrag nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /dge sbyong gi ni ltor chud pas/ /'khor de dag dang bral bar gyur/ /'di nas gang du dong ba ni/ /thams
307a3(mdo sde): cad de yi dbang du song / /des su yang phyi rol tu ma 'byung zhig /bdud kyi spyod yul 'dir bdag cag gnas par bya'o/ /zhes smras nas myur du grong khyer gyi
307a4(mdo sde): sgo bcad de gab tu bcug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ji ltar nam mkha'i spyan las gsungs pa bzhin du de dag la tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams
307a5(mdo sde): pa gsum po sems can la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa rgya cher bstan par yang dag par brtsam pa mdzad do/ /ri kha
307a6(mdo sde): la ti ya'i rtse mo drang srong thub pa'i gnas su klu gang dag brten cing 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gis lus chung dur mthong ste/ dper na/
307a7(mdo sde): mig sman bsku ba'i thur ma bzhin no/ /ji ltar sngon gyi lus bzhin du yang bzhag par ma nus so/ /slar 'byung bar yang ma nus te/ de dag thams cad 'jigs
307b1(mdo sde): shing skrag la spu zing zhes bya ba'i ba spu'i khung bu byung nas de dag thams cad kyis dga' bo dang nye dga' la rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gi tshe bdag
307b2(mdo sde): cag gi grong du sha sprang dang / sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kun tu byung ba de'i tshe bdag cag gnas thams cad por nas bskyab pa'i phyir
307b3(mdo sde): 'dir zhugs nas 'di nas gang du'ang mchi bar ma nus te/ lus dag kyang chung ngur gyur lags na/ gang gis bdag cag gnas su mchi bar bdag cag bskyab
307b4(mdo sde): tu gsol/ mi 'jigs pa stsal bar gsol/ dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis kyang smras pa/ dge sbyong 'di ni g.yo sgyu can gyis blo/ /shAkya'i bu pho sgyu ma
307b5(mdo sde): byed pa yin/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'dir zhugs par gyur nas su/ /lus kun la ni thams cad chud par gyur/ /des ni klu rnams kun gyi gnas dag tu/ /sha sbrang sbrang
307b6(mdo sde): bu mchu ring sbrang bu sprul/ /sa 'di bskyab phyir nged cag lhags gyur te/ /thams cad stobs rnams las ni nyams par gyur/ /gau ta ma ni blo gros g.yo can
307b7(mdo sde): yang / /las des rdzu 'phrul de las nyams gyur cing / /de ni lus kyang chung ngur gyur nas su/ /stan gyi steng na mdangs ni kun tu snang / /des ni bdag cag lus
308a1(mdo sde): kyang chung dur byas/ /btson ra 'dir ni bcings par gyur nas su/ /nged cag ci yang byed par mi nus kyi/ /mi 'jigs
308a2(mdo sde): lha la khyed cag phyag 'tshol cig / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud sdig can la klu de dag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ gang bdag cag
308a3(mdo sde): btson ra de nas 'byer ba dang / rang rang gi gnas rnams su gnas par rngo thogs par bdag cag bskyab tu gsol/ klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bus
308a4(mdo sde): de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdud dpung bcas pa rang nyid skrag nas su/ /gau ta ma sgyu ma g.yo sgyu can la skyo/ /'khor dang lto gol rnams kyang
308a5(mdo sde): g.yo yis su/ /des ni de yi skye bo mang po 'phrog/ bdud la mthu ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /'gro ba dang ni rdzu 'phrul de las nyams/ /gzhan la khyed
308a6(mdo sde): cag myur du skyabs su dengs/ /lha rnams la ni kun gyis rjed par byos/ /de nas klu thams cad kyang kha cig ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshal
308a7(mdo sde): bar byed de/ kha cig ni/ brgya byin la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ rab 'thab bral la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig na/ yongs su
308b1(mdo sde): dga' ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ 'phrul dga' la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la phyag
308b2(mdo sde): 'tshal bar byed de/ kha cig ni/ tshangs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /klu'i rgyal po thams cad la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha
308b3(mdo sde): dang lha dbang 'di kun 'khod nas su/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / /gau tam dmangs la thams cad skyabs gnas pa/ /khyed cag gi ni ci yi
308b4(mdo sde): phyir ma mthong / /dka' thub drag po drang srong chen po dag /gzhan rnams la ni grogs dag khyed phyag 'tshol/ /rtas bsrungs mthon 'phur skar ma dga' ba
308b5(mdo sde): dang / /ngan spong bu la ci phyir phyag mi 'tshal/ /de nas klu de dag thams cad kha cig ni/ drang srong rab tu dpal ldan la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/
308b6(mdo sde): brtan po la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ rtas bsrungs la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ mthon por 'phur la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /
308b7(mdo sde): kha cig ni/ skar ma la dga' ba la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /kha cig ni/ drang srong ngan srong gi bu la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/ /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa
309a1(mdo sde): de dag la skyabs su nye bar dong ngo / /yang de'i tshe drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa de dag gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos
309a2(mdo sde): la drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i mdun na shAkya khyu mchog gi yon tan bsngags pa nyan cing 'khod do/ /drang srong de dag gis klu thams cad 'o dod 'bod
309a3(mdo sde): pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang drang srong lnga po de dag stan las langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces smras
309a4(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu thams cad gnod par gyur cing bdag cag la skyabs su nye bar gnas pa gzigs sam/
309a5(mdo sde): bzhengs te der bzhud la klu'i sde thams cad yongs su thar par mdzod cig /des smras pa/ khyed dengs shig/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag
309a6(mdo sde): mang po 'di dag nga'i mdun du 'khod nas tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa yongs su 'dri bar byed de/ ngas de dag gi sems yongs su mgu bar bya'o/ /de
309a7(mdo sde): n as skar ma la dga' ba'i rkang pa gnyis la drang srong de dag thams cad mgo bos byas btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ste
309b1(mdo sde): drang srong thub pa'i gnas kyi gzhi rten du 'khod do/ /de nas de dag la klu de dag mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod bsod nams can shes rab
309b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa thabs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang srong chen po lags na/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ btson ra'i 'jigs pa 'di las bdag
309b3(mdo sde): cag yongs su dgrol bar gsol/ de nas drangs rong de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /nged kyis ni/ khyed 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par mi nus so/ /lag
309b4(mdo sde): 'gro'i bdag po dag/ /gangs kyi nub phyogs kyi ngos la drang srong thams cad kyi bla ma/ dbang che bar grags pa/ shes rab dang thabs dang gzi brjid chen pos rgyas
309b5(mdo sde): pa skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ des khyed 'di nas yongs su grol bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la phyag 'tshol cig /de thos nas klu thams cad drang
309b6(mdo sde): srong skar ma la dga' ba la thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas dbyangs gcig gis 'o dod pos so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad can drang srong
309b7(mdo sde): skar ma la dga' ba'i lha dang / mi'am ci dang / gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag mang pos mdun du ba dar cing yongs su bskor te/ de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis chas nas
