310a2(mdo sde): gang bdag cag rang gi gnas su mchis nas dga' bar 'gyur bar bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ gnas 'di nas bdag cag yongs su dgrol bar
310a3(mdo sde): gsol| dus shes pa/ dus la lta ba drang srong chen po des kyang rkyen gyi dbang gis de dag la rgyu skar gyi go rim gyi gtam brtsams pa/ ji ltar thams cad thar 'gyur
310a4(mdo sde): ba| |de bzhin du ni shes par bya/ /khyed la phan pa gzhan med kyi/ /mthar gyis su ni mnyan par gyis/ /'dir ni nab so gang gnas pa/ /de ni dbyar zla tha chung ste/ /de ni
310a5(mdo sde): nyi ma lha yin zhing / /klu rnams kun dang 'brel pa yis/ /skar ma'i dpyad ni phongs pa dang / /snying por drang srong sbyor bas bstan/ /gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma rnams/ /nam
310a6(mdo sde): mkha' la ni su yis bzhag / mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bgyid pa/ /lo skor shes pa bshad du gsol/ /zla pa nyi ma rgyu skar dang / /gza' rnams 'gro ba ji ltar lags/ /
310a7(mdo sde): zla ba rnams kyi dang por ni/ /rgyu skar gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ /zla ba'i yud tsam gang zhig lags/ /go rim yang ni ci 'dra lags/ /lha ni ci lags rus ci lags/ /lci ba
310b1(mdo sde): ci lags yang ba gang / /phan pa ci lags gnod pa ci/ /stobs ci bdag la myur du gsungs/ /gang gis su ni mtshan mo 'thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na ci zhig lags/ /grib
310b2(mdo sde): ma'i gom ba du zhig tu/ /nyi ma 'khor bar bgyid pa lags/ /zla ba gang la lho phyogs su/ /nyi ma byang du ji ltar gnas/ /drang srong khyod la kun zhu na/ /bdag cag la ni
310b3(mdo sde): kun ston cig / shes rab chen pos 'jig rten mkhas/ /skar la dga' bas de skad smras/ /bskal pa bzang po zhugs pa na/ /sngon chang byung ba kye lag 'gro/ /dpal
310b4(mdo sde): ldan grong khyer lnga len du/ /'dod pa spangs shing chos dang ldan/ /gtsang ma 'dod cing rab mkhas pa'i/ /mi rgyal 'byor pa chen po byung / /de yi btsun mo dam pa ni/ /
310b5(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la 'chums gyur nas/ /de tshe yul ni dben par yang / /gzu lums can dang lhan cig spyad/ /mngal ni smin par bya ba'i phyir/ /yang dang yang du spyad
310b6(mdo sde): nas su| |de tshe chos kyis sbrum par gyur/ /mi sdug pa yi khye'u zhig byung / /bong bu'i mgo la bong mgrin po/ /bong rna pa la bong gdong po/ /thams cad rtsub po ral pa can//
310b7(mdo sde): mi yi lus ni phyed yod pa/ /de mthong 'jigs nas myur du ni/ /snam phyi sar ni de bor ro/ /reg tu mi rung mi gtsang ba/ /de phyir srin mo bong mos blangs/ /gangs kyi
311a1(mdo sde): gnas su song nas su/ /bu la chags pas gsos pa yin/ /bcud kyis len ni 'thungs pas na/ /de tshe lha dang lhan cig
311a2(mdo sde): 'grogs/ /shes rab chen po skal ldan po/ /rab tu brtson ldan snying rje'i sems/ /gzi brjid chen po byams pa thob/ /sems can kun la phan byed pa'o/ /
311a3(mdo sde): lha yi tshogs kyang 'dus nas su/ /rnga bong la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /de la yang ni snying brtse'i phyir/ /gangs kyi ri po sprul pa byas/ /shing dang me tog 'bras
311a4(mdo sde): bur ldan/ /dri zhim dga' bar byad pa ste/ /sna tshogs rtsi yis khebs pa la/ /bya rnams sna tshogs brten pa yin/ /der ni drang srong rnga bong de/ /rnam par
311a5(mdo sde): dben par brten nas su/ /lo ni drug khri tham par yang / /rkang pa gcig gis dka' thub gnas/ /brgya byin tshangs pas phyag byas te/ /lha rnams kun gyis
311a6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod/ /gzugs rten lha rnams thams cad dang / /der ni tshangs pa nye bar 'ongs/ /'dod rten lha rnams thams cad dang / /der ni brgya byin nye bar
311a7(mdo sde): 'ongs| |klu dang gnod sbyin grul bum dag / thams cad der ni nye bar lhags/ /'jig rten gang su mkhas pa ni/ /drang srong tshangs par spyod pa rnams/ /'dod
311b1(mdo sde): pa'i khams dang gzugs khams pa/ /thams cad der ni nye bar lhags/ /kun gyi drang srong rnga bong la/ /mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /btud nas thal mo sbyar byas
311b2(mdo sde): te| |brgya byin tshangs pas 'di skad smras/ /skal ldan chen po kye khyod ni/ /ci phyir ded la mngon par dga'/ /re ba ci 'dra ci la bsam/ /ci 'dod pa ni smra
311b3(mdo sde): bar bgyis/ /drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/ /gza' dang rgyus kar skar ma rnams/ /mkha' la ci 'drar byung gyur pa'i/ /sngon gyi bskal pa bdag gis dran/ /nyin
311b4(mdo sde): zhag tu ni rgyu skar rnams/ /re re nas ni rgyu bar byed/ /tshe rabs kun tu rgyu skar gyi/ /yon tan las rnams rnam par shes/ /bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni/ /'di ni ci yang
311b5(mdo sde): mi snang na/ /snying brtser gyis de khyod kyis ni/ /rgyu skar go rim kun zhog cig /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dir gnas bzhin/ /de yi las dang yon tan gsungs/ /yon tan rgya
311b6(mdo sde): mtshos shod cig ces/ /lha yi tshogs rnams kun gyis smras/ /drang srong rnga bong gis smras pa/ /re zhig dang por smin drug ces/ /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ /
311b7(mdo sde): nang gi dang por gzhag par bya/ /ji ltar smin drug gzhag pa bzhin/ /'di la su zhig dad pa 'bul/ /lha yi bu ni nyi ma yang / /skar ma drug po ston par byed/ /smin
312a1(mdo sde): drug rgyu skar de dag ni/ /mkha' la rtag tu rgyu bar shog /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor dga' nas/ /me lha zhig ni sprul pa ba yas//
312a2(mdo sde): gzi brjid chen po drang srong lha/ /me bzhin 'jug gi bus smras pa/ /bdag gi sring mo'i bu 'di dag /gling bzhi par ni gnas par shog /drang srong rnga bong
312a3(mdo sde): slar smras pa/ /dang por smin drug de dag yin/ /rgyu skar chu yi rus can ni/ /gnyis pa yang ni yin par bya/ /skye rgu'i bdag gis 'di skad smras//
312a4(mdo sde): bdag gis bu lnga dbul lags te/ /rus ni drang srong chen po chu/ /rab tu brtson ldan snar ma lags/ /chu yi rus kyi rgyu skar ni/ /snar ma'i ming
312a5(mdo sde): gis gnyis pa lags/ /zla ba'i bu pho gsum po ni/ /ming ni mgo zhes bgyi ba lags/ /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza'i rus su ni/ /mgo zhes bgyi ba gzhag
312a6(mdo sde): pa lags/ /rab tu mi zad lag ces bya/ /lha drag rnams kyis bstan pa lags/ /ljang sngo'i bu yi bu rus su/ /de ni bzhi bar gzhag pa lags/ /
312a7(mdo sde): drang srong bcas pa'i lha tshogs kyis/ /nyi ma'i bu ni bstan lags te/ /nab so lags shing gnas 'jog rus/ /phur bu'i bu ni gsum lags te//
312b1(mdo sde): lag gi bu yi rus lags shing / /rgyal zhes bgyi bar de dag bshad/ /sa srung gi ni bu lnga ba/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa mkhas pa rnams/ /mdza' bo'i bu yi
312b2(mdo sde): rus lags te/ /de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun/ /shar phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su gzhag /de yi las dang go rim dang / /sbyor ba kha 'dzin gzung las bstan//
312b3(mdo sde): ngas kyang yang ni khyed cag la/ /gling bzhi pa ni gnas byed cing / /las ni ci 'dra sgrub byed pa/ /mdor ni myur du bshad bar bya/ /phur bu yi ni bu lnga po/ /
312b4(mdo sde): byang grol brtul zhugs 'chang ba dag /ser skya'i bu yi rus su ni/ /lho yi phyogs su ngas gzhag go /dbyangs can gyi ni bu gnyis po/ /ming gis kyang ni
312b5(mdo sde): gra yin te/ /drang srong gau tam rus su ni/ /lho yi phyogs su ngas gzhag go /lha mo yi ni bu gnyis pa/ /ming gis kyang ni dbo yin te/ /kau Di n+ya yi rus
312b6(mdo sde): su ni| |lho phyogs kha 'dzin gsum pa gzhag / sdig pa yi ni bu bstan pa/ /drang srong kA ta'i bu yi rus/ /lhar bcas drang srong rnams kyis der/
312b7(mdo sde): me bzhi zhes ni bya bar gzhag /dri za'i bu ni nag pa ste/ /kA tA'i bu yi rus yin no/ /sa ri de ni ma yi bu/ /ka tA'i bu chen rus yin no/ /'dir ni sa ga
313a1(mdo sde): dpal gyi bu/ /kA tA'i bu rgan rus yin te/ /drang srong rnams kyis rgyu skar bdun/ /lho phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su
313a2(mdo sde): gzhag / mdza' bo'i bu yi bu bzhi po/ /drag po'i bu yi rus yin te/ /ming gis lha mtshams zhes bya ba/ /nub phyogs su ni gzhag pa yin//
313a3(mdo sde): dbang po yi ni bu gsum ste/ /zla ba kA tA'i bu yi rus/ /'jam pa'i las ni thams cad la/ /gnyis pa snron ni gzhag pa yin/ /sa yi lha
313a4(mdo sde): mo'i bu gsum ste/ /snubs ni lag pa'i bu yi rus/ /rgyal ba'i lha mo'i bu bzhi ste/ /kA tA'i bu yi rus yin no/ /thams cad lha zhes bya ba bzhi//
313a5(mdo sde): maud+gal bu yi rus yin no/ /snubs dang chu stong chu smad gnyis/ /rgyu skar gsum pa gzhag pa yin/ /sred med bu yi bu gsum po/ /rgyu skar
313a6(mdo sde): rnams ni byi bzhin 'khod/ /khyab 'jug gi ni bu gsum ste/ /kA tA'i bu pho dpal gyi rus/ /de ltar de dag rgyu skar bdun/ /nub phyogs
313a7(mdo sde): kyi ni kha 'dzin yin/ /nor lha'i bu ni mon gru ste/ /drang srong rna ba'i rus yin no/ /chu lha'i bu ni gcig pu ste/ /deb rtse'i bu yi rus yin zhing / /
313b1(mdo sde): sman ma sprul gyi lha mo yin/ /rgyu skar mon gre gnas pa yin/ /sdig pa yi ni bu gnyis te/ /khrums stod ces ni bya bar bshad/ /chu yi rna ba'i rus su
313b2(mdo sde): ni| |gsum pa 'di ni gzhag pa yin/ /lha yi drang srong chu lha'i bu/ /khrums smad ces ni bya bar bshad/ /bra nye drang srong rus yin par/ /bzhi pa 'di ni
313b3(mdo sde): gzhag pa yin/ /lha yi drang srong rgyal gyi bu/ /nam gru zhes bya de bstan te/ /drang srong dbang po'i rus su ni/ /lnga pa 'di ni gzhag pa yin/ /dri za'i rgyal
313b4(mdo sde): po'i bu gsum ste/ /lnga len bu yi rus yin zhing / /rgyu skar tha skar zhes bya ba/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rnams kyis gzhag /drag po'i bu ni gsum yin te/ /bra nye
313b5(mdo sde): ngan spong rus yin no/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /byang phyogs kha 'dzin rnams su gzhag /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po/ kha 'dzin bzhir ni gzhung las bshad/ /gtor
313b6(mdo sde): ma las dang yon tan rnams/ /mdor na nga yis bshad par bya/ /thams cad rab tu thal sbyar 'khod/ /lha dang shed las skyes rnams kyis/ /drang srong
313b7(mdo sde): rnga bong la ni smras/ /mi dge sngon du 'gro ba'i las/ /gang byas khyod ni mi sdug skyes/ /gang du thams cad myur zad 'gyur/ /'di ni lha dang mi rnams
314a1(mdo sde): dang / /drang srong dag ni zhi ba rnams/ /thams cad gzugs ni bzang bor gyur/ /rigs dang snyan ldan de dag kun/ /drang srong rnga bong de la
314a2(mdo sde): ni| |brgya byin lhan cig 'khod nus su/ /'khor kun rangs te thal sbyar gyur/ /bsam pa gcig tu smras pa ni/ /nam mkha' 'di la rgyu skar ni/ /gang zhig dang por rgyu
314a3(mdo sde): bar byed/ /kha zas su ni ci za shod/ /mi rnams kyi ni las ci sgrub/ /yid ni ji srid rgyu bar byed/ /drang srong de dag thams cad la/ /rnga bong gis ni 'di skad smras/ /
314a4(mdo sde): ji ltar nga yis brjod pa bzhin/ /'dir ni khyed kyis dad pa phul/ /rgyu skar 'di la ngas mchog phyin/ /de ni khyod la brjod par bya/ /go rim shes pa nga bdag bzhin/ /gling
314a5(mdo sde): bzhi'i sems can phan pa'i phyir/ /lo skor yang ni shes par bya/ /dang por nyi ma gang yin pa/ /ngas byas pa ni nga yi mig /bu drug g.yo can sems rangs pa/ /de ni
314a6(mdo sde): nga yis dang por brjod/ /de yi phyir na smin drug ni/ /rgyu skar tshogs ni thams cad du/ /nang gi gtso bor 'gyur bar shog /zla ba nya dang nyi ma yi/ /nyin mtshan de
314a7(mdo sde): dag mnyam par gnas/ /mtshan mo gzhan ni mun khyab dang / /chu lha yang ni gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro ba bzod pa bgrang ba dang / /bra nye gnas bzhin 'di ltar
314b1(mdo sde): bshad| |mon sran bcu drug brgyar bsgyur te/ /skyes bu dang ni brgyad pa gcig /brgyad pa phrag ni bcu drug la/ /cha ni gcig tu 'gyur ba yin/ /cha ni drug cu tham
314b2(mdo sde): pa la| |yud tsam gcig ni de yin no/ /de tsam yud tsam sum cu la/ /'dir ni 'jig rten gnas pa yin/ /ri rab g.yas nas bskor ba'i tshe/ /yud tsam sum
314b3(mdo sde): cus 'gro bar byed/ /'dir ni mon sran tshod ma za/ /rgyal po nad pas 'gro ba kun/ /zhag bcu tham par thar par gyis/ /rtag tu dad pas mtshon chas bsrungs/ /
314b4(mdo sde): mchog sbyin khyod kyis bu skye gang / /tshong pa dbang po thul ba dang / /chos kyi blo gros nab so la/ /mngal du nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni gre la bya ba
314b5(mdo sde): mang / /chu smad bra nye gsum pa yin/ /me bzhi snar ma gro bzhin ni/ /nor rgud byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /snubs dang skag dang nam gru ni/ /lam dag gi ni rgyu skar
314b6(mdo sde): yin| |khrums stong dang ni snron dang ni/ /rgyal dang yang ni khrums smad ni/ /phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin/ /mchu dang chu stod tha skar dang / /mon gru dang ni smin
314b7(mdo sde): drug dang / /dbo zhes bya ba dag gis ni/ /bde ba sgrub par byed pa yin/ /'dir ni mgo dang nag pa dang / /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /sa ri lag ni rnam drug
315a1(mdo sde): gis| |grogs po dang ni grogs mchog 'gyur/ /lha yi dbang pos 'di skad smras/ /snron gyi tshe na tshe gnyis la/ /yud tsam sum cur mi zad
315a2(mdo sde): par| |bya phyir mkha' la khyod gnas kyi/ /khyod kyis kyang ni la phug dang / /bu ram zas la gnas par gyis/ /nad pa zhag ni bcu gsum khrol/ /da ltar skye rgu skye ba
315a3(mdo sde): med| |shin tu tshul 'chal snying rje spangs/ /mchod sbyin dang ni skye ba dang / /snron la skye che rtag tu ni/ /mngal du mtshams sbyor srung bar gyis/ /nag pa dang ni mon
315a4(mdo sde): gru dang / /mgo la grags pa mang du byed/ /byi bzhin dang ni gre dang dbo/ /las dag gi ni rgyu skar yin/ /khrums stod dang ni khrums smad ni/ /rgud byed chu dang chu
315a5(mdo sde): stod dang / /tha skar phun sum tshogs par byed/ /snubs dang skag dang nam grub dang / /mon gre me bzhi snar ma ni/ /bde ba sgrub par byed pa yin/ /bra nye dang ni gre dang
315a6(mdo sde): ni| |chu smad mdza' bo'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /khrums stod dang ni sa ri dang / /mon gru dang ni nab so dang / /sa ga dang ni lag kyang ni/ /'dir ni rnam pa drug tu
315a7(mdo sde): 'gyur| |lha yi drang srong des gsob kyi/ /snubs bshad pa ni tshes gsum la/ /yud tsam sum cur nam mkha' la/ /bya ba che chung khyod gnas kyi/ /zas ni
315b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu la phug dang / /bdug pa dang ni me tog ste/ /zhag ni sum cur bdag nyid kyis/ /nad pa yang ni thar par byed/ /gang zhig spyod par byed pas ni/ /skye rgu mi skye nor
315b2(mdo sde): dang 'bru/ /skal ldan skyes bu'i rnam pa dang / /sa la las ni byed par 'gyur/ /mgo la mngal du mtshams sbyor ba/ /rta dang yang ni rnga mo dang / /glang po che dang khyu mchog
315b3(mdo sde): dang / /dred dang bcas pa'i rnam par 'gyur/ /chu stod dang ni gre dang ni/ /bra nye dang ni gsum pa ste/ /'jig pa'i rgyur 'gyur skag dang snrubs/ /de la 'phel
315b4(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur/ /nam gru bgrang dang mnyam 'gyur te/ /mon gru las ni rgyu skar yin/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang / /de la rgud par byed par 'gyur/ /lha
315b5(mdo sde): mtshams nab so gsum pa yin/ /lag ni de la rgud byed 'gyur/ /sa ga dang ni mon gre yang / /gsum pa zhes ni bya ba yin/ /tha skar de la sgrub par 'gyur/ /chu
315b6(mdo sde): stod zla ba gnyis pa ste/ /snron dang rgyal zhes bya ba yang / /de la bde bar byed par 'gyur/ /khrums smad ces ni bya ba ni/ /grogs dang grogs po mchog tu 'gyur//
315b7(mdo sde): drug po 'di dag lag dang ni/ /gro bzhin snar ma gsum pa yin/ /smin drug ces ni bya ba yang / /byi bzhin dang ni dbo yin no/ /'di ni khron pa sa rir gyur/ /me lha
316a1(mdo sde): yin te sa gas bshad/ /gling bzhir tshes ni bco lnga la/ /khyod spyod yud tsam bzhi bcu lngas/ /'gro bar byed cing bya ba ni/ /chen po mi
316a2(mdo sde): zad pa yis gnas/ /zhag ni bco lnga tham par yang / /nad pa yang ni thar par gyis/ /su zhig kyang ni khyod kyi bur/ /dag par rjes su skye 'gyur ba/ /gzi brjid
316a3(mdo sde): dang ni dpal dang ni/ /longs spyod dga' ba 'bar bar 'gyur/ /bud med brnab sems shin tu srungs/ /de skye'i rgyu skar lag yin no/ /de'i las rgyu skar mon gre
316a4(mdo sde): yin| |mchu dang tha skar chu stod rgyu/ /smin drug ces ni bya ba la/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin/ /byi bzhin dang ni dbo yang ni/ /'dir ni rgud par byed pa yin/ /
316a5(mdo sde): khrums stod dang ni snron dang ni/ /nab so yang ni gsum pa ste/ /lha mtshams zhes ni bya bar yang / /de ni phun sum tshogs byed yin/ /nab so khrums stod snrubs
316a6(mdo sde): dang ni| |nam gru skag ni bde byed yin/ /gre dang yang ni chu smad dang / /gsum pa bra nye sgrub pa yin/ /mdza' bo dang ni mdza' mchog tu/ /de dag der ni 'gyur ba
316a7(mdo sde): yin| |nag pa snar ma mon gru bzhin/ /mgo gnyis me bzhir gro bzhin yang / /'dir ni de bdun lho phyogs kyi/ /kha 'dzin phrugs zhes bya ba yin/ /'phags
316b1(mdo sde): pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu pa/ mdza' bshes kyi ni lha mo yis/ /yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la//
316b2(mdo sde): 'gro bar byed pa'i go rim yang / /lha mtshams la ni smras pa yin/ /bra nye tshes ni bco lnga yi/ /nyin par yang ni yud tsam yin/ /mtshan mo yang ni de tsam ste/ /nyin
316b3(mdo sde): mtshan gcig la bra nye yin/ /chu yi lha mo de yang ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du mnyam pa ste/ /yud tsam sum du tham pa ste/ /de yi longs spyod thang gcig shog /rgyal
316b4(mdo sde): po legs brtan snying rje spangs/ /mthun par yul 'khor skyong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin du ni mi zad pa'i/ /bra nye yang ni 'gro bar shog /'dzam gling 'di la ston par shog /
316b5(mdo sde): de bzhin khyed cag thams cad kyis/ /de la dmod pa bor bar gyis/ /de bzhin 'gro la bstan par gyis/ /kun gyis smras pa/ /de bzhin rtag tu gyur par shog /mi zad
316b6(mdo sde): pa yi bya ba gyis/ /khyod kyis spyod pas gang skye ba/ /mi yi thu bo mi zad 'gyur/ /de yi mngal 'jug chu stod yin/ /bra nye la ni skyes pa'i mi/ /'chi ba'i tshe na lha mtshams
316b7(mdo sde): dang / /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ /'di la mkhas pas brtag bya ste/ /sa ri mon gru ma yin gzhi/ /dmag 'gro rtsod pa'i gnas dag gis/ /bya spang spu gri'i las
317a1(mdo sde): mi bya| |snar ma me bzhi byi bzhin ni/ /rgud byed dgra rnams khyod kyis gzhom/ /khyod kyi las ni che chung kun/ /gre yi tshe na bya bar gyis//
317a2(mdo sde): chu smad dang ni dbo yang ni/ /phun sum tshogs par byed par brjod/ /sman rnams brten bya sbyin dang dul/ /gos dang rgyan gyi bya ba'ang brjod/ /mgo dang nag pa
317a3(mdo sde): zhes bya dang / /gro bzhin mchu ni bde bar byed/ /sa ga nab so mon gre ste/ /de dag lam 'jug sgrub pa yin/ /skag dang snubs zhes bya ba dang / /tha skar dang ni
317a4(mdo sde): mchu dang gri / grogs po mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /bsgrub tu mi rung las kyang gyis/ /'di tshe khri bzhon gos dang mal/ /mdza' bo rnams la'ang brtsam par
317a5(mdo sde): bya| |nyi ma'i bu ni mig dmar te/ /drang srong chen po der dpang btsugs/ /bcu gnyis khyim dus gnas de nas/ /der yod las mthun grib gom drug/ /der ni
317a6(mdo sde): dus kyang mnyam pa yin/ /nyin dang mtshan kyang mtshungs pa yin/ /de yod tha skar mtshan ma gang / /lha mtshams nyin par gnas pa na/ /khyod kyis nga ni
317a7(mdo sde): spang bar gyis/ /mkha' la spyod cing khyod kyis ston/ /gling bzhi pa ni mgu bya phyir/ /'di ni ji ltar lhags pa bzhin/ /ngas 'dir gang zhig yang dag
317b1(mdo sde): brjod/ /lha yi drang srong kun dga' 'gyur/ /de bzhin khyod ni kun tu song / /smin drug de bzhin me yi lha/ /bdag nyid gling bzhi der gnas shing / /khyed kyis me
317b2(mdo sde): bzhin myur bya gyis/ /yud tsam sum cur tshal du song / /der gang mi yi zas 'byung ba/ /dam pa'i grags dang longs spyod kyang / /zla nya khyod 'dir yang legs
317b3(mdo sde): rdzogs| |de ltar nga yis thob pa yin/ /zhag bzhi tham par nad pa ni/ /myur ba kho nar thar par gyis/ /mngal du 'jug pa me bzhi bsrungs/ /chu stod 'chi bar byed
317b4(mdo sde): pa yin| |skag khrums stod smad nab so dang / /mon gre 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /khyod kyis bya ba 'di spongs shig /dmag dang rtsod pa'i gnas 'gro dang / /spu gri yi ni
317b5(mdo sde): las rnams so/ /gro bzhin dang ni nag pa dang / /mgo ni rgud par byed pa yin/ /lag dang dbo ni 'dir 'joms byed/ /bye ba'i bya ba 'di gyis shig /che dang chung ba
317b6(mdo sde): gang ci yang / /snar mas phun sum tshogs par byed/ /byi bzhin dang ni nag par bcas/ /der ni bya ba gang rtsi dang / /gom pa sbyin pa gos dang mal/ /der ni rgyan gyis
317b7(mdo sde): brgyan par bya/ /lag ni bde bar byed pa ste/ /mon gru dang ni sa ri yang / /gsum po dag ni de dag yin/ /lam du 'jug pa'ang de dag yin/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams
318a1(mdo sde): khrums stod ni/ /las dag sgrub par byed pa yin/ /mchu snrubs skag dang khrums smad dang / /de dang de rnams drag byed grogs

318a3(mdo sde): bdag gis dus kun brjod/ /khyod ci drang srong lha mi dga'/ /bdag gis byed de bshad pa bzhin/ /lha dbang drang srong 'khor dang bcas/ /mi yis thal sbyar
318a4(mdo sde): 'di skad smras/ /'byung po kun la phan pa khyod/ /'gro ba la ni skyob pa khyod/ /de ltar shes mnyam ji bzhin khyod/ /yang smras pa/ /rnga bong can gyi drang srong ste//
318a5(mdo sde): snar ma chu yi rigs kyang yin/ /chu yi lha mo khyod yin na/ /gsum par yang ni 'gro bar gyis/ /byed pa chung dang 'bring yin zhing / /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga tham pa
318a6(mdo sde): yin| |yud tsam du ni khyod kyis 'gro / dug dang sha ni zas yin no/ /khyod la spyod par byed pa yis/ /gang dag mi rnams skye 'gyur ba/ /de dag phyug cing

318b1(mdo sde): bzhin te/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod 'phel/ /dmag 'gro bag ma gtong ba yi/ /gnas nas 'gro bar byed pa dang / /nyo tshong dang ni bzo byed pa/ /de
318b2(mdo sde): 'dra ba yi bya ba spongs/ /sa ri mon gru de dag 'dir/ /rgud byed dgra 'dir gzhom par bya/ /me bzhi las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /che chung thams cad 'dir gyis shig/
318b3(mdo sde): mgo dang nag pa gro bzhin te/ /de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/ /rtsi byed na yang de dag sten/ /der byin gos rgyan sna tshogs sgrogs/ /nab so dang ni sa ga
318b4(mdo sde): dang / /mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/ /de dag la ni lam du 'jug /snron ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /skag ces bya ba khrums smad ni/ /drag po'i las dag byed pa

318b6(mdo sde): bsham pa yang / /'di la bya ba de 'jug go /yang smras pa/ /'gro ba bzhi dang ldan par ni/ /mgo la khyod ni gnas par 'gyur/ /mi yi las bya myur du
318b7(mdo sde): sgrubs| |yud tsam sum cu 'gro bar gyis/ /zhag brgyad nad pa myur du gsos/ /khyod zas tshon sha zla ba'i lha/ /der ni skye rgu gang dag skye/ /dpa' zhing
319a1(mdo sde): 'byor par 'gyur ba yin/ /khyab 'jug bden 'di shin tu bsrungs/ /de byed ji bzhin nga yis bshad/ /gro bzhin tha skar
319a2(mdo sde): mngal du 'jug / chu gnyis gre dbo 'chi bar byed/ /snron gyi tshe ni bya ba 'phel/ /skag dang gzhan bcas thob par byed/ /lam ring rtsod dang gnas nas
319a3(mdo sde): 'gro / bya ba de 'dra spang bar gyis/ /nab so rgud par byed pa ste/ /mon gre sa ga bzhin du shes/ /gsad pa'i gnas bzhin brtsam par gyis/ /rdzun g.yo
319a4(mdo sde): dmangs kyis 'joms par byed/ /nag pa las kyi rgyu skar te/ /'di la che chung thams cad rtsom/ /lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed/ /mon gru sa ri gzhan
319a5(mdo sde): thob byed/ /'dir ni sman dang sbyin 'dul bzhon/ /rgyan dang gos kyang thob par byed/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams khrums stod bde/ /de dag lam du shin tu 'phrod//
319a6(mdo sde): snrubs dang nam gru mchu sgrub byed/ /'di la gtum po'i las kyang bya/ /me bzhi dgra zin bra nye dang / /snar ma dbyer med chu gnyis bzhin/ /skal bzang
319a7(mdo sde): bag ma gtong dang bzhon/ /mal kun 'dir ni byed du chug /lag lha drag mos de tshe smras/ /tshes lnga la ni khyod gnas te/ /yud tsam bco lnga khyod
319b1(mdo sde): 'gro byed/ /khyod kyi zas ni mar gsar te/ /drag cing mi zad sdang byed sgrub/ /nad pa yang ni zhag bcu yin/ /khyod la spyod pas mi gang skye/ /srid pa gsum du mi
319b2(mdo sde): zad 'gyur/ /nor tshol byed cing chom pos 'chi/ /khyod kyi sbyor bas de yin no/ /mon gru snrubs la mngal du 'jug /chu dang nam grus 'phel bar 'gyur/ /dbo yi
319b3(mdo sde): tshe na 'chi bar byed/ /chu gnyis bra nye ji bzhin no/ /skye dang 'jig dang 'phel ba yi/ /byed pa de ni spong bar gyis/ /lha mtshams dang ni khrums stod der/ /byed pa
319b4(mdo sde): bstan nas rgud par byed/ /sa ri las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /byed pa chung ngu thams cad mjug /sa ga dang ni mon gre dang / /nab so phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums
319b5(mdo sde): smad par ni bde byed yin/ /snon dang skag ni lam na mnyam/ /gre ni sgrub par byed pa ste/ /chu stod tha skar gsum pa yin/ /me bzhi'i bar gzhan grogs mchog ste//
319b6(mdo sde): smin drug nag pa gro bzhin dang / /byi bzhin bag ma gtong dang bzhon/ /mal dang skal pa bzang por sgrub/ /nyi ma'i lha mo nab sos smras/ /tshes drug la yang
319b7(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur/ /sprul sha khyod kyi zas su shog /las kyang drag por bya bar gyis/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'gro /'dir ni nad pa zhag brgyad yin/ /
320a1(mdo sde): khyod spyad su yang mi nang skye/ /zhing pa longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/ /rta dang glang chen zad par 'gro /nab so mngal du 'jug par 'gyur//
320a2(mdo sde): 'di ni mon gre'i zas yin te/ /smin drug la ni 'chi bar byed/ /khrums smad rgud par byed pa yin/ /skag snron las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /sa ga brtul zhugs
320a3(mdo sde): bstan pa yin/ /rgyal yang phun sum tshogs par byed/ /lag dang lha mtshams zhes bya dang / /khrums stod kyang ni bde bar byed/ /mchu dang nam gru bzhin
320a4(mdo sde): du ste| |de dag lam du zhugs na bzang / /bra nye chu smad gre dang dbo/ /sgrub byed nag pa gro bzhin dang / /sa ri snar ma mgo mon gru/ /mi yi nad khyod grogs
320a5(mdo sde): mchog 'gyur/ /rgyal 'dir lha mo phur bu khyod/ /tshes bdun gnas khyod yud sum cu/ /'gro byed bu ram sbrang rtsi zas/ /chos ldan byed chud myur du
320a6(mdo sde): sgrub| |nad kyang zhag lnga kho na ste/ /khyod spyod su yang mi nang ste/ /tshul dga' chos smras mdun 'don blon/ /zhing ring bag gtong de dag 'jig /khrums
320a7(mdo sde): stod dang ni lha mtshams la/ /mngal du 'jug par byed pa ste/ /dbo dang yang ni tha skar dang / /chu smad la ni 'phel bar byed/ /snar ma nag po gro bzhin
320b1(mdo sde): 'chi| |gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /mchu snrubs nam gru de dag gsum/ /rgud byed mkhas pas shes par gyis/ /lha mtshams byed pa thams cad la/ /
320b2(mdo sde): las dag gi ni rgyu skar te/ /mkhas pas shes pa kho nar gyis/ /snron ni phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums smad skag gis thob byed gre /chu stod tha skar gsum
320b3(mdo sde): po bde| |me bzhi sgrub min drug dbyer med/ /de bzhin mkhas pas gsum shes gyis/ /sa ri grogs dang grogs mchog ste/ /mgo dang lag dang mon gru
320b4(mdo sde): bzhin| |sa ga dang ni mon gre yang / /don ni 'bras bur bcas pa yin/ /sprul gyi lha mo skag 'dir smra/ /tshes brgyad la ni khyod gnas kyi/ /yud tsam bco lngas
320b5(mdo sde): khyod 'gro byed/ /god pa'i sha ni zas yin no/ /'gro ba'i nang du gshin rje mi/ /byed pa mi zad khyod gnas kyi/ /nyin der khyod spyod su mir skye/ /khro zhing sdig
320b6(mdo sde): pa can du 'gyur/ /shin tu mi sdug tshul khrims nyams/ /chos gos gding ba zad 'gyur zhing / /khrums smad ces bya rab mchog la/ /mngal du 'jug pa
320b7(mdo sde): ston par byed/ /me bzhi smin drug 'chi bar byed/ /mgo snrubs bre ni ro myangs pas/ /rgud byed chu stod tha skar dang / /snron ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /snrubs dang
321a1(mdo sde): nam gru mchu zhes pa/ /gsum po phun sum tshogs par byed/ /bra nye bde byed gred bo dang / /gro bzhin chu gnyis khyod thos sgrub/ /
321a2(mdo sde): nag pa snar ma mchu gnyis dang / /mon gre lha mtshams sa ga dang / /lag dang nab so de dag grogs/ /khrums stod kyang ni de bzhin no/ /gshin rje'i yi
321a3(mdo sde): dwags lha mos smras/ /tshes dgu la ni khyod gnas shing / /yud tsam sum cur nyin mtshan du/ /til gyi sbyar thug zas yin no/ /sems can byed pa
321a4(mdo sde): chung 'bring sgrubs/ /zhag brgyad tham par nad pa sos/ /gong ma'i bra nye su mir skye/ /bsod nams byed par bshad pa yin/ /rdzun srog shin tu yun ring
321a5(mdo sde): srungs| / snrubs ni las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /'dir yang nam grus mngal du 'jug /sa ga la yang 'chi bar byed/ /lag ces bya ba kho na dang / /mon gre mang
321a6(mdo sde): ni gsum pa yin/ /snar ma dang ni nag pa dang / /gsum pa gro bzhin 'dir dga' byed/ /dbo dang bra nye rgud byed yin/ /chu smang phun sum tshogs par
321a7(mdo sde): byed| |tha skar dang ni gre dang ni/ /mchu gnyis 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /gsum po de dag shes par gyis/ /me bzhi dang ni byi bzhin dang / /smin drug
321b1(mdo sde): rgyal ni bde bar byed/ /sa ri de la sgrub pa yin/ /mgo gnyis dang ni mon gru bcas/ /de gsum rje grogs shes par gyis/ /snron rgyal lha mtshams chu stod dang / /
321b2(mdo sde): nab so lhag par zla ba'ang yin/ /skal ldan lha mo gre yis smras/ /tshes bcu la ni khyed gnas shig /bil ba mar gsar zas yin te/ /yud tsam sum cur khyod
321b3(mdo sde): kyis 'gro/ /'gro 'dir bya ba chung du sgrubs/ /zhag bdun nad pa khyod spyod pas/ /su zhig mir skye dri dga' 'dod/ /gos dang rgyan dag 'dod pa yin/ /bye brag
321b4(mdo sde): phyed rnams su srung ba/ /tha skar la ni mngal 'jug 'gyur/ /nab sos 'chi mgo zin ro myang / /'phel byed smin drug rgud par byed/ /me bzhi'ang mkhas pas
321b5(mdo sde): mngon shes kyis/ /gre zhes bya dang bra nye dang / /chu smad ces ni bya ba gsum/ /phun sum tshogs byed shes par gyis/ /'di ni sa ga mon gre yang / /sgrub yin
321b6(mdo sde): lag la'ang bde ba ste/ /snar ma nag pa gro bzhin nyin/ /mkhas pas grogs gnyis shes par gyis/ /rnam pa drug tu 'gyur ba ni/ /skag dang nam gru rgyal
321b7(mdo sde): dag dang / /snrubs dang snron zhes bya ba dang / /khrums gnyis gang yin 'dir yin no/ /lhag par yang ni de bzhin du/ /thams cad kyang ni bgrang bar
322a1(mdo sde): gyis| |mkhas pa blo gros ldan pa yis/ /rang gi thams cad shes par gyis/ /gre dbo nyi ma'i lha mos smras/ /tshes ni bcu
322a2(mdo sde): gcig khyod gnas kyi/ /yud tsam bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yis/ /khyod ni rnam par grol bar gyis/ /mgo yis las ni chung dus kyang / /sa bon thob cing
322a3(mdo sde): bskyed bya ste/ /zhag bcur nad pa zhi bar gyis/ /khyod spyad skye rgu gang 'byung ba/ /blun zhing bsnyen gnas gnas pa'i ngang / /sbyin bral 'gro la sdang
322a4(mdo sde): mi sdug / dug gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste/ /de yi mngal 'jug bra nye shog /nam gru mon gre 'phel bar byed/ /lag ces bya dang sa ga dang / /snron
322a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ /de dag 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /khrums smad dang ni rgyal yang 'dir/ /rgud byed yin par shes par gyis/ /snar ma dang
322a6(mdo sde): ni chu smad kyang / /de'i las rgyu skar shes par gyis/ /me bzhi'ang phun sum tshogs byed cing / /byi bzhin dang ni smin drug kyang / /bde bar byed pa'i gnas
322a7(mdo sde): yin te| |mon gru dang ni mgo sgrub byed/ /nab so khrums stod lha mtshams 'dir/ /mkhas pa bzhin du'ang shes par gyis/ /grogs dang grogs
322b1(mdo sde): mchog tha skar te/ /mchu dang nam gru skag dang bcas/ /snrubs dang khrums stod ces bya ba/ /drug po de dag nam mkha' la/ /nyi ma'i lha mo lhan cig par/ /mkhas
322b2(mdo sde): pa yis ni shes par gyis/ /bcu gnyis khru myur rgyal byed mkha'i/ /dpal las bya bar myur mi zad/ /yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar gyis/ /sems can rnams
322b3(mdo sde): la phan par sbyin/ /e ma khyod zas lham mchu gsher/ /zhag lnga nad pa myur du gsos/ /der gnas skye rgu gang skye ba/ /dbang phyug gtso bo nor ldan yin/ /chom
322b4(mdo sde): rkun rnams ni 'dul byed mchog / sbyin dang dul bar byed pa yin/ /mchod sbyin rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /mchod sbyin byed par 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub kyi ni
322b5(mdo sde): yan lag bdun/ /go 'phang srung bar byed pas na/ /de yi grags pa mngal 'jug kyang / /skag ces bya ba kho na yin/ /lha mtshams 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /de
322b6(mdo sde): yi 'phel byed nab so yin/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yang / /las kyi rgyu skar dbyer med pa'o/ /sa ri mon gru 'dir rgud byed/ /'dir ni mgo yang gsum pa
322b7(mdo sde): yin| / phun sum tshogs byed 'dir gre bzhin/ /sa ri snar ma'ang gsum pa yin/ /mon gre bde bar byed pa ste/ /'dir ni sa ga lag gsum pa/ /snron dang
323a1(mdo sde): rgyal yang sgrub pa ste/ /'dir ni khrums smad gsum pa'ang yin/ /grogs dang grogs mchog 'di drug ste/ /chu stod mchu dang tha skar dang /
323a2(mdo sde): chu smad ces ni bya ba dang / /gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/ /dga' byed lha mo nag pas smras/ /khyod mkha' myur song yud sum cur/ /mi zad las byed myur gnas shig /
323a3(mdo sde): yan lag rmas pa'ang khyod kyis bza'/ /zhag drug nad ba myur du gsos/ /khyod la gnas pas skye rgu skye/ /glu dang rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/ /sbyin dgA 'dod spyod
323a4(mdo sde): mkhas la sdug / snar ma de yi mngal 'jug yin/ /tha skar zhes ni bya ba dang / /mchu ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /chu stod ces bya gsum pa'ang yin/ /khrums smad 'phel
323a5(mdo sde): bar byed pa ste/ /snron dang rgyal ni gsum pa'ang yin/ /de yi las kyi rgyu skar ni/ /gro bzhin yin gyi bgrang bar gyis/ /'dir ni mon gre rgud par byed/ /sa ga 'dir lag
323a6(mdo sde): gsum pa'ang yin/ /mgo ni phun sum tshogs byed 'dir/ /sa ri mon gru gsum pa'ang yin/ /'dir yang lha mtshams bde bar byed/ /mgo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang / /
323a7(mdo sde): khrums stod ces ni bya ba dang / /skag kyang 'dir ni sgrub pa yin/ /grogs dang grogs mchog snrubs nam gru/ /'dir drug chu smad smin drug dang / /bra nye dang ni dbo
323b1(mdo sde): dang yang / /sa bon gre dang sa ri ste/ /pha mas 'dir smras gling bzhi par/ /mkha' la khyod song tshes bcu bzhir/ /khyod spyod 'gro ba'i gling bzhi par/ /lnga yud drag byos
323b2(mdo sde): khyod song zhig / me tog nas shin zas yin te/ /zhag lngar nad pa myur du gsos/ /khyod spyad skye rgu su skye ba/ /rtsis pa 'byor rnyed khro bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni rgyu skar khro
323b3(mdo sde): sdang g.yo/ /snar ma me bzhi rgud par byed/ /'dir ni smin drug byi bzhin dang / /gsum po dbo ni phun sum tshogs/ /sa ga dang ni nab so dang / /gsum pa khrums stod
323b4(mdo sde): sgrub pa yin/ /'dir bde nag pa mgo mon gru/ /rnam pa drug ni mdza' bo yin/ /nam gru snron mdza' tha skar dang / /mchu snubs de dag mchog tu mdza'/ /byi bzhin
323b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i lha mos smras/ /tshes drug mkha' la khyod yud song / /mi zad bya ba 'byung bya'i phyir/ /mar gsar yang ni khyod zo zhig /khyod la sems can su gnas
323b6(mdo sde): pa/ /dpa' zhing sran thub 'byor rgyal gtso/ /yul 'khor grong 'joms dgra thul ba/ /dbo la de ni mngal du 'jug /de la 'phel med 'chi ba med/ /de yi rgyu skar kun
323b7(mdo sde): grogs mchog / gro bzhin khyab 'jug lha song smras/ /nga'i g.yas tshes bdun 'dir khyod song / /sum cu'i yud sha bu ram zas/ /'phrog byed bya ba chung ngu sgrubs/ /
324a1(mdo sde): khyod gnas skye rgu su skye ba/ /mkhas par byed pa'i mchog yin te/ /grogs skyong rnams kyis mchod pa yin/ /'dir de me bzhis
324a2(mdo sde): mngal 'jug yin/ /rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang / /khrims stod la ni 'phel bar byed/ /mchu snubs gro bzhin 'chi bar byed/ /snar ma las kyi rgyu skar
324a3(mdo sde): yin| |sa ri mon gre lag rgud byed/ /mon gru mgo zhes bya ba dang / /nag pa phun sum tshogs par byed/ /khrums stod nab so sa ga bde/ /nam gru nab so snron
324a4(mdo sde): skag sgrub/ /rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog ste/ /smin drug chu smad de dag yin/ /de gnyis gsum pa dbo yang yin/ /mon gru drang srong nor lhas smras/ /
324a5(mdo sde): tshes brgyad yud tsam sum cur khyod/ /bzhir song las chung khyod khu 'thung / /der ni nad btab lo gcig gsos/ /khyod gnas skye rgu su skye ba/ /khro zhing
324a6(mdo sde): rnyed gos dus kyang spangs/ /nang mis yongs bskor mchod sbyin bsrungs/ /'dir de'i mngal 'jug nag pa yin/ /gre dang bra nye 'chi bar byed/ /chu stod gsum
324a7(mdo sde): bar bgrang bar gyis/ /snon skag nam gru 'phel bar byed/ /sa ga nab so khrums stod rgud/ /sa ri dang ni mon gre dang / /lag ni phun sum tshogs par byed//
324b1(mdo sde): las kun gnyen gyis shin tu bsrungs/ /de yi mngal 'jug skag yin no/ /mon gre zhes ni bya ba dang / /lag ni 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /me bzhi dang ni mon gre dang //
324b2(mdo sde): snar ma 'phel bar byed pa yin/ /nam gru de las rgyu skar yin/ /bar nye dang ni chu smad dang / /gre zhes kyang ni bya ba yang / /gsum pa yin te rgud par byed/ /chu stod
324b3(mdo sde): mchu dang tha skar ni/ /phun sum tshogs byed nag pa dang / /mon gru mgo ni sgrub par byed/ /byi bzhin dbo ni bde bar bsgrags/ /rnam drug grogs dang grogs mchog
324b4(mdo sde): yin| |khrums stod khrums smad nab so 'dir/ /rgyal zhes bya dang lha mtshams dang / /sa ga 'dir ni smras pa yin/ /chu stong gzhi yi lha mos smras/ /tshes bzhi'i
324b5(mdo sde): mtshams khyod mkha' la song / /n+ya gro d+ha ni zas yin te/ /yud tsam sum cur 'gro bar byed/ /gdab mo chu yi las phyir yin/ /bdag ka na gyur nad chung bar
324b6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |khyod spyod skye rgu der su skye/ /chos gnas brtson thos longs spyod ldan/ /mkhas pa dag dang phrad pa yin/ /bya ba kun la mkhas pa yin/ /de skye'i rgyu skar
324b7(mdo sde): 'dir mchu yin/ /'dir las rgyu skar tha skar yin/ /nag po mgo dang mon gru 'phel/ /sa ga khrums stod nab so ni/ /'dir yang 'chi bar byed pa yin/ /dbo ni
325a1(mdo sde): 'dir yang rgud par byed/ /smin drug byi bzhin gsum pa'ang yin/ /'di ni phun sum tshogs byed gre /bra nye chu smad gsum pa'ang yin/ /
325a2(mdo sde): khrums dang sa ri mon gre sgrub/ /me bzhi snar ma gro bzhin bde/ /grogs dang grogs 'bring rnam drug ste/ /nam gru rgyal dang lha mtshams skag /snron dang 'dir ni
325a3(mdo sde): khrums smad yin/ /khrums smad drang srong kun lhas smras/ /tshes lngar bzhi bcur lnga yud 'gro /khyod chud bsdu byar khyod zas mngar/ /zhag bdun nad gsos skye ba
325a4(mdo sde): bsrungs/ /khyod spyod skye rgu su skye ba/ /bu ldan yin zhing nad kyang med/ /grogs mang rab tu 'byor pa ste/ /mngal du 'jug pa'ang chu stod yin/ /mon gre dang ni lag
325a5(mdo sde): dang ni| |sa ri kho nas 'phel bar byed/ /khrums smad dang ni lha mtshams dang / /rgyal yang 'dir ni 'chi byed yin/ /gshin rje'i lha mo la mgos smras/ /rgyal zhes
325a6(mdo sde): bya dang lha mtshams dang / /khrums smad bde bar byed pa ste/ /tha skar mchu snubs sgrub pa yin/ /dbo zhes kyang ni bya ba dang / /chu smad smin drug grogs kyang byed//
325a7(mdo sde): snar ma byin zhing brtsis nas kyang / /gsum pa me bzhi grogs mchog yin/ /mon gre bra nye'i lha mos smras/ /gling bzhi'i mkha' la khyod song zhig/ yud tsam
325b1(mdo sde): bco lngar zho mar zo/ /zhag bdun nad gsos las kyang chung / /'dir khyod gnas pas skye rgu skye/ /khro bar byed cing med pa yin/ /chu bran la ni srung par gyis/ /mngal
325b2(mdo sde): 'jug 'dir ni sa ri yin/ /tha skar mchu snubs 'phel bar byed/ /chu smad ces ni bya ba dang / /smin drug 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /dbo yang gsum par shes par
325b3(mdo sde): bya| |khrums smad rgyal dang lha mtshams ni/ /rgud byed lag las rgyu skar yin/ /khrums stod nab sos ga ste/ /de dag phun sum tshogs par byed/ /snon skag
325b4(mdo sde): nam gru bde bar byed/ /gre dang chu stod bra nye sgrub/ /gro bzhin mgo dang me bzhi dang / /snar ma byi bzhin grogs mchog grogs/ /khrums stod drang srong gis smras
325b5(mdo sde): khyod| |lan chung g.yo byed yud sum cur/ /bcu bzhi tshes gling bzhi 'dir song / /sha sran khyod zo me tog bsnams/ /der ni sems can gang dag skyes/ /gya gyu
325b6(mdo sde): g.yo rkun blun zhing 'thab/ /ri dwags srog gcod yud sum cur/ /nad pa myur du thar byed cing / /skye rgu de dag dmag rkun dang / /rgyud sgra rtag bsrungs sa ga yang /
325b7(mdo sde): 'dir mngal 'jug yin bra nye dang / /chu stod gsum pa gre 'dir 'phel/ /snar ma byi bzhin shi so so byed/ /thams cad bya phyir nab so lag /rgud byed nam gru
326a1(mdo sde): snron skag bzhin/ /phun tshogs khrums smad lha mtshams rgyal/ /tha skar mchu snrubs 'dir bde byed/ /smin drug chu dbo gsum pa sgrub/ /
326a2(mdo sde): mon gru mgo dang nag pa grogs/ /grogs mchog mon gru lag sa ri/ /khrums smad nyi ma'i lha mo khyod/ /bcu gcig tshes la mkha' la song / /yud tsam bzhi
326a3(mdo sde): bcu rtsa lngar song / /ri dwags sha gtor zhag bdun rims/ /khyod spyad skye rgu su skye ba/ /glu dang gar mkhas nor 'bru mang / /rab tu rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ /'dir ni
326a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa byed/ /kha mtshams 'phel byed smin drug dang / /chu smad 'chi bar byed pa ste/ /nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin dang / /rgyal de'i las kyi rgyu skar yin/ /
326a5(mdo sde): snrubs dang tha skar mchu rgud byed/ /nam gru snon skar 'dir phun tshogs/ /me bzhi byi bzhin sgrub pa ste/ /bde bar byed pa chu stod gre /bra nye dang ni nag pa dang / /
326a6(mdo sde): sa ri mon gru lag yin no/ /nab so dang ni sa ga dang / /mon gre gsum pa grogs mchog yin/ /drang srong lha mo rgyal smras khyod/ /mi yi 'jam chung bya ba'i
326a7(mdo sde): phyir| |bcu bzhi'i tshes yud sum cur song / /gtor ma bu ram mun ba srungs/ /zhag ni nyi shur khyod bsrungs pas/ /skye rgu skye mdzangs nor 'bru ldan/ /sbyor dang
326b1(mdo sde): rab sbyor bya ba dang / /dbyig rnams dpag tu med pa'ang yin/ /de yi mngal 'jug snron yin te/ /me bzhi snar ma byi bzhin 'phel/ /sa ri mon gru lag 'chi byed/ /
326b2(mdo sde): las kyi rgyu skar 'dir skag yin/ /dbo dang chu smad smin drug bde/ /gro bzhin nag pa snar ma sgrub/ /chu stod gre bra nye rgud byed/ /tha skar mchu snrubs phun tshogs
326b3(mdo sde): byed| |nab so sa ga mon gre grogs/ /rgyal dang lha mtshams grogs mchog ste/ /khrums stod drang srong gis smras pa/ /dri za'i lha mo yud sum cur/ /tshes ni bcu
326b4(mdo sde): bzhir khyed song zhig / myur bya'i gtor ma zan dron sha /'dir zhag nyi shu lnga nang yin/ /srog ldan 'bras dkar brgya yis bsrungs/ /khyod spyad skye rgu su skye ba/ /sman
326b5(mdo sde): sbyor byed pa sman pa yin/ /glu gar rol mo'i sgra mkhas 'gyur/ /'dir de'i mngal 'jug snubs yin no/ /nag pa mgo dang gro bzhin 'phel/ /nab so mon gre
326b6(mdo sde): lag 'chi byed/ /skye 'chi 'phel nyo tshongs lam 'gyed/ /thal mo 'greg mkhan las rtag spongs/ /smin drug gre dbo chu smad gnyis/ /rgud byed 'dir ni dgra pham byed//
326b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis las dag che chung byas/ /mchu dang gre 'di brtan phun tshogs/ /chu stod dang ni bra nye dang / /gsum pa khrums smad bde bar byed/ /me bzhi snar ma bde
327a1(mdo sde): bya'i phyir/ /gsang ba'i lam du 'gro ba yin/ /lag dang mon gru sa ri sgrub/ /drag po'i las rnams kun gyis shig /rgyal dang lha
327a2(mdo sde): mtshams khrums stod grogs/ /bya ba sal bzang 'dir chung za/ /skad snron grogs mchog bsten pa ste/ /khrums smad 'dir yang gsum pa yin/ /skal
327a3(mdo sde): pa bzang dang bzhon pa dang / /mal dang shin tu brtan par gyis/ /drug bdun de dag las bzhin dang / /sna tshogs mkhas pas shes nas su/ /sngon gyi
327a4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhin du gyis/ /gshin rje'i lha tshes bcu bzhir song / /zla nya zla ba rangs pa'i tshe/ /smin drug kyang ni 'gro bar gyis/ /lha dang mi dang drang srong rnams/ /byed
327a5(mdo sde): pa gang gis sngar bzhin no/ /zhag ni sum cu zla ba rangs/ /nyin dang mtshan ni mnyam pa ste/ /yud tsam bco lnga bco lnga yin/ /grib ma'i gom drug 'dir
327a6(mdo sde): kun 'khor/ /tha skar gyis ni mtshan mo thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na lha mtshams te/ /lho phyogs su ni nyi ma 'khor/ /zhing gi dkyil 'khor mig dmar yin//
327a7(mdo sde): nyi bu lha srong rab spro byas/ /khyod kyis zla ba 'di la ni/ /rtsa dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin dang / /sdig pa las sogs srung bar gyis/ /cha dang char ni dus
327b1(mdo sde): bzhag par/ /sdig pa zhes bya khyod phan song / /phyogs dang phyogs su las bzhag par/ /khyod ni yang dag phan par song / /mi mthun mthun dang 'phel 'di
327b2(mdo sde): yin| |'gro ba la ni phan pa yi/ /rjes su mthun pa bdag gis su/ /dang por bsdu ba byas 'di yin/ /de nas drang srong rnga bong gis thams cad la thal mo rab
327b3(mdo sde): tu sbyar te 'khor la go bar byed cing smras pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis go rim kyi dang po dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / rgyu skar dang /
327b4(mdo sde): gza' dang / dus dang / khyim dang / gnas dang / 'gro bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba dang / 'gro ba dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rnam par shes pa de
327b5(mdo sde): bzhin du da ltar yang bstan cing rnam par bzhag na/ ci khyed cag 'di ltar rnam par bzhag pa dbang gdags par rgyu skar dang / gza' yongs su mgu ba la
327b6(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang bar byed dam/ 'on te ma yin/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe lha ma yin dang / mi dang / drang srong dang / lha dang / lag 'gro dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs
327b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye khyod ni/ lha thams cad kyi bla ma/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i nang na
328a1(mdo sde): gtso bo/ mtshungs pa med par mkhas la mngon par rtogs pa'i snying brtse bas bskal pa pha rol dran pa'o/ /sems
328a2(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa'o/ /dpal thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /dus gsum thams
328a3(mdo sde): cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta bu'i mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / skad cig dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed
328a4(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed pa'i ye shes de lta bu su la yod pa'i sems can de lta bu su yang lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na med pa yin no/ /ji ltar khyod
328a5(mdo sde): kyis da ltar btags pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis der dad pa byin pa yin/ rjes su'ang yi rang ngo / /legs ldan legs so/ /sems can
328a6(mdo sde): thams cad la phan pa'i phyir rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / khyim dang / dus kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i zla ba gnyis pa la yang gdags
328a7(mdo sde): par gyis shig / drang srong rnga bong gis rab tu smras ba/ bdag gis rgyu skar smin drug brjod/ /zla ba nya tshe zla rangs 'gyur/ /ston zla tha chung zhes bya ba/ /
328b1(mdo sde): 'di ni rab tu brjod pa yin/ /mtshan mo yang ni yud tsam gcig /yongs su bskor te slar ldog byed/ /bra nye dang ni smin drug kyang / /lan gnyis yongs
328b2(mdo sde): su 'khor bar byed/ /de bas rgyu skar thams cad kyang / /phyir zhing 'jug par byed pa ste/ /snar ma gcig pu'ang zla ngo der/ /tshes gcig la ni mkha' la
328b3(mdo sde): 'gro/ /ji ltar sngar bya bshad pa bzhin/ /de bzhin khyod kyis skye rgyu srungs/ /de tsam mgo tshes gnyis la 'gro/ /de tsam lag tshes gsum la 'gro /tshes
328b4(mdo sde): bzhi la yang nab so ste/ /rgyal yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro /tshes drug la ni skag gi tshigs/ /mchu yang tshes ni bdun la srung / /tshes brgyad la ni gre yin
328b5(mdo sde): te/ /tshes dgu la ni dbo 'gro byed/ /me bzhi'ang tshes ni bcu la 'jug /nag pa'ang tshes bcu gcig la 'gro /sa ri'ang tshes bcu gnyis la gnas//
328b6(mdo sde): tshes bcu gsum la'ang sa ga ste/ /tshes bcu bzhi la lha mtshams yin/ /tshes bco lnga la de bzhin snron/ /'di ni zla ba phyed du bshad/ /yar gyi ngo
328b7(mdo sde): la snrubs sgrub ste/ /tshes gcig la ni skye rgu srung / /tshes gnyis la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes gsum la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni byi bzhin
329a1(mdo sde): srung / /tshes lnga la ni gro bzhin yin/ /tshes drug la ni mon gru'i tshigs/ /tshes bdun la ni chu lha yin/ /tshes brgyad
329a2(mdo sde): la ni khrums stod yin/ /tshes dgu la ni khrums smad yin/ /tshes bcu yang na nam gru srung / /de bzhin bcu gcig tshes tha skar/ /gshin rje'i
329a3(mdo sde): lha mo tshes bcu gnyis/ /tshes bcu gsum la me lha mo/ /tshes bcu bzhi la'ang snar ma yin/ /zla ba rangs la mgo bshad do/ /dgun zla ra ba'i
329a4(mdo sde): zla ba 'dir/ /lha yi bla ma phur bu ste/ /'di ni lhan cig byed par gzung / /de bas gza' zhes bya bar bshad/ /de phyir nyin mo tshes bcu bzhir//
329a5(mdo sde): yud tsam mtshan mo bcu drug ste/ /smin drug gis ni mtshan mo thob/ /snubs kyang nyi ma'i mdun na ste/ /grib tshod gom pa brgyad yin zhing / /nyi
329a6(mdo sde): ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /lho phyogs nyi mar kha bltas 'khor/ /de bzhin dgun zla ra ba yi/ /zla 'dir khyim gzhur shes par bya/ /mar gyi ngo yi
329a7(mdo sde): tshes gcig la'ang / /lag ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /tshes gnyis la ni nab so ste/ /tshes gsum rgyal du shes par gyis/ /'dir tshes bzhi
329b1(mdo sde): la'ang skag yin te/ /mchu yang tshes ni lnga la 'gro /tshes drug la yang gre yin te/ /tshes bdun la yang dbo yin bshad/ /tshes brgyad la ni me bzhi
329b2(mdo sde): yin| |tshes dgu la ni nag pa gnas/ /tshes bcu la ni sa ri 'gro /tshes bcu gcig la sa ga 'gro /tshes bcu gnyis la'ang lha mtshams te/ /tshes bcu

329b4(mdo sde): ba yin/ /tshes gnyis byi bzhin gro bzhin te/ /tshes gsum la ni mon gru 'gro/ /tshes bzhir mon gre 'gro rung ste/ /tshes lnga la ni khrums stod yin/ /

335a5(mdo sde): te| |tshes brgyad la ni snron yin no/ /tshes dgu la ni snrubs yin te/ /tshes bcu la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la chu smad yin/ /gro bzhin byi bzhin tshes
335a6(mdo sde): bcu gnyis/ /tshes bcu gsum la mon gru ste/ /tshes bcu bzhi la mon gre yin/ /zla ba nya ba'i zla rangs la/ /khrums stod ces ni bya ba yin/ /bdag gis
335a7(mdo sde): ston zlar rim brjod/ /lho phyogs nyi ma'i 'khor lo ldog/ nyin mar yang ni bcu bdun te/ /mtshan mo yang ni bcu gsum yin/ /gro bzhin gyis kyang
335b1(mdo sde): mtshan mo thob/ /nyi ma'i mdun na gre yin te/ /grib tshod dag kyang gom pa gnyis/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /zla bu gza' lhag ces bya ba/ /der ni zhing la yang dag gnas/ /
335b2(mdo sde): der khyim bu mo bzhag pa ste/ /zla ba bcu gcig bdag gis bshad/ /ston zla 'bring po mar gyi ngo'i/ /dang po tshes gcig khrums smad sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni nam gru ste/ /tshes
335b3(mdo sde): gsum la ni tha skar yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni bra nye ste/ /tshes lnga la ni smin drug yin/ /tshes drug la ni snar ma ste/ /tshes bdun la ni mgo yin no/ /tshes brgyad la ni lag
335b4(mdo sde): yin te| |tshes dgu la ni nam so yin/ /tshes bcu la ni rgyal yin te/ /tshes bcu gcig la skag yin no/ /tshes bcu gnyis la mchu yin te/ /tshes bcu gsum la gre
335b5(mdo sde): yin no| |tshes bcu bzhi la dbo yin no/ /tshes bco lnga la me bzhi yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /zla yar tshes gcig nag pa sgrub/ /tshes gnyis la ni sa ri ste/ /tshes gsum la
335b6(mdo sde): ni sa ga yin/ /tshes bzhi la ni lha mtshams te/ /tshes lnga la ni snron yin no/ /tshes drug la ni snrubs yin te/ /tshes bdun la ni chu stod yin/ /tshes brgyad la ni chu smad yin/ /tshes
335b7(mdo sde): dgur byi bzhin gro bzhin te/ /tshes bcu la ni mon gru yin/ /tshes bcu gcig la mon gru yin/ /tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stod yin/ /tshes bcu gsum la khrums
336a1(mdo sde): smad yin/ /tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru ste/ /zla rangs nya tshe tha skar yin/ /de ni zla ba phyed yin te/ /ston zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni/ /lo skor bdag gis brjod
336a2(mdo sde): par bya| |lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing / /mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin/ /khrums stod kyis ni mtshan
336a3(mdo sde): mo thob| |nyi ma'i mdun na nag pa yin/ /grib tshod dag ni gom bzhi ste/ /nyi ma yongs su 'khor bar byed/ /lha min bla ma pa ba sangs/ /gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhag /
336a4(mdo sde): 'dir khyim srang zhes bya ba gzhag /zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin/ /yongs su 'khor ba de yis ni/ /lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed/ /mig stong yang dang yang du ni/ /'dus
336a5(mdo sde): te chos kyi phyogs la ltos/ /khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na/ /chos ma yin pa'ang zlog par gyis/ /chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs/ /thos phyug mkhas
336a6(mdo sde): pa bsam gtan pa/ /de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang / /bza' btung rnams kyis rjes su srungs/ /yang dag gnas te brgya byin gyis/ /rnga bod la ni thal sbyar nas/ /
336a7(mdo sde): rab tu smras pa bdag cag gis/ /bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis/ /smras pa/ lha yi bla ma khyod kyis su/ /rtag par tshangs par spyod pa srungs/ /rig sngags sman dang gsang
336b1(mdo sde): sngags rnams/ /thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs/ /las kun drang srong zla ba dang / /zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi/ /bzo yi las kyi mtha' kun la/ /gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin/ /drag
336b2(mdo sde): bo dung gi sna can dang / /dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste/ /gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni/ /mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod/ /rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang / /rin chen skyod dang ring du 'gro/
336b3(mdo sde): sa yid tshes dang zla srung dang / /gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni/ /gtso bor gzhag ste ma dros dang / /khab kyis lus 'bigs chu lhas byin/ /ri dwags 'khrugs pa klu de bzhi/ /klu rnams kyi
336b4(mdo sde): ni gtso bor bkod/ /khyod ni dge bar bskyed pa/ /ne tso yi ni khyab byed pa/ /mkhas pa zhing gi gtso bo ste/ /de 'dra ba ni ji lta bu/ /khyod ni snying po kho nas kyang / /me yi rtse mo'i gtso bo ste/ /khyod
336b5(mdo sde): ni rlung dmar 'gul g.yo ba/ /rlung yang ba yi gtso bo yin/ /rdo rje'i mig dang seng+ge'i mig /legs mthong lag na mdud gsum thogs/ /lha mo bzhi po de dag ni/ /grong khyer gtso bor bkod
336b6(mdo sde): pa yin/ /gong ma'i char skyes rtsibs mu khyud/ /'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi/ /de dag rin chen brtag pa la/ /nyo tshod byed pa'i gtso bor bkod/ /phyogs mtshams su ni
336b7(mdo sde): bzhi yin te/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni yang dag gnas/ /yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du/ /bsrung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod/ /drang srong dag ni thams cad dang / /lha yi
337a1(mdo sde): tshogs dang klu rnams dang / /lha ma yin dang mi rnams kyi/ /bar yang rjes su yi rang byed/ /lung bstan rab tu rgyal ba mchog /thub pa yi ni gtso bo ste/
337a2(mdo sde): khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang / /zas dang ro dang me tog mchog /khyod ni dri 'phel byed pa ste/ /shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog /khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste/ /rnam par
337a3(mdo sde): 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso/ /dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis/ /ri bo rnams kyi gtso bor bkod/ /nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing / /lci mchog mig dmar smugs byed skem/ /khyod
337a4(mdo sde): ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso/ /khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa/ /zla ba 'phrog par byed pa ste/ /bcud kyis len gyi gtso bo yin/ /gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin/ /khyim bdag thams
337a5(mdo sde): cad rnam par gzhag / rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni/ /skal ldan rgyur ni rnam par gzhag /lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso/ /grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po/ /klu
337a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni mig mi bzang / /dri za rnams kyi yul 'khor srung / /thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi/ /gling gzhan brgyad khri thams cad du/ /drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongs
337a7(mdo sde): su skyong ba ma bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci'ang med do/ /de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
337b1(mdo sde): chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba byas par gyur to/ /drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ /bya ba de
337b2(mdo sde): ni| mchod pa dang / rim gro bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to/ /de'i rjes la shin tu yun ring zhig na drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste/ /des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab tu byas
337b3(mdo sde): so| |zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod pa yang bshad do/ /yang de'i tshes drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten ga la bar klu thams cad 'dus te/ de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
337b4(mdo sde): mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir ci nus su brtson par gyur to/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las/
337b5(mdo sde): nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par gzhag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa rdzogs so// //'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po
337b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rgya mtshos smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs/ /ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni/ /khyod kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dran/ /mkhas khyod
337b7(mdo sde): srid gsum kun gyi gtso/ /khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper/ /shes gsal 'gro la snying brtse bzhin/ /kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni/ /lag 'gro thams cad thar par gyis/ /
338a1(mdo sde): srid gsum tshul brtul mtshungs med khyod/ /lag 'gro de kun tshim byed khyod/ /khyod ni drang srong kun gyi bla/ /mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os/ /'gro
338a2(mdo sde): ba kun dpal khyod la ni/ /lha dang lag 'gro gnod sbyin tshogs/ /rten gyi yul rnams thams cad pa/ /lag 'gro myur du thar par gyis/ /de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba
338a3(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang ba bskyed par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /yon
338a4(mdo sde): tan de 'dra bdag la med/ /drang srong rnga bong bdag ma yin/ /khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par/ /bdag gis nus pa ma yin no/ /gang gis bskal ba du mar ni/ /dka' thub
338a5(mdo sde): dka' ba bzod par spyad/ /khyod cag thar par byed pa yi/ /drang srong gzhan de blta bar gyis/ /rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin/ /mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni/ /shing rta bu
338a6(mdo sde): dang chung ma dang / /nor gyis sems can phan pa byas/ /rkang lag mgo dang rna ba dang / /mig dang pags pa khrag dang ni/ /bu bran bran mo bza' btung mang / /mal cha kha zas
338a7(mdo sde): sngon chad btang / /snying rje dang ni byams pa yis/ /khyed cag thar byed srid gsum na/ /mtshungs med bsam gtan dga' 'byung ba/ /de ni drang srong rnga bong ste/ /kun tu
338b1(mdo sde): brtse zhing byang chub sems/ /sngon chad rig byed pha rol phyin/ /sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis/ /nyam thag pa ni thar bar byas/ /sems can gcig gi ched du yang / /sngon gyi tshe rabs
338b2(mdo sde): de bskal par/ /dmyal bar 'gro bzod de yi dwags/ /de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung / /sems can sdug bsngal nyam thag kun/ /sdug bsngal mthar mdzad rnga bong yin/ /sems
338b3(mdo sde): can smin phyir brtson 'grus dang / /snying rje brtan pos de srid 'khor/ /rnga bong de ni skyes pa na/ /rgyal sras bu ram shing pa yi/ /rigs su zas gtsang gi ni sras/ /des ni btsas ma
338b4(mdo sde): thag tu khyab/ /srid gsum bde 'byung 'jig rten dpal/ /yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /lha dang klu yi bu rnams dang / /'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab/ /der ni mchod phyir thams
338b5(mdo sde): cad lhags/ /de yis gom pa bdun bor te/ /ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/ /sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rga nad sdug bsngal dang / /'chi bas gzir las ngas
338b6(mdo sde): bsgral zhing / /zhi ba bde ba mya ngan med/ /skam la dgod ces shAka sras gsungs/ /me tog dri dang rin chen dag /lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing / /'byung po'i tshogs rnams
338b7(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis/ /sras po la ni bstod gyur pa/ /bskal pa mang po du mar yang / /sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang / /sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la brten/ /sems can kun ched
339a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bzod/ /'di la skye ba 'di yang ni/ /thams cad kyi ni tha ma lags/ /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad par/ /ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang
339a2(mdo sde): rgya| |des kyang dpa' bo brtan par gyur/ /mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs/ /drug khri tham pa spangs nas su/ /spyod pa rab bstan lo drug spyad/ /g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas
339a3(mdo sde): pa'i| |bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang / /byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes/ /mya ngan med lam don dam gzigs/ /byams dang ye shes thugs rje yis/ /sems
339a4(mdo sde): can kun dang mi mnyam zhing / /'byung bo dag ni thams cad la/ /de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa/ /sems can gang la'ang mtho mi 'tsham/ /sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
339a5(mdo sde): las| |thar par mdzad cing de yang ni/ /rnam bcings brtson ra thar mdzad pa/ /ma ga d+ha na de gnas shing / /'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston/ /de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob/ /byams
339a6(mdo sde): pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos/ /drang srong mchog gi thad du dengs/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las/ /khyed cag yongs su thar par byed/ /rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar
339a7(mdo sde): gyis| |dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis/ /phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las/ /'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo / /rtag bde sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis/ /btson
339b1(mdo sde): ra 'di ni g.yo sgyu can/ /bdud ni khyod la rnam par 'tshe/ /ji ltar nga yis bshad pa bzhin/ /thams cad kyang ni gzung bar gyis/ /yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du klu dang /
339b2(mdo sde): klu chen po pho dang / mo dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten thams cad las khyad par
339b3(mdo sde): du 'phags pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gis pha rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad pa/ bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa/ dga' ba thams
339b4(mdo sde): cad skyed par mdzad pa/ shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa/ thugs rje thams cad kyis khyab pa/ 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par
339b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa/ lam thams cad ston pa/ yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba/ lha dang / klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa/ mchod pa thams cad
339b6(mdo sde): 'os pa| bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi btson ra 'dir 'phangs lags na/ 'di nas bdag cag thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu de dag dang lhan cig bdag cag gnas par
339b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o| |bcom ldan 'das kyis klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ gnas de nas 'gro bar mi nus so/ /de dag thams cad kyis drang
340a1(mdo sde): srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ bden te/ sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i chos
340a2(mdo sde): nyid yin no/ /de la bdag cag skyabs su nye bar gnas so/ /'di nas myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig /skar ma la dga' bas 'di
340a3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun pa thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa des byang chub sems
340a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi lam rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir dang / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems
340a5(mdo sde): can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir mang por ma byung ba la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang thun mong ba sems can
340a6(mdo sde): la dmigs pa'i gnas pa mchog bstan to/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams las yang dag par byung ba dang / so sor brtag
340a7(mdo sde): pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to/ /da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi
340b1(mdo sde): rdul snyed na theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
340b2(mdo sde): bsgral ba'i phyir dang / bdud bzhi gdul ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir chos kyi chus khrus mdzad do/ /da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs
340b3(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs kyi sems can gyi khams la dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam
340b4(mdo sde): par gzhag pa med pa/ rdul med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dad pa nyid ces bya ba nas phung po dang / khams dang
340b5(mdo sde): skye mched dang / 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa zhes bya ba'i bar nas yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa
340b6(mdo sde): med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang /
340b7(mdo sde): gang 'jug pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba/ phyad pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag
341a1(mdo sde): par dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongs su sbyang ba byas
341a2(mdo sde): pa| sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ lta ba thams cad kyi bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa rnams la
341a3(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to/ /kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na'ang klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba
341a4(mdo sde): dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa zhes bya ba dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su
341a5(mdo sde): dran pas de dag snang ba dang / rnam par bsgyings pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags
341a6(mdo sde): pa'i smon lam yang dag par rjes su dran pas byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la de dag gis 'di
341a7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so/ /khyod bzhud la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis 'dir bdag cag bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongs su thar bar bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
341b1(mdo sde): chen po thob pa de la bdag cag gi tshig gis gsol ba thob cig / de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba drang srong gi cha
341b2(mdo sde): byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo / /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde theg pa chen po'i mdo las/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa
341b3(mdo sde): las le'u brgyad pa'o/ / //bcom ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabs su nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la rgya shug gi
341b4(mdo sde): 'dab ma bzhin du lus rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis bsgrengs te 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag 'gro rnams ni skyabs su dong / /skye rgu thams cad rmongs gyur cing //
341b5(mdo sde): 'chi med lam la gzhog byed pa/ /mi zad g.yo sgyu can la ltos/ /de'i tshe na bdud kyi bu mo mun bral ma zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so/ /sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis//
341b6(mdo sde): dge sbyong la ni skyabs su mchis/ /gang dag de yi tshig thos shing / /de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal/ /brtson 'grus sna tshogs sbyor ba yis/ khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs/ /bka'
341b7(mdo sde): mchid sna tshogs lhan cig mdzad/ /de yi sgyu ni ma bslabs sam/ /bdud kyis slar smras pa/ dge sbyong gau tam brtan pa yin/ /rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste/ /stong pa'i chos la yang
342a1(mdo sde): dag zhugs/ /rgal nas skye rgu sgrol bar byed/ /mun bral mas smras pa/ stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa/ /bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyod de/ /byang grol
342a2(mdo sde): bde ba sbyin bgyid pa/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid la gang rten cing / /ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin/ /de la bdag ni skyabs su
342a3(mdo sde): mchis| |sgyu de bdag gis bslab par bgyi/ /sems can thams cad rnam par dgrol/ /chos rnams kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /bla med sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /bdud kyi
342a4(mdo sde): bu mo lnga brgya snyed bdud kyi gnas der 'khod nas byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur to/ /bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing dngangs te rmongs nas stobs kyi shugs kyis
342a5(mdo sde): 'chag sar zhugs te bdud kyi stobs kyi shugs kyi cho 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so/ /gang gis drang srong skra ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring
342a6(mdo sde): p o ma lon par drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas nam mkha' las rdo'i char ba me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te klu thams
342a7(mdo sde): cad thal bar rlag par 'dod na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu phab ste/ klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' khyab mas
342b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ kye bdud kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shig /dzam+bu'i gling der dge sbyong gau ta ma la klu gang dag skyabs su dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'di sdug bsngal mang pos gnod par byed na/
342b2(mdo sde): gang dag 'dir 'khod nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong ba rang gi bu mo khyed la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas skyabs su sems can su
342b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba| |bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te/ tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang / /de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro/ /ston pa la ni me tog gcig gtor zhing / /byang
342b4(mdo sde): chub smon lam brtan po bskyed pas na/ /de ni bdud rnams du mas gsang mi nus/ /nem nur med par 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing / /tshig gi
342b5(mdo sde): don gcig tsam yang nyan byed na/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed pa de/ /sems can kha lo sgyur 'gyur nem nur med/ /yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis/ /der ni me tog
342b6(mdo sde): char ba sna tshogs 'bebs/ /sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos/ /der ni ci yang nus par ma gyur to/ /gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing / /bdag cag gi ni las kyi
342b7(mdo sde): sgrib 'byang ba/ /ched du lung bstan pa ni der nyan pa'i/ /rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas gsungs/ /de nas bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde
343a1(mdo sde): ba skyes nas mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug go / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba bcom ldan 'das kyi
343a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar mjug thogs su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der phyin te 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas
343a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bzhi pa
343a4(mdo sde): rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol/ /gzungs sngags kyi gzhi de dag gis ni/ sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyis su gyur pa na
343a5(mdo sde): l us kyi slad du rgyal po rgyal gyi lha la nongs pa bgyis pas 'gum pa la thug ste btson rar stsal nas zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing bcing ba lngas bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa
343a6(mdo sde): man+dA ra ba'i bsung la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba btab pa lags so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man+dA ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas
343a7(mdo sde): kyi shul kar bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa de lta bus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bstan to/ sangs
343b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus btson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/ tshig 'bru dang bcas par grags so/ /gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis bdag cag dga' ba dang / dad pa yang dag
343b2(mdo sde): par bskyed nas de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang /
343b3(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i bar
343b4(mdo sde): dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bsam bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams
343b5(mdo sde): su 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongs su bas shing / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mod la mgrin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol
343b6(mdo sde): te btson ra nas rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing / de nas nam mkha' la chas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa man+dA ra ba'i bsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to/ /de nas shi
343b7(mdo sde): 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas slan chad bskal
344a1(mdo sde): pa dpag tu ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa rnams su bdag cag ma skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du da ltar sangs rgyas
344a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa dpag tu ma mchis pas khyab ste/ de dag ni/
344a3(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to/ /zhes bgyi ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
344a4(mdo sde): rnams su las yongs su ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te mchis par mi nus pa lags so/ /zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o/ /sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos ma thag tu sems
344a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos
344a6(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang /
344a7(mdo sde): dge bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad dang / thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams
344b1(mdo sde): cad yongs su bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan pa des sems can rnams bzod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tsho ba'i mtha'i bar du
344b2(mdo sde): der 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas sems can rnams ji ltar bsam pa bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rdo thogs par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun
344b3(mdo sde): du brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnams su 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon
344b4(mdo sde): par brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / mngon
344b5(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ches de dag dang
344b6(mdo sde): 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs

345a1(mdo sde): ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su
345a2(mdo sde): la la theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa ni/ myur du theg pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams
345a3(mdo sde): cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/ thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad las yongs su thar par 'dod

345b3(mdo sde): khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing / kha zas gtsang ma dang mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung ngam/ 'chag pas kyang rung ste/ rjes su mthun pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs
345b4(mdo sde): y id la byed pas gzhan yid la mi sems par zhes bya ba nas las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis re zhig mtshan gcig gam zhes bya ba nas mtshan
345b5(mdo sde): bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na/ des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo / /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs chung ngur rtog par byed na/ chung ngu kho nar

345b7(mdo sde): las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjes su bltas nas gsang sngags 'di dag brjod do/ /ta d+ya thA/ bi dri ma b+hu/ bi dzri ma b+ha/ ud pA da/ bya ya/ pi dri ma

346a2(mdo sde): pa de srid du des mtshan gcig la rnam par mig g.yeng ba'i yid kyis rjes su bltas nas tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/ mi dngang bar bya'o/ /rang gi lus la mar rnam

348a7(mdo sde): pa brgya phrag mang pos mdun gyis bltas te sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongs su bskor nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas
348b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang /
348b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i ras bcos pu dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
348b3(mdo sde): phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ lag 'gro'i tshogs thams cad kyi zhal ta
