348b5(mdo sde): gang khyod kyis mdzad pa mdzod cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byang
348b6(mdo sde): ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin no/ /yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas grul bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang /
349a1(mdo sde): ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spud pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan
349a2(mdo sde): b ye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi ril mo'i sgra 'byin pa la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon tan gyis bstod nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs
349a3(mdo sde): te ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogs su nye bar gshegs so/ /'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang gang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
349a4(mdo sde): 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par bzhed par shes so/ /de ltar rig nas mi mdzed kyi bdag po
349a5(mdo sde): tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i them skas sprul nas 'di skad ces
349a6(mdo sde): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dzam+bu'i chu bo'i
349a7(mdo sde): gser gyi them skas tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas rnams las gshegs
349b1(mdo sde): par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas tsan+dan sa mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
349b2(mdo sde): bdag cag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai DUR+ya'i them skas dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs
349b3(mdo sde): bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi bai DUR+ya'i them skas
349b4(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang bcom ldan
349b5(mdo sde): 'das kyi phyir mu tig dmar po'i them skas lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
349b6(mdo sde): 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi rin po che rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu sna tshogs
349b7(mdo sde): kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi
350a1(mdo sde): ' khor dang bcas pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas kyi lha rdzas gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongs su khebs pa de nyid du sprul
350a2(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas bdag nyid 'dun
350a3(mdo sde): pas bdag dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sku drug sprul nas sangs rgyas bdun po de dag lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thams cad kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun du bdar cing
350a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs so/ /sangs rgyas bdun po de dag mchog tu lhan
350a5(mdo sde): ne lhang nger ri rab kyi rtse mo na bzhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od zer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba bzhin no/ /klu gang dag drang srong thub
350a6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas rten du lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis de mthong nas ltad mor gyur te gcig la gcig dris pa/ snang ba chen po'i nang na brten ba ri rab kyi rtse mo la gnas pa bdun po de dag gi
350a7(mdo sde): las 'ongs/ dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis kyis smras pa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa/ /kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu
350b1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin/ /bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed/ /'ching ba rnams las thar bar byed kyi kun kyang de la mgo bos
350b2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshol cig / ma dros pas 'di skad ces smras so/ /de 'di ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can/ /khyed la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs
350b3(mdo sde): bskor 'di ni gnas pa yis/ /'di ni gang zhig la la 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyis 'jigs/ /sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug
350b4(mdo sde): bsngal rnams las thar par byed/ /sa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /de lta ma yin 'dir rgyal lha dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul ba/ /de dag
350b5(mdo sde): khyod la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu yi tshogs la lta/ /bdag cag yongs su skyo bas zhes kun gyis gsang mthor de dag la ni 'dod bos/ /de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan pas khyed
350b6(mdo sde): cag btson ra dag nas zhi bar byed/ /rgya mtshos smras pa/ de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang brgya byin tshogs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba/ /de ni gling bzhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su
350b7(mdo sde): yod brtse ba'i yid kyis blta/ /khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis/ /de yis myur du lag 'gro thar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun nas thar
351a1(mdo sde): par byed/ /shin tu brtan gyis smras pa/ de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs brten lha tshogs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can/ /sems can rnams kyi ched
351a2(mdo sde): du drang srong 'dir 'dzegs 'khod nas brtse bas phyogs rnams su/ /myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i char ba 'bebs/ /lha yi yid kyis thams
351a3(mdo sde): cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas bdag cag thar par byed/ /klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ni gzugs na brten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di kun bdud gyi
351a4(mdo sde): 'byor pa yin/ /lus ngan skye mchog bdud rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar btags pa 'di dag gnas pa ni/ /gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi skyong byed sdig pa'i skye
351a5(mdo sde): bo sgrol| |de dag gis ni bdag cag sems can gzhan mthong 'di ni myur du thar par byed/ /klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /de dag ma yin de ni mgo bregs dur smrig
351a6(mdo sde): gos can 'khong par snang ba yin/ /de dag la ni kun lta thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin/ /bdun po de dag cher bsgrubs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs dag gis
351a7(mdo sde): mthong ba yin/ /dur smrig gos bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os par mthong / /klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /'di ni bdag
351b1(mdo sde): nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren pa yin te nga la de ltar snang / /sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyob pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa/ /gang dag lhan cig snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams
351b2(mdo sde): kyang ni de yis sprul pa yin/ /bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu ri
351b3(mdo sde): rab dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to/ /de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna
351b4(mdo sde): bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bar man chad sna tshogs pa/ blta na sdug pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong du mar spras pa de srid cig sprul te/ de ni/
351b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spud pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / me tog sna
351b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin no/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bos te bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni/ nga dang /
351b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / bdud rnams dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang /
352a1(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to/ /de bzhin du da ltar ri rab 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
352a2(mdo sde): shin tu longs spyad zin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs
352a3(mdo sde): spyad zin to/ /ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gal te bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
352a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / ri rab la longs spyad par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal te yang gang su dag bdud dam/
352a5(mdo sde): brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/
352a6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci'i dbang po'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/ sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas mi'i drang srong gi bar de
352a7(mdo sde): dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ /de'i zhal
352b1(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ngo / /'od zer de dag gshegs nas bdud kyi
352b2(mdo sde): gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / brgya byin gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba nas lha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / drang srong gi gnas
352b3(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad du 'od zer de dag zhugs so/ /de dang de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa bdud dam zhes bya
352b4(mdo sde): b a nas drang srong rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du btags pa de dang de dag thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas bdud ces bya ba nas drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang de dag de nas chas te
352b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku drug po de dag ga la bar skad cig thang gcig yud tsam gcig gis 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun
352b6(mdo sde): bcad nas bka' stsal pa/ nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyi nang na ri rab 'di ni/ mchog dang phul yin par ngas bshad de/
352b7(mdo sde): ri rab 'di ni/ 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no/ /de thos nas brgya byin kau shi ka dang zhes bya ba nas mi mjed kyi bdag po
353a1(mdo sde): tshangs pa zhes bya ba'i bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skyes so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas
353a2(mdo sde): rten de nas song ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho ni/ 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug mas 'dug nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba'
353a3(mdo sde): zhig la lta'o/ /zhes bya ba nas klu'i rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni/ byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang /
353a4(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni/ shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mjug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das 'ba'
353a5(mdo sde): zhig la lta'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni/ de nas 'dong bar ma nus so/ /de dag thams cad kyis gsang bstod de
353a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smas so/ /btso nar 'di nas bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ /yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis bcom
353a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gshegs shing gnas rten 'dir bzhugs nas klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de dag gnyis gnas rten nas ri rab
353b1(mdo sde): kyi rtse mo'i bar du de srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to/ /de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ klu de dag ni/ lus rtsub cing 'dus te reg nag dug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
353b2(mdo sde): k yi mthil dag ral par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongs su g.yogs shing mgo la tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas yongs
353b3(mdo sde): su g.yogs te lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de rgyar dpag tshang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
353b4(mdo sde): par sprul to/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbus su lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / rgyan dang / nor bu dang / rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan
353b5(mdo sde): 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi
353b6(mdo sde): yul kyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston te/ kau Di n+ya/ gang mig gi skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni/
353b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o/ /'di ni/ nad dang / srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi'i 'byung ba'o/ /kau Di n+ya/ gang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye
354a1(mdo sde): pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o/ /'di ni/ nad dang / srid pa'i yan lag rnams
354a2(mdo sde): kyi gnas pa'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi'i 'byung ba'o/ /kau Di n+ya/ gang mig gi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang / nye bar len pa nye bar zhi ba 'di ni/ sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/ /'di
354a3(mdo sde): ni| sreg pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi'i nub pa'o/ /kau Di n+ya/ gang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang /
354a4(mdo sde): nub pa dang / nye bar len pa rnam par zhi ba 'di ni/ sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o/ /'di ni/ srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o/ /'di ni/ rga shi'i nub pa'o/ /chos gang
354a5(mdo sde): gis nga lha dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i 'jig rten na phul yin par grags pa
354a6(mdo sde): dang / byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang / snying rje chen pos dam pa yin par grags pa dang / 'khor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pas bla na med par grags pa dang / sbyin
354a7(mdo sde): ba dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyi sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dag dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / tshangs
354b1(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgom pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i chos de ni/ ngas sems can thams cad la rgya cher bstan to/ /gsol bar mdzad do/ /ston pa thugs
354b2(mdo sde): brtse ba can phan par bzhed pas gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni/ ngas mdzad zin te/ da khyed cag gis bya ba yin no/ /rga shi'i mthar dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang / shing drung
354b3(mdo sde): dang / dur khrod dang / ri dang / ri khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur na mi rung gi /sgoms shig/ rtsol cig /nged kyis rjes su bstan pa ni/ 'di yin no/
354b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang sems
354b5(mdo sde): can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po de dag gis ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed de/ /kha cig ni/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnams la rnam
354b6(mdo sde): bar gnas par gyur to/ /de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi mig bskyed do/ /kha cig ni/ sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byang ngo / /zhes bya ba nas kha cig
354b7(mdo sde): ni/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i bar dang / kha cig gnod sbyin dbul bo nyid kyis bar dang / kha cig ni/ mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su
355a1(mdo sde): byang ngo / /nad kyis btab pa rnams ni/ /nad med par gyur to/ /sems can rnams btson nas yongs su thar par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
355a2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dge bas na tshogs dri ma med pa'i gser can spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes phyug /lha dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i dam pa
355a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa/ /tshul khrims thos rig gsum po phun sum tshogs pa sems can thams cad 'dzud pa'o/ /lag 'gro'i tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rje brtan po sngon gyi
355a4(mdo sde): dam bcas dgongs par mdzod/ /gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal ji ltar btang ba bzhin/ /lag 'gro'i skad cig mtha' yas 'dir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs/
355a5(mdo sde): dgra yis phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las grol ba/ /ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad tshim par mdzad du gsol/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i mdo nyi ma'i snying po'i
355a6(mdo sde): le'u bcu gcig pa las/ ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/
355a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / rin po che dang / chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa'i
355b1(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing byang chub sems dpa'i
355b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten gyi dbus su gdan bting ba nyid la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' la
355b3(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo/ /bcom
355b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang me tog sna tshogs dang / di sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras gos dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas
355b5(mdo sde): nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal nas spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos
355b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sug las gang dag gis sems can rnams klu'i gnas su skye lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po/ las
355b7(mdo sde): kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung bo rnams myur du klu'i skye gnas su skyes so/ /bcu gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing bla na med pa'i theg
356a1(mdo sde): p a yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag yin la myur du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmigs su lta ba ma yin zhing shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la lag
356a2(mdo sde): pa brkyang ba dag yod de/ de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha
356a3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag gis tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs par skyon med par srung bar ni ma nus so/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags
356a4(mdo sde): kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongs su tshol par byed cing shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa
356a5(mdo sde): dag yod de/ de dag nga rgyal gyis mthus rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/
356a6(mdo sde): de dag shin tu khro ba mang zhing sems can gzhan rnams la rab tu sdang ste/ /de dag sha 'khon la brten pas 'chi ba'i dus tha mar klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/ de dag smon lam
356a7(mdo sde): gyis sher skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang yang dag par ldan zhing snod du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongs su btsal ba dang mchod pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag
356b1(mdo sde): yod de/ de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang
356b2(mdo sde): sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing mu cor smra la brdzun du smra ba dag yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa
356b3(mdo sde): ma yin pa mang pa dag yin zhing / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang / pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag
356b4(mdo sde): yin pa yod de/ de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid chung dus 'khrul pas klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang gti mug gis zil gyis non
356b5(mdo sde): cing ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod de/ de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig rtsu ba po smra ba la goms pa dag yod de/ de
356b6(mdo sde): dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas klu rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ bcu po de dag yin no/ /chos gzhan gsum dang ldan na/ klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag lus dang / ngag dang /
356b7(mdo sde): yid kyi nyes par spyod pa shin tu dam po dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas nyes par spyod pa'i lhag ma chung dus klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o//
357a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / de bzhin du yi dwags rnams nas zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis sems can rnams klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o/ /rgya
357a2(mdo sde): mtshos kyang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de de bzhin no/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa/ de de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ni/ klu gang dag longs spyod pa dang / nye bar
357a3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i dpal dang ldan pa lha dang 'dra ba dag ma chis pa nas mi smad rims dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / yi dwags dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas
357a4(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / klu gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis lags te/ de dag sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas klu'i
357a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i bu pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ba dag sug las gang gis klu'i rigs su skyes nas gzugs mchog tu lha ma me zhing lus kyis reg pa gang cung zad ci rig kyang kun
357a6(mdo sde): tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/ bdag dus thams cad du mchil lha ma bor nas gcer bur rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdag gi pha ma de ni/ dpal phun sum tshogs pa'i ches khyad par du 'phags pa
357a7(mdo sde): myong ste/ dper na/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lag 'gro/ /sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sum cu rtsa
357b1(mdo sde): gcig pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i par gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo / /de'i tshe rgyal po mi
357b2(mdo sde): tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po me tog bral des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan
357b3(mdo sde): bde la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad phul nas rtag tu chos mnyan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug lag khang yo
357b4(mdo sde): byad thams cad dang ldan pa zhig kyang brtsigs so/ /rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu
357b5(mdo sde): byung ste pha'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga'i ra bar de rjes su skyong zhing 'dug go / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de na gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba
357b6(mdo sde): dang / mal cha la longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nas dong
357b7(mdo sde): ngo / /de'ang yid mchog tu dga' nas bdag nyid kyis kyang longs spyod par mi byed/ gzhan dag la'ang mi ster ro/ /zhes bya ba nas dge slong de'ang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal
358a1(mdo sde): ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas bcos so/ /de de
358a2(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos nas yi dwags rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por der sdug bsngal myong ngo / /phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal myong
358a3(mdo sde): ngo / /lag 'gro /'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang srid sgrub bcas zhes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ba de gzhan zhing /
358a4(mdo sde): yin par khyod sems na/ de gzhan yin par blta bar mi bya ste/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa'ang khyod yin no/ /'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig tu khyod rtag par ngan
358a5(mdo sde): song gsum gyi nang du skyes so/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni/ gzhan ma yin gyi/ khyod yin te/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong ngo / /gang
358a6(mdo sde): khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ gnas yod do/ /klu'i bu
358a7(mdo sde): de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas rab tu du zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'atsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ byis pa ji lta ba dang / rmongs
358b1(mdo sde): pa ji lta ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi mkhas pa ji lta ba bzhin nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so/ /nongs pa so sor 'chags lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gi bsam pas
358b2(mdo sde): sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs pa lags so/ /bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis pa lags
358b3(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so/ /legs so/ /khyod lhag pa'i bsam pas nga la skyabs su song bas khyod kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su zad do/ /'di nas
358b4(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i rnyed pa thob par 'gyur te/ byams pa'i thad du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe
358b5(mdo sde): de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang / de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum
358b6(mdo sde): tshogs par byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/ de gzhan yin par yang mi blta ste/ de ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no/ /'di ni/ bskal pa
358b7(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror ma skyes so/ /lha'i dpal dang skal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo / /'di ni/ bla na med pa'i theg pa'i phyir smon lam gyi
359a1(mdo sde): dbang gis 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir dpal dang skal ba bzang po de lta bu myong ngo / /de skad ces thos nas klu thams cad skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi bde nas
359a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtog pas gces par byed par gyur to/ /de'i nang na klu gzhan mig med pa long ba 'bras bu nyam chung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des
359a3(mdo sde): gsang bstod nas 'o 'dod bos te gsol pa/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse bdag cag yongs su bskyab par gsol/ /yun ring bdag gi lus la sdug bsngal tshor ba rab mi bzad/ /srin
359a4(mdo sde): bu sbal pa skye bo srog chags sna tshogs 'tshal bar bgyid/ /bza' ba btung ba ma mchis chab tshan nang na bdag gnas lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ba 'jig
359a5(mdo sde): rgyal bstan pa la/ /sngon gyi dge sbyong khyod gyur to/ /mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan/ /dben pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed/ /lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang / /khyod bdag ston pa
359a6(mdo sde): 'dra bar gyur/ /dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen po yang / /khyod la slob ma rnams kyis brjod/ /rnyed dang bkur sti byung ba ni/ /khyod gcig pu yis longs spyad cing / /khyod kyis dge slong des
359a7(mdo sde): pa mthong / /de dag la ni mi snyan brjod/ /lhan cig gnas de mi dgar gnas/ /khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag tu/ /nged kyi zas su gyur cig ces/ /de lta bu yi sems bskyed do/ /las kyi
359b1(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa des/ /'dir yang khyod ni lag 'gror skyes/ /khyod rang gi yang lhan cig gnas/ /phyi phyir za bar byed pa yin/ /chu tshan nang na gnas pa dang / /long bar de yis gyur pa yin/ /kun tu
359b2(mdo sde): 'bar ba'i lcags dang zangs/ /phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur/ /stobs med yid ni mi dga' bas/ /klu dbang kun gyi nang na du/ /nyes pa so sor bshags byas na/ /sdug bsngal rnams
359b3(mdo sde): las yongs su grol/ /de nas bcom ldan gser 'dra ba'i/ /phyag gis zhal gyi dkyil 'khor reg /spyod pa dka' ba dgongs mdzad nas/ /ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po mig bzang nga
359b4(mdo sde): byung ste/ /sngon tshe bden pa gang gis ngas/ /bram ze long ba'i don du ni/ /mig dag gnyis ka phyung bar gyur/ /bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/ /khyod kyis dri med mig thob shog /nga yi legs par
359b5(mdo sde): spyod pas khyod/ /sngon gyi las de byang bar shog /tad+ya thA/ tsak+Shu kha ba/ ra sa na kha ba/ karma kha ba/ a nan dza na/ bi ra dza pa ra an+ta/ dz+nyA ma ni sa ra Na tro ya/ a he tsan+d+ra Da ne/ kri mi shud+d+he/ pha la shud+d+he/
359b6(mdo sde): a dze ta dze/ ta le tan+ta le/ ba se d+ha sa ke/ ba sa te/ rU ra ti/ ma hA rU ra bi/ tri rat+na bra he swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na klu 'bras bu nyam chung ba'i mig yongs su dag
359b7(mdo sde): par gyur to/ /klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi mig kyang yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gzhan gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / mi khrag khrig phrag brgyad
360a1(mdo sde): cu rtsa bzhi ni/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad cing mig yongs su dag par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzang thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smras pa/ 'jig
360a2(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos/ /rab tu lam med rnams la mig kyang byin/ /gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na/ /su yang 'gro bar sha'i mig phyis mi 'thob/ /de'i tshe bcom
360a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ kau Di n+ya/ khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i gzhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrub pa 'di zungs shig /da ltar dang ma 'ongs
360a4(mdo sde): pa'i dus na su la la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma dang / khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang / dug gi sbyor bas long bar 'gyur ba dang /
360a5(mdo sde): cung zad mthong bar yang 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs 'di rang gis bklag par bya'o/ /rang gi las so sor bshags par bya'o/ /des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i
360a6(mdo sde): sems kyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing las gzhan mi byed par zhag bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la bya bas na mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang sems can
360a7(mdo sde): gang dag mtshams med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cing dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang /
360b1(mdo sde): chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / gzhan gyi mig rnam par 'jig pa'i las kyi lhag mas long bar gyur pa de dag gis
360b2(mdo sde): gzungs sngags 'di yi ge 'brir bcug ste/ yang dang yang du klog tu gzhug go /las kyi sgrib pa bshags par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang / shing mngar dang / sman ka tsa dang / 'bras
360b3(mdo sde): bu gsum dang / rus sbal gyi snying rnying ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btags cing btsos la gsang sngags 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjod cing mig gi phyi rol tu bsku bar bya'o/ /zhag bdun
360b4(mdo sde): p hrag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur zhing de'i mig yongs su dag par
360b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas na'ang de'i las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas
360b6(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu'i 'khor des 'di skad ces gsol to/ /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa/ nad las rab tu thar par
360b7(mdo sde): mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtsi sngon pos gsang bstod de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba khyod/ /khyod ni dka' mdzad dpal kun ldan/ /khyod kyis
361a1(mdo sde): las kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyod/ /bdag ni chu dang rnam bral zhing / /tsha ba'i klung gis kun gdungs pa'i/ /'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags//
361a2(mdo sde): dri mi zhim pa'i gnas na gnas/ /lo ni bye ba phrag stong du/ /zhag gcig bdag la bde ma mchis/ /rtag par 'khor dang lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni gzhan gyis bza' ba lags/ /bcom ldan
361a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gang dag sdig byas nas/ /phyis kyang bdag nyid bsod nams sgrub/ /lus kyis gaN+Di brdungs nas su/ /dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed na'ang / /las
361a4(mdo sde): kyi lhag ma de yis su/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa na/ /sdug bsngal ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing / /bza' btung dag dang yang dag ldan/ /yang na klu yi skye gnas su/ /las kyis skye bar 'gyur ba
361a5(mdo sde): yin| |de yi mgo yi klad pa der/ /nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur/ /kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba/ /chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyur ro/ /gang na klu ni gnas byed pa/ /de nas chu ni 'bab par
361a6(mdo sde): 'gyur| |sa 'am nam mkha' la yang rung / /gang dang gang du 'gro ba der/ /sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang / /chu ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yang na sems can gang dag gis/ /mi yi
361a7(mdo sde): dngos po thob nas su/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /dge 'dun rim gro mi byed na/ /de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni/ /ngan song gsum du myong nas kyang / /de nyid klu yi skye gnas su/ /
361b1(mdo sde): skye ba thob par 'gyur ba yin/ /de las kun tu chu mi 'byung / /mgo la nor bu rin chen med/ /stong pa skom pa'i gnas dag tu/ /chu med par ni gnas par 'gyur/ /sngon 'das dus na khyod kyis ni//
361b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba skar rgyal bstan pa la/ /dge slong dgon pa bar gyur te/ /phrag dog ser snas gang ba yin/ /dge slong glo bur 'ongs mthong nas/ /khro gnyer can gyi bzhin byas nas/ /de dag la ni sbyin
361b3(mdo sde): gtong byed/ /de la yang ni mngon sum gshe/ der ni gang dag chur yang ni/ /myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang / /'chags gnas khang dag gi gnas/ /dri nga ba yis bkang bar gyur/ /dge slong
361b4(mdo sde): des pa 'gro ba na/ /brgyad bkag gis ni gshe bar gyur/ /dge slong des pa gzhan dag kyang / /rgyang ring bar ni yongs su spangs/ /de phyir phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu/ /mchod par ni khyod gyur
361b5(mdo sde): nas| |dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong / /myur du khros nas gshe bar 'gyur/ /sbyin pa po la khro bas gshe/ ngo tsha khrel yong rnam par spangs/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa des/ /sems can dmyal
361b6(mdo sde): bar so sor skyes/ /lus ni bye bas sems dmyal du/ /sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong / /yi dwags rnams su dus ring por/ /sdug bsngal rab tu mi bzad myong / /khyod ni klu yi skye gnas
361b7(mdo sde): su| |skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur/ /stong pa 'brog dgon rdzong rnams su/ /chu dang bral bar gnas pa yin/ /sems can dmyal ba rnams su khyod/ /sdug bsngal tshor ba phyi
362a1(mdo sde): phyir myong / /shin tu yun ring yi dwags dang / /dud 'gror sdug bsngal tshor ba myong / /su zhig tha ma'i dus tshe gnod sems byung / /rtag tu phrag dog ser sna khros pa
362a2(mdo sde): la| |bsam gtan mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min/ /tshul khrims mi skyob dgon par gnas pa min/ /yang de'i tshe klu'i 'khor de'i nang na klu yi dwags lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngo na
362a3(mdo sde): gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ skad po cher rab tu du zhing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag
362a4(mdo sde): cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la bdag cag gis 'dra mtshungs par las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu 'phangs lags so/ /de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du
362a5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal myong lags so/ /de ltar yang klu yi dwags lta bu rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir lags te/ dper na/ klu yi dwags lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhin no/ /
362a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis chu longs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob cig dang / des ni/ khyed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad
362a7(mdo sde): yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /de nas klu yi dwags lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs pa dang / lag na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro/ /de nas me'i
362b1(mdo sde): phung po shing ta la drug srid du 'phags te lan bdun gyi bar du de bzhin no/ klu'i tshogs de mchog tu yid mi dga' nas mchi ma dag phyung ngo / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang yid
362b2(mdo sde): kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin no/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/ /de 'dra ba yi 'bras bu 'thob/ /dge ba yin na bzang po ste/ /sdig pa byed pa'ang sdig to
362b3(mdo sde): 'o| |de nas yi dwags lta bu'i klu/ khyed kun 'di skad tshig smros shig /bden pa gang gis ston pa ni/ /sems can kun la thugs snyoms pa/ /bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/ /nged kyi chu ni ma
362b4(mdo sde): 'bar cig / klu thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /lan brgyad pa la lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtor nas nyes pa la nyes pa so sor
362b5(mdo sde): bshags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yi/ /lhag ma lus pa yongs su zad/ /byams pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni/ /mi yi srid pa thob par 'gyur/ /
362b6(mdo sde): byams pa yi ni bstan pa la/ /myur du rab tu 'byung ba thob/ /rnal 'byor la ni mngon brtson dang / /myur du dgra bcom thob par 'gyur/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu'i
362b7(mdo sde): tshogs de ji ltar lhags pa bzhin de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dang / bdag gi las dang / 'gro ba dang / skye ba rjes su dran te/ 'khor de'i nang nas klu brgya stong phrag
363a1(mdo sde): mang po rang gis nyes par byas pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis rab tu dus nas kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
363a2(mdo sde): bstan pa la bdag khyim na gnas par gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang / /chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa'i me
363a3(mdo sde): tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba longs spyad lags so/ /zhes bya ba nas kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag gis phyogs bzhi pa la bsngos pa longs spyad
363a4(mdo sde): lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag gis rang gis bsngos pa longs spyad lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ kha cig gis gsol
363a5(mdo sde): pa| bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag gtsug tor can gyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag 'khro ba 'jig gi zhes bya ba'i
363a6(mdo sde): bar dang / bdag cag gser thub kyi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /glu kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas par
363a7(mdo sde): gyur te/ nye du dgang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang / /chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba
363b1(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la stsal ba de bdag cag gis longs spyad lags so/ /sdig pa'i las des kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu mi
363b2(mdo sde): bzad pa mang po yang dang yang nyams su myong lags so/ /dud 'gro dang yi dwags rnams kyi nang du dus yun ring por rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir lags so/ /las kyi lhag ma des
363b3(mdo sde): bdag cag klu'i skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes nas chab bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i nang du btsos lags so/ /bye ma kun tu tsha ba'i nang du bsregs lags so/ /bdag cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas
363b4(mdo sde): stsal ba'ang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lags so/ /de bzhin du khar btung bstsal ba'ang lcags dang zangs su gyur lags so/ /gang dang gang du mchis pa thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
363b5(mdo sde): de lta bu myong lags na/ bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lhag 'gro dag/ khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi longs spyod pa de ni/ 'os pa ma yin te/
363b6(mdo sde): mtshams med pa dang nye ba yin no/ /rnam par ma smin par gang gis kyang myur du bshags par mi nus so/ /kye lag 'gro dag /de lta yin yang ji srid 'tshe'i bar du skyabs su 'gro ba la
363b7(mdo sde): 'khod cig dang / de lta na khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyu des de bzhin gshegs pas khyed 'dod pa bzhin 'khor bar gzhog par mdzad do/ /de dag thams cad gsum la skyabs su
364a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba la'ang bkod par gyur to/ /yang 'khor de'i nang na klu mo long ma zhig yod do/ /de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcin rul blta bu'i rang dring ba zag go/ smad
364a2(mdo sde): kyi mtshan ma la'ang de bzhin no/ /de'i lus thams cad rul cing rang 'dzag pa phol mig dang srin bus gang ba la sha sbran dang / /sbrang bu ma chu ring dang / sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kyis
364a3(mdo sde): za bar byed do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ sring mo/ khyod kyis lus la sdig pa'i las ni/ ci byas/ /ji lta bu zhig /des gsol pa/ btsun pa

364a5(mdo sde): lo stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mngon par 'tshal lags so/ /bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu ni/ gdugs zhag gcig kyang rgyu nam chad lags so'i/ /bka' stsal pa/

364b1(mdo sde): 'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i chos 'dod pa dag so so yang dag par myong lags te/ nor gyi slad du ma skrag lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de tshun chad bdag rtag tu lha dang mi'i rnyed pa dang bral lags
364b2(mdo sde): so| |rtag tu ngan song gsum gyi tshor ba mi bzad pas rab tu gzir lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ sring mo/ gang gi tshe 'dir bskal pa chen po 'jig par gyur ba de'i tshe khyod gang du song /des gsol pa/
364b3(mdo sde): sngon gyi las la brten pa'i rlung chen po de dag gis 'phangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa gzhan dag tu 'phangs lags so/ /yang gang gi tshe der 'jig par gyur nas de nas
364b4(mdo sde): yang 'dir 'phangs lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ thugs rje chen pos bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
364b5(mdo sde): kyi phyag gnyis kas rma rtsi spos dang sbyar ba'i chu ba zhes te bden brjod par mdzad de/ /bden pa gang gis sngon thi ba'i phyir nga'i lus chags pa med par yongs su btang ba'i bden pa des
364b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi nad de dag zhi bar gyur cig/ klu mo de'i khar blugs shing lus la gtor bas nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ gsum la skyabs su nye bar gnas par gyur to/ /yang de
364b7(mdo sde): nyid na klu gzhan zhig lus dri nga zhing srin bus gang la srin bus ser skyabs gang nas de las rang khrag tsha zhing gor gor po zag pa/ smra mi nus pa/ mchog tu skyon du bgrang ba zhig yod do/ /

365a2(mdo sde): rnag khrag dang / mas gang ba'i kha'i sgo spyang brims te smra ma nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skyor chu zhig bzhes te bka' stsal pa/ ri bong gyur te drang srong phyir/ /rang gis me yi nang
365a3(mdo sde): bor ba| |bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis/ /klu ni smra bar nus par shog /skyor chu de klu'i khar blugs nas de'i kha'i nang du me rab tu zhi zhing srin bu dang rang khrag kha'i phyi rol du byung ngo / /klu
365a4(mdo sde): de kha yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal ba 'do srung gi bstan pa la bdag zhing par gyur lags so/ /bdag gis bcom ldan 'das
365a5(mdo sde): kyi nyan thos gzhan zhig la skyed du stsol cig dang / /ston gyi dus su khyod la 'bul lo/ /zhes gser lnga bcu zhig gsol ba btab pa lags so/ /des bdag la 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu
365a6(mdo sde): zhig stsal te/ lnga bcur ma stsal lags so/ /bdag gis dge slong de la khro bas zil gyis non nas 'gron bu brgyad cu'i rin bcu blangs te/ de la slar yang ma stsal lags so/ /gzhan
365a7(mdo sde): y ang dus gzhan zhig na dge slong rnams kyi kun dga' ba der bdag mchis nas der dge 'dun gyi mngon du gyur pa bsngos pa a mra'i 'bras bu bcu gsum pa longs spyad lags
365b1(mdo sde): s o| |sug las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de kho nas de nas shi 'phos nas 'brog dgon pa skam po 'dir nye tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes te rtag tu bdag gi lus srin bu dag
365b2(mdo sde): dang rang khrag bsdus pas gang lags so/ /bkres pa dang skom pas kun tu gzir nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong lags so/ /yang mi dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des bdag 'di nas shi 'phos nas
365b3(mdo sde): yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skyes lags so/ /dge slong de'ang khro ba dang ser sna'i rgyu des 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du bdag gi mchan khung du skyes
365b4(mdo sde): te| dus rtag tu bdag la g.yo bar bgyid do/ /de rtag tu khro bas zil gyis non nas dbugs tshabs bdag gis lus la yongs su gang bar bgyid do/ /rgyu des rtag par rgyun du bdag gi lus
365b5(mdo sde): srin bu dag dang rang khrag gis gang lags na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ sprul dgra dang 'dra ba de las bdag yongs su thar par mdzad par gsol/ de

366b1(mdo sde): gsal shing steng du bteg pa bla'i/ /khyim par gyur pas dge 'dun gyi/ /longs spyod par ni mi bya'o/ /me mdag gis ni gang ba yi/ /gnas khang der ni zhugs pa bla'i/ /khyim pas dge 'dun
366b2(mdo sde): gnas khang du/ /mtshan mo gnas par mi bya'o/ /me lce 'bar ba lta bu yi/ /lcags kyi thu lum blangs pa bla'i/ /rab tu byung dang khyim pa yis/ /dbyig ni blang par mi bya'o/ /'khor lo rnon

366b4(mdo sde): rang gis phyung ba bla'i/ /sems can du ni bgrang ba la/ /khros pas skye rgu mi mngag go /legs par gsungs pa'i chos can gyi/ /me yi gos ni gyon pa bla'i/ /tshul 'chos pa dang mthu yis

366b7(mdo sde): tshe klu gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad cu ni/ /skyabs gsum du 'gro ba dang / theg pa gsum la nges pa rnam par bkod do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kau Di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/
367a1(mdo sde): kau Di n+ya/ sems can rnams rang la slu ba la ltos/ /sems can gang dag dbul po nyid kyi 'jigs bas skrag nas rang gis dge slong chos kyis gnas pa
367a2(mdo sde): rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir yo byad kyi dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs bsngos la/ kha cig gis ni/ rang gis longs spyod do/ /kha cig gis ni/ gzhan dag longs spyad par bya ba'i
