367a4(mdo sde): pas skrag nas 'khor ba'i srid pa'i btson ra thams cad las yongs su thar par bya ba'i phyir sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo / /de dag
367a5(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas chos dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang tshig 'don pa btang nas nyams par gyur pa de dag kha cig ni/ dge slong chos kyis gnas pa rnams la dngos
367a6(mdo sde): po rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du bsngos pa rang gis 'phrog ste longs spyod par byed do/ /kha cig gis ni/ khyim pa rnam la sbyin par byed de/ de dag gnyis ka de ltar yun
367a7(mdo sde): ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal gyis gzir to/ /ngas nyes dmigs de yang dag par gzigs nas nga'i nyan thos rnams la dran par bya ba bca' bar mdzad
367b1(mdo sde): de| nga'i nyan thos sus kyang dge slong la bsngos pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / bcud khyim pa rnams la sbyin par mi bya'o/ /gang
367b2(mdo sde): zag gi 'du shes kyis longs spyad par mi bya'o/ /dge 'dun las phyi rol tu'ang nyo tshong mi bya'o/ /bskor ba dang / bsgyur ba dang / dbyig gi gtam mi bya'o/ /sems can rnams zang zing
367b3(mdo sde): gis yongs su bsdu ba'i rkyen gyis ngan song gi sdug bsngal dag la dgod par mi bya'o/ /sems can rnams chos kyi bsdu bas bsdu bar bya'o/ /si phyed pa'i dad pa bzhi dang / theg pa gsum
367b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po'i mdo le'u bcu gcig pa las/ klu skyabs su 'gro ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig
367b5(mdo sde): pa'o/ / //'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhe bya ba'i mdo/ bam po bcu gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas brtan kun
367b6(mdo sde): shes ko Di n+yas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ lag 'gro dag byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i las bstan pa'i spyod pa dang 'phrel ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
367b7(mdo sde): yun ring por 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir mchod rten chen po 'di dag rnal 'byor yid la byed par mngon par brtson
368a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis stongs par ma gyur pa de srid du gling bzhi pa 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten chen po gang dag ce
368a2(mdo sde): na| dzam+bu'i gling 'di na mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni/ sngon chad sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / drang rgyal ba dang / nyan thos mang
368a3(mdo sde): po gnas gnas shing ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ rjes su bstan pa chen po yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni/
368a4(mdo sde): sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do/ /ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongs su gtad de/ 'di'ang spro bar 'gyur zhing
368a5(mdo sde): gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnal 'byor yid la byed pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams la
368a6(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang yongs su srung bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po chu lhas gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de
368a7(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/ /gang dag gang zag mnyam pa nyid la
368b1(mdo sde): mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyang chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/ /gang dag gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la
368b2(mdo sde): rim grol mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang de bzhin lags te/ ji srid du dam pa'i chos 'bar bar 'gyur ba de kho na bzhin du bdag gis gnyis ka srung
368b3(mdo sde): lags so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyi bar dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bar gyis kyang de'i chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi ba'i slad du gtad
368b4(mdo sde): lags so/ /de bzhin du da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten nas gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi bar dang /
368b5(mdo sde): gang dag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag gi bar dag dang / ji
368b6(mdo sde): srid du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par gnas par de dag thams cad srung bar bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag 'gro'i bdag po/ legs
368b7(mdo sde): so legs so/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i chos kyi tshul sbyin bdag chen po de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /ba lang spyod kyi gling gi ngos na rdul gyi
369a1(mdo sde): ri de la drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba ni/ klu'i rgya po rin po che'i phreng ba can la chad khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rin
369a2(mdo sde): po che'i phreng ba can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis der drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba de chang
369a3(mdo sde): khyir yongs su gtad lags so/ /zhes bya ba nas ji srid du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par gnas pa de srid du bdag gis thams cad yongs su bskyang par bgyi lags
369a4(mdo sde): so| |zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag rnams kyis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /shar gyi
369a5(mdo sde): lus 'phags kyi ngos na ni/ lang+ga Na'i ri la drang srong thub pa'i gnas drang srong 'byung ba na/ klu'i rgyal po zla srung la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas de srid du bdag
369a6(mdo sde): gis yongs su bskyang bar bgyi lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ngos na rgyal dga'i ri la drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs ni/ klu'i rgyal po lus
369a7(mdo sde): 'bigs pa'i khab la chang khyir yongs su gtad de gang zag mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyang chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /de bzhin du
369b1(mdo sde): gang zag dge slong mnyam pa nyid la mngon par brtson pa chos kyis gnas pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag de dag kyang chang
369b2(mdo sde): khyir ngas yongs su gtad do/ /klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de de bzhin te/ sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig
369b3(mdo sde): gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs de'ang chang khyir yongs su gtad lags so/ /chos kyis gnas pa'ang de bzhin lags so/ /gser thub kyis kyang de bzhin lags so/ /
369b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas 'od srung gis kyang de bzhin lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag gis chos kyi tshul yang dag par bzung lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de bzhin du da ltar
369b5(mdo sde): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bdag gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs thams cad bsrung bar bgyi lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
369b6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ lag 'gro'i bdag po/ legs so legs so/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs pas chos kyi tshul sbyin bdag chen po de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par
369b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ba lang spyod kyi gling na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 'od zer byung ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /
370a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags gling na drang srong thub pa'i
370a2(mdo sde): gnas pad+ma'i shing n+ya gro d+ha lta bu gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po dbyig gtong la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /
370a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling na drang srong thub pa'i gnas spos brtsegs 'od zer ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po gnas na rgyu la chang
370a4(mdo sde): khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i
370a5(mdo sde): gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas nor bu'i snying po'i 'od 'phro ba gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar
370a6(mdo sde): bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du ri rab kyi rtse mo na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i snying po gang yin
370a7(mdo sde): pa de ni| klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du dzam+bu'i
370b1(mdo sde): gling 'di na dga' 'phel zhes bya ba nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas gnas brtan gyi phug gang yin pa de ni/ klu'i rgyal po lce sbyang la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por
370b2(mdo sde): 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du yangs pa can na drang srong thub pa'i gnas shin tu brtan pa ni/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad
370b3(mdo sde): do| |zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du ser skya'i gnas na drang srong thub pa'i gnas gser sgron dri zhim ni/ klu'i rgyal po ma
370b4(mdo sde): dros pa la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du yul ma ga d+ha na drang srong thub pa'i gnas rgya chen
370b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po ri bos byin la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du bcom brlag na drang
370b6(mdo sde): srong thub pa'i gnas stug pa'i sprin ni/ klu'i rgyal po lce spyang dang rgyu ma la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar
370b7(mdo sde): du'o| |de bzhin du yul 'khor ko sa la na drang srong thub pa'i gnas rgyal ba dag pa zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po srin bu la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por
371a1(mdo sde): 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du phug gi pha rol na drang srong thub pa'i gnas btang bzung bden pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i
371a2(mdo sde): rgyal po btang bzung la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du yul 'khor sa 'dzin na
371a3(mdo sde): drang srong thub pa'i gnas mthong ba'i lam rgyags zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par
371a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du kha che'i yul na drang srong thub pa'i gnas gur gum gyi rtse mo zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po hu lu ru la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /
371a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du yul chu len na drang srong thub pa'i gnas 'od zer byed pa'i snying po zhes bya ba ni/
371a6(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du rgya yul na drang srong
371a7(mdo sde): thub pa'i gnas sred med kyi bu'i 'od ces bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos byin gyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par
371b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du kha sha'i yul na sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs na drang srong thub pa'i gnas go na sA la gan+d+ha zhes bya ba mchod rten
371b2(mdo sde): chen po'i gnas na klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin gyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /zhes bya ba nas yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /mchod
371b3(mdo sde): rten chen po de dag ni/ sngon chad drang srong thub pa'i khyu mchog mang po gnas gnas shing sngon chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po 'ang gnas gnas/ sngon chad rang
371b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba mang po 'ang gnas gnas/ sngon chad nyan thos chen po mang po 'ang gnas gnas/ sngon chad drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa mang po 'ang gnas gnas pa yin te/ sangs
371b5(mdo sde): r gyas kyi zhing 'dir gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing sems can 'khor bas skrag pa yongs su skyo ba rnams kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir
371b6(mdo sde): dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyis de dag gi lag tu yongs su gtad pa yin no/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dpag tu
371b7(mdo sde): med pa na gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byung ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams kyis las zad par bya
372a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag dgongs shing bsam la byin gyis brlabs so/ /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyis
372a2(mdo sde): zhing grangs med pa dpag tu med pa de dag tu gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad
372a3(mdo sde): kyis kyang mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag dgongs shing bsam par 'gyur la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rgyal pa'i zla ba gang
372a4(mdo sde): d ag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang sems can gyi don du las zad par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob par
372a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / rang rgyal ba thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po thams cad dang / de bzhin du drang srong mngon
372a6(mdo sde): p ar shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don du las zad par bya ba'i phyir mchod rten chen po nyi shu po de dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing byin gyis rlob par yang
372a7(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ /sems can dbang che bar grags pa de dag gi lag tu chang khyir ngas yongs su gtad par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du par mchod rten chen po'i gnas nyi shu po de dag
372b1(mdo sde): khyed kyis ji ltar ming yongs su bzung ba bzhin ngas yongs su gtad kyi/ sems can 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba rnams kyi don du khyed kyis de dag srungs shig /chos rab tu mi 'jigs
372b2(mdo sde): par yang dag par zungs shig / de nas gang dag gi lag tu mchod rten chen po'i gnas nyi shu po de dag yongs su gtad pa'i klu de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa
372b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag klu rnams ni/ rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sgrib pas shin tu myos lags te/ gang bdag cag mtshan gcig gnyid log pa de ni/ mi'i ltar brtsis na dgung lo
372b4(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa gcig 'das par 'gyur lags so/ /gal te bdag cag rab tu gnyid kyis log nas drang srong thub pa'i gnas de dag tu lha'i kun tu 'khrug pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur tam/
372b5(mdo sde): mi'i kun tu 'khrug pa'am/ zhugs sam/ chab kyis kun tu 'khrug pa 'ga' zhig byung bar gyur na mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur lags na/ bdag cag
372b6(mdo sde): gnyid kyis log cing myos pa de dag gis rab tu 'jig pa de bsal bar rngo mi thogs lags te/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdag cag nongs pa
372b7(mdo sde): byung ba lags par 'gyur lags so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag la bka' stsal pa/ rtag par rgyal ba rnams kyis dgongs pa'i
373a1(mdo sde): mchod rten chen po'i gnas drang srong thub pa'i gnas khyed kyis longs shig / chang khyer yongs su skyongs shig /yongs su srungs shig /de'i tshe gnod
373a2(mdo sde): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa drug gis ji ltar rjes su mthun par sngon chad drang srong thub pa'i gnas su ji ltar gnas par gyur pa bzhin du chang khyir yongs su blangs so/ /
373a3(mdo sde): go ma sA la gan+d+ha'i gnas ni/ ma gtogs te/ ma blangs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/
373a4(mdo sde): sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs gang na drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan+d+ha zhes bgyi ba mchod rten chen po'i gnas mchis pa ni/ yongs su
373a5(mdo sde): bskyang ba'i slad du bdag gis blangs lags na/ sa phyogs de na yul dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal ma mchis lags so/ /mi rnams kyi gnas ma mchis lags
373a6(mdo sde): te| yul gzhan nam/ gling bzhi pa gzhan na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rang rgyal ba dang / nyan thos chen
373a7(mdo sde): po rnams dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ni/ ma gtogs te/ de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis mchod pa bgyi ba'i
373b1(mdo sde): slad du drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan+d+ha der lhags te/ de nas slar yang mchi bar bgyid do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon su'ang de kun tu
373b2(mdo sde): bsrung ba'i slad du spro bar ma gyur pa la gzigs/ gnas de ngan bar rtsi ba zhig ma lags sam zhes bdag ngo mtshar du gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
373b3(mdo sde): lag 'gro'i bdag po/ de skad ma smra zhig /kha sha'i yul na bden pa mthong ba dang / dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa nyi khri gnas pa gang yin pa de dag gis drang
373b4(mdo sde): srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po go ma sA la gan+d+ha la nyin mtshan du mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang lag 'gro'i bdag po/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
373b5(mdo sde): srung yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas skye rgus lo sum stong lon pa na sa'i nu ma'i gnas su yul 'khor chen po rdo rtsub ces bya ba bde ba dang dga' bar byed pa/ mi dang skye bo
373b6(mdo sde): mang pos gang ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ /de na drang srong sbyin gnas bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba theg pa bla na med pa 'dod pa lnga 'bum snyed kyi mang po gnas par gyur to/ /
373b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe mi rnams zas la la 'khren te/ de dag kha zas kyi phyir drang srong de dag la 'khrig ba dang ldan pas mi snyan pa rjod par byed do/ /thal ba dang rdul gyis 'thor bar byed do/ /de'i tshe drang
374a1(mdo sde): srong de dag yul 'khor rdo rtsub de nas dong ngo / /de nas sems can de dag drang srong dong ba de dag la mchog tu dga' zhing yi rang bar gyur to/ /de'i phyir dang
374a2(mdo sde): por khyod khros te/ de dag gi chu kun tu chad nas yul 'khor der klung dang / 'bab chu'i dogs dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / lu ma'i chu dang / khron pa dag bskams pa khyod
374a3(mdo sde): kyis dran nam/ yul der me lha khros te sems can de dag gi me kun tu chad nas sems can de dag bkres pa dang skom pas gzir te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas ring por ma lon par de
374a4(mdo sde): 'brog dgon par gyur to/ /de ltar yun ring por yang dag par gnas par gyur pa dag kyang de bzhin no/ /nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang der ci nas
374a5(mdo sde): kyang sa'i nu ma'i gnas der grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / ri brag rnams gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sems can theg pa chen po la yang dag par
374a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i gnas dang / bde ba dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur bar nga der gshegs
374a7(mdo sde): par mdzad de/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan+d+ha de zhag bdun longs spyad par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon ming can la bka' stsal
374b1(mdo sde): pa| ming can/ khyod kyis dran nam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ sngon re glang ru de la ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis skyil mo krung gcig gis rnam par grol
374b2(mdo sde): ba'i bde bas dgung bdun 'das par mdzad de/ dgung bdun po de 'das nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te drang srong thub pa'i gnas go ma sA la gan+d+ha de la bzhugs pa dang / de'i tshe
374b3(mdo sde): de'i srung ba 'dzin pa dang / byi byi ling gi shing srung ba gang dag lags pa dang / de'i nyan thos bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa/ ting nge 'dzin la mngon par brtson pa/ chos kyis
374b4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams kyi srung ba 'dzin pa dang / byi byi ling gi shing srung ba gang dag lags pa bdag gis dran lags so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin gyis gsol pa/ btsun
374b5(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du yun ji srid du nyan thos de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis par gnas pa de srid du bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi lags so/ /gzhan yang byams
374b6(mdo sde): pa'i dus kyi bar du mchod rten chen po go ma sA la gan+d+ha dus rtag tu chab dang / zhugs dang / gnod sbyin dang / grul bum gyis kun tu 'khrug pa rnams las bdag gis bsrung bar bgyi
374b7(mdo sde): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag 'gro'i bdag po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /nga'i chos kyi tshul de ltar shin tu byin gyis brlabs pas grogs po dang sbyin
375a1(mdo sde): bdag de lta bu dag gis yun ring por 'bar bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu po gang
375a2(mdo sde): dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas lung bstan pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po mnyam par bya ba'i phyir lhags shing 'dus ba de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
375a3(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang gling bzhi pa 'dir gnas par bgyi lags so/ /drang srong thub pa'i gnas me tog nas ba dan gyi bar dang / gser nas sa le
375a4(mdo sde): sbram gyi bar gyis yongs su gtams par bgyi lags so/ /las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags nyi ma'i snying po 'di bcang bar bgyi lags so/ /gzhan dag la bstan par bgyi lags
375a5(mdo sde): so| |yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs sngags de'ang yid kyis rjes su brtags te gnas par bgyi lags so/ /
375a6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dang gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa byang bar bgyi lags so/ /da ltar bdud bye ba de dag lhags
375a7(mdo sde): shing lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po grangs ma mchis pa/ dpag tu ma mchis pa de dag kyang lhags
375b1(mdo sde): te| bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag thams cad klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi sug par chang khyir stsal lags so/ /
375b2(mdo sde): 'on kyang 'di la bdud dang / lha dang / mi 'am ci dang / lha ma yin de dag gi sems gzhan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas de rnams dag pa dag gi sug par
375b3(mdo sde): chang khyir yongs su gtad lags zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rnams kyi bar gyis mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag la mi phan pa dang / rab tu 'jigs
375b4(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par 'jig par pha rol gnod par 'gyur ba de lta bu ma dgongs na mi rung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ legs so legs so/ /ma 'jigs
375b5(mdo sde): shig |ma skrag cig / 'dir sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag gis drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag thams cad
375b6(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs nas klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams la chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /de bzhin du da ltar ngas kyang drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas thams
375b7(mdo sde): cad klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu chang khyir yongs su gtad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mi khom pa brgyad thob pa de dag gi las kyi sgrib pa yang dag par byang bar bya ba dang /
376a1(mdo sde): byang grol gyi bde ba'i rgyu yang dag par bskyed par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad sa bon gyi tshogs dang / 'byung ba'i tshogs dang /
376a2(mdo sde): sman dang / nags tshal rnams yang dag par rab tu skye bar bya ba dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su smin par bya ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i
376a3(mdo sde): phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu yongs su gtad pa'i phyir ro/ /yang gzhan yang mchod rten chen
376a4(mdo sde): po'i gnas byung ngo cog dang / 'byung bar 'gyur pa gang du de bzhin gshegs pa bltams pa dang / dka' thub gyi tshal gang du bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / gang
376a5(mdo sde): du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'am/ btsas pa'i sku rab tu bzhag pa'i
376a6(mdo sde): bar dang / gang dang gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnams gnas par 'gyur pa dang / gnas par 'gyur pa nas nga'i chos kyi tshul gnas par 'gyur
376a7(mdo sde): ba'i bar gyi gnas de dag thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten dag yin no/ /mang mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag kyang bdud rnams dang / lha rnams
376b1(mdo sde): dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi lag tu yongs su bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su gtad do/ /gzhan yang 'byung bo thams cad rab tu dad par byed pa
376b2(mdo sde): dang / phyir mi ldog par byed pa gang 'di lung bstan pa chen po/ ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa/ so sor sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa zhes bya ba ngas khyed cag la sbyin par bya
376b3(mdo sde): ste| sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs la mngon par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ sdang ba rnams mngon par dad par byed pa/ phyir zlog
376b4(mdo sde): par byed pa/ dge ba la yang dag par sbyor du 'jug pa yin no/ /de bzhin du ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba nas mngon par dad par byed cing phyir zlog
376b5(mdo sde): par byed la/ dge ba la yang dag par sbyor du 'jug pa'i bar du yin no/ /lung bstan pa chen po/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i rgyu mthun pa/ mngon par sgrub pa'i bdag po chen po/ sdang
376b6(mdo sde): ba thams cad phyir ldog par byed pa 'di ni/ brtul zhugs chen po yang dag par sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /ye shes chen po la 'jug par byed pa'o/ /thos pa mang po kun tu 'dzin pa'o/ /
376b7(mdo sde): thabs chen po yang dag par sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /dgra chen po nges par 'dul bar byed pa'o/ /sdang ba chen po rab tu dad par byed pa'o/ /nad chen po las rab tu thar par byed
377a1(mdo sde): pa'o| |nad chen po las rab tu sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /'jigs pa chen po phyir zlog par byed pa'o/ /dgon pa chen po las nges par rgal bar byed
377a2(mdo sde): pa'o| |bden pa chen po mthong bar byed pa'o/ /bzod pa chen po la reg par byed pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba nas bla na med pa yang
377a3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /ta d+ya thA/ A ma a bA sa/ A ma pa ri ba ra/ saM shrI ya/ gar+b+ha pa
377a4(mdo sde): ri bA sA/ mi tra mi tra/ shwA ya mi tra/ pa ri bA sA/ mi tra sa ma dz+nyA ya/ ni ka tha sa ma dz+nyA ya/ tri sh+yang g+ha ba/ dra ba rA dza/ bi na shA ya/ sa ma shA ya/ ni ra a na b+ha dra ma/ bA bA gra ma/ rid
377a5(mdo sde): d+hi bi gra ma Na/ sa ma dz+nyA na/ a ba brga/ na rA ya na brga/ sa mA gra ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hi Sh+Tha na mA rga swAhA/ bzhin bzang dag /'di ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs shing
377a6(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rgyu mthun pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/ sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa nas dge ba la yang dag par
377a7(mdo sde): sbyor du 'jug par byed pa'i bar dang / brtul zhugs chen po yang dag par sgrol bar byed pa nas byang chub thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i bar yin no/ /
377b1(mdo sde): gang dang gang du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su de'i tshe mchod rten chen po'i gnas de dag la bdud dam/ lha'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha'
377b2(mdo sde): lding ngam/ mi'am ci'am/ grul bum nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du sus chu'am/ me'am/ pha rol gnod pa gzhan gang yang rung bzhig gis mi phan pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa dang / rnam
377b3(mdo sde): par 'jig par rtul bar byed na/ der khyed kyis 'di ltar dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bya zhing sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa'i yid kyis lung
377b4(mdo sde): bstan pa chen po/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/ sdang ba thams cad phyir zlog par byed pa 'di dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de dag gi sems kyi rgyud rab tu dad par byed
377b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ /phyis kyang rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir rtul bar mi byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang gis lung bstan pa chen po/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa/ sdang ba thams
377b6(mdo sde): cad phyir zlog par byed pa 'di thos nas sdig pa'i sems phyir zlog par mi byed pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las spong bar mi byed pa ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten nas skye rgu'i bar la
377b7(mdo sde): ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ sngon gyi sha 'khon dang 'dres pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /kye bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang /
378a1(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod spyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das la mngon por dad pa
378a2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dad pa skyes so/ /yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bdud sdig
378a3(mdo sde): can bdag nyid kyis rang gi gnas su ting nge 'dzin mngon par sgrub pa 'di thos so/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / gus pa skyes nas mchi
378a4(mdo sde): ma dag byung ste 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /nga'i tshig nyon cig /'di ni/ drang srong thub pa rgyal ba'i mchog bzod pa dang / yon tan dang / nges pa'i tshig rab mchog can
378a5(mdo sde): de srin bus gang ba'i ri'i gnas dam pa la 'bar ba la lag 'gro chen po dang / lha rnams kyis bzod pa'i dus bstan te/ nga'ang der 'gro zhing mnyam pa med pa'i dge sbyong la bzod
378a6(mdo sde): par gsol lo/ /de nyid la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i snying brtse ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa rgyal ba bzod pa can de la skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ nga dang lhan cig
378a7(mdo sde): 'dong bar byos shig / de'i chos bstan du med pa nyon cig /nyon mongs pa'i dra ba chod cig /rdul med cing 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par byos shig /de nas bdud
378b1(mdo sde): sdig can 'khor bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag btsal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /rkang gnyis dam pa shin
378b2(mdo sde): tu zhi mdzad pa/ /bzod stobs des mthu can la bzod par gsol/ /khyod kyi yon tan bdag gis kun du 'tshal/ /bdag gis log pa gang bgyis de bzod gsol/ /dus gsum rgyal
378b3(mdo sde): ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /chos dang dge 'dun la yang bdag skyabs mchi/ /bla ma bdag gi nongs par gzung du gsol/ /slan chad khyod la bdag 'khrug yong mi bgyid/ /de
378b4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga la khro med nyon mongs thams cad med/ /rtag tu sems can kun la sems snyoms te/ /bdud khyod la
378b5(mdo sde): ni sems kyang dga' ba yin/ /rgyal ba bzod pa'i thugs ldan rtag tu bzod/ /de nas bdud sdig can mchog tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
378b6(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la blta zhing 'dug go / de nas 'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu 'od 'phro rtsub ces bya ba bdud
378b7(mdo sde): kyi yul thams cad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mig mig
379a1(mdo sde): ces bgyi ba lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ ci gzugs rnams kyi rgyu mig lags sam/ 'on te mig gi rgyu gzugs rnams lags pa nas ci chos
379a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyu yid kyi khams lags sam/ 'on te yid kyi rgyu chos rnams kyi bar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ gzugs rnams kyi rgyu'ang mig ma
379a3(mdo sde): yin la| mig gi rgyu'ang gzugs rnams ma yin pa nas chos rnams kyi rgyu'ang yid ma yin la/ yid kyi rgyu'ang chos rnams kyi bar ma yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'on kyang mig ni/
379a4(mdo sde): mig gis stong pa'o/ /de lta mod kyi/ mig la rten cing mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o/ /de'i rkyen gyis gzugs rnams rab tu shes pa nas yid kyi rkyen gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye'o//
379a5(mdo sde): de'i rkyen gyis chos rnams kyi bar rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs nas gang nas kyang 'ong ba med do/ /gang du'ang 'gro ba med do/ /mig phyi na sdod pa'ang
379a6(mdo sde): med de| dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad la gang la'ang mi dmigs so/ /mig la 'bri ba nyid med do/ /gang ba nyid med do/ /brda med do/ /tha snyad med do/ /yang dag
379a7(mdo sde): par 'du ba med do/ /gzhi med do/ /dper na/ snga dro'i dus su nyi ma shar ba na skar khung gang dang gang du nyi ma'i 'od zer dag zhugs pa ni/ rwa ba la gnas pa dag tu yang dag
379b1(mdo sde): par snang ngo / /rwa ba la mun pa dang / snang ba dang / rtog pa'ang med do/ /rwa ba gang yin pa de nyid snang ba'ang ma yin no/ /rwa ba'i rkyen gyis snang ba'ang ma yin te/ 'on kyang de la snang
379b2(mdo sde): pa'ang yod do/ /snang ba gang yin pa de nyid nyi ma dang / nyi ma gang yin pa de nyid snang ba'ang ma yin no/ /nyi ma nub pa na snang ba'ang med par 'gyur ro/ /gang na'ang snang ba'i 'gro ba
379b3(mdo sde): dang / gzhi med de/ 'on kyang nyi ma'i rkyen gyis snang bar rab tu shes shing gzugs kyi snang ba la rten par yang snang ngo / /de bzhin du nang gi skye mched drug po de dag gi rgyu'ang nang gi skye
379b4(mdo sde): mched drug po de dag yin no/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /nang gi skye mched rnams kyi rgyu'ang phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams ma yin te/ phan tshun du bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /bsdus pa la ni/
379b5(mdo sde): rnam par rgyu ba med do/ /yang dag par 'du ba med do/ /gzhi med do/ /phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnams la rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / brda dang / rnam par rgyu ba med do/ /yang dag
379b6(mdo sde): par 'du ba med do/ /gzhi'ang med pa nyid de/ phan tshun du bsdus pa nyid kyi phyir dang / yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'on kyang rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par byed de/ 'du
379b7(mdo sde): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin pas rnam par shes pa'ang 'du byed kyi rgyu lags so/ /'du byed rnams ni/ gsum ste/ lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid
380a1(mdo sde): kyi 'du byed do/ /de la lus kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni/ dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dag yin te/ de dag ni/
380a2(mdo sde): lus kyi 'du byed rnams so/ /dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba dag kyang yan lag rnams len pa ste/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi phyir
380a3(mdo sde): gzhan gang yang rung ba'i skal pa mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gsar pa gsar pa dang / rnying pa med pa nyid dang / rnam par mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / nam mkha' dang
380a4(mdo sde): mnyam pa dang / nam mkha' la kun tu rgyu ba dag yin no/ /rlung gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha' ma yin no/ /nam mkha' gang yin pa de nyid kyang rlung ma yin te/ phan tshun du 'dres
380a5(mdo sde): pa yin la phan tshun spyod yul ni/ ma yin no/ /gnyi ga stong pa dang / brjod du med pa/ mtshan nyid dang bral ba dgra yin no/ /'bri ba dang / gang ba med pa dag yin no/ /pha rol dang
380a6(mdo sde): tshu rol la gnas pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag par 'phags pa ni/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams yin te/ de lta bas na/ rnam par shes pa la lus kyi 'du byed rnams gnas
380a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin te/ tshogs pa med/ rnam par rgyu ba med/ yang dag par 'du ba med pa/ gzhi dang yang dag pa'i rjes su 'brel ba med do/ /rnam par shes pa gzhi dang yang dag par
380b1(mdo sde): rjes su 'brel ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar yang de bzhin no/ /de la ngag gi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang / dpyod pa rnams so/ rtog pa rnams gnag zhe na/ gnag dag dbugs
380b2(mdo sde): chub pa dang / 'jug par byed pa dang / 'byung bar byed pa rnams te/ sems kyis rjes su mthun par byas pa dag yin no/ /de la rtog par nams kyis rtog par byed pa nas 'jig pa'i mtshan
380b3(mdo sde): nyid rnams kyis rtog par byed/ yongs su dag pa la rtog par byed/ rlung la rten pa'i rtog pa de dag skye bar byed/ 'gag pa'i bar du ste/ rtog pa'i rlung rnams ni/ skad cig la 'tshal ba
380b4(mdo sde): yin no/ /rlung rnams kyang rtog pa rnams yin par mi 'gyur te/ gnyis ka'ang phan tshun du spyod yul ma yin zhing phan tshun du mtshan nyid dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa dag dang / nam
380b5(mdo sde): mkha' ltar med pa dag pa'i bar du'o/ /de la dpyod pa rnams gang zhe na/ dpyod pa gang dag grang ba'i rnam pa'am/ dro ba'i rnam par lus thams cad kyi dbugs rngub pa dang / 'byung ba'i
380b6(mdo sde): rlung rnams rgyu bar byed pa yin no/ /dpyod pa dag gis 'dus te reg pa rnam par mi shes te/ dpyod pa de dag rlung rnams dang phan tshun spyod yul ma yin te/ phan tshun du mtshan nyid
380b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa dag pa'i bar du'o/ /de la yid kyi 'du byed rnams gang zhe na/ yid kyi 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni/ 'du shes dang / sems pa'o/ /de la 'du shes gang
381a1(mdo sde): zhe na| sems gang gis chos de dag de ltar shes pa nas gang gi tshe dbugs rdub pa de'i tshe dbugs 'byung ba med do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ltar
381a2(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams la 'du shes rnam par bsgoms pa yin no/ yang dag par byung nas kyang 'du byed rnams zad pa yin te/ rjes su mthun par 'du shes pas kyang 'du byed kyi
381a3(mdo sde): 'du shes rnam par sgom par byed pa 'di ni| 'du shes zhes bya ste/ 'du shes de ni/ rlung rnam la brten pa nas gnyi ga brjod du med pa'i bar du'o/ /de la sems pa gnag zhe na/
381a4(mdo sde): sems pa gang dag gis zhes bya ba nas 'du byed rnams la 'du shes rnam par bsgoms pas yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la zhugs shing so so skye bo'i sa las rnam par 'das
381a5(mdo sde): par byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ skye ba dang 'jig pa sgom pa 'du byed rnams las sems sel bar byed pa/ rlung rnams 'phro bar mi byed pa 'di ni/ sems pa zhes bya'o/ /
381a6(mdo sde): tshor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir ye shes kyi rten mig ma 'dres pa can zhes bya ba nas yid ma 'dres pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dang / 'phags pa zhes bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /
381a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu/ de ltar yang gzugs dmigs pa'i rgyu mig ma yin no/ /mig gi rgyu gzugs ma yin pa nas chos rnams kyi rgyu yid ma yin no/ /yid kyi rgyu chos rnams ma yin
381b1(mdo sde): pa'i bar du ste/ gnyis ka phan tshun du spyod yul ma yin/ phan tshun du brdar brtags pa ma yin/ rnam par rgyu ba ma yin/ yang dag par gnas pa yin/ yang dag par 'du ba ma yin/
381b2(mdo sde): brjod du med pa dag yin/ pha rol dang tshu rol la gnas pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la yang dag par brten pa dag yin no/ /kye yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa 'di bshad
381b3(mdo sde): pa na bdud kyi bu 'od 'phro rtsub bdud kyi 'khro sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa nyi khri dang lhan cig tu rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de'i tshe lha dang mi sngon gyi
381b4(mdo sde): rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ sems can dpag yas pa'ang bsam gtan dang po la gnas par gyur pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar thob par gyur to/ kha cig ni/ 'bras
381b5(mdo sde): bu dang po la gnas par gyur pa nas 'bras bu gsum pa la gnas par gyur pa'i bar du'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sa bon bskyed pa nas rkyen gyi theg pa la sa bon bskyed
381b6(mdo sde): pa'i bar du'o/ /kha cig gis ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /klu'i 'khor de'i nang nas kyang klu dkrigs phrag drug cus bla na med pa yang dag
381b7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed par gyur te/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad dus chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu 'gul to/ /der phyogs bcu nas
382a1(mdo sde): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag lhags pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
382a2(mdo sde): 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu phye ba'i rin po che'i char ba dang / ras bcos bu'i char ba dang / me tog gi char pa sna tshogs rab tu phab ste gsol pa/ sngon mthos pa'i 'dus pa
382a3(mdo sde): 'di dang / ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di ni/ mchog tu ngo mtshar lags shing rmad du byung ba lags so/ /'di ni/ shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa lags so/ /
382a4(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i sde'i mdo'i gzungs sngags 'di bzung nas rang rnag gi sangs rgyas kyi
382a5(mdo sde): zhing rnams su sems can rnams la rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/ /der bdud dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
382a6(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / sha za gang dag lhags pa de dag gis kyang mchog tu ngo mtshar thob nas sil snyan rnam pa sna
382a7(mdo sde): tshogs kyi sgra 'byin par byed cing bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras bcos su dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / dri dang / byug pa
382b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste
382b2(mdo sde): bdag gi gnas su rgya mtsho chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs par gsol/ der bcom ldan 'das las bdag 'khor dang bcas pas nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di thog
382b3(mdo sde): ma dang / par dang / tha ma 'di thams cad mnyan par bgyi lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag 'gro'i bdag po/ de de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho chen por mi
382b4(mdo sde): gshegs so/ /gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ su zhig sems rtse gcig pas nyi ma'i snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di nyan par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos
382b5(mdo sde): bsod nams mang po ji snyed cig skyed par bgyid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag 'gro'i bdag po/ sems can su la la zhig byung nas gling bzhi pa 'di thams
382b6(mdo sde): cad rin po che thams cad kyis yongs su gnag bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin par byed pa dang / skyes bu gcig shos su zhig sems rtse gcig pas nyi ma'i
382b7(mdo sde): snying po lung bstan pa chen po 'di thams cad yongs su rdzogs par nyan par byed na/ bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po gcig shos 'di la brgya'i char yang /

396b2(mdo sde): gis mthong / gsol pa/ bdag cag 'khor 'dus pas mig gis mthong lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gser gyi mdog can gyis khyod kyi
396b3(mdo sde): mig dang yid snang bar byas par smra na/ khyod kyi mig gis mthong mod kyi/ khyod kyi sems gang zhig bdag gi phyag gis snang bar bgyi ba'i yul du 'gyur/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/
396b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sems gang du gnas pa 'dri na/ bdag gis sems btsal te dpyad cing nan tar gtugs pa na dpyod cing gtugs pa 'di ni/ sems lags so snyam du sems
396b5(mdo sde): so| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thong / 'di ni/ khyod kyi sems yin no/ /zhes so/ /kun dga' bo dngangs te stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la
396b6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ 'di nyid bdag gi sems ma yin na/ ci zhig bdag gi sems yin/ bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni/ phyi rol don gyis stongs pa'i sems kyi rnam pa rdzun pa ste/ yang dag pa'i
396b7(mdo sde): sems kyi rang bzhin rnyog par byed do/ /khyod kyis thog ma med pa nas da lta'i bar du rkun po la rang gi bur rlom pas/ sems kyi rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid stor bas na 'khor bar 'khor
397a1(mdo sde): ro| |kun dga' bos gsol pa/ ston pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nu bo tha chung lags te/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon par dad pas rab tu
397a2(mdo sde): byung ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid la bsnyen bkur ba nas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi zhing khams kyi mthar thug pa'i bcom ldan 'das bshes gnyen la dge ba'i rtsa ba sgrub pa'i snying
397a3(mdo sde): stobs chen po bskyed de bya bar dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad pa mtha' dag sems 'di kho na'i bgyi ba lags so/ /dam pa'i chos la skur pa 'debs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba smad par byed pa rnams
397a4(mdo sde): kyang sems 'di nyid lags so/ /da lta rnam par dpyod pa'i sems 'di nyid ma yin par gsungs na/ da ni/ sems nyid med par 'gyur te/ sa dang shing lta bur 'gyur ro/ /sems
397a5(mdo sde): gsal ba nyid dang bral na ni/ gzhan ci zhig yod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ 'di ltar gsungs te/ 'di sems nyid ma yin par gsungs te/ bdag dngangs par
397a6(mdo sde): ma zad nyan thos 'di dag kyang the tshom med pa ma mchis so/ /thugs rje chen pos bdag cag gi rmongs pa bsal du gsol/ de'i tshe ston pas kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi 'khor 'dus pa
397a7(mdo sde): dang bcas pa thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su 'chad par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa nyid kyis kun dga' bo'i spyi
397b1(mdo sde): bor phyag bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'chad pa na/ chos thams cad kyi 'byung ba ni/ sems las 'byung ba ste/ 'jig rten rdul phra rab yan chad kyi rgyu dang
397b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu thams cad kyang sems kyi rgyu las dngos por red par bshad de/ kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten na yod pa'i chos thams cad kyi nang na rtswa dang / lo ma dang / snal ma dang / 'jur
397b3(mdo sde): mdud yan chad kyang rgyu'i rnam pa dang bcas pa ste/ stong pa'i ngo bo dag kyang ming dang / rnam pa dang bcas so/ /'od gsal ba'i sems rmad du byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sems kyi
397b4(mdo sde): khams ni/ ji ltar na dngos po med par 'gyur/ gal te khyod kyis ci nas rnam par 'byed pa rtog cing dpyod pa'i sems kun tu gsal ba 'di nyid ga sems kyi bdag nyid du mngon par
397b5(mdo sde): zhen na| de lta na gzugs dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya sogs las su bya ba'i yul thams cad dang bral ba'i gzhan du sems kyi dngos po yongs su rdzogs pa zhig yod par 'gyur
397b6(mdo sde): ro| |de ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'chad pa nyan pa na rnam par 'byed pa'i rtog pa 'di ni/ chos kyi sgra nyid las 'byung zhing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dang sgra yongs su chad pa'i
397b7(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems kho nar yongs su brtags par gnas pa na yang chos kyi yul gyis bcings te/ rdul gyi gzugs brnyan la rnam par dpyod pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag gis khyod la sems
398a1(mdo sde): med par blta bar bshad pa ma yin te/ gzhan du na khyod kyis sems nyid la so sor rtog bas dpyod par gyis shig /gal te yul gyi rnam pa dang bral
398a2(mdo sde): ba'i rnam par 'byed pa'i sems nyid ka khyod kyi sems yin na/ rnam par 'byed pa'i sems yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba ni/ dngos po med par 'gyur la/ 'on te 'di nyid ka
398a3(mdo sde): yul gyi rnam pa rnam par rig pa'i rdul gyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra na/ yul ni/ mi rtag pa ste/ de nyid 'gag pa'i dus su phyin pa na sems nyid rus spal gyi spu dang / ri
398a4(mdo sde): bong gi rwa dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyi chos nyid kyi sku dang lhan cig chad pa dang 'gag par 'gyur bas gang zhig gis skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod par 'gyur/
398a5(mdo sde): de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pa cang mi smra bar ngo mtshar zhing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten na lam yongs
398a6(mdo sde): su slob pa rnams da ltar mthar gyis snyoms 'jug dgu la bslab kyang zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom par mi 'gyur te/ skye 'chi'i rnam par rtog pa sems nyid la bden par
398a7(mdo sde): rlom pas so/ /de yang kun dga' bo khyod kyang mang du thos pa nyid na'ang 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par ma gyur ro/ /kun dga' bos de skad thos pa dang / yang mchi
398b1(mdo sde): ma blags te yan lag lngas sa la gtugs nas pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag gis ston pa'i zham 'bring par rab tu byung nas ston pa'i gzi
398b2(mdo sde): byin gyi mthu las rtag tu bsam pa na bdag gis yongs su 'bad pa med par ci zhig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin stsal par bgyid do snyam du sems lags te/ lus sems tha
398b3(mdo sde): dad du yongs su ma rtogs lags pas/ bdag gis sems kyi de kho na nyid stor bar gyur na/ lus kyis tshangs par spyad na'ang sems kyis 'bras bu mngon du ma byas te/ dper na/ bu
398b4(mdo sde): dbul pos rang gi pha bskyur te bros pa bzhin no/ /da ste mang du thos na'ang bsgoms pas yid la ma byas na ni/ ma thos pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis zas bzang por bsnyad
398b5(mdo sde): kyang ro ma myong ba bzhin no/ /ston pa/ bdag cag ni/ da lta sgrib pa gnyis kyis bcings pas/ sems kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par ma gyur lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag
398b6(mdo sde): ma gon med skyabs med rnams la thugs brtse bas sems kyi de kho na nyid gsal bar mdzad cing chos kyi mig 'byed par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi
398b7(mdo sde): thugs kyi dpal be'u las 'od zer gyi tshogs kha dog brgya stong 'khrug pa spros te/ phyogs bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dus gcig tu bskor te/ zhing bkod
399a1(mdo sde): pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor la reg nas slar 'khyil te kun dga' ba dang / 'khor 'dus pa rnams kyang snang bar byas so/ /kun dga' bo la
399a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi slad du chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng zhing / phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la yang zab cing gsang ba'i de kho na nyid dang / dag cing
399a3(mdo sde): gsal ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gsal bar byed cing rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob par byas so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis sngar lan gsol ba'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
399a4(mdo sde): 'od 'phro ba'i khu tshur rgyu cis na/ yod par smra/ ji ltar na/ khu tshur du grub/ ci zhig gis mthong bar gyur/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dzam+bu chu bo'i gser
399a5(mdo sde): gyi mdog can rin po che'i ri bo dang mtshungs pa dag cing gsal bar 'khrungs pas na/ 'od zer gyis rgyas lags te/ bdag cag gi mig lam du snang ba na phyag sor gyi
399a6(mdo sde): 'khor lo rnam par bzlums te ston par mdzad pa las na/ khu tshur gyi rnam par snang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis da ste bde ba'i bka'
399a7(mdo sde): yis gsal bar bgyi ste/ blo gros dang ldan pa rnams ni/ dpes bsnyad pa na rtogs par 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ /dper na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khu tshur ni/ bcom
399b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi phyag ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khu tshur du mi 'grub la/ khyod kyi mig ma mchis na/ khyod kyis mthong bar mi 'grub ste/ khyod kyi mig gi dbang po bcom ldan
399b2(mdo sde): 'das kyi phyag dang dper bgyis pa na 'dra bar mchis sam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ de de bzhin te/ ston pa/ bdag gi mig gi dbang po dang bral na ni/ bdag gis mthong
399b3(mdo sde): bar mi 'grub ste/ bdag gi mig gi dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang dper bgyis pa ni/ don mtshungs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal pa/ khyod kyis 'dra
399b4(mdo sde): bar bsnyad pa ni/ don 'dra ba ma yin te/ ci'i phyir na/ lag pa med pa'i mi la khu tshur nyid med par rigs te/ dper na/ mig med pa'i mis mthong ba rnam pa thams cad du med
399b5(mdo sde): par mi rung ngo / /de ci'i slad du na/ khyod kyis lam du 'gro ba'i long ba rnams la khyod kyis ci zhig mthong zhes bgam ste 'di bar bya ste/ des ni/ gdon mi za bar mun pa nyid mthong
399b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te gzhan mi mthong ngo / /zhes smra ba las brtsams te bsam pa na yul gyi rnam pa ni/ mun pa ste/ mthong ba ni/ dri ba med do/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ long ba'i
399b7(mdo sde): mdun du mun pa snang ba la ji ltar na mthong bar bsnyad par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ long bas mthong ba'i mun pa dang / mig ldan pas mthong ba'i phug
400a1(mdo sde): gi mun pa gnyis la khyad par mchis sam/ 'on te ma mchis/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ de de bzhin te/ ston pa/ phug na gnas pa'i mun pa dang / long
400a2(mdo sde): bas mthong ba'i mun pa gnyis la tha dad du bya ba ci yang ma mchis so/ /bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ long bas mun pa mthong bar gyur na/ glo bur du mig dang ldan par gyur na
400a3(mdo sde): mdun gyi yul gyi rnam pa kha dog sna tshogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ram/ de lta na mun pa'i phug na gnas pa'i skyes bus mdun gyi mun pa mthong ba na blo bur du sgron me sbar ba'i tshe yul
400a4(mdo sde): gyi rnam pa kha dog sna tshogs pa mthong ba na sgron mes mthong bar bsnyad par rigs so/ /gal te sgron me mthong bar 'gyur na ni/ sgron me nyid kyis mthong bar nus pas sgron mer
400a5(mdo sde): bsnyad par mi bgyid la/ gal te sgron me mthong bar gyur ni/ mig la rag ma lus pa nyid do/ /des na/ 'di ltar rtogs par bya ste/ sgron mes gzugs snang bar nus pa dang
400a6(mdo sde): mthong ba 'di ni/ mig nyid de sgron mes ma yin pa/ mig gis gzugs gsal bar nus pa nyid la rang bzhin mthong ba ni/ sems kyis mthong ba yin gyi/ mig gis ni/ ma yin
400a7(mdo sde): no| |zhes gsungs pa dang / kun dga' bo/ /'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pas ston pa'i bka' 'di yang thos par 'gyur te chang mi smra bar 'khod kyang da dung sems kyis rtogs par
400b1(mdo sde): ma gyur te/ slad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos rjes su bzung bar gsol ba'i slad du thal mo sbyar te gus pas btud de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyogs te blta
400b2(mdo sde): zhing 'dug go / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis shing bal ltar 'jam zhing dra bas 'brel ba'i phyag gser gyi 'od can brkyang ste phyag sor gyi 'khor lo yongs su phye ste 'khor 'dus pa dang bcas pa'i
400b3(mdo sde): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis bdud rtsi thog mar rnyed nas drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi nags su kun shes kaun+Di n+ya la sogs pa dge slong lnga sde dang 'khor rnam bzhi la/ sems
400b4(mdo sde): can thams cad byang chub ma thob cing dgra bcom par ma gyur pa ni/ yul gyi mgron po nyon mongs pa'i tshogs kyis bslad pa'o/ /zhes 'chad par mdzad de/ de'i tshe ji ltar na yongs su
400b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par khyed cag gis 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ de'i tshe kun shes kaun+Di n+ya stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag ni/ na tshod yol ba lags te/

400b7(mdo sde): mgron khang du sleb ste nyal ba'am za bar brtsams te don mngon par 'grub pa na/ byes kyi chas rnams bsnams te yang lam du 'gro bar brtsams nas 'dug par mi sems pa ste/ gal
401a1(mdo sde): te gzhir 'khod pa zhig na gzhan du 'gro bar mi byed de/ bdag ni/ 'di ltar sems te/ mgron po ni/ mi sdod cing gzhir 'khod pa ni/ sdod pa ste/ sdod par mi
401a2(mdo sde): byed pa nyid la mgron po/ zhes brjod snyam mo/ /yang dper na/ nam mkha' drangs pa na nyi ma'i zer snod du phog pa na rdul phra mo'i tshogs nam mkha'i khams la gsal bar 'gyur te/
401a3(mdo sde): rdul phran g.yo ba nyid na'ang nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba ni/ g.yo ba med de/ bdag gis 'di ltar bsam ste/ dwangs shing mi sgrib pa ni/ stong par bsnyad de/ g.yo zhing 'gyur ba

401b6(mdo sde): bos g.yon du kyogs te blta ba na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi mgo bo da lta ji ltar na g.yo bar 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rin

402a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i gsang ba sgrub pa'i don mngon par thob pa'i rgyu/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ston pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gtsug tor dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba
402b1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po gnyis pa/ de'i tshe kun dga' bo 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su stsal pa'i bka' thos pas lus sems sim pa myong ste/ thog ma med
402b2(mdo sde): pa nas rang gi de kho na nyid stor bas/ phyi rol gyi yul rdzun pa la bden par zhen te gzugs brnyan rnam par 'byed par gyur pa las/ da ste legs par rtogs pas nu ma stor ba'i byis pa
402b3(mdo sde): glo bur du brtse ba'i ma dang 'phrad pa ltar gyur te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' rjes su mnyan par sems pas/ lus sems mngon du byas
402b4(mdo sde): te| don dam dang kun rdzob bam/ bden pa dang rdzun pa da lta mngon sum du mthong ba'i skye 'gag yod pa dang / skye 'gag dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal
402b5(mdo sde): bar mdzad du gsol zhes re zhing sdod do/ /de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal langs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag gis sngon sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa ma thos pa'i tshe ka t+yA
402b6(mdo sde): na dang yang dag rgyal ba can sogs kyis shi ba'i tshe bem rig rgyun chad pa la myang 'das zhes smra ba thos so/ /da ste sangs rgyas mjal ba na bdag gi yid nem nur du gyur te/ ji ltar na/ da
402b7(mdo sde): lta'i sems 'di skye 'gag med pa'i gnas gsal bar mdzad par 'gyur snyam ste/ 'khor 'dus pa'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang de kho na ltar sems lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
403a1(mdo sde): kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis khyod la 'di 'dri ste/ khyod kyi sha rus rdos bcas kyi lus 'di rdo rje ltar gzhom du med bzhig gam/ 'on
403a2(mdo sde): te 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang bcas grang zhes smra/ gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/ ston pa/ bdag gi lus 'di mthar 'jig pa'i chos can nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsal
403a3(mdo sde): rgyal la bka' stsal pa/ khyod da lta gson bzhin du ji ltar 'jig pa'i chos can du shes/ gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa/ ston pa/ bdag gi lus mi rtag cing 'jig pa'i chos can
403a4(mdo sde): da lta ma zhig mod kyang / bdag gi sems da lta dran rig da lta yang skye zhing yang 'jig pa glo bur glo bur du 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa/ mes thal bar byed pa ltar 'phral 'phral du
403a5(mdo sde): 'jig cing 'gag pa mthong ba las na/ 'gag pa rang 'jig pa med par mi 'gyur bas nges na/ bdag gi lus mthar 'jig pa'i chos can du nges par rtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das
403a6(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rgyal po/ khyod ni/ da lta lang tsho yol te byad bzhin dar la babs pa'i skabs las rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba lags mod/ gsal rgyal
403a7(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/ ston pa/ bdag byis pa'i skabs su sha pags 'jam zhing 'khril chags la/ dar la babs pa'i skabs su rtsal stobs yongs su rgyas pa las/ da lta lang
403b1(mdo sde): tsho yol bas rtsal stobs rgud cing dran pa rmongs pa la thug pas lus kyi rang bzhin 'gyur la zungs dma' zhing khams rnyog pas/ skra dkar gnyer ma lhags pas ring por mi thogs te/ ji
403b2(mdo sde): ltar na| sngon gyi dar la babs pa'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po/ khyod kyi lang tsho glo bur du rgas par lta mchis sam/ gsal
403b3(mdo sde): rgyal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lang tsho ni/ khad kyis yol ba ste/ mngon pa ma yin par dbyar dgu na dus kyis 'gyur bas rim gyis gtugs par gyur nas tshod 'dir sleb
403b4(mdo sde): snyam lags te/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag lo nyi shu lon pa na gzhon pa nyid na'ang byad bzhin 'gyur bas/ lo bcu'i dus las rgud par gyur la/ lo sum cu'i tshe nyi shu las kyang rgud la/ da
403b5(mdo sde): lta ni| lo gnyis kyis lhag pa'i drug cu lags te/ sngon lo lnga bcu'i gnas skabs na 'di bas gzhon sha can lags so/ /ston pa/ rim gyis lang tsho yol ba'i rnam 'gyur rjes su dpag
403b6(mdo sde): ste| re zhig lo bcu bcu na rnam 'gyur mngon par 'gyur ro/ /yang zhib tu brtags tshe lo khyud kor re la 'gyur bar ma zad lo re bzhin 'gyur ba dang / lo rer ma zad zla rer dang /
403b7(mdo sde): zla rer ma zad nyin rer yang 'gyur ba dang / zhib tu na skad cig skad cig la yid 'gyur ba'i bar dag tu yang mi brtan pa ste/ des na bdag gi lus mthar 'jig pa'i chos can du ngas
404a1(mdo sde): par rtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis rnam par 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa'i ngang tshul mthong bas/ khyod mthar
404a2(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i chos can du shes na/ ci khyod mthar 'jig pa'i tshe na khyod la mi 'jig pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mchis sam/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la
404a3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bdag gis nges par ma 'khums lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis rtogs par bya ste/ rang bzhin ni/ skye 'gag ma mchis so/ /rgyal
404a4(mdo sde): po| khyod kyis sngon nam zhig na gang+gA'i klung mthong ba yin/ rgyal pos gsol pa/ bdag lo gsum na mas bkur te khyab 'jug gi lha khang mjal bar dong ba'i tshe klung babs pa
404a5(mdo sde): mthong ste/ de'i tshe gang+gA yin par 'khums lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po/ khyod kyis smras pa lta na lo nyi shu na lo bcu las brgal ba nas bzung ste drug
404a6(mdo sde): cu'i bar du lo dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / dus tshod re re bzhin yid tsam re rnam par 'gyur bar smra na/ khyod kyis lo gsum na gang+gA'i klung mthong ba las/ lo bcu gsum pa'i
404a7(mdo sde): tshe mthong ba na ci gang+gA gzhan du 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ lo gsum gyi tshe mthong ba las gzhan du ma 'gyur zhing / lo drug cu na yang de kho na ltar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
404b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod da lta skra dkar gnyer ma lhags pas na/ bzhin byis pa'i gnas skabs yos nges par rgas par gyur mod/ khyod kyis sngon byis pa'i gnas skabs su mthong ba
404b2(mdo sde): las gang+gA gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dbye ba lta mchis sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po/ /khyod kyi bzhin rgas shing / rang
404b3(mdo sde): bzhin ni/ rgas pa med do/ rgas pa ni/ 'gyur ba zhes bya la/ rgas pa med pa ni/ mi 'gyur ba zhes bya'o/ /'gyur ba ni/ skye 'chi nyams su myong la/ 'gyur ba med pa nyid ni/ gdod
404b4(mdo sde): nas skye 'chi ma mchis na/ de ji ltar na/ khyod kyis skye 'chi nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ des na ci'i phyir khyod kyis da dung kun tu rgyu sogs kyi rjes su 'brangs te shi ba'i tshe bem rig chad par
404b5(mdo sde): smra bar bgyid/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de skad thos pa dang / lus 'di brjes pa'i tshe rten 'di bor nas skye ba gzhan len pa/ 'khor 'dus pa dang lhan cig sngon ma thos pa'i gtam gyis
404b6(mdo sde): lhag par rtsen zhing dga' ba nyams su myong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe kun dga' bo stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te pus mo btsugs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
404b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gsung 'di 'khums pa lam na/ rang bzhin ni/ skye 'gag ma mchis te/ ji ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag so so'i skye bo rnams kyis rang
405a1(mdo sde): gi rang bzhin brlag ste phyin ci log tu spyod par gsungs/ des na byams brtses bdag gi dri ma sbyang du gsol/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gser gyi
405a2(mdo sde): mdog can 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa 'og tu brkyang ste kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis bdag gi phyag rgya 'di mthong ba las gyen du blta bar smra'am/ thur du blta
405a3(mdo sde): bar smra| kun dga' bos gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnams kyis ni/ 'di la thur du blta bar smra ste/ gang zhig ni/ gyen dang / gang zhig thur du bsnyad par bdag gis ma 'khums

405a5(mdo sde): dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag bsgrengs te shing bal ltar 'jam pa'i sor mo steng du bstan pa'i tshe de la gyen du bsnyad par bgyi mod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
405a6(mdo sde): bsgrengs te kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar steng 'og phan tshun gos brjes pa la 'jig rten pa rnams 'dra bar mthong ba yin snyam na/ khyed cag gi lus dang / bcom ldan
405a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi dag gsal chos kyi sku gnyis dpe mtshungs su phye ba'i tshe go bar nus yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni/ yang dag par rtogs la/ khyed cag gi lus ni/ rang bzhin
405b1(mdo sde): phyin ci log tu bsnyad pa de la khyod kyis dpyad cing bltas pa na khyod kyi lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dper byas pa'i tshe phyin ci log tu bsnyad na ci zhig phyin ci log ces brjod/ de'i tshe kun

405b3(mdo sde): kyis byams brtse bskyed de kun dga' bo dang / 'khor 'dus pa la thugs kyis bsrang ste rgya mtsho'i rlabs dang mtshungs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu

405b6(mdo sde): khon nyid kyi rin po che ster nas ye shes nyid las rmongs pa tshol bar byed/ rmongs pa las ni/ stong pa'i skabs phye zhing / rmongs pa dang / stong pa'i 'jur mdud las gzugs dang / de
405b7(mdo sde): las yang 'du shes sna tshogs pa 'byung zhing / de las phung por red par 'gyur ro/ /rgyu'i rnams 'dus pa las nang gi g.yeng ba'i rnam rtog gis bskyod pas phyi rol gyi don thams cad la
406a1(mdo sde): rgyug pas 'khrul zhing 'khyams nas rnyog pa'i rnam pa la sems kyi rang bzhin du 'khrul lo/ /de ltar gcig tu rmongs pas na/ gzugs kyi dngos po nyid nang
406a2(mdo sde): g i rang bzhin du bzung nas rtag tu phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi dngos po ri klung dang nam mkha' stong pas chen po'i bar thams cad rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba'i rang bzhin yin
406a3(mdo sde): pa ma shes so/ /dper na/ dwangs shing gsal ba'i rgya mtsho chen po stong phrag brgya pa yongs su dor nas chu bur phra mo'i rnam pa la rba rlabs su bltas te rgya mtsho chen por rtag tu 'khrul

406a6(mdo sde): mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmad du byung ba de ltar thos pa las rmad du byung ba'i sems 'od gsal ba/ yongs su rdzogs pa/

406b1(mdo sde): du byed pa la/ de lta bu'i sems tsam zhig thob mod kyi/ sems de nyid bden pa'i rtsa ba can du lta bar ma nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag par byams pa dang / brtse bas bdag gi the

407a2(mdo sde): rang bzhin yang med par 'gyur/ de ltar na/ sgra la rnam par rig pa'i sems kyi rang bzhin yod par ma zad/ bdag gi bzhin rnam par rig pa yang gzugs kyi rnam pa thams

408b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pas khyod kyis 'dir rang dang gzhan rnam par 'byed par rigs so/ /da lta ngas khyod kyi slad du snang ba de dag las gang zhig bdag gi rang bzhin yin/ gang zhig dngos po'i rang

409b2(mdo sde): khyab par gyur pa khyod ma yin na/ gzhan su zhig yin/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyi rang gi yang dag pa'i rang bzhin la the tshom za ba'i rang gi rang bzhin mi shes par ci'i phyir phyir zhing bdag la the tshom
409b3(mdo sde): za zhing 'dri bar bgyid/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te snang ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni/ gdon mi za bar bdag gi yin la gzhan gyi ma yin na/ bdag gis bcom

409b5(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ /phyir log ste bsam gtan gyi khang par sleb pa na kun dga' ra ba kho na mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi khang pa nas mnyam par bzhag pa'i tshe bya 'dab tsam zhig mthong
409b6(mdo sde): bar snang ngo / /ston pa/ snang ba 'di rang gi ngang gis 'jig rten khams khyab par snang la/ da ste khang pa'i nang du gang bar snang ngo / /snang ba 'di chen po rnams 'dus nas chung bar gyur tam/
409b7(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang sgrib yol gyis chod pas bskal par gyur tam/ 'di'i do na gang na gnas pa bdag gis ma shes pas thugs rje chen pos bdag gi slad du rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom
410a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi las don che chung phyi nang thams cad mdun rol gyi yul snang gis bsdus pa ste/
410a2(mdo sde): mthong ba 'di la bkram pa dang / bcum par smra bar mi bya'o/ /dper na/ snod gru bzhi ba'i nang gi stong pa gru bzhi pa mthong ba dang mtshungs so/ /kho bos khyod la yang 'dri bar bya ste/ snod
410a3(mdo sde): gru bzhi pa 'di'i nang gi stong pa gru bzhi pa snang ba de nges par gru bzhi pa yin nam/ gru bzhi pa ma nges pa yin grang / gal te nges par gru bzhi pa yin na ni/ snod zlum po bzhag pa'i tshe
410a4(mdo sde): de'i nang gi stong pa zlum por mi 'gyur la/ gal te ma nges pa yin tshe snod gru bzhi pa'i nang du yang stong pa gru bzhi pa med par 'gyur ro/ /khyod kyis don 'di gang du gnas pa ma shes par
410a5(mdo sde): smra na| don 'di'i rang bzhin ni/ de ltar yin na ji ltar gnas par smra bar bgyi/ kun dga' bo/ gru bzhi dang zlum po med par 'jug na ni/ snod kyi gru bzhi pa gsal bar bya yi stong
410a6(mdo sde): pa'i dngos po la gru bzhi pa med pas/ bar snang stong pa'i dngos po gru bzhi pa yod pa gsal bar bya'o/ /zhes smra par mi rigs so/ /gal te khyod kyis dris pa ltar khang pa'i nang du gnas
410a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshe mthong snang bcum nas chung dur byas pa yin na/ gyen du nyi ma la bltas pa'i tshe khyod kyis mthong snang 'di bteg nas nyi ma la sleb par byed dam/ gal te rtsig pa dang sgrib yol
410b1(mdo sde): gyis bar du bcad de/ sgrib par nus na skar khung chung du brus pa'i tshe ci mthong snang 'thud par 'gyur tam/ don 'di nyid de ltar ma yin no/ /sems can thams cad thog ma med pa nas rang
410b2(mdo sde): gi rang bzhin dngos po la zhen pas dngos po 'khrul par 'phyan pas na/ de dag stor te las chen po dang chung du zhes rlom par byed do/ /gal te dngos po las mngon par log pa'i tshe na de bzhin
410b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang mtshungs par gyur te/ lus dang sems yongs su ye nas dag cing de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor las g.yo ba med la/ ba spu'i khung bu gcig la yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rab
410b4(mdo sde): 'byams chud par byed do/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ ston pa/ gal te mthong snang 'di nyid bdag gi rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin yin na/ rmad du byung ba'i rang bzhin 'di ni/ bdag
410b5(mdo sde): gi mdun na gnas pas gdon mi za bar mthong ba nyid du bden pas da ni/ bdag gi lus dang sems ci zhig tu 'gyur/ bdag gi lus dang sems ni/ rnam par dbye bar byar yod kyang
410b6(mdo sde): mthong ba'i rang bzhin des bdag gi lus rnam par dbye bar ma mchis so/ /gal te bdag gi sems bdag la lta ba po'i rang bzhin yin tshe lta ba'i rang bzhin ni/ nges par bdag
410b7(mdo sde): gi yin par 'gyur la/ lus ni/ bdag gi ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sngon du dngos po bdag la lta bar 'gyur ba mi 'thad par gsungs pa dang cis mi
411a1(mdo sde): mtshungs/ brtse ba chen pos ma rtogs pa'i gnas rnam par 'byed par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mthong snang
411a2(mdo sde): 'di khyod kyi mdun du gnas par smras pa ni/ yang dag pa'i don ma yin no/ /gal te nges par mthong snang 'di khyod kyi mdun du gnas shing mthong bar nges pa yin na/ mthong ba'i rang
411a3(mdo sde): bzhin 'di ni/ phyogs cha dang bcas par 'gyur la/ bstan du med par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /der ma zad da lta khyod dang lhan cig rgyal byed tshal du bsdad nas nags tshal dang / klung rgyun
411a4(mdo sde): dang / pho brang dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / yar nyi zla'i bar dang / mdun du gang+gA la phyogs te yongs su bltas pa na/ khyod kyis bdag gi seng+ge'i khri'i mdun nas lag pa brkyang ste rnam
411a5(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs de dag ston par byed pa na 'thibs po ni/ nags tshal dang / snang ba ni/ nyi ma'i 'od dang / sgrib pa ni/ rtsig pa dang sgrib yol dang / thal byung ni/ stong pa yin te/ de ltar
411a6(mdo sde): rtswa shing nas spu nyag gi bar che chung so so tha dad pa yod kyang gzugs kyang yin phyin chad bstan du med pa ma yin no/ /gal te mthong snang 'di khyod kyi mdun du nges par gnas pa'i tshe khyod
411a7(mdo sde): gyis mdzub mos rig par bstan te/ gang zhig mthong snang yin pa ston par rigs so/ /kun dga' bo/ rig par bya ste/ gal te stong pa ni/ mthong snang yin na/ mthong snang du grub
411b1(mdo sde): pas ji ltar stong par 'gyur/ /gal te dngos po mthong snang yin na/ mthong snang du grub pas ji ltar dngos por 'gyur/ khyod kyis dngos po thams cad la zhib tu gzhigs te phra zhing
411b2(mdo sde): gsal ba dag cing rmad du byung ba'i mthong snang gi rang bzhin 'di dang 'di zhes bdag la bstan te dngos po de dag dang 'dra bar phye ste gsal bar ma 'dres par gyis shig / kun dga' bos
411b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bdag da lta khang pa brtsegs pa kun dga' ra ba gnas thag ring por chu bo gang+gA'i bar dang / yar nyi zlar bltas pa dang / lag pas bstan cing mig gis mthong du rung ba thams cad
411b4(mdo sde): dngos po kho na de mthong snang ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal bas gsungs pa ltar na/ bdag lta ba'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i nyan thos las dang po pa lta zhog /byang chub sems dpa' rnams
411b5(mdo sde): kyis kyang dngos po'i rnam pa thams cad las logs su mthong snang phye ste dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i rang gi rang bzhin bstan par mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/
411b6(mdo sde): de de bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis mthong snang 'di dngos po thams cad dang bral ba logs su rang gi rang bzhin med do/ /zhes smras kyang khyod kyis bstan pa'i dngos
411b7(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi nang na mthong snang du gdags pa ma mchis so/ /yang khyod la bshad par bya ste/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig rgyal byed tshal nas yang nags tshal dang rab nas nyi
412a1(mdo sde): zla'i bar du rnam pa sna tshogs pa la so sor dpyad pa na ci zhig ltar na'ang khyod kyi rmad du byung ba'i mthong snang bstan du med cing / khyod kyis yang dngos po de dag las
412a2(mdo sde): gang zhig mthong snang ma yin pa ston cig / kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed tshal la sogs pa bltas pa na de dag las gang zhig mthong snang ma yin pa ma 'khums so/ /
412a3(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ nags tshal nyid mthong snang ma yin na/ ji ltar na nags tshal mthong bar 'gyur/ ci ste nags tshal nyid mthong snang yin na yang ci zhig nags tshal mthong bar 'gyur/ /
412a4(mdo sde): zhes pa nas ji ltar stong pa mthong snang ma yin na/ stong pa nyid ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ gal te stong pa nyid mthong snang yin na/ yang ci zhig stong pa mthong bar 'gyur/ yang bdag gis
412a5(mdo sde): zhib tu brtags pa na dngos po de dag gi nang nas phra zhib zhib par phye ba'i tshe mthong snang ma yin pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /
412a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i slob pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' 'di thos pas sems blong blong bor 'gyur zhing / don de'i mtha' dang mu ma shes pas yud cig dngangs shing
412a7(mdo sde): nem nur du gyur te dran pa stor ba ltar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag rtab rtab bor gyur par gzigs nas byams brtse mngon du mdzad de kun dga' bo dang 'khor 'dus
412b1(mdo sde): pa rnams la rjes su ston pa'i slad du bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po bka' yang dag pa bden pa ste/ ji lta ba nyid ji bzhin du gsungs pa/ rdzun pa med cing bslu ba
412b2(mdo sde): med la| kun tu rgyu rnam pa bzhis 'chi ba med par brlang pos log par smras pa dang mi mtshungs so/ /khyed cag gis zhib tu brtag par bya ste/ brtse bas bskyangs pa'i re ba ma brlag cig /de'i
412b3(mdo sde): t she chos kyi rgyal po'i sras 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis 'khor rnam pa bzhi la brtse ba'i sems kyis 'khor 'dus pa mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
412b4(mdo sde): nas lag pa thal mo sbyar te gus pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'dus pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsal bar phye ba'i mthong ba rnam par dag pa gzugs
412b5(mdo sde): dang stong pa gnyis yin min gyi don ma rtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di'i mdun gyi rkyen gzugs dang stong pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gal te mthong ba yin na bstan du yod par rigs
412b6(mdo sde): so| |gal te mthong ba ma yin na/ mthong bar mi 'gyur bar rigs so/ /da lta don de nyid kyi gnas lugs mi shes pa'i phyir de ltar the tshom du gyur cing skrag par gyur te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
412b7(mdo sde): chung ba dag gi spyod yul ma yin no/ /des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtse ba chen pos dngos po 'di dag thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang / mthong ba'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sdod lugs de
413a1(mdo sde): nyid las gang zhig yin pa dang ma yin pa ma 'tshal na/ don 'di gsal bar phye nas bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam
413a2(mdo sde): dbyangs la sogs pa 'khor 'dus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams so sor ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
413a3(mdo sde): pa na der mthong ba dang mthong ba'i rkyen snang ba'i mtshan ma dag nam mkha'i me tog ltar gdod ma nas ci yang med do/ /mthong ba 'di dang rkyen 'di dag gdod ma nas rmad du byung ba'i byang chub
413a4(mdo sde): kyi dbyings rnam par dag cing gsal ba'i chos kyi sku der yang yin pa dang ma yin pa ni/ ji ltar gnas/ 'jam dpal/ ngas da lta khyod la dri yi/ dper na/ khyod 'jam dpal yin zhing /

413a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal yin zhing bdag las gzhan 'jam dpal med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag las gzhan 'jam dpal yod na gnyis su 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang da lta bdag gis 'jam
413a7(mdo sde): dpal med ces ma smras so/ /de la yin pa dang ma yin pa gnyis kyi mtshan ma med do/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmad du byung ba'i mthong ba
413b1(mdo sde): gsal ba 'di dang / yul stong pa nyid dag kyang de kho na bzhin no/ /gdod ma nas rmad du byung ba'i gsal ba bla na med pa'i byang chub yang dag pa'i sems dam pa'i bden pa yin no/ /rdzun pa'o

413b3(mdo sde): rang ngos nas zla ba yin pa dang / ma yin pa gnyis med do/ /de'i phyir da lta khyod kyi mthong ba dang mthong ba'i yul la rnam pa sna tshogs su gsal bar snang ba 'di ni/ log par rtog pa zhes bya ste/
413b4(mdo sde): 'di'i nang nas yin pa dang ma yin pa 'byed par mi nus so/ /de yang dag par rmad du byung ba'i gsal zhing rig pa'i rang bzhin la brten pas na khyod la bstan du yod pa dang / bstan du med pa
413b5(mdo sde): las 'da' bar nus so/ /de nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsung ba chos kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal ba'i rig pa'i rkyen phyogs
413b6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gsal zhing dwangs pas gtan du gnas pa'i rang bzhin skye 'gag med pa bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsung ba chos kyi rgyal pos bka' stsal pa ltar na/ sngon gyi bram ze ka pi las smras pa'i gsang tshig dang /
413b7(mdo sde): thal ba byug ba po la sogs pa'i phyi rol pa rnams kyis bdag bden bar yod cing phyogs bcur bya ba pa yin zhes pa 'di dang ji ltar
414a1(mdo sde): mi 'dra lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lang+ka'i ri la blo gros chen po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don 'di rgyas par bka' stsal pa'i tshe phyir
414a2(mdo sde): rol pa de dag rtag pa rang byung du smra la bdag gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bka' stsal pa 'di ni/ de rnams kyi shes par bya ba'i yul ma yin zhes bka' stsal na/ da lta gal

414a4(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa lta na/ de dag gis rang byung du grub ces smras pa dang 'dra bas ji ltar na rnam par phye ste bstan nas log pa'i lta ba gang la yang mi 'jug cing yang dag pa'i sems kyi gsal
414a5(mdo sde): zhing rig pa'i rang bzhin rtogs par mdzad du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ bdag gis da lta de lta bur thabs la mkhas

414b1(mdo sde): mthong ba 'di'i snang ba bdag gam/ mun pa bdag gam/ stong pa bdag gam/ bem po bdag yin/ kun dga' bo/ gal te snang ba bdag yin na/ mun pa mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal
414b2(mdo sde): te stong pa rang byung ba'i dngos po yin na/ bem po mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du des mtshon nas mun pa'i mtshan ma la sogs pa'i bar bdag yin na/ snang ba'i dus su mthong ba'i rang

414b6(mdo sde): bdag gis slar yang khyod la 'dri'o/ /da lta khyod kyis mthong ba'i rgyu nyid kyis rang bzhin rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes so zhe na/ yang mthong ba 'di snang ba la brten nas mthong ngam/ mun
414b7(mdo sde): pa la brten nas mthong ngam/ stong pa la brten nas mthong ngam/ bem po la brten nas mthong / kun dga' bo/ gal te snang ba la brten pa yin na/ mun pa mi mthong bar rigs so/ /mun
415a1(mdo sde): pa la brten pa yin na/ snang ba mi mthong bar rigs so/ /des mtshon nas stong pa la brten pa dang / bem po la brten pa'i bar du snang ba dang mun pa ltar ro/ /

415b1(mdo sde): bsngal bar byed pa tsam las nam mkha' stong pa la khyod kyi 'dod pa bzhin ji ltar 'dzin par nus/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal

415b3(mdo sde): stong pa la brten pa dang / snang ba la brten pa dang / sems la brten pa dang / mig la brten par bka' stsal ba'i don ci lta bu lags/ 'di skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
